GP12mtp176pu:2460: sukhenādhyuṣito bhadre na manyurvidyate mama // MatsP_26.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:2461: āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi śivamastvatha me pathi /
GP12mtp176pu:2463: apramattodyatā nityam ārādhaya guruṃ mama // MatsP_26.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:2466: yadi māṃ dharmakāmārthaṃ pratyākhyāsyasi dharmataḥ // MatsP_26.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:2467: tataḥ kaca na te vidyā siddhimeṣā gamiṣyati // MatsP_26.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2468: *kaca uvāca guruputrīti kṛtvāhaṃ pratyākhyāsye na doṣataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2469: guruṇā cābhyanujñātaḥ kāmameva śapasva mām // MatsP_26.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2470: ārṣaṃ dharmaṃ bruvāṇo 'haṃ devayāni yathā tvayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2471: śaptuṃ nārho 'smi kalyāṇi kāmato 'dya ca dharmataḥ // MatsP_26.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2472: tasmādbhavatyā yaḥ kāmo na tathā sambhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:2473: ṛṣiputro na te kaścij jātu pāṇiṃ grahīṣyati // MatsP_26.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2474: phaliṣyati na me vidyā tvadvacaśceti tattayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2475: adhyāpayiṣyāmi ca yaṃ tasya vidyā phaliṣyati // MatsP_26.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2481: na te yaśaḥ praṇaśitā bhāgabhākca bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_26.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:2483: *śaunaka uvāca kṛtavidye kace prāpte hṛṣṭarūpā divaukasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2484: kacādavetya tāṃ vidyāṃ kṛtārthā bharatarṣabha // MatsP_27.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:2490: vāyurbhūtaḥ sa vastrāṇi sarvāṇyeva vyamiśrayat // MatsP_27.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2491: tato jalāt samuttīrya tāḥ kanyāḥ sahitāstadā /
GP12mtp176pu:2493: tatra vāso devayānyāḥ śarmiṣṭhā jagṛhe tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:2498: kasmādgṛhṇāsi me vastraṃ śiṣyā bhūtvā mamāsuri /
GP12mtp176pu:2499: samudācārahīnāyā na te śreyo bhaviṣyati // MatsP_27.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:2501: āsīnaṃ ca śayānaṃ ca pitā te pitaraṃ mama /
GP12mtp176pu:2502: stauti pṛcchati cābhīkṣṇaṃ nīcasthaḥ suvinītavat // MatsP_27.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2504: sutāhaṃ stūyamānasya dadato na tu gṛhṇataḥ // MatsP_27.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2505: anāyudhā sāyudhāyāḥ kiṃ tvaṃ kupyasi bhikṣuki /
GP12mtp176pu:2506: lapsyase pratiyoddhāraṃ na ca tvāṃ gaṇayāmyaham // MatsP_27.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:2507: *śaunaka uvāca sā vismayaṃ devayānīṃ gatāṃ saktāṃ ca vāsasi /
GP12mtp176pu:2513: nāhuṣiḥ prekṣamāṇo hi sa nipāne gatodake /
GP12mtp176pu:2514: dadarśa kanyāṃ tāṃ tatra dīptāmagniśikhām iva // MatsP_27.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:2518: dīrghaṃ dhyāyasi cātyarthaṃ kasmācchvasiṣi cāturā // MatsP_27.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2519: kathaṃ ca patitā hy asmin kūpe vīruttṛṇāvṛte /
GP12mtp176pu:2520: duhitā caiva kasya tvaṃ vada sarvaṃ sumadhyame // MatsP_27.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2523: tasya śukrasya kanyāhaṃ tvaṃ māṃ nūnaṃ na budhyase // MatsP_27.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2524: eṣa me dakṣiṇo rājan pāṇis tāmranakhāṅguliḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2525: samuddhara gṛhītvā māṃ kulīnastvaṃ hi me mataḥ // MatsP_27.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2526: jānāmi tvāṃ ca saṃśāntaṃ vīryavantaṃ yaśasvinam /
GP12mtp176pu:2527: tasmānmāṃ patitāṃ kūpād asmād uddhartumarhasi // MatsP_27.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2528: *śaunaka uvāca tāmatha brāhmaṇīṃ strīṃ ca vijñāya nahuṣātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2529: gṛhītvā dakṣiṇe pāṇāv ujjahāra tato 'vaṭāt // MatsP_27.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:2531: āmantrayitvā suśroṇīṃ yayātiḥ svapuraṃ yayau // MatsP_27.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:2532: gate tu nāhuṣe tasmin devayānyapi ninditā /
GP12mtp176pu:2535: tvaritaṃ ghūrṇike gaccha sarvamācakṣva me pituḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2536: nedānīṃ tu pravekṣyāmi nagaraṃ vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ // MatsP_27.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:2537: *śaunaka uvāca sā tu vai tvaritaṃ gatvā ghūrṇikāsuramandiram /
GP12mtp176pu:2539: ācakhyau ca mahābhāgā devayānī vane hatā /
GP12mtp176pu:2541: śrutvā duhitaraṃ kāvyas tadā śarmiṣṭhayā hatām /
GP12mtp176pu:2542: tvarayā niryayau duḥkhān mārgamāṇaḥ sutāṃ vane // MatsP_27.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:2546: manye duścaritaṃ te 'sti tasyeyaṃ niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā // MatsP_27.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:2548: niṣkṛtir vāstu vā māstu śṛṇuṣvāvahito mama /
GP12mtp176pu:2551: evaṃ hi me kathayati śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī // MatsP_27.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:2553: stuvato duhitāsi tvaṃ yācataḥ pratigṛhṇataḥ // MatsP_27.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:2558: prasādayiṣye śarmiṣṭhām ityuktā hi sakhī mayā // MatsP_27.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:2559: *śukra uvāca stuvato duhitā na tvaṃ bhadre na pratigṛhṇataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2561: vṛṣaparvaiva tadveda śakro rājā ca nāhuṣaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2562: acintyaṃ brahma nirdvaṃdvam aiśvaraṃ hi balaṃ mama // MatsP_27.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:2564: *śukra uvāca yaḥ pareṣāṃ naro nityam ativādāṃstitikṣati /
GP12mtp176pu:2565: devayāni vijānīhi tena sarvamidaṃ jitam // MatsP_28.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:2566: yaḥ samutpatitaṃ krodhaṃ nigṛhṇāti hayaṃ yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:2567: sa yantetyucyate sadbhir na yo raśmiṣu lambate // MatsP_28.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:2569: devayāni vijānīhi tena sarvamidaṃ jitam // MatsP_28.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:2571: yathoragastvacaṃ jīrṇāṃ sa vai puruṣa ucyate // MatsP_28.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2573: yaśca tapto na tapati bhṛśaṃ so 'rthasya bhājanam // MatsP_28.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:2574: yo yajedaśvamedhena māsi māsi śataṃ samāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2575: yastu kupyenna sarvasya tayorakrodhano varaḥ // MatsP_28.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:2577: naitatprājñastu kurvīta viduste na balābalam // MatsP_28.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:2579: vedāhaṃ tāta bālāpi kāryāṇāṃ tu gatāgatam /
GP12mtp176pu:2580: krodhe caivātivāde vā kāryasyāpi balābale // MatsP_28.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:2582: asatsaṃkīrṇavṛtteṣu vāso mama na rocate // MatsP_28.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2584: na teṣu nivasetprājñaḥ śreyorthī pāpabuddhiṣu // MatsP_28.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2586: teṣu sādhuṣu vastavyaṃ sa vāsaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate // MatsP_28.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:2589: na hy ato duṣkaraṃ manye tāta lokeṣvapi triṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:2590: yaḥ sapatnaśriyaṃ dīptāṃ hīnaśrīḥ paryupāsate // MatsP_28.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:2592: *śaunaka uvāca tataḥ kāvyo bhṛguśreṣṭhaḥ samanyurupagamya ha /
GP12mtp176pu:2594: nādharmaścarito rājan sadyaḥ phalati gaur iva /
GP12mtp176pu:2596: yadi nātmani putreṣu na cetpaśyati naptṛṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:2599: yadā ghātayase vipraṃ kacamāṅgirasaṃ tadā // MatsP_29.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2603: sthātuṃ tvadviṣaye rājan na śaknomi tvayā saha // MatsP_29.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:2607: nāvadyaṃ na mṛṣāvādaṃ tvayi jānāmi bhārgava /
GP12mtp176pu:2608: tvayi satyaṃ ca dharmaśca tatprasīdatu māṃ bhavān // MatsP_29.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:2611: *śukra uvāca samudraṃ praviśadhvaṃ vo diśo vā vrajatāsurāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2612: duhiturnāpriyaṃ soḍhuṃ śakto 'haṃ dayitā hi me // MatsP_29.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2613: prasādyatāṃ devayānī jīvitaṃ yatra me sthitam /
GP12mtp176pu:2617: bhuvi hastirathāśvaṃ vā tasya tvaṃ mama ceśvaraḥ // MatsP_29.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2618: *śukra uvāca yatkiṃcid asti draviṇaṃ daityendrāṇāṃ mahāsura /
GP12mtp176pu:2620: *śaunaka uvāca tatastu tvaritaḥ śukras tena rājñā samaṃ yayau /
GP12mtp176pu:2621: uvāca caināṃ subhage pratipannaṃ vacastava // MatsP_29.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:2624: nābhijānāmi tatte 'haṃ rājā vadatu māṃ svayam // MatsP_29.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:2630: anuyāsyati māṃ tatra yatra dāsyati me pitā // MatsP_29.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2632: uttiṣṭha dhātri gaccha tvaṃ śarmiṣṭhāṃ śīghramānaya /
GP12mtp176pu:2633: yaṃ ca kāmayate kāmaṃ devayānī karotu tam // MatsP_29.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2634: *śaunaka uvāca tato dhātrī tatra gatvā śarmiṣṭhām idamabravīt /
GP12mtp176pu:2635: uttiṣṭha bhadre śarmiṣṭhe jñātīnāṃ sukhamāvaha // MatsP_29.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2637: yaṃ sā kāmayate kāmaṃ sa kāryo 'tra tvayānaghe /
GP12mtp176pu:2640: yaṃ ca kāmayate kāmaṃ karavāṇyahamadya tam /
GP12mtp176pu:2641: mā gānmanyuvaśaṃ śukro devayānī ca matkṛte // MatsP_29.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2642: *śaunaka uvāca tataḥ kanyāsahasreṇa vṛtā śibikayā tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:2646: dhruvaṃ tvāṃ tatra yāsyāmi yatra dāsyati te pitā // MatsP_29.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:2649: stūyamānasya duhitā kathaṃ dāsī bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_29.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:2652: anuyāsyāmyahaṃ tatra yatra dāsyati te pitā // MatsP_29.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:2657: amoghaṃ tava vijñānam asti vidyābalaṃ ca te // MatsP_29.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:2659: praviveśa puraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ pūjitaḥ sarvadānavaiḥ // MatsP_29.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:2661: *śaunaka uvāca atha dīrgheṇa kālena devayānī nṛpottama /
GP12mtp176pu:2662: vanaṃ tadaiva niryātā krīḍārthaṃ varavarṇinī // MatsP_30.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:2664: tameva deśaṃ samprāptā yathākāmaṃ cacāra sā // MatsP_30.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:2666: krīḍantyo 'bhiratāḥ sarvāḥ pibantyo madhu mādhavam // MatsP_30.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:2670: dadarśa devayānīṃ ca śarmiṣṭhāṃ tāśca yoṣitaḥ // MatsP_30.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:2672: upaviṣṭāṃ ca dadṛśe devayānīṃ śucismitām // MatsP_30.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:2677: gotre ca nāmanī caiva dvayoḥ pṛcchāmyato hy aham // MatsP_30.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:2680: śuko nāmāsuraguruḥ sutāṃ jānīhi tasya mām // MatsP_30.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2681: iyaṃ ca me sakhī dāsī yatrāhaṃ tatra gāminī /
GP12mtp176pu:2684: kathaṃ tu te sakhī dāsī kanyeyaṃ varavarṇinī /
GP12mtp176pu:2685: asurendrasutā subhūḥ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // MatsP_30.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:2688: vidhinā vihitaṃ jñātvā mā vicitraṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ // MatsP_30.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2689: rājavadrūpaveṣau te brāhmīṃ vācaṃ bibharṣi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:2690: kiṃnāmā tvaṃ kutaścāsi kasya putraśca śaṃsa me // MatsP_30.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:2692: brahmacaryeṇa vedo me kṛtsnaḥ śrutipathaṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2695: kena cārthena nṛpate hy enaṃ deśaṃ samāgataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2702: tvadadhīnāsmi bhadraṃ te sakhe bhartā ca me bhava // MatsP_30.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2704: viddhyauśanasi bhadraṃ te na tvadarho 'smi bhāmini /
GP12mtp176pu:2705: avivāhyāḥ sma rājāno devayāni pitustava // MatsP_30.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2707: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ brahmaṇā kṣatraṃ kṣatraṃ brahmaṇi saṃśritam /
GP12mtp176pu:2708: ṛṣiśca ṛṣiputraśca nāhuṣādya bhajasva mām // MatsP_30.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2711: pṛthagdharmāḥ pṛthakchaucās teṣāṃ vai brāhmaṇo varaḥ // MatsP_30.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2713: pāṇigraho nāhuṣāyaṃ na puṃbhiḥ sevitaḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:2714: tvaṃ pāṇimagrahīdagre vṛṇomi tvāmahaṃ tataḥ // MatsP_30.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2715: kathaṃ tu me manasvinyāḥ pāṇimanyaḥ pumānspṛśet /
GP12mtp176pu:2725: hanti vipraḥ sarāṣṭrāṇi purāṇyapi hi kopitaḥ // MatsP_30.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:2727: ato 'dattāṃ ca pitrā tvāṃ bhadre na vivahāmyaham // MatsP_30.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:2729: dattāṃ vahasva pitrā māṃ tvaṃ hi rājanvṛto mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2730: ayācato bhayaṃ nāsti dattāṃ ca pratigṛhṇataḥ // MatsP_30.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:2732: sarvaṃ nivedayāmāsa dhātrī tasmai yathātatham // MatsP_30.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:2733: śrutvaiva ca sa rājānaṃ darśayāmāsa bhārgavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2734: dṛṣṭvaivam āgataṃ vipraṃ yayātiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // MatsP_30.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:2735: vavande brāhmaṇaṃ kāvyaṃ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2739: namaste dehi māmasmai loke nānyaṃ patiṃ vṛṇe // MatsP_30.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:2740: *śukra uvāca vṛto 'nayā patirvīra sutayā tvaṃ mameṣṭayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2741: gṛhāṇemāṃ mayā dattāṃ mahiṣīṃ nahuṣātmaja // MatsP_30.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:2743: adharmo māṃ spṛśedevaṃ pāpam asyāśca bhārgava /
GP12mtp176pu:2744: varṇasaṃkarato brahmann iti tvāṃ pravṛṇomyaham // MatsP_30.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:2745: *śukra uvāca adharmāttvāṃ vimuñcāmi varaṃ varaya cepsitam /
GP12mtp176pu:2746: asminvivāhe tvaṃ ślāghyo rahaḥ pāpaṃ nudāmi te // MatsP_30.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:2748: anayā saha samprītim atulāṃ samavāpnuhi // MatsP_30.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:2749: iyaṃ cāpi kumārī te śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī /
GP12mtp176pu:2750: saṃpūjyā satataṃ rājan na caināṃ śayane hvaya // MatsP_30.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:2751: *śaunaka uvāca evamukto yayātistu śukraṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:2752: jagāma svapuraṃ hṛṣṭaḥ so 'nujñāto mahātmanā // MatsP_30.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:2760: devayānyā tu sahitaḥ sa nṛpo nahuṣātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2763: lebhe garbhaṃ prathamataḥ kumāraśca vyajāyata // MatsP_31.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:2765: dadarśa yauvanaṃ prāptā ṛtuṃ sā kamalekṣaṇā // MatsP_31.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:2767: ṛtukālaśca samprāpto na kaścinme patirvṛtaḥ // MatsP_31.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:2768: kiṃ prāptaṃ kiṃca kartavyaṃ kathaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:2770: yathā tayā vṛto bhartā tathaivāhaṃ vṛṇomi tam /
GP12mtp176pu:2771: rājñā putraphalaṃ deyam iti me niścitā matiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2772: apīdānīṃ sa dharmātmā raho me darśanaṃ vrajet // MatsP_31.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2773: *śaunaka uvāca atha niṣkramya rājāsau tasminkāle yadṛcchayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2779: tava vā nāhuṣa gṛhe kaḥ striyaṃ draṣṭumarhati // MatsP_31.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2781: sā tvāṃ yāce prasādyeha rantumehi narādhipa // MatsP_31.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:2784: rūpaṃ tu te na paśyāmi sūcyagramapi ninditam // MatsP_31.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:2786: neyam āhvayitavyā te śayane vārṣaparvaṇī // MatsP_31.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:2788: na narmayuktaṃ vacanaṃ hinasti na strīṣu rājan na vivāhakāle /
GP12mtp176pu:2790: pṛṣṭāstu sākṣye pravadanti cānyathā bhavanti mithyāvacanā narendra te /
GP12mtp176pu:2791: ekārthatāyāṃ tu samāhitāyāṃ mithyā vadantaṃ hy anṛtaṃ hinasti //
GP12mtp176pu:2793: rājā pramāṇaṃ bhūtānāṃ sa vinaśyenmṛṣā vadan /
GP12mtp176pu:2794: arthakṛcchramapi prāpya na mithyā kartumutsahe // MatsP_31.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2796: samāv etau matau rājan patiḥ sakhyāśca yaḥ patiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2797: samaṃ vivāha ityāhuḥ sakhyā me 'si patiryataḥ // MatsP_31.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2800: tvaṃ ca yācasi kāmaṃ māṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi tat // MatsP_31.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2802: adharmāttrāhi māṃ rājan dharmaṃ ca pratipādaya /
GP12mtp176pu:2804: traya evādhanā rājan bhāryā dāsastathā sutaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2805: yatte samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya taddhanam // MatsP_31.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:2806: devayānyā bhujiṣyāsmi vaśyā ca tava bhārgavī /
GP12mtp176pu:2807: sā cāhaṃ ca tvayā rājan bharaṇīyāṃ bhajasva mām // MatsP_31.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:2809: pūjayāmāsa śarmiṣṭhāṃ dharmaṃ ca pratipādayan // MatsP_31.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:2814: prajajñe ca tataḥ kāle rājñī rājīvalocanā /
GP12mtp176pu:2817: *śaunaka uvāca śrutvā kumāraṃ jātaṃ sā devayānī śucismitā /
GP12mtp176pu:2820: kimarthaṃ vṛjinaṃ subhrūḥ kṛtaṃ te kāmalubdhayā // MatsP_32.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:2823: sa mayā tu varaḥ kāmaṃ yācito dharmasaṃhatam // MatsP_32.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:2825: tasmād ṛṣer mamāpatyam iti satyaṃ bravīmi te // MatsP_32.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2828: apatyaṃ yadi te labdhaṃ jyeṣṭhācchreṣṭhācca vai dvijāt // MatsP_32.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:2829: śobhanaṃ bhīru satyaṃ cet kathaṃ sa jñāyate dvijaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2832: ojasā tejasā caiva dīpyamānaṃ raviṃ yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:2833: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mama saṃpraṣṭuṃ śaktir nāsīcchucismite // MatsP_32.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:2834: *śaunaka uvāca anyonyamevam uktvā ca samprahasya ca te mithaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2837: yaduṃ ca turvasuṃ caiva śakraviṣṇū ivāparau // MatsP_32.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2839: druhyaṃ cānuṃ ca pūruṃ ca trīnkumārānajījanat // MatsP_32.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2840: tataḥ kāle ca kasmiṃścid devayānī śucismitā /
GP12mtp176pu:2841: yayātisahitā rājañ jagāma haritaṃ vanam // MatsP_32.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:2843: krīḍamānān tu visrabdhān vismitā cedamabravīt // MatsP_32.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2848: kiṃ nāmadheyagotre vaḥ putrakā brāhmaṇaḥ pitā // MatsP_32.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:2849: vibrūta me yathātathyaṃ śrotukāmāsmyato hy aham /
GP12mtp176pu:2851: śarmiṣṭhāṃ mātaraṃ caiva tasyā ūcuḥ kumārakāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2852: *śaunaka uvāca ityuktvā sahitāstena rājānam upacakramuḥ // MatsP_32.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:2855: dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ tu bālānāṃ praṇayaṃ pārthivaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:2856: buddhvā ca tattvato devī śarmiṣṭhāmidamabravīt // MatsP_32.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2859: tamevāsuradharmaṃ tvam āsthitā na bibheṣi kim // MatsP_32.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2862: nyāyato dharmataścaiva carantī na bibhemi te // MatsP_32.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2863: yadā tvayā vṛto rājā vṛta eva tadā mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:2864: sakhībhartā hi dharmeṇa bhartā bhavati śobhane // MatsP_32.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2865: pūjyāsi mama mānyā ca śreṣṭhā jyeṣṭhā ca brāhmaṇī /
GP12mtp176pu:2866: tvatto hi me pūjyataro rājarṣiḥ kiṃ na vetsi tat // MatsP_32.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:2867: *śaunaka uvāca śrutvā tasyāstato vākyaṃ devayānyabravīd idam /
GP12mtp176pu:2868: rājannādyeha vatsyāmi vipriyaṃ me tvayā kṛtam // MatsP_32.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:2870: tūrṇaṃ sakāśaṃ kāvyasya prasthitāṃ vyathitastadā // MatsP_32.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:2872: nyavartata na sā caiva krodhasaṃraktalocanā // MatsP_32.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:2875: sā tu dṛṣṭvaiva pitaram abhivādyāgrataḥ sthitā /
GP12mtp176pu:2881: durbhagāyā mama dvau tu putrau tāta bravīmi te // MatsP_32.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:2882: dharmajña iti vikhyāta eṣa rājā bhṛgūdvaha /
GP12mtp176pu:2884: *śukra uvāca dharmajñastvaṃ mahārāja yo 'dharmam akṛthāḥ priyam /
GP12mtp176pu:2885: tasmājjarā tvām acirād dharṣayiṣyati durjayā // MatsP_32.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:2887: ṛtuṃ yo yācyamānāyā na dadāti pumānvṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2888: bhrūṇahetyucyate brahman sa ceha brahmavādibhiḥ // MatsP_32.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:2889: ṛtukāmāṃ striyaṃ yastu gamyāṃ rahasi yācitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2890: nopaiti yo hi dharmeṇa brahmahetyucyate budhaiḥ // MatsP_32.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:2893: *śukra uvāca na tv ahaṃ pratyavekṣyaste madadhīno 'si pārthiva /
GP12mtp176pu:2896: pūrvaṃ vayaḥ parityajya jarāṃ sadyo 'nvapadyata // MatsP_32.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:2899: prasādaṃ kuru me brahmañ jareyaṃ mā viśeta mām // MatsP_32.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:2900: *śukra uvāca nāhaṃ mṛṣā vadāmyetaj jarāṃ prāpto 'si bhūmipa /
GP12mtp176pu:2901: jarāṃ tv etāṃ tvamanyasmin saṃkrāmaya yadīcchasi // MatsP_32.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:2904: yo dadyānme vayaḥ putras tadbhavānanumanyatām // MatsP_32.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:2906: māmanudhyāya tattvena na ca pāpamavāpsyasi // MatsP_32.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:2907: vayo dāsyati te putro yaḥ sa rājā bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:2910: *śaunaka uvāca jarāṃ prāpya yayātistu svapuraṃ prāpya caiva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:2911: putraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca yadumityabravīddvijaḥ // MatsP_33.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:2913: jarā valī ca māṃ tāta palitāni ca paryaguḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2914: kāvyasyośanasaḥ śāpān na ca tṛpto 'smi yauvane // MatsP_33.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:2915: tvaṃ yado pratipadyasva pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:2917: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu tvadīyaṃ yauvanaṃ tv aham /
GP12mtp176pu:2918: dattvā sampratipatsyāmi pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha // MatsP_33.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:2924: santi te bahavaḥ putrā mattaḥ priyatarā nṛpa /
GP12mtp176pu:2925: jarāṃ grahītuṃ dharmajña putramanyaṃ vṛṇīṣva vai // MatsP_33.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:2927: yastvaṃ me hṛdayājjāto vayaḥ svaṃ na prayacchasi /
GP12mtp176pu:2930: yauvanena careyaṃ vai viṣayāṃstava putraka // MatsP_33.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:2932: tathaiva pratipatsyāmi pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha // MatsP_33.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:2937: yastvaṃ me hṛdayājjāto vayaḥ svaṃ na prayacchasi /
GP12mtp176pu:2938: tasmātprajā samucchedaṃ turvaso tava yāsyati // MatsP_33.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:2940: piśitāśiṣu lokeṣu nūnaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_33.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:2943: *śaunaka uvāca evaṃ sa turvasuṃ śaptvā yayātiḥ sutamātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2944: śarmiṣṭhāyāḥ sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ druhyuṃ vacanamabravīt // MatsP_33.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:2947: jarāṃ varṣasahasraṃ me yauvanaṃ svaṃ prayacchatām // MatsP_33.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:2948: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu te pradāsyāmi yauvanam /
GP12mtp176pu:2949: svaṃ cādāsyāmi bhūyo 'haṃ pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha // MatsP_33.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:2951: na rājyaṃ na rathaṃ nāśvaṃ jīrṇo bhuṅkte na ca striyam /
GP12mtp176pu:2952: na rāgaścāsya bhavati tajjarāṃ te na kāmaye // MatsP_33.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:2954: yastvaṃ me hṛdayājjāto vayaḥ svaṃ na prayacchasi /
GP12mtp176pu:2955: taddruhyo vai priyaḥ kāmo na te sampatsyate kvacit // MatsP_33.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:2957: arājyabhojaśabdaṃ tvaṃ tatra prāpsyasi sānvayaḥ // MatsP_33.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:2959: ano tvaṃ pratipadyasva pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:2960: ekaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu careyaṃ yauvanena te // MatsP_33.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:2962: na juhoti ca kāle 'gniṃ tāṃ jarāṃ nābhikāmaye // MatsP_33.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:2964: yastvaṃ me hṛdayājjāto vayaḥ svaṃ na prayacchasi /
GP12mtp176pu:2966: prajāśca yauvanaṃ prāptā vinaśyanti hy ano tava /
GP12mtp176pu:2969: pūro tvaṃ pratipadyasva pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:2970: tvaṃ me priyataraḥ putras tvaṃ varīyān bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_33.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:2971: jarā valī ca māṃ tāta palitāni ca paryaguḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:2972: kāvyasyośanasaḥ śāpān na ca tṛpto 'smi yauvane // MatsP_33.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:2975: svaṃ caiva pratipatsye 'haṃ pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha // MatsP_33.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:2977: yathāttha tvaṃ mahārāja tatkariṣyāmi te vacaḥ // MatsP_33.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:2978: pratipatsyāmi te rājan pāpmānaṃ jarayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:2979: gṛhāṇa yauvanaṃ mattaś cara kāmān yathepsitān // MatsP_33.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:2981: yauvanaṃ bhavate dattvā cariṣyāmi yathecchayā // MatsP_33.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:2983: pūro prīto 'smi te vatsa varaṃ cemaṃ dadāmi te /
GP12mtp176pu:2986: *śaunaka uvāca evamuktaḥ sa rājarṣiḥ kāvyaṃ smṛtvā mahāvratam /
GP12mtp176pu:2987: saṃkrāmayāmāsa jarāṃ tadā putre mahātmani // MatsP_34.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:2991: dharmāviruddhānrājendro yathārhati sa eva hi // MatsP_34.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:2996: dharmeṇa ca prajāḥ sarvā yathāvad anurañjayan /
GP12mtp176pu:3000: sa samprāpya śubhānkāmāṃs tṛptaḥ khinnaśca pārthivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3003: pūrṇam matvā tataḥ kālaṃ pūruṃ putramuvāca ha // MatsP_34.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3004: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati /
GP12mtp176pu:3007: nālamekasya tatsarvam iti matvā śamaṃ vrajet // MatsP_34.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3009: sevitā viṣayāḥ putra yauvanena mayā tava // MatsP_34.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3010: pūro prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te gṛhāṇedaṃ svayauvanam /
GP12mtp176pu:3011: rājyaṃ caiva gṛhāṇedaṃ tvaṃ hi me priyakṛtsutaḥ // MatsP_34.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3013: yauvanaṃ pratipede sa pūruḥ svaṃ punarātmanaḥ // MatsP_34.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3014: abhiṣektukāmaṃ ca nṛpaṃ pūruṃ putraṃ kanīyasam /
GP12mtp176pu:3016: kathaṃ śukrasya dauhitraṃ devayānyāḥ sutaṃ prabho /
GP12mtp176pu:3017: jyeṣṭhaṃ yadumatikramya rājyaṃ pūroḥ pradāsyasi // MatsP_34.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3019: śarmiṣṭhāyāḥ suto druhyus tathānuḥ pūrureva ca // MatsP_34.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3023: brāhmaṇapramukhā varṇāḥ sarve śṛṇvantu me vacaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3024: jyeṣṭhaṃ prati yato rājyaṃ na deyaṃ me kathaṃcana // MatsP_34.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:3026: pratikūlaḥ pituryaśca na sa putraḥ satāṃ mataḥ // MatsP_34.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3028: sa putraḥ putravadyaśca vartate pitṛmātṛṣu // MatsP_34.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3030: druhyuṇā cānunā caivam apyavajñā kṛtā bhṛśam // MatsP_34.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:3031: pūruṇā me kṛtaṃ vākyaṃ mānitaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3032: kanīyānmama dāyādo jarā yena dhṛtā mama // MatsP_34.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:3033: mama kāmaḥ sa ca kṛtaḥ pūruṇā putrarūpiṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:3034: śukreṇa ca varo dattaḥ kāvyenośanasā svayam // MatsP_34.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:3037: *prakṛtaya ūcuḥ yaḥ putro guṇasampanno mātāpitrorhitaḥ sadā /
GP12mtp176pu:3038: sarvaṃ so 'rhati kalyāṇaṃ kanīyānapi sa prabhuḥ // MatsP_34.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3039: arhaṃ pūroridaṃ rājyaṃ yaḥ priyaḥ priyakṛt tava /
GP12mtp176pu:3040: varadānena śukrasya na śakyaṃ vaktumuttaram // MatsP_34.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:3042: abhiṣicya tataḥ pūruṃ rājye svasutamātmajam // MatsP_34.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:3043: dattvā ca pūrave rājyaṃ vanavāsāya dīkṣitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3044: purātsa niryayau rājā brāhmaṇaistāpasaiḥ saha // MatsP_34.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:3046: druhyoścaiva sutā bhojā anostu mlecchajātayaḥ // MatsP_34.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:3047: pūrostu pauravo vaṃśo yatra jāto 'si pārthiva /
GP12mtp176pu:3050: *śaunaka uvāca evaṃ sa nāhuṣo rājā yayātiḥ putramīpsitam /
GP12mtp176pu:3052: uṣitvā vanavāsaṃ sa brāhmaṇaiḥ saha saṃśritaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3053: phalamūlāśano dānto yathā svargamito gataḥ // MatsP_35.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3054: sa gataḥ svargavāsaṃ tu nyavasanmuditaḥ sukhī /
GP12mtp176pu:3055: kālasya nātimahataḥ punaḥ śakreṇa pātitaḥ // MatsP_35.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3057: sthitaścāsīd antarikṣe sa tadeti śrutaṃ mayā // MatsP_35.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3058: tata eva punaścāpi gataḥ svargamiti śrutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3059: rājñā vasumatā sārdham aṣṭakena ca vīryavān /
GP12mtp176pu:3060: pratardanena śibinā sametya kila saṃsadi // MatsP_35.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3061: *śatānīka uvāca karmaṇā kena sa divaṃ punaḥ prāpto mahīpatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3068: śrotumicchāmi deveśa divi ceha ca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_35.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3069: *śaunaka uvāca hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yayāteruttamāṃ kathām /
GP12mtp176pu:3070: divi ceha ca puṇyārthāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśinīm // MatsP_35.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3072: rājye 'bhiṣicya muditaḥ pravavrāja vanaṃ tadā // MatsP_35.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3080: ambubhakṣaḥ sa cābdāṃstrīn āsīn niyatavāṅmanāḥ // MatsP_35.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3082: pañcāgnimadhye ca tapas tepe saṃvatsaraṃ punaḥ // MatsP_35.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3091: kathānte tatra śakreṇa pṛṣṭaḥ sa pṛthivīpatiḥ // MatsP_36.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3092: *śakra uvāca yadā sa pūrustava rūpeṇa rājañ jarāṃ gṛhītvā pracacāra loke /
GP12mtp176pu:3093: tadā rājyaṃ sampradāyaiva tasmai tvayā kimuktaḥ kathayeha satyam //
GP12mtp176pu:3098: akrodhanaḥ krodhanebhyo viśiṣṭas tathā titikṣur atitikṣor viśiṣṭaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3101: ākroṣṭāraṃ nirdahati sukṛtaṃ cāsya vindati // MatsP_36.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3102: nāruntudaḥ syānna nṛśaṃsavādī na hīnataḥ param abhyādadīta /
GP12mtp176pu:3103: yayāsya vācā para udvijeta na tāṃ vadedruśatīṃ pāpalaulyām // MatsP_36.8
GP12mtp176pu:3104: aruntudaṃ puruṣaṃ tīvravācaṃ vākkaṇṭakair vitudantaṃ manuṣyān /
GP12mtp176pu:3105: vidyād alakṣmīkatamaṃ janānāṃ mukhe nibaddhaṃ nirṛtiṃ vahantam //
GP12mtp176pu:3106: sadbhiḥ purastādabhipūjitaḥ syāt sadbhistathā pṛṣṭhato rakṣitaḥ syāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3107: sadā satām ativādāṃstitikṣet satāṃ vṛttaṃ pālayansādhuvṛtaḥ // MatsP_36.10
GP12mtp176pu:3108: vāksāyakā vadanānniṣpatanti yair āhataḥ śocati vā tryahāni /
GP12mtp176pu:3109: parasya no marmasu te patanti tānpaṇḍito nāvasṛjetpareṣu // MatsP_36.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3111: yathā maitrī ca lokeṣu dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vāk // MatsP_36.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3112: tasmātsāntvaṃ sadā vācyaṃ na vācyaṃ paruṣaṃ kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:3115: indra uvāca sarvāṇi kāryāṇi samāpya rājan gṛhānparityajya vanaṃ gato 'si /
GP12mtp176pu:3116: tattvāṃ pṛcchāmi nahuṣasya putra kenāpi tulyastapasā yayāte // MatsP_37.1
GP12mtp176pu:3120: *indra uvāca yadāvamaṃsthāḥ sadṛśaḥ śreyasaśca pāpīyasaś cāviditaprabhāvaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3121: tasmāllokā hy antavantastaveme kṣīṇe puṇye patito 'syadya rājan //
GP12mtp176pu:3123: surarṣigandharvanarāvamānāt kṣayaṃ gatā me yadi śakralokāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3124: icchāmyahaṃ suralokādvihīnaḥ satāṃ madhye patituṃ devarāja // MatsP_37.4
GP12mtp176pu:3125: *indra uvāca satāṃ sakāśe patito 'si rājaṃś cyutaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ yatra labdhāsi bhūyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3126: evaṃ viditvā tu punaryayāte na te 'vamānyāḥ sadṛśaḥ śreyase ca //
GP12mtp176pu:3129: *aṣṭaka uvāca kastvaṃ yuvā vāsavatulyarūpaḥ svatejasā dīpyamāno yathāgniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3132: kiṃnusvid etat patatīva sarve vitarkayantaḥ parimohitāḥ smaḥ // MatsP_37.8
GP12mtp176pu:3134: pratyudgatāstvāṃ vayamadya sarve tasmātpāte tava jijñāsamānāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3135: na cāpi tvāṃ dhṛṣṇavaḥ praṣṭum agre na ca tvamasmānpṛcchasi ke vayaṃ sma /
GP12mtp176pu:3136: tattvāṃ pṛcchāmi spṛhaṇīyarūpaṃ kasya tvaṃ vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvamāgāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3137: bhayaṃ tu te vyetu viṣādamohau tyajāśu devendrasamānarūpa /
GP12mtp176pu:3138: tvāṃ vartamānaṃ hi satāṃ sakāśe śakro na soḍhuṃ balahāpi śaktaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3139: santaḥ pratiṣṭhā hi sukhacyutānāṃ satāṃ sadaivāmararājakalpa /
GP12mtp176pu:3140: te saṃgatāḥ sthāvarajaṅgameśāḥ pratiṣṭhitastvaṃ sadṛśeṣu satsu //
GP12mtp176pu:3142: prabhuḥ sūryaḥ prakāśācca satāṃ cābhyāgataḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_37.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3145: ahaṃ yayātirnahuṣasya putraḥ pūroḥ pitā sarvabhūtāvamānāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3147: ahaṃ hi pūrvo vayasā bhavadbhayas tenābhivādaṃ bhavatāṃ na yuñje /
GP12mtp176pu:3148: yo vidyayā tapasā janmanā vā vṛddhaḥ sa vai sambhavati dvijānām //
GP12mtp176pu:3149: *aṣṭaka uvāca avādīstvaṃ vayasāsmi pravṛddha iti vai rājann adhikaḥ kathaṃcit /
GP12mtp176pu:3150: yo vai vidvāṃstapasā sampravṛddhaḥ sa eva pūjyo bhavati dvijānām //
GP12mtp176pu:3152: pratikūlaṃ karmaṇāṃ pāpamāhus tadvartināṃ pravaṇaṃ pāpalokam /
GP12mtp176pu:3153: santo 'sato nānvavartanta te vai yadātmanaiṣāṃ pratikūlavādī // MatsP_38.4
GP12mtp176pu:3154: abhūddhanaṃ me vipulaṃ mahadvai viceṣṭamāno 'dhigantā tadasmi /
GP12mtp176pu:3155: evaṃ pradhāryātmahite niviṣṭo yo vartate sa vijānāti dhīraḥ // MatsP_38.5
GP12mtp176pu:3157: tattatprāpya na vihanyeta dhīro diṣṭaṃ balīya iti matvātmabuddhyā //
GP12mtp176pu:3158: sukhaṃ hi janturyadi vāpi duḥkhaṃ daivādhīnaṃ vindati nātmaśaktyā /
GP12mtp176pu:3159: tasmāddiṣṭaṃ balavanmanyamāno na saṃjvarennāpi hṛṣyetkadācit // MatsP_38.7
GP12mtp176pu:3160: duḥkhe na tapyeta sukhe na hṛṣyet samena varteta sadaiva dhīraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3161: diṣṭaṃ balīya iti manyamāno na saṃjvarennāpi hṛṣyet kadācit // MatsP_38.8
GP12mtp176pu:3162: bhaye na muhyāmyaṣṭakāhaṃ kadācit saṃtāpo me manaso nāsti kaścit /
GP12mtp176pu:3163: dhātā yathā māṃ vidadhāti loke dhruvaṃ tathāhaṃ bhaviteti matvā //
GP12mtp176pu:3164: saṃsvedajā hy aṇḍajā hy udbhidaśca sarīsṛpāḥ kṛmayo 'py apsu matsyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3165: tathāśmānastṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ ca sarvaṃ diṣṭakṣaye svāṃ prakṛtiṃ bhajante //
GP12mtp176pu:3166: anityatāṃ sukhaduḥkhasya buddhvā kasmāt saṃtāpamaṣṭakāhaṃ bhajeyam /
GP12mtp176pu:3167: kiṃ kuryāṃ vai kiṃca kṛtvā na tapye tasmātsaṃtāpaṃ varjayāmyapramattaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3168: *śaunaka uvāca evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ nṛpatiṃ yayātim athāṣṭakaḥ punarevānvapṛcchat /
GP12mtp176pu:3169: mātāmahaṃ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ yatra sthitaṃ svargaloke yathāvat //
GP12mtp176pu:3170: *aṣṭaka uvāca ye ye lokāḥ pārthivendra pradhānās tvayā bhuktā yaṃ ca kāle yathā ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3171: tanme rājanbrūhi sarvaṃ yathāvat kṣetrajñavadbhāṣase tvaṃ hi dharmam //
GP12mtp176pu:3173: rājāhamāsaṃ tv iha sārvabhaumas tato lokānmahataś cājaryaṃ vai /
GP12mtp176pu:3175: tataḥ purīṃ puruhūtasya ramyāṃ sahasradvārāṃ śatayojanāntām /
GP12mtp176pu:3177: tato divyamajaraṃ prāpya lokaṃ prajāpater lokapaterdurāpam /
GP12mtp176pu:3179: devasya devasya niveśane ca vijitya lokānnyavasaṃ yatheṣṭam /
GP12mtp176pu:3183: tatra sthitaṃ māṃ devasukheṣu saktaṃ kāle 'tīte mahati tato 'timātram /
GP12mtp176pu:3185: etāvanme viditaṃ rājasiṃha tato bhraṣṭo 'haṃ nandanātkṣīṇapuṇyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3186: vāco 'śrauṣaṃ cāntarikṣe surāṇām anukrośācchocatāṃ māṃ narendra //
GP12mtp176pu:3188: tānabruvaṃ patamānastadāhaṃ satāṃ madhye nipateyaṃ kathaṃ nu //
GP12mtp176pu:3190: havirgandhair darśitāṃ yajñabhūmiṃ dhūmāpāṅgaṃ parigṛhya pratītām //
GP12mtp176pu:3192: *aṣṭaka uvāca yadā vasannandane kāmarūpe saṃvatsarāṇāmayutaṃ śatānām /
GP12mtp176pu:3193: kiṃkāraṇaṃ kārtayugapradhāna hitvā tadvai vasudhām anvapadyaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3195: jñātiḥ suhṛtsvajano yo yatheha kṣīṇe vitte tyajyate mānavairhi /
GP12mtp176pu:3196: tathā svarge kṣīṇapuṇyaṃ manuṣyaṃ tyajanti sadyaḥ khecarā devasaṃghāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3197: *aṣṭaka uvāca kathaṃ tasminkṣīṇapuṇyā bhavanti saṃmuhyate me 'tra mano 'timātram /
GP12mtp176pu:3198: kiṃviśiṣṭāḥ kasya dhāmopayānti tadvai brūhi kṣetravittvaṃ mato me //
GP12mtp176pu:3200: imaṃ bhaumaṃ narakaṃ te patanti lālapyamānā naradeva sarve /
GP12mtp176pu:3201: te kaṅkagomāyupalāśanārthaṃ kṣitau vivṛddhiṃ bahudhā prayānti //
GP12mtp176pu:3202: tasmādevaṃ varjanīyaṃ narendra duṣṭaṃ loke garhaṇīyaṃ ca karma /
GP12mtp176pu:3203: ākhyātaṃ te pārthiva sarvametad bhūyaścedānīṃ vada kiṃ te vadāmi //
GP12mtp176pu:3204: *aṣṭaka uvāca yadā tu tāṃs te vitudante vayāṃsi tathā gṛdhrāḥ śitikaṇṭhāḥ pataṃgāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3205: kathaṃ bhavanti kathamābhavanti tvatto bhaumaṃ narakamahaṃ śṛṇomi //
GP12mtp176pu:3207: ūrdhvaṃ dehātkarmaṇo jṛmbhamāṇād vyaktaṃ pṛthivyām anusaṃcaranti /
GP12mtp176pu:3208: imaṃ bhaumaṃ narakaṃ te patanti nāvekṣante varṣapūgānanekān // MatsP_39.7
GP12mtp176pu:3209: ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāṇi patanti vyomni tathāśītiṃ caiva tu vatsarāṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:3210: tānvai nudante prapatantaḥ prayātān bhīmā bhaumā rākṣasās tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrāḥ // MatsP_39.8
GP12mtp176pu:3211: *aṣṭaka uvāca yadetāṃste saṃpatatastudanti bhīmā bhaumā rākṣasāstīkṣṇadaṃṣṭrāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3212: kathaṃ bhavanti kathamābhavanti kathaṃbhūtā garbhabhūtā bhavanti //
GP12mtp176pu:3214: asṛgretaḥ puṣparasānuyuktam anveti sadyaḥ puruṣeṇa sṛṣṭam /
GP12mtp176pu:3215: tava tarayā raja āpadyate ca sa garbhabhūtaḥ samupaiti tatra //
GP12mtp176pu:3216: vanaspatīn oṣadhīṃścāviśanti apo vāyuṃ pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣam /
GP12mtp176pu:3217: catuṣpadaṃ dvipadaṃ cāpi sarva evaṃbhūtā garbhabhūtā bhavanti //
GP12mtp176pu:3218: *aṣṭaka uvāca anyadvapurvidadhātīha garbha utāhosvitsvena kāmena yāti /
GP12mtp176pu:3219: āpadyamāno narayonimetām ācakṣva me saṃśayātpṛcchatastvam // MatsP_39.12
GP12mtp176pu:3220: śarīradehādisamucchrayaṃ ca cakṣuḥśrotre labhate kena saṃjñām /
GP12mtp176pu:3221: etatsarvaṃ tāta ācakṣva pṛṣṭaḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ manyamānā hi sarve //
GP12mtp176pu:3223: vāyuḥ samutkarṣati garbhayonim ṛtau retaḥ puṣparasānuyuktam /
GP12mtp176pu:3224: sa tatra tanmātrakṛtādhikāraḥ krameṇa saṃvardhayatīha garbham //
GP12mtp176pu:3225: sa jāyamāno 'tha gṛhītamātraḥ saṃjñāmadhiṣṭhāya tato manuṣyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3226: sa śrotrābhyāṃ vedayatīha śabdaṃ sa vai rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣā ca //
GP12mtp176pu:3227: ghrāṇena gandhaṃ jihvayātho rasaṃ ca tvacā sparśaṃ manasā devabhāvam /
GP12mtp176pu:3228: ityaṣṭakehopacitaṃ hi viddhi mahātmanaḥ prāṇabhṛtaḥ śarīre // MatsP_39.16
GP12mtp176pu:3229: *aṣṭaka uvāca yaḥ saṃsthitaḥ puruṣo dahyate vā nikhanyate vāpi nikṛṣyate vā /
GP12mtp176pu:3230: abhāvabhūtaḥ sa vināśametya kenātmānaṃ cetayate purastāt // MatsP_39.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3232: hitvā so 'sūn suptavanniṣṭhitatvāt purodhāya sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3233: anyāṃ yoniṃ puṇyapāpānusārāṃ hitvā dehaṃ bhajate rājasiṃha // MatsP_39.18
GP12mtp176pu:3234: puṇyāṃ yoniṃ puṇyakṛto viśanti pāpāṃ yoniṃ pāpakṛto vrajanti /
GP12mtp176pu:3235: kīṭāḥ pataṃgāśca bhavanti pāpān na me vivakṣāsti mahānubhāva //
GP12mtp176pu:3236: catuṣpadā dvipadāḥ pakṣiṇaśca tathābhūtā garbhabhūtā bhavanti /
GP12mtp176pu:3237: ākhyātametannikhilaṃ hi sarvaṃ bhūyastu kiṃ pṛcchasi rājasiṃha //
GP12mtp176pu:3238: *aṣṭaka uvāca kiṃ svitkṛtvā labhate tāta saṃjñāṃ martyaḥ śreṣṭhāṃ tapasā vidyayā vā /
GP12mtp176pu:3239: tanme pṛṣṭaḥ śaṃsa sarvaṃ yathāvac chubhāṃllokān yena gacchetkrameṇa //
GP12mtp176pu:3241: tapaśca dānaṃ ca śamo damaśca hrīr ārjavaṃ sarvabhūtānukampā /
GP12mtp176pu:3242: svargasya lokasya vadanti santo dvārāṇi saptaiva mahānti puṃsām //
GP12mtp176pu:3244: naśyanti mānena tamo 'bhibhūtāḥ puṃsaḥ sadaiveti vadanti santaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3245: adhīyānaḥ paṇḍitaṃ manyamāno yo vidyayā hanti yaśaḥ parasya /
GP12mtp176pu:3246: tasyāntavantaḥ puruṣasya lokā na cāsya tadbrahmaphalaṃ dadāti //
GP12mtp176pu:3249: na mānyamāno mudamādadīta na saṃtāpaṃ prāpnuyāccāvamānāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3250: santaḥ sataḥ pūjayantīha loke nāsādhavaḥ sādhubuddhiṃ labhante //
GP12mtp176pu:3251: iti dadyāditi yajed ityadhīyīta me śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:3253: yenāśrayaṃ vedayante purāṇaṃ manīṣiṇo mānase mānayuktam /
GP12mtp176pu:3254: tanniḥśreyas tena saṃyogametya parāṃ śāntiṃ prāpnuyuḥ pretya ceha //
GP12mtp176pu:3256: *aṣṭaka uvāca carangṛhasthaḥ kathameti devān kathaṃ bhikṣuḥ katham ācāryakarmā /
GP12mtp176pu:3257: vānaprasthaḥ satpathe saṃniviṣṭo bahūnyasmin samprati vedayanti //
GP12mtp176pu:3259: āhūtādhyāyī gurukarmasu codyataḥ pūrvotthāyī caramaṃ copaśāyī /
GP12mtp176pu:3263: svavīryajīvī vṛjinānnivṛtto dātā parebhyo na paropatāpī /
GP12mtp176pu:3264: tādṛṅmuniḥ siddhimupaiti mukhyāṃ vasann araṇye niyatāhāraceṣṭaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3265: aśilpajīvī vigṛhaśca nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ sarvato vipramuktaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3266: anokaśāyī laghu lipsamānaś caran deśānekacaraḥ sa bhikṣuḥ // MatsP_40.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3267: rātryā yayā cābhiratāśca lokā bhavanti kāmābhijitāḥ sukhena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3268: tāmeva rātriṃ prayateta vidvān araṇyasaṃstho bhavituṃ yatātmā //
GP12mtp176pu:3270: araṇyavāsī sukṛtaṃ dadhāti muktvā tv araṇye svaśarīradhātūn // MatsP_40.7
GP12mtp176pu:3271: *aṣṭaka uvāca katisvid devamunayo maunāni kati cāpyuta /
GP12mtp176pu:3272: bhavantīti tadācakṣva śrotum icchāmahe vayam // MatsP_40.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3274: araṇye vasato yasya grāmo bhavati pṛṣṭhataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3275: grāme vā vasato 'raṇyaṃ sa muniḥ syājjanādhipa // MatsP_40.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3277: grāme vā vasato 'raṇyaṃ kathaṃ bhavati pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_40.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3280: tathāsya vasato 'raṇye grāmo bhavati pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_40.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3284: tadāsya vasato grāme 'raṇyaṃ bhavati pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_40.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3286: ātiṣṭheta munir maunaṃ sa loke siddhimāpnuyāt // MatsP_40.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3290: yadā bhavati nirdvaṃdvo munirmaunaṃ samāsthitaḥ // MatsP_40.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3291: atha lokamimaṃ jitvā lokaṃ cāpi jayetparam /
GP12mtp176pu:3293: athāsya lokaiḥ sarvo yaḥ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // MatsP_40.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3299: grāma eva caranbhikṣus tayoḥ pūrvataraṃ gataḥ // MatsP_41.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3300: aprāpyaṃ dīrghamāyuśca yaḥ prāpto vikṛtiṃ caret /
GP12mtp176pu:3301: tapyeta yadi tatkṛtvā caretsograṃ tapastataḥ // MatsP_41.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3302: yadvai nṛśaṃsaṃ tadapat hyamāhur yaḥ sevate dharmamanarthabuddhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3303: asāvanīśaḥ sa tathaiva rājaṃs tadārjavaṃ sa samādhistadāryam // MatsP_41.4
GP12mtp176pu:3304: *aṣṭaka uvāca kenādya tvaṃ tu prahito 'si rājan yuvā sragvī darśanīyaḥ suvarcāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3305: kuta āgataḥ katamasyāṃ diśi tvamutāhosvitpārthivasthānam asti //
GP12mtp176pu:3307: imaṃ bhaumaṃ narakaṃ kṣīṇapuṇyaḥ praveṣṭum ūrvīṃ gaganādviprakīrṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3308: uktvāhaṃ vaḥ prapatiṣyāmy anantaraṃ tvarantvamī brahmaṇo lokapā ye //
GP12mtp176pu:3309: satāṃ sakāśe tu vṛtaḥ prapātas te saṅgatā guṇavantastu sarve /
GP12mtp176pu:3310: śakrācca labdho hi varo mayaiṣa patiṣyatā bhūmitalaṃ narendra //
GP12mtp176pu:3311: *aṣṭaka uvāca pṛcchāmi tvāṃ prapatantaṃ prapātaṃ yadi lokāḥ pārthiva santi me 'tra /
GP12mtp176pu:3312: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śritāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ tasya dharmasya manye //
GP12mtp176pu:3314: yāvatpṛthivyāṃ vihitaṃ gavāśvaṃ sahāraṇyaiḥ paśubhiḥ pakṣibhiśca /
GP12mtp176pu:3315: tāvallokā divi te saṃsthitā vai tathā vijānīhi narendrasiṃha // MatsP_41.9
GP12mtp176pu:3316: *aṣṭaka uvāca tāṃste dadāmi mā prapata prapātaṃ ye me lokā divi rājendra santi /
GP12mtp176pu:3317: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śritāstānākrama kṣipramamitrahā'thasi //
GP12mtp176pu:3320: yathā pradeyaṃ satataṃ dvijebhyas tadā dade pūrvam ahaṃ narendra //
GP12mtp176pu:3321: nābrāhmaṇaḥ kṛpaṇo jātu jīved yadyapi syādbrāhmaṇī vīrapatnī /
GP12mtp176pu:3322: so 'haṃ yadevākṛtapūrvaṃ careyaṃ vivitsamānaḥ kimu tatra sādhuḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3323: *pratardana uvāca pṛcchāmi tvāṃ spṛhaṇīyarūpa pratardano 'haṃ yadi me santi lokāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3324: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śrutāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ tasya dharmasya manye //
GP12mtp176pu:3326: santi lokā bahavaste narendra apyekaikaṃ sapta śatānyahāni /
GP12mtp176pu:3327: madhucyuto ghṛtavanto viśokās tenāntavantaḥ pratipālayanti // MatsP_41.14
GP12mtp176pu:3328: *pratardana uvāca tāṃste dadāmi patamānasya rājan ye me lokāstava te vai bhavantu /
GP12mtp176pu:3329: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śritās tānākrama kṣipramapetamohaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3331: nu tulyatejāḥ sukṛtaṃ hi kāmaye yogakṣemaṃ pārthivātpārthivaḥ san /
GP12mtp176pu:3332: daivādeśādāpadaṃ prāpya vidvāṃś carennṛśaṃsaṃ hi na jātu rājā //
GP12mtp176pu:3333: dharmyaṃ mārgaṃ cintayāno yaśasyaṃ kuryāttapo dharmamavekṣamāṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3334: na madvidho dharmabuddhirhi rājā hy evaṃ kuryātkṛpaṇaṃ māṃ yathāttha //
GP12mtp176pu:3335: kuryāmapūrvaṃ na kṛtaṃ yadanyair vivitsamānaḥ kim u tatra sādhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3336: bruvāṇamevaṃ nṛpatiṃ yayātiṃ nṛpottamo vasumānabravīt tam // MatsP_41.18
GP12mtp176pu:3339: pṛcchāmyahaṃ vasumānauṣadaśvir yadyasti loko divi mahyaṃ narendra /
GP12mtp176pu:3340: yadyantarikṣe prathito mahātman kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ tasya dharmasya manye //
GP12mtp176pu:3342: yadantarikṣaṃ pṛthivī diśaśca yattejasā tapate bhānumāṃśca /
GP12mtp176pu:3343: lokās tāvanto divi saṃsthitā vai te tvāṃ bhavantaṃ pratipālayanti //
GP12mtp176pu:3345: tāṃs te dadāmi pata māṃ prapātaṃ ye me lokāstava te vai bhavantu /
GP12mtp176pu:3346: krīṇīṣvaināṃs tṛṇakenāpi rājan pratigrahaste yadi samyakpraduṣṭaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3348: na mithyāhaṃ vikrayaṃ vai smarāmi mayā kṛtaṃ śiśubhāve 'pi rājan /
GP12mtp176pu:3349: kuryāṃ na caivākṛtapūrvamanyair vivitsamāno vasumanna sādhu // MatsP_42.4
GP12mtp176pu:3351: tāṃs tvaṃ lokānpratipadyasva rājan mayā dattānyadi neṣṭaḥ krayaste /
GP12mtp176pu:3352: nāhaṃ tānvai pratigantā narendra sarve lokāstāvakā vai bhavantu //
GP12mtp176pu:3354: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ śibirauśīnaro 'haṃ mamāpi lokā yadi santi tāta /
GP12mtp176pu:3355: yadyantarikṣe yadi vā divi śritāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tvāṃ tasya dharmasya manye //
GP12mtp176pu:3357: na tvaṃ vācā hṛdayenāpi rājan parīpsamāno māvamaṃsthā narendra /
GP12mtp176pu:3358: tenānantā divi lokāḥ sthitā vai vidyudrūpāḥ svanavanto mahāntaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3360: tāṃs tvaṃ lokānpratipadyasva rājan mayā dattānyadi neṣṭaḥ krayaste /
GP12mtp176pu:3361: na cāhaṃ tānpratipadya dattvā yatra tvaṃ tāta gantāsi lokān // MatsP_42.8
GP12mtp176pu:3364: tathādya loke na rame 'nyadatte tasmācchibe nābhinandāmi vācam //
GP12mtp176pu:3365: *aṣṭaka uvāca na cedekaikaśo rājaṃl lokānnaḥ pratinandasi /
GP12mtp176pu:3366: sarve pradāya tāṃllokān gantāro narakaṃ vayam // MatsP_42.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3369: ahaṃ tu nābhigṛhṇāmi yatkṛtaṃ na mayā purā // MatsP_42.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3370: alipsamānasya tu me yaduktaṃ na tattathāstīha narendrasiṃha /
GP12mtp176pu:3371: asya pradānasya yadeva yuktaṃ tasyaiva cānantaphalaṃ bhaviṣyam //
GP12mtp176pu:3372: *aṣṭaka uvāca kasyaite pratidṛśyante rathāḥ pañca hiraṇmayāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3373: uccaiḥ santaḥ prakāśante jvalanto 'gniśikhā iva // MatsP_42.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3375: bhavatāṃ mama caivaite rathā bhānti hiraṇmayāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3376: āruhyaiteṣu gantavyaṃ bhavadbhiśca mayā saha // MatsP_42.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3377: *aṣṭaka uvāca ātiṣṭhasva rathaṃ rājan vikramasva vihāyasā /
GP12mtp176pu:3380: sarvairidānīṃ gantavyaṃ saha svargo jito yataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3381: eṣa vo virajāḥ panthā dṛśyate devasadmagaḥ // MatsP_42.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3382: *śaunaka uvāca te 'bhiruhya rathānsarve prayātā nṛpate nṛpāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3383: ākrāmanto divaṃ bhānti dharmeṇāvṛtya rodasī // MatsP_42.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3384: *aṣṭaka uvāca ahaṃ manye pūrvameko 'bhigantā sakhā cendraḥ sarvathā me mahātmā /
GP12mtp176pu:3385: kasmādevaṃ śibirauśīnaro 'yam eko 'tyayāt sarvaṃ vegena vāhān //
GP12mtp176pu:3388: uśīnarasya putro 'yaṃ tasmācchreṣṭho hi vaḥ śibiḥ // MatsP_42.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:3389: dānaṃ śaucaṃ satyamatho hy ahiṃsā hrīḥ śrīstitikṣā samatānṛśaṃsyam /
GP12mtp176pu:3390: rājantyetānyatha sarvāṇi rājñi śibau sthitānyapratime subuddhyā /
GP12mtp176pu:3391: evaṃ vṛttaṃ hrīniṣevī bibharti tasmācchibir abhigantā rathena //
GP12mtp176pu:3393: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ nṛpate brūhi satyaṃ kutaśca kaścāsi kathaṃ tvamāgāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3394: kṛtaṃ tvayā yaddhi na tasya kartā loke tvadanyo brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vā //
GP12mtp176pu:3396: yayātirasmi nahuṣasya putraḥ pūroḥ pitā sārvabhaumastvihāsam /
GP12mtp176pu:3397: guhyaṃ mantraṃ māmakebhyo bravīmi mātāmaho bhavatāṃ suprakāśaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3398: sarvām imāṃ pṛthivīṃ nirjigāya ṛddhāṃ mahīmadadāṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3399: medhyānaśvānnaikaśas tānsurūpāṃs tadā devāḥ puṇyabhājo bhavanti //
GP12mtp176pu:3401: gobhiḥ suvarṇaiśca dhanaiśca mukhyair aśvāḥ sanāgāḥ śataśastvarbudāni //
GP12mtp176pu:3402: satyena me dyauśca vasuṃdharā ca tathaivāgnirjvalate mānuṣeṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:3403: na me vṛthā vyāhṛtameva vākyaṃ satyaṃ hi santaḥ pratipūjayanti //
GP12mtp176pu:3404: sādhvaṣṭaka prabravīmīha satyaṃ pratardanaṃ vasumantaṃ śibiṃ ca /*
GP12mtp176pu:3405: sarve devā munayaśca lokāḥ satyena pūjyā iti me manogatam // MatsP_42.26
GP12mtp176pu:3406: yo naḥ sarvajitaṃ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ nivedayet /
GP12mtp176pu:3407: anasūyur dvijāgnyebhyaḥ sa bhajennaḥ salokatām // MatsP_42.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:3408: *śaunaka uvāca evaṃ rājansa mahātmā yayātiḥ svadauhitraistārito mitravaryaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3409: tyaktvā mahīṃ paramodārakarmā svargaṃ gataḥ karmabhirvyāpya pṛthvīm //
GP12mtp176pu:3410: evaṃ sarvaṃ vistarato yathāvad ākhyātaṃ te caritaṃ nāhuṣasya /
GP12mtp176pu:3411: vaṃśo yasya prathitaṃ pauraveyo yasmiñjātastvaṃ manujendrakalpaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:3414: vismitaḥ parayā prītyā pūrṇacandra ivābabhau // MatsP_43.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3417: pratigṛhya tataḥ sarvaṃ yadrājñā prahitaṃ dhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:3420: yaduprabhṛtibhiḥ putrair yadā loke pratiṣṭhitam // MatsP_43.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3422: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca gadato me nibodhata // MatsP_43.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3428: haihayaśca hayaścaiva tathā veṇuhayaśca yaḥ // MatsP_43.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3434: rudraśreṇyasya putro 'bhūd durdamo nāma pārthivaḥ // MatsP_43.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3435: durdamasya suto dhīmān kanako nāma vīryavān /
GP12mtp176pu:3436: kanakasya tu dāyādāś catvāro lokaviśrutāḥ // MatsP_43.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3442: tasmai dattā varāstena catvāraḥ puruṣottama // MatsP_43.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3443: pūrvaṃ bāhusahasraṃ tu sa vavre rājasattamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3451: daśa yajñasahasrāṇi rājñāṃ dvīpeṣu vai tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:3452: nirargalāni vṛttāni śrūyante tasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_43.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3457: tasya yajñe jagau gāthāṃ gandharvo nāradastathā /
GP12mtp176pu:3458: kārtavīryasya rājarṣer mahimānaṃ nirīkṣya saḥ // MatsP_43.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:3459: na nūnaṃ kārtavīryasya gatiṃ yāsyanti kṣatriyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3461: sa hi saptasu dvīpeṣu khaḍgī cakrī śarāsanī /
GP12mtp176pu:3462: rathī dvīpānyanucaran yogī paśyati taskarān // MatsP_43.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:3464: sa sarvaratnasampūrṇaś cakravartī babhūva ha // MatsP_43.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3465: sa eva paśupālo 'bhūt kṣetrapālaḥ sa eva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:3466: sa eva vṛṣṭyā parjanyo yogitvādarjuno 'bhavat // MatsP_43.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:3470: karkoṭakasutaṃ jitvā puryāṃ tatra nyaveśayat // MatsP_43.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:3471: eṣa vegaṃ samudrasya prāvṛṭkāle bhajeta vai /
GP12mtp176pu:3485: evaṃ baddhvā dhanurjyāyām utsiktaṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3486: laṅkāyāṃ mohayitvā tu sabalaṃ rāvaṇaṃ balāt // MatsP_43.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:3487: nirjitya baddhvā cānīya māhiṣmatyāṃ babandha ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3488: tato gatvā pulastyastu hy arjunaṃ saṃprasādayan // MatsP_43.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:3492: aho bata vidhervīryaṃ bhārgavo 'yaṃ yadāchinat // MatsP_43.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:3494: yatrāpavastu saṃkruddho hy arjunaṃ śaptavānprabhuḥ // MatsP_43.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:3495: yasmādvanaṃ pradagdhaṃ vai viśrutaṃ mama haihaya /
GP12mtp176pu:3496: tasmātte duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtamanyo hariṣyati // MatsP_43.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:3497: chittvā bāhusahasraṃ te prathamaṃ tarasā balī /
GP12mtp176pu:3498: tapasvī brāhmaṇaśca tvāṃ sa vadhiṣyati bhārgava // MatsP_43.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:3499: *sūta uvāca tasya rāmastadā tv āsīn mṛtyuḥ śāpena dhīmataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3500: varaścaiva tu rājarṣeḥ svayameva vṛtaḥ purā // MatsP_43.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:3501: tasya putraśataṃ tv āsīt pañca tatra mahārathāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3502: kṛtāstrā balinaḥ śūrā dharmātmāno mahābalāḥ // MatsP_43.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:3506: tasya putraśatānyeva tālajaṅghā iti śrutāḥ // MatsP_43.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:3507: teṣāṃ pañca kulāḥ khyātā haihayānāṃ mahātmanām /
GP12mtp176pu:3516: na tasya vittanāśaḥ syān naṣṭaṃ ca labhate punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3520: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kimarthaṃ tadvanaṃ dagdham āpavasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3521: kārtavīryeṇa vikramya sūta prabrūhi tattvataḥ // MatsP_44.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3522: rakṣitā sa tu rājarṣiḥ prajānāmiti naḥ śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:3523: sa kathaṃ rakṣitā bhūtvā adahattattapovanam // MatsP_44.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3528: kīdṛśaṃ bhojanaṃ dadmi hutvā tu vidadhāmyaham // MatsP_44.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3529: *āditya uvāca sthāvaraṃ dehi me sarvam āhāraṃ dadatāṃ vara /
GP12mtp176pu:3530: tena tṛpto bhaveyaṃ vai sā me tṛptirhi pārthiva // MatsP_44.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3531: *kārtavīrya uvāca na śakyāḥ sthāvarāḥ sarve tejasā ca balena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3532: nirdagdhuṃ tapatāṃ śreṣṭha tena tvāṃ praṇamāmyaham // MatsP_44.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3534: ye prakṣiptā jvaliṣyanti mama tejaḥsamanvitāḥ // MatsP_44.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3537: *sūta uvāca tataḥ śarāṃstadādityas tv arjunāya prayacchata /
GP12mtp176pu:3538: tato dadāha samprāptān sthāvarān sarvameva ca // MatsP_44.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3541: evaṃ prācīmanvadahat tataḥ sarvāṃ sa dakṣiṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:3542: nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā bhūmir hatā ghoreṇa tejasā // MatsP_44.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3544: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tatrāste sa mahānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_44.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3547: krodhācchaśāpa rājarṣiṃ kīrtitaṃ vo yathā mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:3552: svāhaputro 'bhavad rājan ruṣaṅgur vadatāṃ varaḥ // MatsP_44.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3553: sa tu prasūtimicchan vai ruṣaṅguḥ saumyamātmajam /
GP12mtp176pu:3556: śaśabinduriti khyātaś cakravartī babhūva ha // MatsP_44.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3576: rukmeṣuḥ pṛthurukmaśca jyāmaghaḥ parigho hariḥ // MatsP_44.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:3582: narmadāṃ nṛpa ekākī kevalaṃ vṛttikāmataḥ // MatsP_44.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:3586: tasyāsīdvijayo yuddhe tatra kanyāmavāpya saḥ // MatsP_44.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:3588: evamuktābravīdenaṃ kasya ceyaṃ snuṣeti ca // MatsP_44.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:3590: yaste janiṣyate putras tasya bhāryā bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:3592: putraṃ vidarbhaṃ subhagā caitrā pariṇatā satī /
GP12mtp176pu:3594: lomapādaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu putraṃ paramadhārmikam // MatsP_44.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:3596: lomapādānmanuḥ putrā jñātistasya tu cātmajaḥ // MatsP_44.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:3597: kaiśikasya cidiḥ putras tasmāccaidyā nṛpāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3600: dhṛṣṭasya putro dharmātmā nirvṛtiḥ paravīrahā // MatsP_44.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:3601: tadeko nirvṛteḥ putro nāmnā sa tu vidūrathaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3602: daśārhastasya vai putro vyomastasya ca vai smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3603: dāśārhāccaiva vyomāttu putro jīmūta ucyate // MatsP_44.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:3605: suto bhīmarathasyāsīt smṛto navarathaḥ kila // MatsP_44.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:3607: tasmātkarambhaḥ kārambhir devarāto babhūva ha // MatsP_44.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:3616: prajāvān eti sāyujyaṃ rājñaḥ somasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_44.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:3618: bhajinaṃ bhajamānaṃ tu divyaṃ devāvṛdhaṃ nṛpa // MatsP_44.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:3619: andhakaṃ ca mahābhojaṃ vṛṣṇiṃ ca yadunandanam /
GP12mtp176pu:3620: teṣāṃ tu sargāś catvāro vistareṇaiva tacchṛṇu // MatsP_44.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:3622: sṛñjayasya sute dve tu bāhyakāstu tadābhavan // MatsP_44.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:3623: tasya bhārye bhaginyau dve suṣuvāte bahūnsutān /
GP12mtp176pu:3624: nimiṃ ca kṛmilaṃ caiva vṛṣṇiṃ parapuraṃjayam /
GP12mtp176pu:3625: te bāhyakāyāṃ sṛñjayyāṃ bhajamānād vijajñire // MatsP_44.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:3628: putraḥ sarvaguṇopeto mama bhūyāditi spṛhan // MatsP_44.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:3635: atha bhūtvā kumārī sā bibhratī paramaṃ vapuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3637: atha sā navame māsi suṣuve saritāṃ varā /
GP12mtp176pu:3642: babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devairdevāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ // MatsP_44.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:3647: atha kaṅkasya duhitā suṣuve caturaḥ sutān /
GP12mtp176pu:3648: kukuraṃ bhajamānaṃ ca śaśiṃ kambalabarhiṣam // MatsP_44.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:3649: kukurasya suto vṛṣṇir vṛṣṇestu tanayo dhṛtiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3652: khyāyate tasya nāmnā sa nandano daradundubhiḥ // MatsP_44.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:3654: aśvamedhaṃ ca putrārtham ājahāra narottamaḥ // MatsP_44.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:3656: atastu vidvānkarmajño yajvā dātā punarvasuḥ // MatsP_44.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:3658: āhukaścāhukī caiva khyātaṃ mātematāṃ vara // MatsP_44.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:3664: āhukasya bhṛtiṃ prāptā ityetadvai taducyate // MatsP_44.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:3668: devakasya sutā vīrā jajñire tridaśopamāḥ // MatsP_44.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:3670: teṣāṃ svasāraḥ saptāsan vasudevāya tā dadau // MatsP_44.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:3672: śrīdevī satyadevī ca sutāpī ceti saptamī // MatsP_44.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:3674: nyagrodhaśca sunāmā ca kaṅkaḥ śaṅkuśca bhūyasaḥ // MatsP_44.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:3676: teṣāṃ svasāraḥ pañcāsan kaṃsā kaṃsavatī tathā // MatsP_44.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:3677: sutantū rāṣṭrapālī ca kaṅkā ceti varāṅganāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3684: śamī ca devaśarmā ca nikuntaḥ śakraśatrujit // MatsP_44.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:3686: pratikṣetraḥ suto bhojo hṛdīkastasya cātmajaḥ // MatsP_44.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:3688: kṛtavarmāgrajas teṣāṃ śatadhanvā ca madhyamaḥ // MatsP_44.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:3694: sudaṃṣṭraśca sunābhaśca kṛṣṇa ityandhakā matāḥ // MatsP_44.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:3696: ātmano vipulaṃ vaṃśaṃ prajāvānāpnute naraḥ // MatsP_44.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:3698: *sūta uvāca gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca vṛṣṇibhārye babhūvatuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3700: mādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato vai devamīḍhuṣam /
GP12mtp176pu:3701: anamitraṃ śibiṃ caiva pañcamaṃ kṛtalakṣaṇam // MatsP_45.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3702: anamitrasuto nighno nighnasyāpi tu dvau sutau /
GP12mtp176pu:3703: prasenaśca mahāvīryaḥ śaktisenaśca tāv ubhau // MatsP_45.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3705: pṛthivyāṃ sarvaratnānāṃ rājā vai so 'bhavanmaṇiḥ // MatsP_45.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3706: hṛdi kṛtvā tu bahuśo maṇiṃ tamabhiyācitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3707: govindo 'pi na taṃ lebhe śakto 'pi na jahāra saḥ // MatsP_45.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3709: yathāśabdaṃ sa śuśrāva bile sattvena pūrite // MatsP_45.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3710: tataḥ praviśya sa bilaṃ praseno hy ṛkṣamaikṣata /
GP12mtp176pu:3711: ṛkṣaḥ prasenaṃ ca tathā ṛkṣaṃ caiva prasenajit // MatsP_45.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3712: hatvā ṛkṣaḥ prasenaṃ tu tatastaṃ maṇimādadāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3714: prasenaṃ tu hataṃ jñātvā govindaḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3715: govindena hato vyaktaṃ praseno maṇikāraṇāt // MatsP_45.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:3717: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa hatastena govindaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GP12mtp176pu:3718: hanmi cainaṃ durācāraṃ śatrubhūtaṃ hi vṛṣṇiṣu // MatsP_45.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3719: atha dīrgheṇa kālena mṛgayāṃ nirgataḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3721: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu mahāśabdaṃ sa cakre ṛkṣarāḍbalī /
GP12mtp176pu:3722: śabdaṃ śrutvā tu govindaḥ khaḍgapāṇiḥ praviśya saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3730: kanyā ceyaṃ mama śubhā bhartāraṃ tvāmavāpnuyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3731: yo 'yaṃ maṇiḥ prasenaṃ tu hatvā prāpto mayā prabho // MatsP_45.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3732: tataḥ sa jāmbavantaṃ taṃ hatvā cakreṇa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3737: asmākaṃ tu matirhyāsīt prasenastu tvayā hataḥ // MatsP_45.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3738: kaikeyasya sutā bhāryā daśa satrājitaḥ śubhāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3743: satyabhāmā varā strīṇāṃ vratinī ca dṛḍhavratā /
GP12mtp176pu:3744: tathā padmāvatī caiva tāśca kṛṣṇāya so 'dadāt // MatsP_45.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3750: anamitrānvayo hy eṣa vyākhyāto vṛṣṇivaṃśajaḥ // MatsP_45.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:3752: anyau tu tanayau vīrau vṛṣabhaḥ kṣatra eva ca // MatsP_45.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:3754: jayantastu jayantyāṃ tu putraḥ samabhavacchubhaḥ // MatsP_45.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3759: upalambhaḥ sadālambho vṛkalo vīrya eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3762: sarve ca pratihotāro ratnāyāṃ jajñire ca te // MatsP_45.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:3765: aśvinyāṃ ca tataḥ putrāḥ pṛthur vipṛthureva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3767: vṛṣṭinemiḥ sudharmā ca tathā śaryātireva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3770: na sa mithyābhiśāpena abhiśāpyo 'tha kenacit // MatsP_45.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:3773: pauruṣājjajñire śūrād bhojāyāṃ putrakā daśa // MatsP_46.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3775: devamārgastato jajñe tato devaśravāḥ punaḥ // MatsP_46.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:3777: śyāmaḥ śamīkaḥ saṃyūpaḥ pañca cāsya varāṅganāḥ // MatsP_46.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3779: rājādhidevī ca tathā pañcaitā vīramātaraḥ // MatsP_46.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3780: kṛtasya tu śrutādevī sugrīvaṃ suṣuve sutam /
GP12mtp176pu:3781: kaikeyyāṃ śrutakīrtyāṃ tu jajñe so 'nuvrato nṛpaḥ // MatsP_46.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:3784: atha sakhyena vṛddhe 'sau kuntibhoje sutāṃ dadau /
GP12mtp176pu:3785: evaṃ kuntī samākhyātā vasudevasvasā pṛthā // MatsP_46.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3786: vasudevena sā dattā pāṇḍorbhāryā hy aninditā /
GP12mtp176pu:3787: pāṇḍorarthena sā jajñe devaputrān mahārathān // MatsP_46.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3792: rohiṇī pauravī nāma bhāryā hy ānakadundubheḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3793: lebhe jyeṣṭhaṃ sutaṃ rāmaṃ sāraṇaṃ ca sutaṃ priyam // MatsP_46.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:3795: citrākṣyau dve kumāryau tu rohiṇyāṃ jajñire tadā // MatsP_46.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3799: prathamā yā amāvāsyā vārṣikī tu bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:3800: tasyāṃ jajñe mahābāhuḥ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ // MatsP_46.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3802: devakyāṃ tu mahātejā jajñe śūro mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_46.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3805: ekāṃ kanyāṃ ca subhagāṃ kaṃsastām abhyaghātayat // MatsP_46.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3806: vijayaṃ rocamānaṃ ca vardhamānaṃ tu devalam /
GP12mtp176pu:3807: ete sarve mahātmāno hy upadevyāṃ prajajñire // MatsP_46.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3809: vṛkadevyāṃ svayaṃ jajñe nandako nāma nāmataḥ // MatsP_46.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3812: śraddhādevyā vihāre tu vane hi vicaranpurā /
GP12mtp176pu:3816: jarā nāma niṣādo 'bhūt prathamaḥ sa dhanurdharaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3823: sucandraṃ tu mahābhāgaṃ vīryavantaṃ mahābalam // MatsP_46.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:3824: jāmbavatyāḥ sutāv etau dvau ca satkṛtalakṣaṇau /
GP12mtp176pu:3832: śṛṇoti mānavo nityaṃ sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // MatsP_46.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:3834: *sūta uvāca atha devo mahādevaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3835: vihārārthaṃ sa deveśo mānuṣeṣviha jayate // MatsP_47.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:3839: uvāca vasudevastaṃ rūpaṃ saṃhara vai prabho // MatsP_47.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:3841: mama putrā hatāstena jyeṣṭhāste bhīmavikramāḥ // MatsP_47.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:3846: ayaṃ tu garbho devakyāṃ jātaḥ kaṃsaṃ haniṣyati // MatsP_47.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:3847: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ ka eṣa vasudevastu devakī ca yaśasvinī /
GP12mtp176pu:3848: nandagopaśca kastveṣa yaśodā ca mahāvratā // MatsP_47.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:3849: yo viṣṇuṃ janayāmāsa yaṃ ca tātetyabhāṣata /
GP12mtp176pu:3850: yā garbhaṃ janayāmāsa yā cainaṃ tv abhyavardhayat // MatsP_47.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:3851: *sūta uvāca puruṣaḥ kaśyapastvāsīd aditistu priyā smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:3854: ye tayā kāṅkṣitā nityam ajātasya mahātmanaḥ // MatsP_47.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:3855: so 'vatīrṇo mahīṃ devaḥ praviṣṭo mānuṣīṃ tanum /
GP12mtp176pu:3857: naṣṭe dharme tathā jajñe viṣṇurvṛṣṇikule prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3858: kartuṃ dharmasya saṃsthānam asurāṇāṃ praṇāśanam // MatsP_47.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:3859: rukmiṇī satyabhāmā ca satyā nāgnajitī tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:3860: subhāmā ca tathā śaibyā gāndhārī lakṣmaṇā tathā // MatsP_47.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:3861: mitravindā ca kālindī devī jāmbavatī tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:3862: suśīlā ca tathā mādrī kauśalyā vijayā tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:3863: evamādīni devīnāṃ sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa // MatsP_47.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:3865: cārudeṣṇaṃ raṇe śūraṃ pradyumnaṃ ca mahābalam // MatsP_47.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:3866: sucāruṃ bhadracāruṃ ca sudeṣṇaṃ bhadrameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3868: cāruhāsaṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ ca kanyāṃ cārumatīṃ tathā // MatsP_47.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:3870: rohito dīptimāṃścaiva tāmraś cakro jalaṃdhamaḥ // MatsP_47.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:3872: jāmbavatyāḥ suto jajñe sāmbaḥ samitiśobhanaḥ // MatsP_47.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:3874: mitrabāhuḥ sunīthaśca nāgnajityāḥ prajā hi sā // MatsP_47.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:3876: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_47.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:3878: lakṣamekaṃ tathā proktaṃ putrāṇāṃ ca dvijottamāḥ // MatsP_47.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:3879: upasaṅgasya tu sutau vajraḥ saṃkṣipta eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:3884: satyaprakṛtayo devāḥ pañca vīrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_47.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:3887: devāṃśāḥ sarva eveha hy utpannāste mahaujasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3888: devāsure hatā ye ca tv asurā ye mahābalāḥ // MatsP_47.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:3892: sarvametatkulaṃ yāvad vartate vaiṣṇave kule // MatsP_47.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:3893: viṣṇusteṣāṃ praṇetā ca prabhutve ca vyavasthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3898: kimarthaṃ saṃghaśo bhūtāḥ smṛtāḥ sambhūtayaḥ kati // MatsP_47.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:3902: punaḥ punarmanuṣyeṣu tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // MatsP_47.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:3903: *sūta uvāca tyaktvā divyāṃ tanuṃ viṣṇur mānuṣeṣviha jāyate /
GP12mtp176pu:3904: yuge tv atha parāvṛtte kāle praśithile prabhuḥ // MatsP_47.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:3912: devānāmasurāṇāṃ ca ghoraḥ kṣayakaro mahān // MatsP_47.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:3914: bhṛgoḥ śāpanimittaṃ tu devāsurakṛte tadā // MatsP_47.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:3916: devāsuraṃ yathā vṛttaṃ tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // MatsP_47.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:3917: *sūta uvāca teṣāṃ dāyanimittaṃ te saṃgrāmāstu sudāruṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3918: varāhādyā daśa dvau ca śaṇḍāmarkāntare smṛtāḥ // MatsP_47.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:3928: vāmanena balir baddhas trailokyākramaṇe purā // MatsP_47.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:3929: hiraṇyākṣo hato dvaṃdve pratighāte tu daivataiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3930: daṃṣṭrayā tu varāheṇa samudrastu dvidhā kṛtaḥ // MatsP_47.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:3934: aśaknuvansa devānāṃ sarvaṃ soḍhuṃ sadaivatam // MatsP_47.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:3935: nihatā dānavāḥ sarve trailokye tryambakeṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:3938: saṃpṛkto dānavairvṛtro ghoro hālāhale hataḥ // MatsP_47.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:3943: jayankolāhale sarvān devaiḥ parivṛto vṛṣā // MatsP_47.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:3945: ete devāsure vṛttāḥ saṃgrāmā dvādaśaiva tu // MatsP_47.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:3949: aśītiṃ ca sahasrāṇi trailokyaiśvaryatāṃ gataḥ // MatsP_47.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:3953: tāvatkālaṃ tu prahlādo nivṛtto hy asuraiḥ saha // MatsP_47.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:3962: kiṃ tvaṃ no miṣatāṃ rājyaṃ tyaktvā yajñaṃ punargataḥ // MatsP_47.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:3963: sthātuṃ na śaknumo hy atra praviśāmo rasātalam /
GP12mtp176pu:3965: mā bhaiṣṭa dhārayiṣyāmi tejasā svena vo 'surāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3966: mantrāścauṣadhayaścaiva rasā vasu ca yatparam // MatsP_47.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:3967: kṛtsnāni mayi tiṣṭhanti pādasteṣāṃ sureṣu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:3968: tatsarvaṃ vaḥ pradāsyāmi yuṣmadarthe dhṛtā mayā // MatsP_47.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:3970: saṃmantrayanti devā vai saṃvijñāstu jighṛkṣayā // MatsP_47.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:3971: kāvyo hy eṣa idaṃ sarvaṃ vyāvartayati no balāt /
GP12mtp176pu:3974: tato devāstu saṃrabdhā dānavān upasṛtya ha // MatsP_47.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:3976: tataḥ kāvyastu tāndṛṣṭvā tūrṇaṃ devair abhidrutān // MatsP_47.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:3978: kāvyaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthitaṃ devā niḥśaṅkamasurāñjahuḥ // MatsP_47.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:3980: tānuvāca tataḥ kāvyaḥ pūrvaṃ vṛttamanusmaran // MatsP_47.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:3981: trailokyaṃ vo hṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vāmanena tribhiḥ kramaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:3982: balirbaddho hato jambho nihataśca virocanaḥ // MatsP_47.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:3985: kiṃcicchīṣṭāstu yūyaṃ vai yuddhaṃ māstviti me matam /
GP12mtp176pu:3986: nītiṃ yāṃ vo 'bhidhāsyāmi tiṣṭhadhvaṃ kālaparyayāt // MatsP_47.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:3989: yudhyāmahe punardevāṃs tataḥ prāpsyatha vai jayam // MatsP_47.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:3991: nyastaśastrā vayaṃ sarve niḥsaṃnāhā rathairvinā // MatsP_47.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:3993: prahlādasya vacaḥ śrutvā satyābhivyāhṛtaṃ tu tat // MatsP_47.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:3994: tato devā nyavartanta vijvarā muditāśca te /
GP12mtp176pu:4000: *śukra uvāca mantrānicchāmyahaṃ deva ye na santi bṛhaspatau /
GP12mtp176pu:4001: parābhavāya devānām asurāṇāṃ jayāya ca // MatsP_47.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:4004: yadi pāsyasi bhadraṃ te tato mantrānavāpsyasi // MatsP_47.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:4007: vrataṃ carāmyahaṃ deva tvayādiṣṭo 'dya vai prabho // MatsP_47.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:4009: tadā tasmingate śukre hy asurāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:4010: mantrārthaṃ tatra vasati brahmacaryaṃ maheśvare // MatsP_47.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:4011: tadbuddhvā nītipūrvaṃ tu rājye nyaste tadāsuraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4015: utpetuḥ sahasā te vai saṃtrastāstānvaco 'bruvan // MatsP_47.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:4017: dattvā bhavanto hy abhayaṃ samprāptā no jighāṃsayā // MatsP_47.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:4020: raṇe vijetuṃ devāṃśca na śakṣyāmaḥ kathaṃcana /
GP12mtp176pu:4023: nivṛtte ca tathā śukre yotsyāmo daṃśitāyudhāḥ // MatsP_47.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:4025: prāpadyanta tato bhītās tebhyo 'dādabhayaṃ tu sā // MatsP_47.91 //
GP12mtp176pu:4026: na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ bhayaṃ tyajata dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4027: matsaṃnidhau vartatāṃ vo na bhīr bhavitumarhati // MatsP_47.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:4033: tastambha devī balavad yogayuktā tapodhanā // MatsP_47.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:4034: tatastaṃ stambhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā indraṃ devāśca mūkavat /
GP12mtp176pu:4035: prādravanta tato bhītā indraṃ dṛṣṭvā vaśīkṛtam // MatsP_47.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:4037: māṃ tvaṃ praviśa bhadraṃ te nayiṣye tvāṃ surottama // MatsP_47.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:4039: viṣṇunā rakṣitaṃ dṛṣṭvā devī kruddhā vaco 'bravīt // MatsP_47.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:4040: eṣā tvāṃ viṣṇunā sārdhaṃ dahāmi maghavanbalāt /
GP12mtp176pu:4041: miṣatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dṛśyatāṃ me tapobalam // MatsP_47.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:4043: kathaṃ mucyeva sahitau viṣṇurindram abhāṣata // MatsP_47.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:4045: viśeṣaṇābhibhūto 'smi tvatto 'haṃ jahi mā ciram // MatsP_47.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:4046: tataḥ samīkṣya viṣṇustāṃ strīvadhe kṛcchram āsthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4047: abhidhyāya tataścakram āpaduddharaṇe tu tat // MatsP_47.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:4050: kruddhaḥ svamastramādāya śiraściccheda vai bhiyā // MatsP_47.103 //
GP12mtp176pu:4051: taṃ dṛṣṭvā strīvadhaṃ ghoraṃ cukrodha bhṛgurīśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4052: tato 'bhiśapto bhṛguṇā viṣṇur bhāryāvadhe tadā // MatsP_47.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:4056: lokasya ca hitārthāya jāyate mānuyeṣviha // MatsP_47.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:4058: samānīya tataḥ kāyam asau gṛhyedamabravīt // MatsP_47.107 //
GP12mtp176pu:4059: eṣā tvaṃ viṣpunā devi hatā saṃjīvayāmyaham /
GP12mtp176pu:4060: tatastāṃ yojya śirasā abhijīveti so 'bravīt // MatsP_47.108 //
GP12mtp176pu:4061: yadi kṛtsno mayā dharmo jñāyate carito 'pi vā /
GP12mtp176pu:4062: tena satyena jīvasva yadi satyaṃ vadāmyaham // MatsP_47.109 //
GP12mtp176pu:4063: tatastāṃ prokṣya śītābhir adbhir jīveti so 'bravīt /
GP12mtp176pu:4064: tato 'bhivyāhṛte tasya devī saṃjīvitā tadā // MatsP_47.110 //
GP12mtp176pu:4066: sādhu sādhviti cakruste vacasā sarvatodiśam // MatsP_47.111 //
GP12mtp176pu:4067: evaṃ pratyāhṛtā tena devī sā bhṛguṇā tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:4068: miṣatāṃ devatānāṃ hi tadadbhutam ivābhavad // MatsP_47.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:4072: saṃcintya matimān vākyaṃ svāṃ kanyāṃ pākaśāsanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4073: eṣa kāvyo hyamitrāya vrataṃ carati dāruṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:4074: tenāhaṃ vyākulaḥ putri kṛto matimatā bhṛśam // MatsP_47.114 //
GP12mtp176pu:4078: gaccha tvaṃ tasya dattā'si prayatnaṃ kuru matkṛte // MatsP_47.116 //
GP12mtp176pu:4079: evamuktā jayantī sā vacaḥ saṃgṛhya vai pituḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4080: agacchadyatra ghoraṃ sa tapa ārabhya tiṣṭhati // MatsP_47.117 //
GP12mtp176pu:4081: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tu pibantaṃ sā kaṇadhūmam avāṅmukham /
GP12mtp176pu:4082: yakṣeṇa pātyamānaṃ ca kuṇḍadhāreṇa pātitam // MatsP_47.118 //
GP12mtp176pu:4083: dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ pātyamānaṃ devī kāvyamavasthitam /
GP12mtp176pu:4085: pitrā yathoktaṃ vākyaṃ sā kāvye kṛtavatī tadā // MatsP_47.119 //
GP12mtp176pu:4090: vareṇa cchandayāmāsa kāvyaṃ prīto bhavastadā // MatsP_47.121 //
GP12mtp176pu:4091: *mahādeva uvāca etadvrataṃ tvayaikena cīrṇaṃ nānyena kenacit /
GP12mtp176pu:4092: tasmādvai tapasā buddhyā śrutena ca balena ca // MatsP_47.122 //
GP12mtp176pu:4095: prapatsyase tu tatsarvaṃ nānuvācyaṃ tu kasyacit /
GP12mtp176pu:4096: sarvābhibhāvī tena tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi dvijottama // MatsP_47.124 //
GP12mtp176pu:4098: prajeśatvaṃ dhaneśatvam avadhyatvaṃ ca vai dadau // MatsP_47.125 //
GP12mtp176pu:4111: varāya bhavyarūpāya śvetāya puruṣāya ca // MatsP_47.131 //
GP12mtp176pu:4113: sutṛptāya suvastrāya dhanvine bhārgavāya ca // MatsP_47.132 //
GP12mtp176pu:4114: niṣaṅgiṇe ca tārāya svakṣāya kṣapaṇāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4115: tāmrāya caiva bhīmāya ugrāya ca śivāya ca // MatsP_47.133 //
GP12mtp176pu:4117: hiraṇyāya variṣṭhāya jyeṣṭhāya madhyamāya ca // MatsP_47.134 //
GP12mtp176pu:4119: mṛgavyādhāya dakṣāya sthāṇave bhīṣaṇāya ca // MatsP_47.135 //
GP12mtp176pu:4121: kapāline ca vīrāya mṛtyave tryambakāya ca // MatsP_47.136 //
GP12mtp176pu:4123: pinākine ceṣumate citrāya rohitāya ca // MatsP_47.137 //
GP12mtp176pu:4126: sāṃkhyāya caiva yogāya vyāpine dīkṣitāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4127: anāhatāya śarvāya bhavyeśāya yamāya ca // MatsP_47.139 //
GP12mtp176pu:4129: catuṣpadāya medhyāya rakṣiṇe śīghragāya ca // MatsP_47.140 //
GP12mtp176pu:4133: saumyāya caiva mukhyāya dhārmikāya śubhāya ca // MatsP_47.142 //
GP12mtp176pu:4135: vyāpṛtāya viśiṣṭāya bharatāya ca sākṣiṇe // MatsP_47.143 //
GP12mtp176pu:4137: kartre paraśave caiva śūline divyacakṣuṣe // MatsP_47.144 //
GP12mtp176pu:4147: kṛśānave pracetāya vahnaye nirmalāya ca // MatsP_47.149 //
GP12mtp176pu:4149: vibhrāntāya mahāntāya arṇave durgamāya ca // MatsP_47.150 //
GP12mtp176pu:4152: hiraṇyabāhave caiva vyāptāya ca mahāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4157: dṛḍhadhanvine kavacine rathine ca varūthine // MatsP_47.154 //
GP12mtp176pu:4159: amoghāya praśāntāya sumedhāya vṛṣāya ca // MatsP_47.155 //
GP12mtp176pu:4161: paśūnāṃ pataye tubhyaṃ bhūtānāṃ pataye namaḥ // MatsP_47.156 //
GP12mtp176pu:4162: praṇave ṛgyajuḥsāmne svāhāya ca svadhāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4163: vaṣaṭkārātmane caiva tubhyaṃ mantrātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.157 //
GP12mtp176pu:4164: tvaṣṭre dhātre tathā kartre cakṣuḥśrotramayāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4167: viṣāya mārutāyaiva tubhyaṃ devātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.159 //
GP12mtp176pu:4170: prajānāṃ pataye caiva tubhyaṃ brahmātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.160 //
GP12mtp176pu:4174: nirupākhyāya mitrāya tubhyaṃ sāṃkhyātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.162 //
GP12mtp176pu:4175: pṛthivyai cāntarikṣāya divyāya ca mahāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4176: janastapāya satyāya tubhyaṃ lokātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.163 //
GP12mtp176pu:4178: ātmajñāya viśeṣāya tubhyaṃ sarvātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.164 //
GP12mtp176pu:4180: buddhāya vibhave caiva tubhyaṃ mokṣātmane namaḥ // MatsP_47.165 //
GP12mtp176pu:4181: namaste triṣu lokeṣu namaste paratas triṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:4182: satyānteṣu mahādyeṣu caturṣu ca namo 'stu te // MatsP_47.166 //
GP12mtp176pu:4183: namaḥ stotre mayā hy asmin yadi na vyāhṛtaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:4184: madbhakta iti brahmaṇya tatsarvaṃ kṣantumarhasi // MatsP_47.167 //
GP12mtp176pu:4191: kasya tvaṃ subhage kā vā duḥkhite mayi duḥkhitā /
GP12mtp176pu:4192: mahatā tapasā yuktā kimarthaṃ māṃ niṣevase // MatsP_47.171 //
GP12mtp176pu:4193: anayā saṃstuto bhaktyā praśrayeṇa damena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4194: snehena caiva suśroṇi prīto 'smi varavarṇini // MatsP_47.172 //
GP12mtp176pu:4198: cikīrṣitaṃ hi me brahmaṃs tvaṃ hi vettha yathātatham // MatsP_47.174 //
GP12mtp176pu:4200: mayā saha tvaṃ suśroṇi daśa varṣāṇi bhāmini // MatsP_47.175 //
GP12mtp176pu:4203: evaṃ vṛṇoṣi kāmaṃ tvaṃ matto vai valgubhāṣiṇi // MatsP_47.176 //
GP12mtp176pu:4207: adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ māyayā saṃvṛtaḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_47.178 //
GP12mtp176pu:4208: kṛtārthamāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā kāvyaṃ sarve diteḥ sutāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4210: yadā gatā na paśyanti māyayā saṃvṛtaṃ gurum /
GP12mtp176pu:4212: bṛhaspatistu saṃruddhaṃ kāvyaṃ jñātvā vareṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:4213: tuṣṭyarthaṃ daśa varṣāṇi jayantyā hitakāmyayā // MatsP_47.181 //
GP12mtp176pu:4217: svāgataṃ mama yājyānāṃ prāpto 'haṃ vo hitāya ca // MatsP_47.183 //
GP12mtp176pu:4218: ahaṃ vo 'dhyāpayiṣyāmi vidyāḥ prāptāstu yā mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:4222: buddhiṃ cakre tataḥ so 'tha yājyānāṃ pratyavekṣaṇe // MatsP_47.185 //
GP12mtp176pu:4226: eṣa dharmaḥ satāṃ brahman na dharmaṃ lopayāmi te // MatsP_47.187 //
GP12mtp176pu:4229: kāvyaṃ māṃ vo vijānīdhvaṃ toṣito giriśo vibhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4230: vañcitā bata yūyaṃ vai sarve śṛṇuta dānavāḥ // MatsP_47.189 //
GP12mtp176pu:4231: śrutvā tathā bruvāṇaṃ taṃ saṃbhrāntāste tadābhavan /
GP12mtp176pu:4232: prekṣantas tāv ubhau tatra sthitāsīnau suvismitāḥ // MatsP_47.190 //
GP12mtp176pu:4233: sampramūḍhās tataḥ sarve na prābudhyanta kiṃcana /
GP12mtp176pu:4235: ācāryo vo hy ahaṃ kāvyo devācāryo 'yamaṅgirāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4236: anugacchata māṃ daityās tyajatainaṃ bṛhaspatim // MatsP_47.192 //
GP12mtp176pu:4237: ityuktā hy asurāstena tāv ubhau samavekṣya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4238: yadāsurā viśeṣaṃ tu na jānantyubhayostayoḥ // MatsP_47.193 //
GP12mtp176pu:4240: kāvyo vo 'haṃ gururdaityā madrūpo 'yaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ // MatsP_47.194 //
GP12mtp176pu:4242: śrutvā tasya tataste vai sametya tu tato 'bruvan // MatsP_47.195 //
GP12mtp176pu:4243: ayaṃ no daśa varṣāṇi satataṃ śāsti vai prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4244: eṣa vai gururasmākam antarepsurayaṃ dvijaḥ // MatsP_47.196 //
GP12mtp176pu:4246: vacanaṃ jagṛhustasya cirābhyāse na mohitāḥ // MatsP_47.197 //
GP12mtp176pu:4248: ayaṃ gurur hito 'smākaṃ gaccha tvaṃ nāsi no guruḥ // MatsP_47.198 //
GP12mtp176pu:4249: bhārgavo vāṅgirā vāpi bhagavāneṣa no guruḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4250: sthitā vayaṃ nideśe 'sya sādhu tvaṃ gaccha māciram // MatsP_47.199 //
GP12mtp176pu:4252: yadā na pratyapadyanta kāvyenoktaṃ mahaddhitam // MatsP_47.200 //
GP12mtp176pu:4254: bodhitā hi mayā yasmān na māṃ bhajatha dānavāḥ // MatsP_47.201 //
GP12mtp176pu:4256: iti vyāhṛtya tānkāvyo jagāmātha yathāgatam // MatsP_47.202 //
GP12mtp176pu:4258: kṛtārthaḥ sa tadā hṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ pratyapadyata // MatsP_47.203 //
GP12mtp176pu:4260: tataḥ pranaṣṭe tasmiṃstu vibhrāntā dānavābhavan // MatsP_47.204 //
GP12mtp176pu:4263: vañcitāḥ sopadhānena sve sve vastuni māyayā /
GP12mtp176pu:4270: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ śukraṃ tu bāṣpasaṃdigdhayā girā /
GP12mtp176pu:4271: prahlādastaṃ tadovāca mā nastvaṃ tyaja bhārgava // MatsP_47.209 //
GP12mtp176pu:4274: bhaktānarhasi vai jñātuṃ tapodīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā // MatsP_47.210 //
GP12mtp176pu:4275: yadi nastvaṃ na kuruṣe prasādaṃ bhṛgunandana /
GP12mtp176pu:4276: apadhyātās tvayā hy adya praviśāmo rasātalam // MatsP_47.211 //
GP12mtp176pu:4278: evaṃ pratyanunīto vai tataḥ kopaṃ niyamya saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4279: uvācaitānna bhetavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ rasātalam // MatsP_47.212 //
GP12mtp176pu:4280: avaśyaṃ bhāvino hy arthāḥ prāptavyā mayi jāgrati /
GP12mtp176pu:4281: na śakyamanyathā kartuṃ diṣṭaṃ hi balavattaram // MatsP_47.213 //
GP12mtp176pu:4282: saṃjñā pranaṣṭā yā vo 'dya tāmetāṃ pratipatsyatha /
GP12mtp176pu:4287: etāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ vai brahmā rājyamabhāṣata // MatsP_47.216 //
GP12mtp176pu:4288: rājyaṃ sāvarṇike tubhyaṃ punaḥ kila bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:4289: lokānāmīśvaro bhāvyas tava pautraḥ punarbaliḥ // MatsP_47.217 //
GP12mtp176pu:4290: evaṃ kila mithaḥ proktaḥ pautraste viṣṇunā svayam /
GP12mtp176pu:4293: tasmādvṛttena prītena tubhyaṃ dattaṃ svayambhuvā // MatsP_47.219 //
GP12mtp176pu:4295: tasmādadṛśyo bhūtānāṃ kālāpekṣaḥ sa tiṣṭhati // MatsP_47.220 //
GP12mtp176pu:4298: na hi śakyaṃ mayā tubhyaṃ purastād viprabhāṣitum /
GP12mtp176pu:4299: brahmaṇā pratiṣiddho 'haṃ bhaviṣyaṃ jānatā vibho // MatsP_47.222 //
GP12mtp176pu:4300: imau ca śiṣyau dvau mahyaṃ samāv etau bṛhaspateḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4301: daivataiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭān sarvānvo dhārayiṣyataḥ // MatsP_47.223 //
GP12mtp176pu:4303: hṛṣṭāstena yayuḥ sārdhaṃ prahlādena mahātmanā // MatsP_47.224 //
GP12mtp176pu:4304: avaśyaṃ bhāvyamarthaṃ tu śrutvā śukreṇa bhāṣitam /
GP12mtp176pu:4306: daṃśitāḥ sāyudhāḥ sarve tato devānsamāhvayan // MatsP_47.225 //
GP12mtp176pu:4309: devāsure tadā tasmin vartamāne śataṃ samāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4310: ajayannasurā devāṃs tato devā hy amantrayan // MatsP_47.227 //
GP12mtp176pu:4312: tadopāmantrayandevāḥ śaṇḍāmarkau tu tāv ubhau // MatsP_47.228 //
GP12mtp176pu:4313: yajñe cāhūya tau proktau tyajetāmasurān dvijau /
GP12mtp176pu:4314: vayaṃ yuvāṃ bhajiṣyāmaḥ saha jitvā tu dānavān // MatsP_47.229 //
GP12mtp176pu:4316: tato devā jayaṃ prāpur dānavāśca parājitāḥ // MatsP_47.230 //
GP12mtp176pu:4321: evaṃ nirudyamā devaiḥ kṛtāḥ kṛcchreṇa dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4322: tataḥ prabhṛti śāpena bhṛgornaimittikena tu // MatsP_47.233 //
GP12mtp176pu:4323: jajñe punaḥ punarviṣṇur dharme praśithile prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4325: prahlādasya nideśe tu na sthāsyantyasurāśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:4328: yajñaṃ vai vartayāmāsur devā vaivasvate 'ntare // MatsP_47.236 //
GP12mtp176pu:4330: yugākhyāyāṃ caturthyāṃ tu āpanneṣu sureṣu vai // MatsP_47.237 //
GP12mtp176pu:4332: dvitīye narasiṃhākhye rudro hy āsītpurohitaḥ // MatsP_47.238 //
GP12mtp176pu:4334: tṛtīye vāmanasyārthe dharmeṇa tu purodhasā // MatsP_47.239 //
GP12mtp176pu:4335: etās tisraḥ smṛtāstasya divyāḥ sambhūtayo dvijāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4336: mānuṣāḥ sapta yānyāstu śāpajāstā nibodhata // MatsP_47.240 //
GP12mtp176pu:4337: tretāyuge tu prathame dattātreyo babhūva ha /
GP12mtp176pu:4339: pañcamaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ ca tretāyāṃ saṃbabhūva ha /
GP12mtp176pu:4353: sarvāṃśca bhūtāṃs timitān pāṣaṇḍāṃścaiva sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_47.248 //
GP12mtp176pu:4356: brahmadviṣaḥ sapatnāṃstu saṃhṛtyaiva ca tadvapuḥ // MatsP_47.250 //
GP12mtp176pu:4358: śūdrān saṃśodhayitvā tu samudrāntaṃ ca vai svayam // MatsP_47.251 //
GP12mtp176pu:4361: tatastadā sa vai kalkiś caritārthaḥ sasainikaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4362: prajāstaṃ sādhayitvā tu samṛddhāstena vai svayam // MatsP_47.253 //
GP12mtp176pu:4364: kṣapayitvā tu te 'nyonyaṃ bhāvinārthena coditāḥ // MatsP_47.254 //
GP12mtp176pu:4365: tataḥ kāle vyatīte tu sa devo 'ntaradhīyata /
GP12mtp176pu:4368: parasparaṃ ca hatvā tu nirākrandāḥ suduḥkhitāḥ // MatsP_47.256 //
GP12mtp176pu:4376: utpātaduḥkhāḥ svalpārthā bahubādhāśca tāḥ prajāḥ // MatsP_47.260 //
GP12mtp176pu:4378: tataḥ kṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti sārdhaṃ kaliyugena tu // MatsP_47.261 //
GP12mtp176pu:4382: turvasostu pravakṣyāmi pūror druhyostathā hy anoḥ // MatsP_47.263 //
GP12mtp176pu:4384: *sūta uvāca turvasostu suto garbho gobhānustasya cātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4387: duṣyantaḥ pauravasyāpi tasya putro hy akalmaṣaḥ // MatsP_48.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:4389: turvasoḥ pauravaṃ vaṃśaṃ praviveśa purā kila // MatsP_48.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:4390: duṣyantasya tu dāyādo varūtho nāma pārthivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4393: teṣāṃ janapadāḥ sphītāḥ pāṇḍyāścolāḥ sakeralāḥ // MatsP_48.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:4394: druhyostu tanayau śūrau setuḥ ketustathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4399: ghṛtācca viduṣo jajñe pracetāstasya cātmajaḥ // MatsP_48.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:4400: pracetasaḥ putraśataṃ rājānaḥ sarva eva te /
GP12mtp176pu:4401: mleccharāṣṭrādhipāḥ sarve udīcīṃ diśam āśritāḥ // MatsP_48.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:4405: kolāhalasya dharmātmā saṃjayo nāma viśrutaḥ // MatsP_48.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:4413: uśīnaraṃ ca dharmajñaṃ titikṣuṃ caiva tāv ubhau // MatsP_48.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:4415: bhṛśā kṛśā navā darśā yā ca devī dṛṣadvatī // MatsP_48.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:4417: tapasā te tu mahatā jātā vṛddhasya dhārmikāḥ // MatsP_48.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:4418: bhṛśāyāstu nṛgaḥ putro navāyā nava eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4420: dṛṣadvatyāḥ sutaścāpi śibir auśīnaro nṛpaḥ // MatsP_48.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:4426: navasya navarāṣṭraṃ tu titikṣostu prajāṃ śṛṇu // MatsP_48.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:4430: jāto mānuṣayonyāṃ tu kṣīṇe vaṃśe prajecchayā // MatsP_48.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:4431: mahāyogī tu sa balir baddho bandhairmahātmanā /
GP12mtp176pu:4433: aṅgaṃ sa janayāmāsa vaṅgaṃ suhmaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4434: puṇḍraṃ kaliṅgaṃ ca tathā bāleyaṃ kṣetramucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:4435: bāleyā brāhmaṇāścaiva tasya vaṃśakarāḥ prabho // MatsP_48.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:4436: baleśca brahmaṇā datto varaḥ prītena dhīmataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4439: traikālyadarśanaṃ caiva prādhānyaṃ prasave tathā // MatsP_48.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:4441: caturo niyatānvarṇān sa vai sthāpayitā prabhuḥ // MatsP_48.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:4442: teṣāṃ ca pañca dāyādā vaṅgāṅgāḥ suhmakāstathā /
GP12mtp176pu:4443: puṇḍrāḥ kaliṅgāśca tathā aṅgasya tu nibodhata // MatsP_48.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:4444: *munaya ūcuḥ kathaṃ baleḥ sutā jātāḥ pañca tasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4445: kiṃnāmnī mahiṣī tasya janitā katama ṛṣiḥ // MatsP_48.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:4447: māhātmyaṃ ca prabhāvaṃ ca nikhilena vadasva tat // MatsP_48.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:4448: *sūta uvāca athośija iti khyāta āsīdvidvānṛṣiḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:4449: patnī vai mamatā nāma babhūvāsya mahātmanaḥ // MatsP_48.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:4452: uvāca mamatā taṃ tu devaraṃ varavarṇinī /
GP12mtp176pu:4453: antarvatnyasmi te bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya tu viramyatām // MatsP_48.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:4454: ayaṃ tu me mahābhāga garbhaḥ kupyedbṛhaspate /
GP12mtp176pu:4457: asminn evaṃ gate kāle yathā vā manyase prabho // MatsP_48.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:4459: kāmātmā sa mahātmāpi na manaḥ so 'bhyavārayat // MatsP_48.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:4465: putraṃ jyeṣṭhasya vai bhrātur garbhasthaṃ bhagavānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_48.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:4472: tasya bhrātā pitṛvyo yaś cakāra bharaṇaṃ tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:4475: jagrāha taṃ dīrghatamāḥ śṛṅgayostu catuṣpadam // MatsP_48.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:4477: tato 'bravīdvṛṣastaṃ vai muñca māṃ balināṃ vara // MatsP_48.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:4479: mama cānyaḥ samo vāpi na hi me balasaṃkhyayā /
GP12mtp176pu:4480: muñca tāteti ca punaḥ prītaste 'haṃ varaṃ vṛṇu // MatsP_48.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:4482: eṣa tvāṃ na vimokṣyāmi parasvādaṃ catuṣpadam // MatsP_48.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:4483: *vṛṣabha uvāca nāsmākaṃ vidyate tāta pātakaṃ steyameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4484: bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ tathā caiva peyāpeyaṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_48.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:4485: dvipadāṃ bahavo hy ete dharma eṣa gavāṃ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4486: kāryākārye na vāgamyā-gamanaṃ ca tathaiva ca // MatsP_48.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:4487: *sūta uvāca gavāṃ dharmaṃ tu vai śrutvā saṃbhrāntastu visṛjya tam /
GP12mtp176pu:4489: prasādite gate tasmin godharmaṃ bhaktitastu saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4490: manasaiva samādadhyau tanniṣṭhastatparo hi saḥ // MatsP_48.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:4492: kṛtāvalepāṃ tāṃ matvā so 'naḍvāniva na kṣamaḥ // MatsP_48.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:4493: godharmaṃ tu paraṃ matvā snuṣāṃ tāmabhyapadyata /
GP12mtp176pu:4494: nirbhartsya cainaṃ ruddhvā ca bāhubhyāṃ sampragṛhya ca // MatsP_48.54 //
