GP12mtp176pu:4495: bhāvyamarthaṃ tu taṃ jñātvā māhātmyāttamuvāca sā /
GP12mtp176pu:4496: viparyayaṃ tu tvaṃ labdhvā anaḍvāniva vartase // MatsP_48.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:4498: durvṛttaṃ tvāṃ tyajāmyadya gaccha tvaṃ svena karmaṇā // MatsP_48.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:4502: jagrāha taṃ sa dharmātmā balir vairocanistadā // MatsP_48.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:4504: prītaścaiva vareṇaiva cchandayāmāsa vai balim // MatsP_48.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:4505: tasmācca sa varaṃ vavre putrārthe dānavarṣabhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4509: sa tasya rājā svāṃ bhāryāṃ sudeṣṇāṃ nāma prāhiṇot /
GP12mtp176pu:4510: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca taṃ jñātvā na sā devī jagāma ha // MatsP_48.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:4512: tasyāṃ kakṣīvadādīṃśca śūdrayonāv ṛṣir vaśī // MatsP_48.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:4514: uvāca taṃ balī rājā dṛṣṭvā kakṣīvadādikān // MatsP_48.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:4518: mamaiva ceti hovāca taṃ dīrghatamasaṃ baliḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4519: natyuvāca munistaṃ vai mamaivamiti cābravīt // MatsP_48.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:4521: andhaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca māṃ jñātvā sudeṣṇā mahiṣī tava /
GP12mtp176pu:4522: prāhiṇod avamānānme śūdrāṃ dhātreyikāṃ nṛpa // MatsP_48.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:4524: baliḥ sudeṣṇāṃ tāṃ bhāryāṃ bhartsayāmāsa dānavaḥ // MatsP_48.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:4526: tāṃ sa dīrghatamā devīṃ tathā kṛtavatīṃ tadā // MatsP_48.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:4527: dadhnā lavaṇamiśreṇa tv abhyaktaṃ madhukena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:4529: tatastvaṃ prāpsyase devi putrānvai manasepsitān // MatsP_48.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:4530: tasya sā tadvaco devī sarvaṃ kṛtavatī tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:4531: tasya sāpānam āsādya devī pariharattadā // MatsP_48.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:4532: tāmuvāca tataḥ so 'tha yatte parihṛtaṃ śubhe /
GP12mtp176pu:4533: vināpānaṃ kumāraṃ tu janayiṣyasi pūrvajam // MatsP_48.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:4535: nārhasi tvaṃ mahābhāga putraṃ me dātumīdṛśam /
GP12mtp176pu:4536: toṣitaśca yathāśakti prasādaṃ kuru me prabho // MatsP_48.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:4538: naiva dāsyati putraste pautrau vai dāsyate phalam // MatsP_48.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:4540: tasmād dīrghatamāṅgeṣu kukṣau spṛṣṭvedam abravīt // MatsP_48.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:4542: tena tiṣṭhanti te garbhe paurṇamāsyām ivoḍurāṭ // MatsP_48.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:4544: tejasvinaḥ suvṛttāśca yajvāno dhārmikāśca te // MatsP_48.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:4545: *sūta uvāca tadaṃśastu sudeṣṇāyā jyeṣṭhaḥ putro vyajāyata /
GP12mtp176pu:4546: aṅgastathā kaliṅgaśca puṇḍraḥ suhmastathaiva ca // MatsP_48.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:4550: tato mānuṣayonyāṃ sa janayāmāsa vai prajāḥ // MatsP_48.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:4552: vicārya yasmādgodharmaṃ pramāṇaṃ te kṛtaṃ vibho // MatsP_48.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:4554: tasmāttubhyaṃ tamo dīrgham āghrāyāpanudāmi vai // MatsP_48.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:4556: jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ tamaścaiva āghrāyāpanudāmi te // MatsP_48.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:4560: kākṣīvāṃstu tato gatvā saha pitrā girivrajam // MatsP_48.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:4561: dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā piturvai sa hy upaviṣṭaściraṃ tapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4562: tataḥ kālena mahatā tapasā bhāvitastu saḥ // MatsP_48.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:4564: tato 'bravītpitā taṃ vai putravānasmyahaṃ tvayā // MatsP_48.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:4566: muktvātmānaṃ tato 'sau vai prāptavānbrahmaṇaḥ kṣayam // MatsP_48.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:4568: kauṣmāṇḍā gautamāścaiva smṛtāḥ kākṣīvataḥ sutāḥ // MatsP_48.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:4572: kṛtārthaḥ so 'pi dharmātmā yogamāyāvṛtaḥ svayam // MatsP_48.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:4573: adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ kālāpekṣaḥ sa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4577: sa hi dharmarathaḥ śrīmāṃs tena viṣṇupade girau /
GP12mtp176pu:4578: somaḥ śukreṇa vai rājñā saha pīto mahātmanā // MatsP_48.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:4580: tasya satyarathaḥ putras tasmāddaśarathaḥ kila // MatsP_48.94 //
GP12mtp176pu:4581: lomapāda iti khyātas tasya śāntā sutābhavat /
GP12mtp176pu:4582: atha dāśarathir vīraś caturaṅgo mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_48.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:4584: caturaṅgasya putrastu pṛthulākṣa iti smṛtaḥ // MatsP_48.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:4586: campasya tu purī campā pūrvaṃ yā mālinī bhavat // MatsP_48.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:4590: haryaṅgasya tu dāyādo jāto bhadrarathaḥ kila // MatsP_48.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:4594: nāmnā jayadrathaṃ nāma tasmādbṛhadratho nṛpaḥ // MatsP_48.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:4600: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kathaṃ sūtātmajaḥ karṇaḥ kathamaṅgasya cātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4601: etad icchāmahe śrotum atyantakuśalo hy asi // MatsP_48.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:4602: *sūta uvāca bṛhadbhānusuto jajñe rājā nāmnā bṛhanmanāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4603: tasya patnīdvayaṃ hy āsīc chaibyasya tanaye hy ubhe /
GP12mtp176pu:4604: yaśodevī ca satyā ca tayorvaṃśaṃ ca me śṛṇu // MatsP_48.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:4605: jayadrathaṃ tu rājānaṃ yaśodevī hy ajījanat /
GP12mtp176pu:4606: sā bṛhanmanasaḥ satyā vijayaṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_48.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:4610: yaḥ karṇaṃ pratijagrāha tena karṇastu sūtajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4611: taccedaṃ sarvamākhyātaṃ karṇaṃ prati yathoditam // MatsP_48.108 //
GP12mtp176pu:4613: *sūta uvāca pūroḥ putro mahātejā rājā sa janamejayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4620: bhadrāśvasya dhṛtāyāṃ tu daśāpsarasi sūnavaḥ // MatsP_49.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:4624: auceyorjvalanā nāma bhāryā vai takṣakātmajā // MatsP_49.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:4628: gaurī kanyā tṛtīyā ca māndhāturjananī śubhā // MatsP_49.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:4630: brahmavādaparākrāntāñ chubhadā tv ilinā hy abhūt // MatsP_49.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:4632: ṛṣyantamatha duṣyantaṃ pravīram anadhaṃ tathā // MatsP_49.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:4634: śakuntalāyāṃ bharato yasya nāmnā ca bhāratāḥ // MatsP_49.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:4636: mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ // MatsP_49.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:4639: tvaṃ cāsya dhātā garbhasya satyamāha śakuntalā // MatsP_49.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:4641: putrāṇāṃ mātṛkāt kopāt sumahānsaṃkṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ // MatsP_49.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:4642: tato marudbhirānīya putraḥ sa tu bṛhaspateḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4644: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ bharatasya bharadvājaḥ putrārthaṃ mārutaiḥ katham /
GP12mtp176pu:4645: saṃkrāmito mahātejās tanno brūhi yathātatham // MatsP_49.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:4646: *sūta uvāca patnyāmāpannasattvāyām uśijaḥ sa sthito bhuvi /
GP12mtp176pu:4647: bhrāturbhāryāṃ sa dṛṣṭvā tu bṛhaspatiruvāca ha // MatsP_49.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:4648: upatiṣṭha svalaṃkṛtya maithunāya ca māṃ śubhe /
GP12mtp176pu:4651: amogharetāstvaṃ cāpi dharmaṃ caivaṃ vigarhitam // MatsP_49.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:4653: nopadeṣṭavyo vinayas tvayā me varavarṇini // MatsP_49.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:4655: tato bṛhaspatiṃ garbho dharṣamāṇamuvāca ha // MatsP_49.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:4656: saṃniviṣṭo hy ahaṃ pūrvam iha nāma bṛhaspate /
GP12mtp176pu:4657: amogharetāśca bhavān nāvakāśa iha dvayoḥ // MatsP_49.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:4658: evamuktaḥ sa garbheṇa kupitaḥ pratyuvāca ha /
GP12mtp176pu:4660: abhiṣedhasi tasmāttvaṃ tamo dīrghaṃ pravekṣyasi // MatsP_49.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:4663: sadyojātaṃ kumāraṃ tu dṛṣṭvā taṃ mamatābravīt /
GP12mtp176pu:4664: gamiṣyāmi gṛhaṃ svaṃ vai bharasvainaṃ bṛhaspate // MatsP_49.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:4665: evamuktvā gatā sā tu gatāyāṃ so 'pi taṃ tyajat /
GP12mtp176pu:4666: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ tyaktaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā taṃ marutaḥ śiśum /
GP12mtp176pu:4667: jagṛhustaṃ bharadvājaṃ marutaḥ kṛpayā sthitāḥ // MatsP_49.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:4671: tataḥ kratuṃ marutsomaṃ putrārthe samupāharat // MatsP_49.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:4676: bharatastu bharadvājaṃ putraṃ prāpya vibhur bravīt /
GP12mtp176pu:4677: ādāv ātmahitāya tvaṃ kṛtārtho 'haṃ tvayā vibho // MatsP_49.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:4678: pūrvaṃ tu vitathe tasmin kṛte vai putrajanmani /
GP12mtp176pu:4679: tatastu vitatho nāma bharadvājo nṛpo 'bhavat // MatsP_49.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:4682: tato jāte hi vitathe bharataśca divaṃ yayau /
GP12mtp176pu:4683: bharadvājo divaṃ yāto hy abhiṣicya sutamṛṣiḥ // MatsP_49.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:4687: narasya saṃkṛtiḥ putras tasya putro mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_49.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:4688: gurudhī rantidevaśca satkṛtyāṃ tāv ubhau smṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:4692: tasya bhāryā viśālā tu suṣuve putrakatrayam /
GP12mtp176pu:4693: tryuṣaṇaṃ puṣkariṃ caiva kaviṃ caiva mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_49.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:4694: urukṣavāḥ smṛtā hy ete sarve brāhmaṇatāṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4695: kāvyānāṃ tu varā hy ete trayaḥ proktā maharṣayaḥ // MatsP_49.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:4697: saṃbhṛtāṅgiraso dakṣā bṛhatkṣatrasya ca kṣitiḥ // MatsP_49.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:4699: tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ puraṃ tu gajasāhvayam // MatsP_49.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:4703: nīlinī dhūminī caiva keśinī caiva viśrutā // MatsP_49.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:4705: tapaso 'nte mahātejā jātā vṛddhasya dhārmikāḥ // MatsP_49.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:4709: ajamīḍhasya bhūminyāṃ jajñe bṛhadanur nṛpaḥ // MatsP_49.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:4719: nīpasyaikaśataṃ tv āsīt putrāṇām amitaujasām // MatsP_49.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:4720: nīpā iti samākhyātā rājānaḥ sarva eva te /
GP12mtp176pu:4721: teṣāṃ vaṃśakaraḥ śrīmān nīpānāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥ // MatsP_49.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:4723: samarasya pārasampārau sadaśva iti te trayaḥ // MatsP_49.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:4724: putrāḥ sarvaguṇopetā jātā vai viśrutā bhuvi /
GP12mtp176pu:4727: vibhrājasya tu dāyādas tv aṇuho nāma vīryavān // MatsP_49.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:4729: aṇuhasya tu dāyādo brahmadatto mahīpatiḥ // MatsP_49.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:4731: vibhrājaḥ punar ājātaḥ sukṛteneha karmaṇā // MatsP_49.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:4734: ugrāyudhena tasyārthe sarve nīpāḥ praṇāśitāḥ // MatsP_49.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:4735: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ ugrāyudhaḥ kasya sutaḥ kasya vaṃśe sa kathyate /
GP12mtp176pu:4736: kimarthaṃ tena te nīpāḥ sarve caiva praṇāśitāḥ // MatsP_49.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:4739: tasya rājyaṃ pratiśrutya nīpān ājaghnivān prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4740: uvāca sāntvaṃ vividhaṃ jaghnuste vai hy ubhāv api // MatsP_49.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:4743: yadi me 'sti tapastaptaṃ sarvānnayatu vo yamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4744: tatastān kṛpyamāṇāṃstu yamena purataḥ sa tu // MatsP_49.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:4747: *janamejaya uvāca are pāpā durācārā bhavitāro 'sya kiṃkarāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4748: tathetyuktastato rājā yamena yuyudhe ciram // MatsP_49.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:4752: sarve yathocitaṃ kṛtvā jagmuste kṛṣṇamavyayam // MatsP_49.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:4753: yeṣāṃ tu caritaṃ gṛhya hanyate nāpamṛtyubhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4754: iha loke pare caiva sukhamakṣayyamaśnute // MatsP_49.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:4757: atha satyadhṛteḥ putro dṛḍhanemiḥ pratāpavān // MatsP_49.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:4763: atha rukmarathasyāsīt supārśvo nāma pārthivaḥ // MatsP_49.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:4769: smṛtāste prācyasāmānaḥ kārtā nāmeha sāmagāḥ // MatsP_49.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:4771: babhūva yena vikramya pṛthukasya pitā hataḥ // MatsP_49.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:4773: ugrāyudhasya dāyādaḥ kṣemo nāma mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_49.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:4775: nṛpaṃjayācca viratha ityete pauravāḥ stutāḥ // MatsP_49.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:4784: pañcālarakṣiṇo hy ete deśānāmiti naḥ śrutam // MatsP_50.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:4786: ete hy aṅgirasaḥ pakṣaṃ saṃśritāḥ kāṇvamudgalāḥ // MatsP_50.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:4790: divodāsaśca rājarṣir ahalyā ca yaśasvinī // MatsP_50.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:4794: āsītsatyadhṛteḥ śukram amoghaṃ dhārmikasya tu // MatsP_50.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:4795: skannaṃ retaḥ satyadhṛter dṛṣṭvā cāpsarasaṃ jale /
GP12mtp176pu:4796: mithunaṃ tatra saṃbhṛtaṃ tasminsarasi saṃbhṛtam // MatsP_50.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:4798: dṛṣṭvā jagrāha kṛpayā śaṃtanurmṛgayāṃ gataḥ // MatsP_50.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:4799: ete śaradvataḥ putrā ākhyātā gautamā varāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4800: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi divodāsasya vai prajāḥ // MatsP_50.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:4802: maitrāyaṇāvaraḥ so 'tha maitreyastu tataḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_50.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:4803: ete vaṃśyā yateḥ pakṣāḥ kṣatropetāstu bhārgavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4804: rājā caidyavaro nāma maitreyasya sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_50.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:4806: ajamīḍhaḥ punarjātaḥ kṣīṇe vaṃśe tu somakaḥ // MatsP_50.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:4807: somakasya suto jantur hate tasmiñchataṃ babhau /
GP12mtp176pu:4810: putrābhāve tapastepe śataṃ varṣāṇi duścaram // MatsP_50.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:4814: ṛkṣaṃ sā janayāmāsa dhūmavarṇaṃ śatāgrajam // MatsP_50.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:4818: kṛṣyamāṇastataḥ śakro bhayāttasmai varaṃ dadau // MatsP_50.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:4819: puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca kurukṣetraṃ tu tatsmṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:4820: tasyānvavāyaḥ sumahān yasya nāmnā tu kauravāḥ // MatsP_50.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:4821: kurostu dayitāḥ putrāḥ sudhanvā jahnureva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4826: kṛmeḥ putro mahāvīryaḥ khyātastvindrasamo vibhuḥ // MatsP_50.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:4828: caidyoparicarājjajñe girikā sapta vai sutān // MatsP_50.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:4831: pañcamaśca yajuścaiva matsyaḥ kālī ca saptamī /
GP12mtp176pu:4832: bṛhadrathasya dāyādaḥ kuśāgro nāma viśrutaḥ // MatsP_50.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:4834: vṛṣabhasya tu dāyādaḥ puṇyavānnāma pārthivaḥ // MatsP_50.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:4838: dve tasya śakale jāte jarayā saṃdhitaś ca saḥ // MatsP_50.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:4840: jetā sarvasya kṣatrasya jarāsaṃdho mahābalaḥ // MatsP_50.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:4842: sahadevātmajaḥ śrīmān somavit sa mahātapāḥ // MatsP_50.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:4845: surathasya tu dāyādo vīro rājā vidūrathaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4850: devātithestu dāyādo dakṣa eva babhūva ha // MatsP_50.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:4852: dilīpasya pratīpastu tasya putrās trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_50.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:4854: vāhlīkasya tu dāyādāḥ sapta vāhlīśvarā nṛpāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4856: *munaya ūcuḥ prajābhistu kimarthaṃ vai hy apadhyāto janeśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4857: ko doṣo rājaputrasya prajābhiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // MatsP_50.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:4859: kāryaṃ caiva tu devānāṃ kṣatraṃ prati dvijottamāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4862: idaṃ codāharantyatra ślokaṃ prati mahābhiṣak // MatsP_50.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:4863: yaṃ yaṃ karābhyāṃ spṛśati jīrṇaṃ rogiṇameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:4864: punaryuvā ca bhavati tasmāttaṃ śaṃtanuṃ viduḥ // MatsP_50.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:4868: kālī vicitravīryaṃ tu dāśeyī janayatsutam // MatsP_50.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:4871: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca pāṇḍuṃ ca viduraṃ cāpyajījanat /
GP12mtp176pu:4873: teṣāṃ duryodhanaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvakṣatrasya vai prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4874: mādrī kuntī tathā caiva pāṇḍorbhārye babhūvatuḥ // MatsP_50.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:4886: kāśī baladharādbhīmāj jajñe vai sarvagaṃ sutam // MatsP_50.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:4890: yaudheyaṃ devakī caiva putraṃ jajñe yudhiṣṭhirāt // MatsP_50.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:4894: sa vaiśampāyanenaiva śaptaḥ kila maharṣiṇā // MatsP_50.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:4896: yāvatsthāsyasi tvaṃ loke tāvadeva prapatsyati // MatsP_50.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:4898: abhigamya sthitāścaiva nṛpaṃ ca janamejayam // MatsP_50.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:4900: utsannā yājino yajñe tataḥprabhṛti sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_50.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:4907: vivāde brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdham abhiśapto vanaṃ yayau // MatsP_50.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:4913: durāpaṃ dīrghasattraṃ vai trīṇi varṣāṇi puṣkare /
GP12mtp176pu:4916: purā kila yadetadvai vyatītaṃ kīrtitaṃ tvayā // MatsP_50.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:4917: yeṣu vai sthāsyate kṣatram utpatsyante nṛpāśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:4918: teṣām āyuṣpramāṇaṃ ca nāmataścaiva tānnṛpān // MatsP_50.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:4922: etatsarvaṃ prasaṃkhyāya pṛcchatāṃ brūhi naḥ prabho // MatsP_50.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:4923: *sūta uvāca yathā me kīrtitaṃ pūrvaṃ vyāsenākliṣṭakarmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:4924: bhāvyaṃ kaliyugaṃ caiva tathā manvantarāṇi ca // MatsP_50.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:4926: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi bhaviṣyā ye nṛpāstathā // MatsP_50.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:4930: tebhyo 'pare 'pi ye tv anye hy utpatsyante nṛpāḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4931: kṣatrāḥ pāraśavāḥ śūdrās tathānye ye bahiścarāḥ // MatsP_50.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:4938: gaṅgayā tu hṛte tasmin nagare nāgasāhvaye // MatsP_50.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:4946: nṛcakṣuṣastu dāyādo bhavitā vai sukhīvalaḥ // MatsP_50.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:4949: medhāvī tasya dāyādo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4951: urvo bhāvyaḥ sutastasya tigmātmā tasya cātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4954: bhaviṣyate codayanād vīge rājā vahīnaraḥ // MatsP_50.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:4959: kṣemakaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ saṃsthāsyati kalau yuge // MatsP_50.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:4963: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ ye pūjyāḥ syur dvijātīnām agnayaḥ sūta sarvadā /
GP12mtp176pu:4966: brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putras tasmātsvāhā vyajījanat // MatsP_51.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:4967: pāvakaṃ pavamānaṃ ca śuciragniśca yaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4969: śuciragniḥ smṛtaḥ sauraḥ sthāvarāścaiva te smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4970: pavamānātmajo hy agnir havyavāhaḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_51.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:4972: devānāṃ havyavāho 'gniḥ prathamo brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // MatsP_51.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:4973: saharakṣaḥ surāṇāṃ tu trayāṇāṃ te trayo 'gnayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:4976: pāvano laukiko hy agniḥ prathamo brahmaṇaśca yaḥ // MatsP_51.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:4978: vaiśvānaro havyavāho vahanhavyaṃ mamāra saḥ // MatsP_51.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:4980: yo 'tharvā laukiko hy agnir dakṣiṇāgniḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_51.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:4982: tasya hy alaukiko hy agnir dakṣiṇāgniḥ sa vai smṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:4983: atha yaḥ pavamānastu nirmathyo 'gniḥ sa ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:4984: sa ca vai gārhapatyo 'gniḥ prathamo brahmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:4985: tataḥ sabhyāvasathyau ca saṃśatyās tau sutāvubhau /
GP12mtp176pu:4987: yaḥ khalvāhavanīyo 'gnir abhimānī dvijaiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:4988: kāverīṃ kṛṣṇaveṇīṃ ca narmadāṃ yamunāṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:4990: vipāśāṃ kauśikīṃ caiva śatadruṃ sarayūṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:4991: sītāṃ manasvinīṃ caiva hrādinīṃ pāvanāṃ tathā // MatsP_51.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:4993: tadā tu viharaṃstāsu dhiṣṇyecchaḥ sa babhūva ha // MatsP_51.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:4995: dhiṣṇyeṣu jajñire yasmāt tataste dhiṣṇavaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_51.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5005: havyasūdo hy asaṃmṛjyaḥ śāmitraḥ sa vibhāvyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5006: śatadhāmā sudhājyotī raudraiśvaryaḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_51.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5008: ajaikapādupastheyaḥ sa vai śālāmukho yataḥ // MatsP_51.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5010: putrā hyete tu sarvasya upastheyā dvijaiḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_51.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:5012: hautriyasya suto hyagnir barhiṣo havyavāhanaḥ // MatsP_51.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5015: apāṃ yoniḥ smṛtaḥ svāmbhaḥ seturnāma vibhāvyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5016: dhiṣṇya āharaṇā hyete somenejyanta vai dvijaiḥ // MatsP_51.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5017: tato yaḥ pāvako nāmnā yaḥ sadbhiryoga ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5018: agniḥ so 'vabhṛtho jñeyo varuṇena sahejyate // MatsP_51.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:5019: hṛdayasya suto hyagner jaṭhare 'sau nṛṇāṃ pacan /
GP12mtp176pu:5022: agnermanyumataḥ putro ghoraḥ saṃvartakaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:5025: saharakṣastu vai kāmān gṛhe sa vasate nṛṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:5026: kravyādagniḥ sutastasya puruṣānyo 'tti vai mṛtān // MatsP_51.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:5028: tataḥ sutāstu sauvīryād gandharvairasurair hṛtāḥ // MatsP_51.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:5030: āyur nāmnā tu bhagavān paśau yastu praṇīyate // MatsP_51.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:5032: pākayajñeṣv abhīmānī hutaṃ havyaṃ bhunakti yaḥ // MatsP_51.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:5034: putro 'sya sahito hyagnir adbhutaḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_51.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:5036: adbhutasya suto vīro devāṃśastu mahānsmṛtaḥ // MatsP_51.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:5042: śucyagnestu prajā hyeṣā agnayaśca caturdaśa // MatsP_51.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:5043: ityete hyagnayaḥ proktāḥ praṇītā ye hi cādhvare /
GP12mtp176pu:5044: samatīte tu sarge ye yāmaiḥ saha surottamaiḥ // MatsP_51.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:5050: ete devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ prathamasyāntare manoḥ // MatsP_51.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:5061: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ idānīṃ prāha yadviṣṇuḥ pṛṣṭaḥ paramamuttamam /
GP12mtp176pu:5066: karmayogaṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca yathāvadvistarānvitam // MatsP_52.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:5068: yasmādaviditaṃ loke na kiṃcittava suvrata // MatsP_52.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5069: *sūta uvāca karmayogaṃ ca vakṣyāmi yathā viṣṇuvibhāṣitam /
GP12mtp176pu:5072: karmajñānodbhavaṃ brahma na ca jñānamakarmaṇaḥ // MatsP_52.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5076: dayā sarveṣu bhūteṣu kṣāntī rakṣāturasya tu // MatsP_52.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:5079: na ca dravyeṣu kārpaṇyam ārteṣūpārjiteṣu ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5080: tathāspṛhā paradravye parastrīṣu ca sarvadā // MatsP_52.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5083: karmayogaṃ vinā jñānaṃ kasyacin neha dṛśyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5085: devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvadā /
GP12mtp176pu:5090: kaṇḍanī peṣaṇī cullī jalakumbhī pramārjanī // MatsP_52.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5091: pañca sūnā gṛhasthasya tena svargaṃ na gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:5101: vāsudevo jaganmūrtis tasya sambhūtayo hy amī // MatsP_52.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:5106: brahmādyāś caturo mūlam avyaktādhipatiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_52.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5107: oṃ oṃ brahmaṇā cātha sūryeṇa viṣṇunātha śivena vā /
GP12mtp176pu:5110: vedamūrtāv ataḥ pūṣā pūjanīyaḥ prayatnataḥ // MatsP_52.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5114: vikarmabhītasya sadā na kiṃcit prāptavyamastīha pare ca loke //
GP12mtp176pu:5120: *matsya uvāca purāṇaṃ sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ prathamaṃ brahmaṇā smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5121: anantaraṃ ca vaktrebhyo vedāstasya vinirgatāḥ // MatsP_53.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:5124: nirdagdheṣu ca lokeṣu vājirūpeṇa vai mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:5125: aṅgāni caturo vedān purāṇaṃ nyāyavistaram // MatsP_53.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5126: mīmāṃsāṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca parigṛhya mayā kṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5129: śrutvā jagāda ca munīn prati devāṃścaturmukhaḥ // MatsP_53.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:5131: kālenāgrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā purāṇasya tato nṛpa // MatsP_53.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:5137: purāṇāni daśāṣṭau ca sāmprataṃ tadihocyate // MatsP_53.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5147: jyeṣṭhe māsi tilairyuktam aśvamedhaphalaṃ labhet // MatsP_53.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5149: yatprāha dharmānakhilāṃs tadyuktaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ viduḥ // MatsP_53.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5151: paurṇamāsyāṃ vipūtātmā sa padaṃ yāti vāruṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:5158: śivaloke sa pūtātmā kalpamekaṃ vasennaraḥ // MatsP_53.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5164: paurṇamāsyāṃ prauṣṭhapadyāṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim /
GP12mtp176pu:5176: yat tad īśānakaṃ kalpaṃ vṛttāntamadhikṛtya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5181: yaḥ pradadhannaraḥ so 'tha svargaloke mahīyate // MatsP_53.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5185: caturdaśa sahasrāṇi tathā pañca śatāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5187: tatpauṣe māsi yo dadyāt paurṇamāsyāṃ vimatsaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5209: skāndaṃ nāma purāṇaṃ ca hy ekāśītirnigadyate /
GP12mtp176pu:5210: sahasrāṇi śataṃ caikam iti martyeṣu gadyate // MatsP_53.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:5212: śaivaṃ padamavāpnoti mīne copāgate ravau // MatsP_53.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:5216: yaḥ śaradviṣuve dadyād vaiṣṇavaṃ yātyasau padam // MatsP_53.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:5228: yo dadyātpṛthivī tena dattā bhavati cākhilā // MatsP_53.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:5233: sa siddhiṃ labhate mukhyāṃ śivaloke ca saṃsthitim // MatsP_53.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:5236: bhaviṣyāṇāṃ ca kalpānāṃ śrūyate yatra vistaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5242: matpiturmama pitrā ca mayā tubhyaṃ niveditam // MatsP_53.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:5263: sarveṣvapi purāṇeṣu tadviruddhaṃ ca yatphalam // MatsP_53.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:5265: rājaseṣu ca māhātmyam adhikaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ // MatsP_53.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:5267: saṃkīrṇeṣu sarasvatyāḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca nigadyate // MatsP_53.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:5275: evaṃ sapādāḥ pañcaite lakṣā martye prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_53.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:5278: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_53.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:5279: idaṃ pavitraṃ yaśaso nidhānam idaṃ pitṝṇāmativallabhaṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5280: idaṃ ca deveṣv amṛtāyitaṃ ca nityaṃ tvidaṃ pāpaharaṃ ca puṃsām //
GP12mtp176pu:5290: saṃyuktastava viṣṇorvā pumānbhaktaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // MatsP_54.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5294: śrutamapyatra yacchāntyai tadvrataṃ śṛṇu nārada // MatsP_54.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5299: mūle namo viśvadharāya pādau gulphāvanantāya ca rohiṇīṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:5300: jaṅghe 'bhipūjye varadāya caiva dve jānunī vāśvikumāraṛkṣe // MatsP_54.9
GP12mtp176pu:5302: pūrvottarāphalguniyugmake ca meḍhraṃ namaḥ pañcaśarāya pūjyam //
GP12mtp176pu:5303: kaṭiṃ namaḥ śārṅgadharāya viṣṇoḥ sampūjayennārada kṛttikāsu /
GP12mtp176pu:5304: tathārcayedbhādrapadādvaye ca pārśve namaḥ keśiniṣūdanāya // MatsP_54.11
GP12mtp176pu:5306: ṛkṣe 'nurādhāsu ca mādhavāya namastathoraḥsthalameva pūjyam // MatsP_54.12
GP12mtp176pu:5307: pṛṣṭhaṃ dhaniṣṭhāsu ca pūjanīyam aghaughavidhvaṃsakarāya tacca /
GP12mtp176pu:5308: śrīśaṅkhacakrāsigadādharāya namo viśākhāsu bhujāśca pūjyāḥ // MatsP_54.13
GP12mtp176pu:5309: haste tu hastā madhusūdanāya namo 'bhipūjyā iti kaiṭabhāreḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5312: kūrmasya pādau śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi jyeṣṭhāsu kaṇṭhe harirarcanīyaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:5313: śrotre varāhāya namo 'bhipūjyā janārdanasya śravaṇena samyak /
GP12mtp176pu:5314: puṣye mukhaṃ dānavasūdanāya namo nṛsiṃhāya ca pūjanīyam // MatsP_54.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5316: āsyaṃ harerbhārgavanandanāya saṃpūjanīyaṃ dvija vāruṇe tu // MatsP_54.17
GP12mtp176pu:5317: namo 'stu rāmāya maghāsu nāsā saṃpūjanīyā raghunandanasya /
GP12mtp176pu:5318: mṛgottamāṅge nayane 'bhipūjye namo 'stu te rāma vighūrṇitākṣa //
GP12mtp176pu:5319: buddhāya śāntāya namo lalāṭaṃ citrāsu saṃpūjyatamaṃ murāreḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5320: śiro 'bhipūjyaṃ bharaṇīṣu viṣṇor namo 'stu viśveśvara kalkirūpiṇe //
GP12mtp176pu:5321: ārdrāsu keśāḥ puruṣottamasya saṃpūjanīyā haraye namaste /
GP12mtp176pu:5322: upoṣitenarkṣadineṣu bhaktyā saṃpūjanīyā dvijapuṃgavāḥ syuḥ // MatsP_54.20
GP12mtp176pu:5323: pūrṇe vrate sarvaguṇānvitāya vāgrūpaśīlāya ca sāmagāya /
GP12mtp176pu:5325: jalasya pūrṇe kalaśe niviṣṭām arcāṃ harervastragavā sahaiva /
GP12mtp176pu:5331: yathā na viṣṇubhaktānāṃ vṛjinaṃ jāyate kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:5333: yathā na lakṣmyā śayanaṃ tava śūnyaṃ janārdana /
GP12mtp176pu:5334: śayyā mamāpyaśūnyāstu kṛṣṇa janmani janmani // MatsP_54.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5341: brahmahatyādikaṃ kiṃcid iha vāmutra vā kṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5342: ātmanā vātha pitṛbhis tatsarvaṃ kṣayamāpnuyāt // MatsP_54.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5343: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vātibhaktyā puruṣavaro vratamaṅganātha kuryāt /
GP12mtp176pu:5352: yadā hastena saptamyām ādityasya dinaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:5353: sūryasya cātha saṃkrāntis tithiḥ sā sārvakāmikī // MatsP_55.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5355: sūryārcāṃ śivaliṅge ca prakurvan pūjayedyataḥ // MatsP_55.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5356: umāpate ravervāpi na bhedo dṛśyate kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:5358: haste ca sūryāya namo 'stu pādāv arkāya citrāsu ca gulphadeśam /
GP12mtp176pu:5359: svātīṣu jaṅghe puruṣottamāya dhātre viśākhāsu ca jānudeśam // MatsP_55.7
GP12mtp176pu:5361: jyeṣṭhāsvanaṅgāya namo 'stu guhyam indrāya somāya kaṭī ca mūle //
GP12mtp176pu:5362: pūrvottarāṣāḍhayuge ca nābhiṃ tvaṣṭre namaḥ saptataraṃgamāya /
GP12mtp176pu:5363: tīkṣṇāṃśave ca śravaṇe ca kukṣau pṛṣṭhaṃ dhaniṣṭhāsu vikartanāya //
GP12mtp176pu:5365: pūrvottarābhādrapadādvaye ca bāhū namaścaṇḍakarāya pūjyau // MatsP_55.10
GP12mtp176pu:5366: sāmnāmadhīśāya karadvayaṃ ca saṃpūjanīyaṃ dvija revatīṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:5370: mṛgottamāṅge daśanā murāreḥ saṃpūjanīyā haraye namaste /
GP12mtp176pu:5371: namaḥ savitre rasanāṃ śaṃkare ca nāsābhipūjyā ca punarvasau ca //
GP12mtp176pu:5373: sārpe 'tha mauliṃ vibudhapriyāya maghāsu karṇāviti gogaṇeśe // MatsP_55.14
GP12mtp176pu:5375: athottarāphalgunibhe bhruvau ca viśveśvarāyeti ca pūjanīye // MatsP_55.15
GP12mtp176pu:5378: ityādi cāstrāṇi ca pūjya nityaṃ viśveśvarāyeti śivo 'bhipūjyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5380: ityevaṃ dvija naktāni kṛtvā dadyāt punarvasau /
GP12mtp176pu:5383: saptame vastrayugmaṃ ca pāraṇe tvadhikaṃ bhavet // MatsP_55.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5386: kṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ padmam aṣṭapattraṃ sakarṇikam /
GP12mtp176pu:5393: kapilāṃ vastrasaṃyuktāṃ suśīlāṃ ca payasvinīm // MatsP_55.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5397: kāntyā dhṛtyā śriyā ratyā tathā me santu siddhayaḥ // MatsP_55.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5398: yathā na devāḥ śreyāṃsaṃ tvadanyamanaghaṃ viduḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5401: śayyāgavādi tatsarvaṃ dvijasya bhavanaṃ nayet // MatsP_55.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:5404: bhaktāya dāntāya ca guhyametad ākhyeyam ānandakaraṃ śivasya /
GP12mtp176pu:5405: idaṃ mahāpātakabhin narāṇām apyakṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti // MatsP_55.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5407: nābhyeti rogaṃ na ca śokaduḥkhaṃ yā vātha nārī kurute 'tibhaktyā //
GP12mtp176pu:5408: idaṃ vasiṣṭhena purārjunena kṛtaṃ kubereṇa puraṃdareṇa /
GP12mtp176pu:5409: yatkīrtanenāpyakhilāni nāśam āyānti pāpāni na saṃśayo 'sti // MatsP_55.32
GP12mtp176pu:5410: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ raviśayanaṃ puruhūtavallabhaḥ syāt /*
GP12mtp176pu:5411: api narakagatānpitṝn aśeṣān api divamānayatīha yaḥ karoti // MatsP_55.33
GP12mtp176pu:5415: śāntirmuktiśca bhavati jayaḥ puṃsāṃ viśeṣataḥ // MatsP_56.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:5417: māghe maheśvaraṃ devaṃ mahādevaṃ ca phālgune // MatsP_56.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5418: sthāṇuṃ caitre śivaṃ tadvad vaiśākhe tvarcayennaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5419: jyeṣṭhe paśupatiṃ cārced āṣāḍhe ugramarcayet // MatsP_56.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:5421: haramāśvayuje māsi tatheśānaṃ ca kārttike // MatsP_56.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:5426: pañcagavyaṃ ca saṃprāśya śaṃkaraṃ pūjayenniśi // MatsP_56.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5427: aśvatthaṃ ca vaṭaṃ caivo-dumbaraṃ plakṣameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5428: palāśaṃ jambuvṛkṣaṃ ca viduḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ maharṣayaḥ // MatsP_56.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:5431: devāya dadyādarghyaṃ ca kṛṣṇāṃ gāṃ kṛṣṇavāsasam /
GP12mtp176pu:5434: gāvaḥ kṛṣṇāḥ suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5442: muhurmuhurjanmani yena samyag vrataṃ samācakṣva tadindumaule // MatsP_57.1
GP12mtp176pu:5445: rahasyaṃ tava vakṣyāmi yatpurāṇavido viduḥ // MatsP_57.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5450: tadā snānaṃ naraḥ kuryāt pañcagavyena sarṣapaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5451: āpyāyasveti tu japed vidvānaṣṭaśataṃ punaḥ // MatsP_57.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5453: somāya varadāyātha viṣṇave ca namo namaḥ // MatsP_57.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5456: somāya śāntāya namo 'stu pādāv anantadhāmneti ca jānujaṅghe /
GP12mtp176pu:5458: namo namaḥ kāmasukhapradāya kaṭiḥ śaśāṅkasya sadārcanīyā /
GP12mtp176pu:5459: tathodaraṃ cāpyamṛtodarāya nābhiḥ śaśāṅkāya namo 'bhipūjyā // MatsP_57.9
GP12mtp176pu:5460: namo 'stu candrāya mukhaṃ ca pūjyaṃ dantā dvijānāmadhipāya pūjyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5462: nāsā ca nāthāya vanauṣadhīnām ānandabhūtāya punarbhruvau ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5466: śiraḥ śaśāṅkāya namo murārer viśveśvarāyeti namaḥ kirīṭine /
GP12mtp176pu:5467: padmapriye rohiṇi nāma lakṣmīḥ saubhāgyasaukhyāmṛtacārukāye // MatsP_57.13
GP12mtp176pu:5469: suptvātha bhūmau punarutthitena snātvā ca viprāya haviṣyayuktaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:5475: śubhraṃ ca viṣṇoḥ karavīrapuṣpaṃ śrīcampakaṃ candramasaḥ pradeyam //
GP12mtp176pu:5481: candraḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ kāryo rohiṇī caturaṅgulā // MatsP_57.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5486: savastrabhājanāṃ dhenuṃ tathā śaṅkhaṃ ca śobhanam // MatsP_57.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5488: candro 'yaṃ dvijarūpeṇa sabhārya iti kalpayet // MatsP_57.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5489: yathā na rohiṇī kṛṣṇa śayyāṃ saṃtyajya gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:5490: somarūpasya te tadvan mamābhedo 'stu bhūtibhiḥ // MatsP_57.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:5492: bhuktirmuktistathā bhaktis tvayi candrāstu me sadā // MatsP_57.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5495: idameva pitṝṇāṃ ca sarvadā vallabhaṃ mune /
GP12mtp176pu:5498: nārī vā rohiṇī candra-śayanaṃ yā samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:5500: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ madhumathanārcanam indukīrtanena /
GP12mtp176pu:5501: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi śaurer bhavanagataḥ paripūjyate 'maraughaiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:5506: ke tatra cartvijo nātha vedī vā kīdṛśī bhavet // MatsP_58.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5508: dravyāṇi kāni śastāni sarvamācakṣva tattvataḥ // MatsP_58.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:5509: *matsya uvāca śṛṇu rājanmahābāho taḍāgādiṣu yo vidhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5511: prāpya pakṣaṃ śubhaṃ śuklam atīte cottarāyaṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:5514: caturhastāṃ śubhāṃ vedīṃ caturasrāṃ caturmukhām // MatsP_58.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5517: nava saptātha vā pañca nātiriktā nṛpātmaja /
GP12mtp176pu:5524: aṣṭau tu jāpakāḥ kāryā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ // MatsP_58.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5528: vyajanaṃ cāmare śubhre tāmrapātre suvistṛte // MatsP_58.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5534: kuṇḍalāni ca haimāni keyūrakaṭakāni ca // MatsP_58.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5536: pūjayettu samaṃ sarvān ācāryo dviguṇaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5540: evamāsādya tatsarvam ādāveva viśāṃ pate // MatsP_58.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:5546: añjasā maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt pañcavarṇena tattvavit // MatsP_58.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5548: caturasraṃ ca parito vṛttaṃ madhye suśobhanam // MatsP_58.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:5552: brahmāṇaṃ ca śivaṃ viṣṇuṃ tatraiva sthāpayedbudhaḥ // MatsP_58.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5560: sāmagau paścime tadvad uttareṇa tvatharvaṇau // MatsP_58.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:5564: evamādiśya tānsarvān paryukṣyāgniṃ sa mantravit // MatsP_58.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5569: rātrisūktaṃ ca raudraṃ ca pāvamānaṃ sumaṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:5570: japeyuḥ pauruṣaṃ sūktaṃ pūrvato bahvṛcaḥ pṛthak // MatsP_58.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:5571: śākraṃ raudraṃ ca saumyaṃ ca kūṣmāṇḍaṃ jātavedasam /
GP12mtp176pu:5574: śaiśavaṃ pañcanidhanaṃ gāyatraṃ jyeṣṭhasāma ca // MatsP_58.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:5576: gavāṃ vrataṃ ca kāṇvaṃ ca rakṣoghnaṃ vayasastathā /
GP12mtp176pu:5577: gāyeyuḥ sāmagā rājan paścimaṃ dvāramāśritāḥ // MatsP_58.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:5579: japeyurmanasā devam āśritya varuṇaṃ prabhum // MatsP_58.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:5583: rocanāṃ ca sasiddhārthāṃ gandhaṃ guggulameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5585: pratyekaṃ tu mahāmantrair eva kṛtvā vidhānataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5587: tataḥ prabhāte vimale saṃjāte 'tha śataṃ gavām /
GP12mtp176pu:5591: vedaśabdaiśca gāndharvair vādyaiśca vividhaiḥ punaḥ // MatsP_58.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:5593: sāmagāya ca sā deyā brāhmaṇāya viśāṃ pate // MatsP_58.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:5598: uttarābhimukhīṃ dhenuṃ jalamadhye tu kārayet // MatsP_58.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:5600: āpo hi ṣṭheti mantreṇa kṣiptvāgatya ca maṇḍapam // MatsP_58.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:5607: hemapātrīṃ ca śayyāṃ ca sthāpakāya nivedayet // MatsP_58.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:5612: eṣa eva vidhirdṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭhāsu tathaiva ca // MatsP_58.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:5616: prāvṛṭkāle sthite toye hy agniṣṭomaphalaṃ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5622: sa yāti rudrālayamāśu pūtaḥ kalpānanekāndivi modate ca // MatsP_58.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:5624: sahaiva viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ yat prāpnoti tadyāgaphalena bhūyaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:5627: vidhinā kena kartavyaṃ pādapodyāpanaṃ budhaiḥ // MatsP_59.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:5628: ye ca lokāḥ smṛtāsteṣāṃ tānidānīṃ vadasva naḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5629: yatphalaṃ labhate pretya tatsarvaṃ vaktumarhasi // MatsP_59.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5638: phalāni sapta cāṣṭau vā kāladhautāni kārayet /
GP12mtp176pu:5645: vanaspateśca vidvadbhir homaḥ kāryo dvijātibhiḥ // MatsP_59.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5659: dakṣiṇā ca punastadvad deyā tatrāpi śaktitaḥ // MatsP_59.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5661: ācārye dviguṇaṃ dadyāt praṇipatya visarjayet // MatsP_59.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5669: so 'pi sampūjito devair brahmaloke mahīyate // MatsP_59.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:5676: tataḥ kālena mahatā punaḥ sargavidhau nṛpa /
GP12mtp176pu:5682: rasarūpaṃ tato yāvat prāpnoti vasudhātalam // MatsP_60.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:5696: tāmārādhya pumānbhaktyā nārī vā kiṃ na vindati // MatsP_60.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:5699: tadvidhānaṃ jagannātha tatsarvaṃ ca vadasva me // MatsP_60.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5701: śuklapakṣasya pūrvāhṇe tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret // MatsP_60.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:5702: tasminnahani sā devī kila viśvātmanā satī /
GP12mtp176pu:5708: namo 'stu pāṭalāyai tu pādau devyāḥ śivasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:5709: śivāyeti ca saṃkīrya jayāyai gulphayor dvayoḥ // MatsP_60.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:5712: saṃkīrtya harikeśāya tathorū varade namaḥ // MatsP_60.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:5713: īśāyai ca kīṭaṃ devyāḥ śaṃkarāyeti śaṃkaram /
GP12mtp176pu:5714: kukṣidvayaṃ ca koṭavyai śūline śūlapāṇaye // MatsP_60.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:5716: sarvātmane namo rudram īśānyai ca kucadvayam // MatsP_60.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5721: svāhāsvadhāyai ca mukham īśvarāyeti śūlinam // MatsP_60.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:5723: sthāṇave tu haraṃ tadvad dhāsyaṃ candramukhapriye // MatsP_60.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:5725: nama ugrāya lokeśaṃ laliteti punarbhruvau // MatsP_60.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:5733: evaṃ nivedya tatsarvam agrataḥ śivayoḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5735: punaḥ prabhāte tu tathā kṛtasnānajapaḥ śuciḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5739: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ yāvat tṛtīyāyāṃ sadā mano /
GP12mtp176pu:5741: prāśane dānamantre ca viśeṣo 'yaṃ nibodha me /
GP12mtp176pu:5742: śṛṅgodakaṃ caitramāse vaiśākhe gomayaṃ punaḥ // MatsP_60.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:5744: śrāvaṇe dadhi saṃprāśyaṃ nabhasye ca kuśodakam // MatsP_60.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:5746: mārge māse tu gomūtraṃ pauṣe saṃprāśayedghṛtam // MatsP_60.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:5748: lalitā vijayā bhadrā bhavānī kumudā śivā // MatsP_60.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:5749: vāsudevī tathā gaurī maṅgalā kamalā satī /
GP12mtp176pu:5750: umā ca dānakāle tu prīyatāmiti kīrtayet // MatsP_60.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:5753: sindhuvāraṃ ca sarveṣu māseṣu kramaśaḥ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:5756: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ yāvad upoṣya vidhivannaraḥ // MatsP_60.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:5757: strī bhaktā vā kumārī vā śivamabhyarcya bhaktitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5759: umāmaheśvaraṃ haimaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca gavā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:5773: nārī vā kurute vāpi kumārī vā nareśvara /
GP12mtp176pu:5776: so 'pi vidyādharo bhūtvā svargaloke ciraṃ vaset // MatsP_60.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:5777: idamiha madanena pūrvamiṣṭaṃ śatadhanuṣā kṛtavīryasūnunā ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5778: kṛtamatha varuṇena nandinā vā kim u jananātha tato yadudbhavaḥ syāt //
GP12mtp176pu:5781: tapaḥ satyaṃ ca saptaite devalokāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_61.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:5782: paryāyeṇa tu sarveṣām ādhipatyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:5783: iha loke śubhaṃ rūpam āyuḥ saubhāgyameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5784: lakṣmīśca vipulā nātha kathaṃ syātpurasūdana // MatsP_61.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:5785: *maheśvara uvāca purā hutāśanaḥ sārdhaṃ mārutena mahītale /
GP12mtp176pu:5792: tataḥ prabhṛti te devān manuṣyānsaha jaṅgamān /
GP12mtp176pu:5793: saṃpīḍya ca munīnsarvān praviśanti punarjalam // MatsP_61.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5794: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi vīrāḥ pañca ca sapta ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5801: adharma eṣa devendra sāgarasya vināśanam // MatsP_61.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:5805: nivasanti suraśreṣṭha sa kathaṃ nāśamarhati // MatsP_61.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:5807: uvācedaṃ vaco roṣān nirdahanniva pāvakam // MatsP_61.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5814: mārutena samaṃ loke tava janma bhaviṣyati // MatsP_61.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:5821: *nārada uvāca sambhūtaḥ sa kathaṃ bhrātā vasiṣṭhasyābhavanmuniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5822: kathaṃ ca mitrāvaruṇau pitarāvasya tau smṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:5825: bhūtvā dharmasuto viṣṇuś cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_61.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5829: na kāmamādhavābhyāṃ ca viṣayānprati cukṣubhe // MatsP_61.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:5833: saṃkṣubdhāstu tayā devās tau tu devavarāvubhau /
GP12mtp176pu:5836: urvaśīti ca nāmneyaṃ loke khyātiṃ gamiṣyati // MatsP_61.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:5838: uktā māṃ ramayasveti bāḍham ityabravīttu sā // MatsP_61.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:5840: varuṇena dhṛtā paścād varuṇaṃ nābhyanandata // MatsP_61.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:5841: mitreṇāhaṃ vṛtā pūrvam adya bhāryā na te vibho /
GP12mtp176pu:5842: uvāca varuṇaścittaṃ mayi saṃnyasya gamyatām // MatsP_61.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:5844: tasyai mānuṣaloke tvaṃ gaccha somasutātmajam // MatsP_61.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5845: bhajasveti yato veśyā dharma eṣa tvayā kṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5846: jalakumbhe tato vīryaṃ mitreṇa varuṇena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:5853: jagmatuḥ śāpanāśāya brahmāṇaṃ jagataḥ patim // MatsP_61.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:5855: nimeṣāḥ syuśca lokānāṃ tadviśrāmāya nārada // MatsP_61.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:5858: agastya iti śāntātmā babhūva ṛṣisattamaḥ // MatsP_61.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:5860: sabhāryaḥ saṃvṛto viprais tapaścakre suduścaram // MatsP_61.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:5865: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te yadabhīṣṭaṃ ca vai mune // MatsP_61.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:5871: tasmādarghaḥ pradātavyo hy agastyasya sadā budhaiḥ // MatsP_61.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:5872: *nārada uvāca kathamarghapradānaṃ tu kartavyaṃ tasya vai vibho /
GP12mtp176pu:5873: vidhānaṃ yadagastyasya pūjane tadvadasva me // MatsP_61.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:5882: utkṣipya lambodaradīrghabāhum ananyacetā yamadiṅmukhaḥ san // MatsP_61.47
GP12mtp176pu:5883: śvetāṃ ca dadyādyadi śaktirasti raupyaiḥ khurair hemamukhīṃ savatsām /
GP12mtp176pu:5884: dhenuṃ naraḥ kṣīravatīṃ praṇamya savatsaghaṇṭābharaṇāṃ dvijāya //
GP12mtp176pu:5886: yāvatsamāḥ sapta daśāthavā syur athordhvamapyatra vadanti kecit //
GP12mtp176pu:5888: mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putra kumbhayone namo 'stu te // MatsP_61.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:5891: vātāpī bhakṣito yena samudraḥ śoṣitaḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:5892: lopāmudrāpatiḥ śrīmān yo 'sau tasmai namo namaḥ // MatsP_61.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:5895: pratyabdaṃ tu phalatyāgam evaṃ kurvanna sīdati // MatsP_61.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:5896: homaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścād varjayenmānavaḥ phalam /
GP12mtp176pu:5897: anena vidhinā yastu pumānarghyaṃ nivedayet // MatsP_61.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:5899: dvitīyena bhuvarlokaṃ svargalokaṃ tataḥ param // MatsP_61.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:5901: yāvadāyuśca yaḥ kuryāt paraṃ brahmādhigacchati // MatsP_61.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:5902: iha paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya etad yugalamuniprabhavārghyasampradānam /
GP12mtp176pu:5903: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi viṣṇor bhavanagataḥ paripūjyate 'maraughaiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:5907: bhuktimuktipradaṃ deva tanme brūhi janārdana // MatsP_62.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:5908: *matsya uvāca yadumāyāḥ purā deva uvāca purasūdanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5918: saubhāgyārogyadaṃ yasmāt sadā ca lalitāpriyam // MatsP_62.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:5920: dhārayedatha raktāni nārī cedatha saṃyatā // MatsP_62.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:5922: devīṃ tu pañcagavyena tataḥ kṣīreṇa kevalam /
GP12mtp176pu:5928: varadāyai namaḥ pādau tathā gulphau namaḥ śriyai /
GP12mtp176pu:5929: aśokāyai namo jaṅghe pārvatyai jānunī tathā // MatsP_62.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:5931: padmodarāyai jaṭharam uraḥ kāmaśriyai namaḥ // MatsP_62.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:5933: mukhaṃ darpaṇavāsinyai smaradāyai smitaṃ namaḥ // MatsP_62.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:5934: gauryai namastathā nāsām utpalāyai ca locane /
GP12mtp176pu:5936: namo gauryai namo dhiṣṇyai namaḥ kāntyai namaḥ śriyai /
GP12mtp176pu:5937: rambhāyai lalitāyai ca vāsudevyai namo namaḥ // MatsP_62.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:5940: pūrveṇa vinyasedgaurīm aparṇāṃ ca tataḥ param /
GP12mtp176pu:5941: bhavānīṃ dakṣiṇe tadvad rudrāṇīṃ ca tataḥ param // MatsP_62.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:5944: madhye yathāsvaṃ māṃsāṅgāṃ maṅgalāṃ kumudāṃ satīm /
GP12mtp176pu:5945: rudraṃ ca madhye saṃsthāpya lalitāṃ karṇikopari /
GP12mtp176pu:5949: sindūraṃ snānacūrṇaṃ ca tāsāṃ śirasi pātayet // MatsP_62.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:5952: na pūjyate gururyatra sarvāstatrāphalāḥ kriyāḥ // MatsP_62.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:5961: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam /
GP12mtp176pu:5970: yathā na devi deveśas tvāṃ parityajya gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:5972: kumudā vimalānantā bhavānī ca sudhā śivā /
GP12mtp176pu:5973: lalitā kamalā gaurī satī rambhātha pārvatī // MatsP_62.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:5976: mithunāni caturviṃśad daśa dvo ca samarcayet /
GP12mtp176pu:5977: aṣṭau ṣaḍvāpyatha punaś cānumāsaṃ samarcayet // MatsP_62.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:5982: naro vā yadi vā nārī vittaśāṭhyāt patatyadhaḥ // MatsP_62.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:5983: garbhiṇī sūtikā naktaṃ kumārī vātha rogiṇī /
GP12mtp176pu:5989: nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vidhavāthavā /
GP12mtp176pu:5991: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vā ya itthaṃ giritanayāvratam indravāsasaṃsthaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:5992: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi devair amaravadhūjanakiṃnaraiśca pūjyaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:5997: prātargavyena payasā tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret // MatsP_63.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6000: dakṣiṇāṅgāni sampūjya tato vāmāni pūjayet // MatsP_63.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6001: lalitāyai namo devyāḥ pādau gulphau tato 'rcayet /
GP12mtp176pu:6002: jaṅghāṃ jānuṃ tathā śāntyai tathaivoruṃ śriyai namaḥ // MatsP_63.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6004: stanau madanavāsinyai kumudāyai ca kandarām // MatsP_63.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6006: bhūlalāṭaṃ ca rudrāṇyai śaṃkarāyai tathālakān // MatsP_63.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6008: madanāyai lalāṭaṃ tu mohanāyai punarbhruvau // MatsP_63.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6009: netre candrārdhadhāriṇyai tuṣṭyai ca vadanaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6010: utkaṇṭhinyai namaḥ kaṇṭham amṛtāyai namaḥ stanau // MatsP_63.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6011: rambhāyai vāmakukṣiṃ ca viśokāyai namaḥ kaṭim /
GP12mtp176pu:6014: jānujaṅghe namo gauryai gāyatryai ghuṭike namaḥ // MatsP_63.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6015: dharādharāyai pādau tu viśvakāyai namaḥ śiraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6016: namo bhavānyai kāminyai kāmadevyai jagatpriye // MatsP_63.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:6023: anena vidhinā devī māsi māsi sadārcayet // MatsP_63.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:6024: lavaṇaṃ varjayenmāghe phālgune ca guḍaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6025: tailaṃ rājiṃ tathā caitre varjyaṃ ca madhu mādhave // MatsP_63.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6026: pānakaṃ jyeṣṭhamāse tu āṣāḍhe cātha jīrakam /
GP12mtp176pu:6027: śrāvaṇe varjayetkṣīraṃ dadhi bhādrapade tathā // MatsP_63.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:6028: ghṛtamāśvayuje tadvad ūrje varjyaṃ ca mākṣikam /
GP12mtp176pu:6029: dhānyakaṃ mārgaśīrṣe tu pauṣe varjyā ca śarkarā // MatsP_63.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:6030: vratānte karakaṃ pūrṇam eteṣāṃ māsi māsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6036: kumudā mādhavī gaurī rambhā bhadrā jayā śivā /
GP12mtp176pu:6037: umā ratiḥ satī tadvan maṅgalā ratilālasā // MatsP_63.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6042: kṛtvā tu kāñcanīṃ gaurīṃ pañcaratnasamanvitām // MatsP_63.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6049: navārbudasahasraṃ tu na duḥkhī jāyate naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6052: nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vā varānane /
GP12mtp176pu:6053: vidhavā yā tathā nārī sāpi tatphalamāpnuyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:6055: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti śrāvayedyaḥ prasaṅgāt kalikaluṣavimuktaḥ pārvatīlokameti /
GP12mtp176pu:6056: matimapi ca narāṇāṃ yo dadāti priyārthaṃ vibudhapativimāne nāyakaḥ syādamoghaḥ // MatsP_63.29
GP12mtp176pu:6059: nāmnā ca loke vikhyātām ārdrānandakarīmimām // MatsP_64.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6061: brahmarkṣaṃ vā mṛgarkṣaṃ vā hasto mūlamathāpi vā /
GP12mtp176pu:6066: vāsudevyai namaḥ pādau śaṃkarāya namo haram /
GP12mtp176pu:6067: jaṅghe śokavināśinyai ānandāya namaḥ prabho // MatsP_64.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6069: adityai ca kaṭiṃ devyāḥ śūlinaḥ śūlapāṇaye // MatsP_64.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6070: mādhavyai ca tathā nābhim atha śambhorbhavāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6072: utkaṇṭhinyai namaḥ kaṇṭhaṃ nīlakaṇṭhāya vai haram /
GP12mtp176pu:6074: bāhū ca parirambhiṇyai triśūlāya harasya ca // MatsP_64.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6076: smitaṃ sasmeralīlāyai viśvavaktrāya vai vibho // MatsP_64.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6078: bhruvau nṛtyapriyāyai tu tāṇḍaveśāya śūlinaḥ // MatsP_64.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6080: svāhāyai mukuṭaṃ devyā vibhorgaṅgādharāya vai // MatsP_64.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6083: evaṃ sampūjya vidhivad agrataḥ śivayoḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6094: apakvaṃ dadhi dugdhaṃ ca gośṛṅgodakameva ca // MatsP_64.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:6101: gaurī me prīyatāṃ nityam aghanāśāya maṅgalā /
GP12mtp176pu:6104: candanaṃ netrapaṭṭaṃ ca sahiraṇyāmbujena tu // MatsP_64.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6107: sapatnīkāya viprāya gaurī me prīyatāmiti // MatsP_64.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:6109: yāmupoṣya naro yāti śambhoryatparamaṃ padam // MatsP_64.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6112: nārī vā kurute yā tu kumārī vidhavā ca yā /
GP12mtp176pu:6117: śakraloke sa gandharvaiḥ pūjyate 'pi yugatrayam // MatsP_64.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:6118: ānandadāṃ sakaladuḥkhaharāṃ tṛtīyāṃ yā strī karotyavidhavā vidhavātha vāpi /
GP12mtp176pu:6119: sā sve gṛhe sukhaśatānyanubhūya bhūyo gaurīpadaṃ sadayitā dayitā prayāti
GP12mtp176pu:6122: yasyāṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati cākṣayam // MatsP_65.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6124: akṣayaṃ phalamāpnoti sarvasya sukṛtasya ca // MatsP_65.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6126: tatra dattaṃ hutaṃ japtaṃ sarvamakṣayamucyate // MatsP_65.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6128: akṣataiḥ pūjyate viṣṇus tena sāpyakṣayā smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:6129: akṣataistu narāḥ snātā viṣṇordattvā tathākṣatān // MatsP_65.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6130: vipreṣu dattvā tāneva tathā saktūn susaṃkṛtān /
GP12mtp176pu:6133: etāsāmapi sarvāsāṃ tṛtīyānāṃ phalaṃ bhavet // MatsP_65.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6135: rājasūyaphalaṃ prāpya gatimagryāṃ ca vindati // MatsP_65.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6141: āyuśca vipulaṃ puṃsāṃ tanme kathaya mādhava // MatsP_66.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6142: *matsya uvāca samyakpṛṣṭaṃ tvayā rājañ chṛṇu sārasvataṃ vratam /
GP12mtp176pu:6150: yathā na devi bhagavān brahmaloke pitāmahaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6151: tvāṃ parityajya saṃtiṣṭhet tathā bhava varapradā // MatsP_66.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6152: vedāḥ śāstrāṇi sarvāṇi gītanṛtyādikaṃ ca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:6153: na vihīnaṃ tvayā devi tathā me santu siddhayaḥ // MatsP_66.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6154: lakṣmīrmedhā dharā puṣṭir gaurī tuṣṭiḥ prabhā matiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6155: etābhiḥ pāhi cāṣṭābhis tanubhirmāṃ sarasvati // MatsP_66.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6158: maunavratena bhuñjīta sāyaṃ prātastu dharmavit // MatsP_66.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6161: kṣīraṃ dadyāddhiraṇyaṃ ca gāyatrī prīyatāmiti // MatsP_66.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:6164: samāpte tu vrate kuryād bhojanaṃ śuklataṇḍulaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6165: pūrvaṃ savastrayugmaṃ ca dadyādviprāya bhojanam // MatsP_66.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6166: devyā vitānaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ ca sitanetre payasvinīm /
GP12mtp176pu:6167: candanaṃ vastrayugmaṃ ca dadyācca śikharaṃ punaḥ // MatsP_66.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:6173: nārī vā kurute yā tu sāpi tatphalagāminī // MatsP_66.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:6174: brahmaloke vased rājan yāvat kalpāyutatrayam // MatsP_66.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:6175: sārasvataṃ vrataṃ yastu śṛṇuyādapi yaḥ paṭhet /
GP12mtp176pu:6193: sarve samudrāḥ saritas tīrthāni jaladā nadāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6211: trailokye yāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6212: brahmaviṣṇvarkayuktāni tāni pāpaṃ dahantu vai // MatsP_67.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:6222: kṛtasnānāya taṃ paṭṭaṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_67.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6224: na tasya grahapīḍā syān na ca bandhujanakṣayaḥ // MatsP_67.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:6226: sūryagrahe sūryanāma sadā mantreṣu kīrtayet // MatsP_67.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6227: adhikāḥ padmarāgāḥ syuḥ kapilāṃ ca suśobhanām /
GP12mtp176pu:6232: *nārada uvāca kimudvegādbhute kṛtyam alakṣmīḥ kena hanyate /
GP12mtp176pu:6240: tadvadvṛddhāturāṇāṃ ca yauvane cāpi vartatām // MatsP_68.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6244: vaivasvataśca tatrāpi yadā tu manuruttamaḥ // MatsP_68.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6252: sahasrabāhuśca yadā bhavitā tasya vai sutaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6257: kṛtavīryeṇa vai pṛṣṭa idaṃ vakṣyati bhāskaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6259: *sūrya uvāca alaṃ kleśena mahatā putrastava narādhipa /
GP12mtp176pu:6266: tadvadvṛddhāturāṇāṃ ca kṛtyaṃ syāditareṣu ca // MatsP_68.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6275: hutvā snānaṃ ca kartavyaṃ maṅgalaṃ yena dhīmatā // MatsP_68.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:6277: sthāpayitvā tu caturaḥ kumbhānkoṇeṣu śobhanān // MatsP_68.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:6294: te te cānye ca devaughāḥ sadā pāntu kumārakam // MatsP_68.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:6295: mitraḥ śanirvā hutabhug ye ca bālagrahāḥ kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:6296: pīḍāṃ kurvantu bālasya mā māturjanakasya vai // MatsP_68.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:6298: saptakaṃ pūjayedbhaktyā strīṇāmatha guruṃ punaḥ // MatsP_68.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:6303: bhuktvā ca guruṇā ceyam uccāryā mantrasaṃtatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6306: brahmā rudro vasuḥ skando viṣṇuḥ śakro hutāśanaḥ // MatsP_68.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:6307: rakṣantu sarve duṣṭebhyo varadāḥ santu sarvadā /
GP12mtp176pu:6309: śaktitaḥ kapilāṃ dadyāt praṇamya ca visarjayet /
GP12mtp176pu:6310: caruṃ ca putrasahitā praṇamya raviśaṃkarau // MatsP_68.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:6323: etanmahāpātakanāśanaṃ syāt paraṃ hitaṃ bālavivardhanaṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6324: śṛṇoti yaścainamananyacetās tasyāpi siddhiṃ munayo vadanti // MatsP_68.42
GP12mtp176pu:6326: *matsya uvāca purā rathaṃtare kalpe paripṛṣṭo mahātmanā /
GP12mtp176pu:6327: mandarastho mahādevaḥ pinākī brahmaṇā svayam // MatsP_69.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6330: svalpena tapasā deva bhavenmokṣo 'thavā nṛṇām // MatsP_69.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6333: *matsya uvāca evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ sa viśvātmā brahmaṇā lokabhāvanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6336: vārāho bhavitā kalpas tasya manvantare śubhe // MatsP_69.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6338: dvāparākhyaṃ yugaṃ tadvad aṣṭāviṃśatimaṃ jaguḥ // MatsP_69.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6343: purīṃ dvāravatīṃ nāma sāmprataṃ yā kuśasthalī /
GP12mtp176pu:6345: tvaṣṭā mamājñayā tadvat kariṣyati jagatpateḥ // MatsP_69.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6351: tvayā pṛṣṭasya dharmasya rahasyasyāsya bhedakṛt // MatsP_69.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:6352: bhavitā sa tadā brahman kartā caiva vṛkodaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6354: yasya tīkṣṇo vṛko nāma jaṭhare havyavāhanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6355: mayā dattaḥ sa dharmātmā tena cāsau vṛkodaraḥ // MatsP_69.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:6357: bhaviṣyatyajaraḥ śrīmān kandarpa iva rūpavān // MatsP_69.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6363: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:6364: bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhaviṣyāṇāṃ purāṇānāṃ purātanam // MatsP_69.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:6366: anyeṣvapi dinarkṣeṣu na śaktastvam upoṣitum // MatsP_69.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:6368: upoṣya vidhinānena gaccha viṣṇoḥ paraṃ padam // MatsP_69.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:6370: ghṛtenābhyañjanaṃ kṛtvā tilaiḥ snānaṃ samācaret // MatsP_69.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6372: kṛṣṇāya pādau sampūjya śiraḥ sarvātmane namaḥ // MatsP_69.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:6374: śaṅkhine cakriṇe tadvad gadine varadāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:6375: sarve nārāyaṇasyaivaṃ saṃpūjyā bāhavaḥ kramāt // MatsP_69.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6378: namo nīlāya vai jaṅghe pādau viśvasṛje namaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6379: namo devyai namaḥ śāntyai namo lakṣmyai namaḥ śriyai // MatsP_69.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:6380: namaḥ puṣṭyai namastuṣṭyai dhṛṣṭyai hṛṣṭyai namo namaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6386: sarpiṣā saha bhuktvā ca gatvā śatapadaṃ budhaḥ // MatsP_69.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:6390: namo nārāyaṇāyeti tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // MatsP_69.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:6392: rātriṃ ca sakalāṃ sthitvā snānaṃ ca payasā tathā // MatsP_69.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:6397: śrutvā prabhāte saṃjāte nadīṃ gatvā viśāṃ pate /
GP12mtp176pu:6398: snānaṃ kṛtvā mṛdā tadvat pāṣaṇḍān abhivarjayet // MatsP_69.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:6399: upāsya saṃdhyāṃ vidhivat kṛtvā ca pitṛtarpaṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:6407: tasya dhārāṃ ca śirasā dhārayetsakalāṃ niśām // MatsP_69.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:6409: aratnimātraṃ kuṇḍaṃ ca kuryāttatra trimekhalam // MatsP_69.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:6412: hutvā ca vaiṣṇavaṃ samyak caruṃ gokṣīrasaṃyutam /
GP12mtp176pu:6425: upādhyāyasya ca punar dviguṇaṃ sarvameva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:6426: tataḥ prabhāte vimale samutthāya trayodaśa // MatsP_69.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:6430: tāstu teṣāṃ tato bhaktyā bhakṣyabhojyānnatarpitān // MatsP_69.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:6432: bhuktvā cākṣāralavaṇam ātmanā ca visarjayet // MatsP_69.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:6435: śivasya hṛdaye viṣṇur viṣṇośca hṛdaye śivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6436: yathāntaraṃ na paśyāmi tathā me svasti cāyuṣaḥ // MatsP_69.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:6438: vāsāṃsi caiva sarveṣāṃ gṛhāṇi prāpayedbudhaḥ // MatsP_69.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:6442: taddinaṃ naraśārdūla ya icchedvipulāṃ śriyam // MatsP_69.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:6444: kuru vratamidaṃ samyak snehāttava mayeritam // MatsP_69.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:6447: yā tu kalyāṇinī nāma purā kalpeṣu paṭhyate // MatsP_69.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:6450: kṛtvā ca yāmapsarasām adhīśā veśyā kṛtā hyanyabhavāntareṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:6453: tatrāpi tasyāḥ paricārikeyaṃ mama priyā samprati satyabhāmā // MatsP_69.60
GP12mtp176pu:6454: snātaḥ purā maṇḍalameṣa tadvat tejomayaṃ vedaśarīramāpa /
GP12mtp176pu:6455: asyāṃ ca kalyāṇatithau vivasvān sahasradhāreṇa sahasraraśmiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:6457: phalamasya na śakyate 'bhivaktuṃ yadi jihvāyutakoṭayo mukhe syuḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:6459: api narakagatānpitṝn aśeṣān alamuddhartumihaiva yaḥ karoti // MatsP_69.63
GP12mtp176pu:6460: ya idamaghavidāraṇaṃ śṛṇoti bhaktyā paripaṭhatīha paropakārahetoḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6462: kalyāṇinī nāma purā babhūva yā dvādaśī māghadineṣu pūjyā /
GP12mtp176pu:6463: sā pāṇḍuputreṇa kṛtā bhaviṣyaty anantapuṇyānagha bhīmapūrvā // MatsP_69.65
GP12mtp176pu:6469: *īśvara uvāca tasminneva yuge brahman sahasrāṇi tu ṣoḍaśa /
GP12mtp176pu:6480: śāpaṃ vakṣyati tāḥ sarvā vo hariṣyanti dasyavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6482: tataḥ prasādito deva idaṃ vakṣyati śārṅgabhṛt /
GP12mtp176pu:6488: ityuktvā tāḥ pariṣvajya gato dvāravatīśvaraḥ // MatsP_70.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6490: nivṛtte mausale tadvat keśave divamāgate // MatsP_70.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:6494: āgamiṣyati yogātmā dālbhyo nāma mahātapāḥ // MatsP_70.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6499: divyabhāvāṃ tāṃ ca purīṃ nānāratnagṛhāṇi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6504: ādiṣṭo 'si purā brahman keśavena ca dhīmatā /
GP12mtp176pu:6506: veśyānāmapi yo dharmas taṃ no brūhi tapodhana /
GP12mtp176pu:6512: kathaṃ nārāyaṇo 'smākaṃ bhartā syād ityupādiśa // MatsP_70.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:6523: *dālbhya uvāca purā devāsure yuddhe hateṣu śataśaḥ suraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6526: pariṇītāni yāni syur balādbhuktāni yāni vai /
GP12mtp176pu:6527: tāni sarvāṇi deveśaḥ provāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // MatsP_70.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:6529: bhaktimatyo varārohās tathā devakuleṣu ca // MatsP_70.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:6530: rājānaḥ svāminastulyāḥ sutā vāpi ca tatsamāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6531: bhaviṣyati ca saubhāgyaṃ sarvāsāmapi śaktitaḥ // MatsP_70.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:6533: nidhanenopacāryo vaḥ sa tadānyatra dāmbhikāt // MatsP_70.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:6536: brāhmaṇānāṃ varārohāḥ kāryāṇi vacanāni ca // MatsP_70.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:6538: avicāreṇa sarvābhir anuṣṭheyaṃ ca tatpunaḥ // MatsP_70.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:6540: yadā sūryadine hastaḥ puṣyo yātha punarvasuḥ // MatsP_70.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:6544: kāmāya pādau sampūjya jaṅghe vai mohakāriṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:6545: meḍhraṃ kandarpanidhaye kīṭaṃ prītimate namaḥ // MatsP_70.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:6551: sarvātmane ca sarvāṅgaṃ devadevasya pūjayet // MatsP_70.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:6555: sarvaśāntyai namaḥ prītyai namo ratyai nama śriyai // MatsP_70.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:6558: gandhairmaulyaistathā dhūpair naivedyena ca kāminī // MatsP_70.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:6562: tasmai viprāya sā dadyān mādhavaḥ prīyatāmiti // MatsP_70.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:6564: ratyarthaṃ kāmadevo 'yam iti citte 'vadhārya tam // MatsP_70.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:6578: dadyādetena mantreṇa tathaikāṃ gāṃ payasvinīm // MatsP_70.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:6580: tathaiva sarvakāmāptir astu viṣṇo sadā mama // MatsP_70.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:6581: yathā na kamalā dehāt prayāti tava keśava /
GP12mtp176pu:6582: tathā mamāpi deveśa śarīre sve kuru prabho // MatsP_70.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:6584: ka idaṃ kasmā adāditi vaidikaṃ mantramīrayet // MatsP_70.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:6586: śayyāsanādikaṃ sarvaṃ brāhmaṇasya gṛhaṃ nayet // MatsP_70.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:6587: tataḥ prabhṛti yo vipro ratyarthaṃ gṛhamāgataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6588: sa mānyaḥ sūryavāre ca sa mantavyo bhavettadā // MatsP_70.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:6593: daivaṃ vā mānuṣaṃ vā syād anurāgeṇa vā tataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6596: adharmo 'yaṃ tato na syād veśyānāmiha sarvadā // MatsP_70.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:6598: tadidaṃ sāmprataṃ sarvaṃ bhavatīṣvapi yujyate // MatsP_70.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:6600: kalyāṇīnāṃ ca kathitaṃ tatkurudhvaṃ varānanāḥ // MatsP_70.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:6602: sā pūjitā devagaṇair aśeṣair ānandakṛtsthānam upaiti viṣṇoḥ // MatsP_70.63
GP12mtp176pu:6604: tapodhanaḥ so 'pyabhidhāya caivaṃ tadā ca tāsāṃ vratamaṅganānām /
GP12mtp176pu:6605: svasthānameṣyatyanu tāḥ samastaṃ vrataṃ kariṣyanti ca devayānaiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:6609: tasyāpi niṣkṛtiṃ deva vada sarvakṛpākara // MatsP_71.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6611: śokavyādhibhayaṃ duḥkhaṃ na bhavedyena tadvada // MatsP_71.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6614: kṣīrārṇave sapatnīkaḥ sadā vasati keśavaḥ // MatsP_71.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6620: gārhasthyaṃ mā praṇāśaṃ me yātu dharmārthakāmadam // MatsP_71.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6622: pitaro mā praṇaśyantu māstu dāmpatyabhedanam // MatsP_71.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6623: lakṣmyā viyujyate deva na kadācidyathā bhavān /
GP12mtp176pu:6624: tathā kalatrasambandho deva mā me viyujyatām // MatsP_71.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6625: lakṣmyā na śūnyo varada śayyāṃ tvaṃ śayanaṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6645: na tasya patnyā virahaḥ kadācidapi jāyate /
GP12mtp176pu:6647: na virūpau na śokārtau dampatī bhavataḥ kvacit // MatsP_71.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:6659: avyaṅgatā śive bhaktir vaiṣṇavo vā bhavetkatham // MatsP_72.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6661: śṛṇuṣva yadvakṣyati vai dharmaputrāya dhārmikaḥ // MatsP_72.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6662: *pippalāda uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra idānīṃ kathayāmi te /
GP12mtp176pu:6663: aṅgāravratam ityetat sa vakṣyati mahīpateḥ // MatsP_72.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6665: virocanasya saṃvādaṃ bhārgavasya ca dhīmataḥ // MatsP_72.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6668: sādhu sādhu mahābāho virocana śivaṃ tava /
GP12mtp176pu:6669: tattathā hasitaṃ tasya papraccha surasūdanaḥ // MatsP_72.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6671: sādhusādhviti māmevam uktavāṃstvaṃ vadasva me // MatsP_72.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6676: bhittvā sa sapta pātālān adahatsapta sāgarān /
GP12mtp176pu:6684: prekṣiṣyante janāḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyanti varānmama // MatsP_72.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6686: devaloke 'dvitīyaṃ ca tava rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati // MatsP_72.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:6687: ye ca tvāṃ pūjayiṣyanti caturthyāṃ tvaddine narāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6692: dṛṣṭavānkriyamāṇaṃ ca śūdreṇa ca vyavasthitaḥ // MatsP_72.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:6694: vividhā ca rucirjātā yasmāttava vidūragā // MatsP_72.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:6699: paśyato 'pi bhavedrūpam aiśvaryaṃ kimu kurvataḥ // MatsP_72.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:6701: ālokitaṃ tena surārigarbhe sambhūtireṣā tava daitya jātā // MatsP_72.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:6702: *īśvara uvāca atha tadvacanaṃ śrutvā bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6703: prahrādanandano vīraḥ punaḥ papraccha vismitaḥ // MatsP_72.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:6705: dīyamānaṃ tu yaddānaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ bhavāntare // MatsP_72.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:6707: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā punaḥ provāca vistarāt // MatsP_72.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:6709: mṛdā snānaṃ tadā kuryāt padmarāgavibhūṣitaḥ // MatsP_72.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:6720: suvarṇaśṛṅgīṃ kapilām athārcya raupyaiḥ suraiḥ kāṃsyadohāṃ savatsām /
GP12mtp176pu:6723: caturbhujaṃ hemamaye niviṣṭaṃ pātre guḍasyopari sarpiyukte // MatsP_72.34
GP12mtp176pu:6725: dātavyametatsakalaṃ dvijāya kuṭumbine naiva tu dāmbhikāya /
GP12mtp176pu:6728: rūpārthī tvāṃ prapanno 'haṃ gṛhāṇārghyaṃ namo 'stu te // MatsP_72.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:6732: śayyāṃ ca śaktito dadyāt sarvopaskarasaṃyutām // MatsP_72.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:6738: caturo vātha vā tasya yatpuṇyaṃ tadvadāmi te // MatsP_72.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:6740: viṣṇau vātha śive bhaktaḥ saptadvīpādhipo bhavet // MatsP_72.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:6743: *pippalāda uvāca ityevamuktvā bhṛgunandano 'pi jagāma daityaśca cakāra sarvam /
GP12mtp176pu:6744: tvaṃ cāpi rājankuru sarvametad yato 'kṣayaṃ vedavido vadanti //
GP12mtp176pu:6745: *īśvara uvāca tatheti sampūjya sa pippalādaṃ vākyaṃ cakārādbhutavīryakarmā /
GP12mtp176pu:6748: *pippalāda uvāca athātaḥ śṛṇu bhūpāla pratiśukraṃ praśāntaye /
GP12mtp176pu:6749: yātrārambhe 'vasāne ca tathā śukrodaye tviha // MatsP_73.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6755: kave sarvārthasiddhyarthaṃ gṛhāṇārghyaṃ namo 'stu te // MatsP_73.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6758: yāvacchukrasya na hṛtā pūjā sā mālyakaiḥ śubhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6760: tāvadannaṃ na cāśnīyāt tribhiḥ kāmārthasiddhaye // MatsP_73.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6766: praṇamya ca gavā sārdhaṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_73.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6768: krūragrahaiḥ pīḍitānām amṛtāya namo namaḥ // MatsP_73.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6775: *īśvara uvāca sauraṃ dharmaṃ pravakṣyāmi nāmnā kalyāṇasaptamīm /
GP12mtp176pu:6781: yadā tu śuklasaptamyām ādityasya dinaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:6782: sā tu kalyāṇinī nāma vijayā ca nigadyate // MatsP_74.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6784: tataḥ śuklāmbaraḥ padmam akṣatābhiḥ prakalpayet // MatsP_74.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6788: yāmye divākarāyeti vidhātra iti nairṛte // MatsP_74.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6790: saumye vikartanāyeti ravaye cāṣṭame dale // MatsP_74.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6791: ādāvante ca madhye ca namo 'stu paramātmane /
GP12mtp176pu:6794: sthaṇḍile pūjayedbhaktyā guḍena lavaṇena ca // MatsP_74.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:6797: tilapātraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_74.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:6803: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsi māsi vrataṃ caret // MatsP_74.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:6807: na vittaśāṭhyaṃ kurvīta yato mohātpatatyadhaḥ // MatsP_74.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:6814: śṛṇoti paṭhate ceha sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // MatsP_74.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:6817: yāmupoṣya naraḥ śokaṃ na kadācidihāśnute // MatsP_75.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6818: māghe kṛṣṇatilaiḥ snātvā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ vai śuklapakṣataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6822: kṛtvā tu kāñcanaṃ padmam arkāyeti ca pūjayet /
GP12mtp176pu:6825: tathā viśokatā me 'stu tvadbhaktiḥ pratijanma ca // MatsP_75.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6826: evaṃ sampūjya ṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu bhaktyā sampūjayeddvijān /
GP12mtp176pu:6827: suptvā saṃprāśya gomūtram utthāya kṛtanaityakaḥ // MatsP_75.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6829: tadvastrayugmaṃ padmaṃ ca brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_75.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6835: śayyāṃ sopaskarāṃ dadyāt kapilāṃ ca payasvinīm // MatsP_75.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:6837: viśokasaptamīṃ kuryāt sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_75.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6840: yaṃ yaṃ prārthayate kāmaṃ taṃ tamāpnoti puṣkalam /
GP12mtp176pu:6841: niṣkāmaḥ kurute yastu sa paraṃ brahma gacchati // MatsP_75.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:6843: so 'pīndralokamāpnoti na duḥkhī jāyate kvacit // MatsP_75.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6845: *īśvara uvāca anyāmapi pravakṣyāmi nāmnā tu phalasaptamīm /
GP12mtp176pu:6846: yāmupoṣya naraḥ pāpād vimuktaḥ svargabhāgbhavet // MatsP_76.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:6848: tāmupoṣyātha kamalaṃ kārayitvā tu kāñcanam // MatsP_76.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6859: bhānurarko ravirbrahmā sūryaḥ śakro hariḥ śivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6861: pratimāsaṃ ca saptamyām ekaikaṃ nāma kīrtayet /
GP12mtp176pu:6865: yathā na viphalāḥ kāmās tvadbhaktānāṃ sadā rave /
GP12mtp176pu:6873: yaḥ śṛṇoti paṭhedvāpi so 'pi kalyāṇabhāgbhavet // MatsP_76.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6878: prātaḥ snātvā tilaiḥ śuklaiḥ śuklamālyānulepanaḥ // MatsP_77.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6880: tasminnamaḥ savitre tu gandhadhūpau nivedayet // MatsP_77.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6885: sarvasyāmṛtameva tvam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_77.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6889: tatsarvaṃ viduṣe tadvad brāhmaṇāya nivedayet // MatsP_77.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6892: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsi māsi samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:6899: na vittaśāṭhyaṃ kurvīta kurvandoṣaṃ samaśnute // MatsP_77.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:6901: nipeturye dharaṇyāṃ tu śālimudgekṣavaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_77.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6903: iṣṭā raverataḥ puṇyā śarkarā havyakavyayoḥ // MatsP_77.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:6906: yaḥ kuryātparayā bhaktyā sa vai sadgatimāpnuyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:6907: kalpamekaṃ vasetsvarge tato yāti paraṃ padam // MatsP_77.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:6908: idamanaghaṃ śṛṇoti yaḥ smaredvā paripaṭhatīha divākarasya loke /
GP12mtp176pu:6909: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi devair amaravadhūjanamālayābhipūjyaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:6914: tilapātre ca sauvarṇe vidhāya kamalaṃ śubham // MatsP_78.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:6920: śaktyā ca kapilāṃ dadyād alaṃkṛtya vidhānataḥ // MatsP_78.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:6923: anena vidhinā śukla-saptamyāṃ māsi māsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6926: gāṃ ca dadyātsvaśaktyā tu suvarṇāḍhyāṃ payasvinīm // MatsP_78.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:6930: kalpe kalpe tato lokān saptagatvā pṛthakpṛthak /
GP12mtp176pu:6931: apsarobhiḥ parivṛtas tato yāti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_78.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6932: yaḥ paśyatīdaṃ śṛṇuyācca martyaḥ paṭhecca bhaktyātha matiṃ dadāti /
GP12mtp176pu:6940: tataḥ prabhāta utthāya kṛtvā snānaṃ punardvijān // MatsP_79.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:6942: sauvarṇaṃ puruṣaṃ tadvat padmahastaṃ suśobhanam // MatsP_79.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:6946: dakṣiṇe tadvadarkāya tathāryamṇe ca nairṛte // MatsP_79.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6949: karṇikāyāṃ ca puruṣaṃ sarvātmana iti nyaset /
GP12mtp176pu:6953: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ saptamyāṃ māsi māsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:6960: vipāpmā sa sukhī martyaḥ kalpaṃ ca divi modate // MatsP_79.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:6979: tataḥ prabhāte saṃjāte bhaktyā sampūjayeddvijān // MatsP_80.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:6980: anena vidhinā dadyān māsi māsi sadā naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:6981: vāsasā vṛṣabhaṃ haimaṃ tadvadgāṃ kāñcanodbhavām // MatsP_80.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:6987: tasya śrīrvipulā kīrtir bhavejjanmani janmani // MatsP_80.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:6995: yāvatsamāḥ sapta naraḥ karoti yaḥ saptamīṃ saptavidhānayuktām /
GP12mtp176pu:6996: sa saptalokādhipatiḥ krameṇa bhūtvā padaṃ yāti paraṃ murāreḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:7000: vibhavodbhavakāri bhūtale 'smin bhavabhīterapi sūdanaṃ ca puṃsaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:7001: *matsya uvāca paripṛṣṭamidaṃ jagatpriyaṃ te vibudhānāmapi durlabhaṃ mahattvāt /
GP12mtp176pu:7007: śriyaṃ vābhyarcya vidhivad bhokṣyāmi tvapare 'hani // MatsP_81.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7011: viśokāya namaḥ pādau jaṅghe ca varadāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:7012: śrīśāya jānunī tadvad ūrū ca jalaśāyine // MatsP_81.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7013: kandarpāya namo guhyaṃ mādhavāya namaḥ kaṭim /
GP12mtp176pu:7014: dāmodarāyetyudaraṃ pārśve ca vipulāya vai // MatsP_81.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7015: nābhiṃ ca padmanābhāya hṛdayaṃ manmathāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:7016: śrīdharāya vibhorvakṣaḥ karau madhujite namaḥ // MatsP_81.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7017: cakriṇe vāmabāhuṃ ca dakṣiṇaṃ gadine namaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7018: vaikuṇṭhāya namaḥ kaṇṭham āsyaṃ yajñamukhāya vai // MatsP_81.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7020: lalāṭaṃ vāmanāyeti haraye ca punarbhruvau // MatsP_81.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7022: namaḥ sarvātmane tadvac chira ityabhipūjayet // MatsP_81.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7024: tatastu maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā sthaṇḍilaṃ kārayenmudā // MatsP_81.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7026: ślakṣṇaṃ hṛdyaṃ ca parito vapratrayasamāvṛtam // MatsP_81.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7031: namo devyai namaḥ śāntyai namo lakṣmyai namaḥ śriyai /
GP12mtp176pu:7032: namaḥ puṣṭyai namastuṣṭyai vṛṣṭyai hṛṣṭyai namo namaḥ // MatsP_81.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:7034: viśokā cāstu sampattyai viśokā sarvasiddhaye // MatsP_81.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7040: abhigamya ca viprāṇāṃ mithunāni tadārcayet // MatsP_81.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:7044: prabhāte ca tataḥ snānaṃ kṛtvā dāmpatyamarcayet // MatsP_81.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7046: bhuktvā śrutvā purāṇāni taddinaṃ cātivāhayet // MatsP_81.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:7047: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsi māsi samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:7050: yathā na lakṣmīrdeveśa tvāṃ parityajya gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:7051: tathā surūpatārogyam aśokaścāstu me sadā // MatsP_81.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:7052: yathā devena rahitā na lakṣmīrjāyate kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:7053: tathā viśokatā me 'stu bhaktiragryā ca keśave // MatsP_81.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:7055: śūrpaṃ ca lakṣmyā sahitaṃ dātavyaṃ bhūtimicchatā // MatsP_81.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7058: kadambaṃ kubjakaṃ jātiḥ śastānyetāni sarvadā // MatsP_81.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:7062: kiṃrūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dātavyaṃ tadihocyatām // MatsP_82.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7070: vatsaṃ bhāreṇa kurvīta dvābhyāṃ vai madhyamā smṛtā // MatsP_82.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7071: ardhabhāreṇa vatsaḥ syāt kaniṣṭhā bhārakeṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:7082: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deveṣvavasthitā /
GP12mtp176pu:7083: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama śāntiṃ prayacchatu // MatsP_82.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7084: dehasthā yā ca rudrāṇī śaṃkarasya sadā priyā /
GP12mtp176pu:7085: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // MatsP_82.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7086: viṣṇorvakṣasi yā lakṣmīḥ svāhā yā ca vibhāvasoḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7088: caturmukhasya yā lakṣmīr yā lakṣmīrdhanadasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7089: lakṣmīryā lokapālānāṃ sā dhenurvaradāstu me // MatsP_82.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:7090: svadhā yā pitṛmukhyāṇāṃ svāhā yajñabhujāṃ ca yā /
GP12mtp176pu:7091: sarvapāpaharā dhenus tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_82.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:7095: tāsāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi nāmāni ca narādhipa // MatsP_82.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7100: rasadhenuśca navamī daśamī syāt svarūpataḥ // MatsP_82.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:7104: etadevaṃvidhānaṃ syāt ta evopaskarāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_82.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:7114: yāmupoṣya naro yāti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam // MatsP_82.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:7115: iha loke ca saubhāgyam āyurārogyameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7116: vaiṣṇavaṃ puramāpnoti maraṇe ca smaranharim // MatsP_82.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7118: na śokaduḥkhadaurgatyaṃ tasya saṃjāyate nṛpa // MatsP_82.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:7119: nārī vā kurute yā tu viśokadvādaśīvratam /
GP12mtp176pu:7122: kartavyaṃ bhūtikāmena bhaktyā tu parayā nṛpa // MatsP_82.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:7123: iti paṭhati ya itthaṃ yaḥ śṛṇotīha samyaṅ madhumuranarakārer arcanaṃ yaśca paśyet /
GP12mtp176pu:7124: matimāpa ca janānāṃ yo dadātīndraloke vasati sa vibudhaughaiḥ pūjyate kalpamekam // MatsP_82.31
GP12mtp176pu:7134: prathamo dhānyaśailaḥ syād dvitīyo lavaṇācalaḥ // MatsP_83.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7140: ayane viṣuve puṇye vyatīpāte dinakṣaye // MatsP_83.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7143: śuklāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ vā puṇyarkṣe vā vidhānataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7147: prāgudakpravaṇaṃ tadvat prāṅmukhaṃ ca vidhānataḥ // MatsP_83.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7151: madhyamaḥ pañcaśatikaḥ kaniṣṭhaḥ syāt tribhiḥ śataiḥ // MatsP_83.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7158: catvāri śṛṅgāṇi ca rājatāni nitambabhāgeṣvapi rājataḥ syāt /
GP12mtp176pu:7160: śuklāmbarāṇyambudharāvalī syāt pūrveṇa pītāni ca dakṣiṇena /
GP12mtp176pu:7161: vāsāṃsi paścādatha karburāṇi raktāni caivottarato ghanālī // MatsP_83.17
GP12mtp176pu:7163: nānāphalālī ca samantataḥ syān manoramaṃ mālyavilepanaṃ ca // MatsP_83.18
GP12mtp176pu:7164: vitānakaṃ copari pañcavarṇam amlānapuṣpābharaṇaṃ sitaṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7167: pūrveṇa mandaramanekaphalāvalībhir yuktaṃ yavaiḥ kanakabhadrakadambacihnaiḥ // MatsP_83.20
GP12mtp176pu:7169: kṣīrāruṇodasarasātha vanena caivaṃ raupyeṇa śaktighaṭitena virājamānam //
GP12mtp176pu:7171: haimena yajñapatinā ghṛtamānasena vastraiśca rājatavanena ca saṃyutaḥ syāt // MatsP_83.22
GP12mtp176pu:7174: saṃsthāpya taṃ vipulaśailamathottareṇa śailaṃ supārśvamapi māṣamayaṃ suvastram /
GP12mtp176pu:7176: mākṣīkabhadrasarasātha vanena tadvad raupyeṇa bhāsvaravatā ca yutaṃ vidhāya /
GP12mtp176pu:7178: pūrveṇa hastamitamatra vidhāya kuṇḍaṃ kāryastilairyavaghṛtena samitkuśaiśca /
GP12mtp176pu:7179: rātrau ca jāgaramanuddhatagītatūryair āvāhanaṃ ca kathayāmi śiloccayānām
GP12mtp176pu:7181: kṣemaṃ vidhatsva kuru śāntimanuttamāṃ naḥ sampūjitaḥ paramabhaktimatā mayā hi // MatsP_83.27
GP12mtp176pu:7183: mūrtāmūrtātparaṃ bījam ataḥ pāhi sanātana // MatsP_83.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:7185: rudrādityavasūnāṃ ca tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_83.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:7189: yasmāccaitrarathena tvaṃ bhadrāśvena ca varṣataḥ // MatsP_83.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:7193: yasmāttvaṃ ketumālena vaibhrājena vanena ca // MatsP_83.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:7195: uttaraiḥ kurubhiryasmāt sāvitreṇa vanena ca // MatsP_83.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:7196: supārśva rājase nityam ataḥ śrīrakṣayāstu me /
GP12mtp176pu:7197: evamāmantrya tānsarvān prabhāte vimale punaḥ // MatsP_83.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:7201: nava sapta tathāṣṭau vā pañca dadyād aśaktimān // MatsP_83.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:7202: ekāpi gurave deyā kapilā ca payasvinī /
GP12mtp176pu:7203: parvatānāmaśeṣāṇām eṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_83.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:7204: ta eva pūjane mantrās ta evopaskarā matāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7205: grahāṇāṃ lokapālānāṃ brahmādīnāṃ ca sarvadā // MatsP_83.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:7209: dānakāle ca ye mantrāḥ parvateṣu ca yatphalam // MatsP_83.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:7210: annaṃ brahma yataḥ proktam anne prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7217: vimānena divaḥ pṛṣṭham āyāti sma niṣevita /
GP12mtp176pu:7218: dharmakṣaye rājarājyam āpnotīha na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_83.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:7231: taddānakartṛkatvena tvaṃ māṃ pāhi nagottama // MatsP_84.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7233: priyaṃ ca śivayornityaṃ tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_84.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7237: umāloke vasetkalpaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_84.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7250: tathā rasānāṃ pravaraḥ sadaivekṣuraso mataḥ // MatsP_85.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7251: mama tasmātparāṃ lakṣmīṃ guḍaparvata dehi vai /
GP12mtp176pu:7253: nivāsaścāpi pārvatyās tasmācchāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_85.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7255: pūjyamānaḥ sa gandharvair gaurīloke mahīyate // MatsP_85.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7260: yasya pradānādbhavanaṃ vairiñcaṃ yāti mānavaḥ // MatsP_86.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7272: tatra kalpaśataṃ tiṣṭhet tato yāti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_86.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7274: *īśvara uvāca ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi tilaśailaṃ vidhānataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7276: uttamo daśabhir droṇair madhyamaḥ pañcabhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7277: tribhiḥ kaniṣṭho viprendra tilaśailaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // MatsP_87.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:7281: tilāḥ kuśāśca māṣāśca tasmācchāntyai bhavatviha // MatsP_87.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7282: havye kavye ca yasmācca tilā evābhirakṣaṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:7283: bhavāduddhara śailendra tilācala namo 'stu te // MatsP_87.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7285: sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yāti punarāvṛttidurlabham // MatsP_87.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7290: yatpradānānnaro nityam āpnoti paramaṃ padam // MatsP_88.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7299: rudraloke vasetkalpaṃ tato rājā bhavediha // MatsP_88.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7312: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ gurave taṃ nivedayet /
GP12mtp176pu:7331: padmarāgaiḥ sasauvarṇair uttareṇa ca vinyaset // MatsP_90.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7337: tvaṃ ca ratnamayo nityaṃ namaste 'stu sadācala // MatsP_90.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7339: sadā ratnapradānena tasmānnaḥ pāhi parvata // MatsP_90.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7356: rājataṃ syādyadanyeṣāṃ sarvaṃ tadiha kāñcanam // MatsP_91.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7358: dadyāttataḥ prabhāte tu gurave raupyaparvatam // MatsP_91.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7361: pitṝṇāṃ vallabho yasmād dharīndrāṇāṃ śivasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7383: haimī supārśve surabhir dakṣiṇābhimukhī bhavet // MatsP_92.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:7385: kṛtvā tu gurave dadyān madhyamaṃ parvatottamam /
GP12mtp176pu:7388: tasmādānandakārī tvaṃ bhava śailendra sarvadā // MatsP_92.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7389: amṛtaṃ pibatāṃ ye tu nipeturbhuvi śīkarāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7390: devānāṃ tatsamutthastvaṃ pāhi naḥ śarkarācala // MatsP_92.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7394: sarvapāpair vinirmuktaḥ sa yāti paramaṃ padam // MatsP_92.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7403: suhṛcchakrasya nihatā yena daityāḥ sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_92.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7416: kasmācca vipulaṃ tejo maccharīre sadottamam // MatsP_92.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7417: *vasiṣṭha uvāca purā līlāvatī nāma veśyā śivaparāyaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:7421: bhṛtyo līlāvatīgehe tena hemnā vinirmitāḥ // MatsP_92.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:7424: dharmakāryamiti jñātvā na gṛhṇāti kathaṃcana // MatsP_92.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:7426: līlāvatī gireḥ pārśve paricaryāṃ ca pārthiva // MatsP_92.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:7428: sā ca līlāvatī veśyā-kālena mahatāpi ca // MatsP_92.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7432: na maulyamādādveśyātaḥ sa bhavāniha sāmpratam // MatsP_92.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:7435: samyagujjvālitāḥ patnyā seyaṃ bhānumatī tava // MatsP_92.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:7440: tatheti satkṛtya sa dharmamūrtir vaco vasiṣṭhasya dadau ca sarvān /
GP12mtp176pu:7443: śṛṇoti bhaktyātha matiṃ dadāti vikalmaṣaḥ so 'pi divaṃ prayāti //
GP12mtp176pu:7445: yaḥ kuryātkimu munipuṃgaveha samyak śāntātmā sakalagirīndrasampradānam //
GP12mtp176pu:7449: *vaiśampāyana uvāca śrīkāmaḥ śāntikāmo vā grahayajñaṃ samārabhet /
GP12mtp176pu:7451: yena brahmanvidhānena tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // MatsP_93.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:7467: rāhuḥ keturiti proktā grahā lokahitāvahāḥ // MatsP_93.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7468: madhye tu bhāskaraṃ vidyāl lohitaṃ dakṣiṇena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:7469: uttareṇa guruṃ vidyād budhaṃ pūrvottareṇa tu // MatsP_93.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:7474: skandamaṅgārakasyāpi budhasya ca tathā harim // MatsP_93.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7476: śanaiścarasya tu yamaṃ rāhoḥ kālaṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_93.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:7478: agnirāpaḥ kṣitirviṣṇur indra aindrī ca devatāḥ // MatsP_93.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:7483: somaśukrau tathā śveto budhajīvau ca piṅgalau /
GP12mtp176pu:7484: mandarāhū tathā kṛṣṇau dhūmraṃ ketugaṇaṃ viduḥ // MatsP_93.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7490: dadhyodanaṃ ca jīvāya śakrāya ca ghṛtaudanam /
GP12mtp176pu:7496: sthāpayedavraṇaṃ kumbhaṃ varuṇaṃ tatra vinyaset // MatsP_93.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7497: gaṅgādyāḥ saritaḥ sarvāḥ samudrāṃśca sarāṃsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7501: sarve samudrāḥ saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca nadāstathā /
GP12mtp176pu:7506: audumbaraḥ śamī dūrvā kuśāśca samidhaḥ kramāt // MatsP_93.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7508: hotavyā madhusarpirbhyāṃ dadhnā caiva samanvitāḥ // MatsP_93.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:7512: svena svenaiva mantreṇa hotavyāḥ samidhaḥ pṛthak // MatsP_93.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:7517: hutvā ca tāṃścarūnsamyak tato homaṃ samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:7518: ākṛṣṇeti ca sūryāya homaḥ kāryo dvijanmanā // MatsP_93.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:7520: agnirmūrdhā divo mantra iti bhaumāya kīrtayet // MatsP_93.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:7523: śukraṃ te anyaditi ca śukrasyāpi nigadyate /
GP12mtp176pu:7524: śanaiścarāyeti punaḥ śaṃ no devīti homayet // MatsP_93.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:7526: ketuṃ kṛṇvann api brūyāt ketūnāmapi śāntaye // MatsP_93.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:7527: ā vo rājeti rudrasya balihomaṃ samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:7528: āpo hi ṣṭhetyumāyāstu syoneti svāminastathā // MatsP_93.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:7531: tathā yamasya cāyaṃ gaur iti homaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7532: kālasya brahma jajñānam iti mantraḥ praśasyate // MatsP_93.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:7534: agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmaha iti vahnerudāhṛtaḥ // MatsP_93.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:7535: ud uttamaṃ varuṇamity apāṃ mantraḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7536: bhūmeḥ pṛthivyantarikṣam iti vedeṣu paṭhyate // MatsP_93.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:7538: indrāyendo marutvata iti śakrasya śasyate // MatsP_93.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:7541: namo 'stu sarpebhya iti sarpāṇāṃ mantra ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:7542: eṣa brahmā ya ṛtvigbhya iti brahmaṇyudāhṛtaḥ // MatsP_93.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:7543: vināyakasya cānūnam iti mantro budhaiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7546: krāṇā śiśurmahīnāṃ ca vāyormantraḥ prakīrtitaḥ // MatsP_93.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:7547: eṣo uṣā apūrvyā ity aśvinormantra ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:7552: yajamānasya kartavyaṃ caturbhiḥ snapanaṃ dvijaiḥ // MatsP_93.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:7558: brahmaṇā sahitaḥ śeṣo dikpālāstvāmavantu te // MatsP_93.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:7560: buddhirlajjā vapuḥ śāntis tuṣṭiḥ krāntiśca mātaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7565: ṛṣayo munayo gāvo devamātara eva ca // MatsP_93.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:7567: astrāṇi sarvaśastrāṇi rājāno vāhanāni ca // MatsP_93.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:7569: saritaḥ sāgarāḥ śailās tīrthāni jaladā nadāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7576: raktaṃ dhuraṃdharaṃ dadyād bhaumāya ca kakudminam // MatsP_93.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:7580: suvarṇena samā kāryā yajamānena dakṣiṇā // MatsP_93.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:7583: samantreṇaiva dātavyāḥ sarvāḥ sarvatra dakṣiṇāḥ // MatsP_93.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:7585: tīrthadevamayī yasmād ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:7586: puṇyastvaṃ śaṅkha puṇyānāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
