GP12mtp176pu:7587: viṣṇunā vidhṛtaścāsi tataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:7589: aṣṭamūrteradhiṣṭhānam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:7591: anantapuṇyaphaladam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:7593: pradānāttasya me viṣṇo hy ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:7595: candrārkavāhano nityam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:7597: sarvapāpaharā nityam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:7601: yānaṃ vibhāvasornityam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:7603: yasmāttasmācchriye me syād iha loke paratra ca // MatsP_93.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:7605: śayyā mamāpyaśūnyāstu dattā janmani janmani // MatsP_93.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:7606: yathā ratneṣu sarveṣu sarve devāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7607: tathā ratnāni yacchantu ratnadānena me surāḥ // MatsP_93.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:7614: yastu pīḍākaro nityam alpavittasya vā grahaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7615: taṃ ca yatnena sampūjya śeṣānapyarcayedbudhaḥ // MatsP_93.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:7633: prāguttaraṃ samāsādya pradeśaṃ maṇḍapasya tu // MatsP_93.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:7649: dvyaṅgulo hyucchrito vapraḥ prathamaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7651: tryaṅgulasya ca vistāraḥ sarveṣāṃ kathyate budhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7658: viṣapāpaharo nityam ataḥ śāntiṃ prayaccha me // MatsP_93.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:7664: ghṛtadhārāṃ tayā samyag agnerupari pātayet // MatsP_93.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:7666: mahāvaiśvānaraṃ sāma jyeṣṭhasāma ca vācayet // MatsP_93.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:7672: kāryāvayutahome tu na prasajyeta vistare // MatsP_93.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:7673: tadvacca daśa cāṣṭau ca lakṣahome tu ṛtvijaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7674: kartavyāḥ śaktitastadvac catvāro vā vimatsaraḥ // MatsP_93.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:7682: annahīnaḥ kṛto yasmād durbhikṣaphalado bhavet // MatsP_93.110 //
GP12mtp176pu:7684: yaṣṭāraṃ dakṣiṇāhīnaṃ nāsti yajñasamo ripuḥ // MatsP_93.111 //
GP12mtp176pu:7685: na vāpyalpadhanaḥ kuryāl lakṣahomaṃ naraḥ kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:7686: yasmātpīḍākaro nityaṃ yajñe bhavati vigrahaḥ // MatsP_93.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:7687: tameva pūjayedbhaktyā dvau vā trīnvā yathāvidhi /
GP12mtp176pu:7695: sa taṃ kāmamavāpnoti padamānantyam aśnute // MatsP_93.116 //
GP12mtp176pu:7696: putrārthī labhate putrān dhanārthī labhate dhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:7697: bhāryārthī śobhanāṃ bhāryāṃ kumārī ca śubhaṃ patim // MatsP_93.117 //
GP12mtp176pu:7699: yaṃ yaṃ prārthayate kāmaṃ sa vai bhavati puṣkalaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7700: niṣkāmaḥ kurute yastu sa paraṃ brahma gacchati // MatsP_93.118 //
GP12mtp176pu:7702: āhutībhiḥ prayatnena dakṣiṇābhiḥ phalena ca // MatsP_93.119 //
GP12mtp176pu:7704: homamantrāsta evoktāḥ khāne dāne tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7717: vedī ca koṭihome syād vitastīnāṃ catuṣṭayam // MatsP_93.126 //
GP12mtp176pu:7719: vaprapramāṇaṃ pūrvoktaṃ vedīnāṃ ca tathocchrayaḥ // MatsP_93.127 //
GP12mtp176pu:7721: pūrvadvāre ca saṃsthāpya bahvṛcaṃ vedapāragam // MatsP_93.128 //
GP12mtp176pu:7727: rātrisūktaṃ ca raudraṃ ca pāvamānaṃ sumaṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:7728: pūrvato bahvṛcaḥ śāntiṃ paṭhannāste hyudaṅmukhaḥ // MatsP_93.131 //
GP12mtp176pu:7729: śāktaṃ śākraṃ ca saumyaṃ ca kauṣmāṇḍaṃ śāntimeva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7732: jyeṣṭhamāsa tathā śāntiṃ chandogaḥ paścime japet // MatsP_93.133 //
GP12mtp176pu:7733: śāntisūktaṃ ca sauraṃ ca tathā śākunakaṃ śubham /
GP12mtp176pu:7736: snāne dāne ca mantrāḥ syus ta eva munisattama // MatsP_93.135 //
GP12mtp176pu:7747: navagrahamakhaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kāmyaṃ samācaret // MatsP_93.140 //
GP12mtp176pu:7748: anyathā phaladaṃ puṃsāṃ na kāmyaṃ jāyate kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:7750: vṛttaṃ voccāṭane kuṇḍaṃ tathā ca vaśyakarmaṇi /
GP12mtp176pu:7757: sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhaya iti homayet // MatsP_93.145 ///
GP12mtp176pu:7758: na cātra sthāpanaṃ kāryaṃ na ca kumbhābhiṣecanam /
GP12mtp176pu:7759: snānaṃ sarvauṣadhaiḥ kṛtvā śuklapuṣpāmbaro gṛhī // MatsP_93.146 //
GP12mtp176pu:7761: sūkṣmavastrāṇi deyāni śuklā gāvaḥ sakāñcanāḥ // MatsP_93.147 //
GP12mtp176pu:7765: dvimekhalaṃ koṇamukhaṃ hastamātraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_93.149 //
GP12mtp176pu:7771: durmitriyās tasmai santu tathā huṃphaḍitīti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7776: vidveṣaṇaṃ tathā kurvan netadeva samācaret // MatsP_93.154 //
GP12mtp176pu:7782: na tasya grahapīḍā syān na ca bandhujanakṣayaḥ // MatsP_93.157 //
GP12mtp176pu:7784: na pīḍā tatra bālānāṃ na rogo na ca bandhanam // MatsP_93.158 //
GP12mtp176pu:7790: paripaṭhati ya itthaṃ yaḥ śṛṇoti prasaṅgād abhibhavati sa śatrūnāyurārogyayuktaḥ // MatsP_93.161
GP12mtp176pu:7793: saptāśvaḥ saptarajjuśca dvibhujaḥ syātsadā raviḥ // MatsP_94.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7797: caturbhujaḥ śvetaromā varadaḥ syād dharāsutaḥ // MatsP_94.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:7819: ādiṣṭastvaṃ śiveneha vada māheśvaraṃ vratam // MatsP_95.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7820: *nandikeśvara uvāca śṛṇuṣvāvahito brahman vakṣye māheśvaraṃ vratam /
GP12mtp176pu:7821: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātā nāmnā śivacaturdaśī // MatsP_95.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:7825: suvarṇavṛṣabhaṃ dattvā bhokṣyāmi ca pare 'hani // MatsP_95.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7829: pādau namaḥ śivāyeti śiraḥ sarvātmane namaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7830: trinetrāyeti netrāṇi lalāṭaṃ haraye namaḥ // MatsP_95.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7832: sadyojātāya karṇau tu vāmadevāya vai bhujau // MatsP_95.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7838: pradhānāya namo jaṅghe gulphau vyomātmane namaḥ // MatsP_95.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7840: namaḥ puṣṭyai namastuṣṭyai pārvatīṃ cāpi pūjayet // MatsP_95.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:7850: ye tu māse viśeṣāḥ syus tānnibodha kramādiha // MatsP_95.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:7854: namaste 'stu mahādeva sthāṇave ca tataḥ param // MatsP_95.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:7855: namaḥ paśupate nātha namaste śambhave punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7857: namo bhīmāya ityevaṃ tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7858: gomūtraṃ gomūyaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam // MatsP_95.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:7859: pañcagavyaṃ tato bilvaṃ karpūraṃ cāguruṃ yavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7860: tilāḥ kṛṣṇāśca vidhivat prāśanaṃ kramaśaḥ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:7861: pratimāsaṃ caturdaśyor ekaikaṃ prāśanaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_95.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:7869: umāmaheśvaraṃ haimaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca gavā saha // MatsP_95.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:7873: sthāpya viprāya śāntāya vedavrataparāya ca // MatsP_95.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:7875: guṇajñe śrotriye dadyād ācārye tattvavedini // MatsP_95.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:7885: gaṇādhipatyaṃ divi kalpakoṭi-śatānyuṣitvā padameti śambhoḥ // MatsP_95.35
GP12mtp176pu:7886: na bṛhaspatirapyanantamasyāḥ phalamindo na pitāmaho 'pi vaktum /
GP12mtp176pu:7887: na ca siddhagaṇo 'pyalaṃ na cāhaṃ yadi jihvāyutakoṭayo 'pi vaktre //
GP12mtp176pu:7888: bhavatyamaravallabhaḥ paṭhati yaḥ smaredvā sadā śṛṇotyapi vimatsaraḥ sakalapāpanirmocanīm
GP12mtp176pu:7889: imāṃ śivacaturdaśīmamarakāminīkoṭayaḥ stuvanti tamaninditaṃ kimu samācaredyaḥ sadā // MatsP_95.37
GP12mtp176pu:7890: yā vātha nārī kurute 'tibhaktyā bhartāramāpṛcchya sutāngurūnvā /
GP12mtp176pu:7891: sāpi prasādātparameśvarasya paraṃ padaṃ yāti pinākapāṇeḥ // MatsP_95.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:7895: mārgaśīrṣe śubhe māsi tṛtīyāyāṃ mune vratam /
GP12mtp176pu:7902: savṛṣaṃ kāñcanaṃ rudraṃ dharmarājaṃ ca kārayet // MatsP_96.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7903: kūṣmāṇḍaṃ mātuliṅgaṃ ca vārtākaṃ panasaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:7906: kāśmaraṃ dāḍimaṃ śaktyā kāladhautāni ṣoḍaśa // MatsP_96.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:7925: tadyuktaphaladānena tau syātāṃ me varapradau // MatsP_96.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:7929: tathā mamāstu viśvātmā śaṃkaraḥ śaṃkaraḥ sadā // MatsP_96.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:7930: iti dattvā ca tatsarvam alaṃkṛtya ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7939: etasmānnāparaṃ kiṃcid iha loke paratra ca /
GP12mtp176pu:7944: etatsamastakaluṣāpaharaṃ janānām ājīvanāya manujeṣu ca sarvadā syāt /
GP12mtp176pu:7945: janmāntareṣvapi na putraviyogaduḥkham āpnoti dhāma ca puraṃdaralokajuṣṭam
GP12mtp176pu:7946: yo vā śṛṇoti puruṣo 'lpadhanaḥ paṭhedvā devālayeṣu bhavaneṣu ca dhārmikāṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:7947: pāpairviyuktavapuratra puraṃ murārer ānandakṛtpadamupaiti munīndra so 'pi
GP12mtp176pu:7950: yacchāntaye ca martyānāṃ vada nandīśa tadvratam // MatsP_97.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:7951: *nandikeśvara uvāca yattadviśvātmano dhāma paraṃ brahma sanātanam /
GP12mtp176pu:7955: yadā hastena saṃyuktam ādityasya ca vāsaram /
GP12mtp176pu:7956: tadā śanidine kuryād ekabhaktaṃ vimatsaraḥ // MatsP_97.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:7961: bhagaṃ tu nairṛte devaṃ varuṇaṃ paścime dale /
GP12mtp176pu:7962: mahendramanile tadvad ādityaṃ ca tathottare // MatsP_97.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:7966: uttare tu raviṃ devaṃ karṇikāyāṃ ca bhāskaram // MatsP_97.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:7968: tasminpadme tato dadyād imaṃ mantramudīrayet // MatsP_97.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:7971: agnim īḍe namastubhyam iṣetvorje ca bhāskara /
GP12mtp176pu:7972: agna āyāhi varada namaste jyotiṣāṃ pate // MatsP_97.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:7975: puruṣaṃ ca yathāśaktyā kārayeddvibhujaṃ tathā // MatsP_97.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:7976: suvarṇaśṛṅgīṃ kapilāṃ mahārghyāṃ raupyaiḥ khuraiḥ kāṃsyadohāṃ savatsām /
GP12mtp176pu:7977: pūrṇe guḍasyopari tāmrapātre nidhāya padmaṃ puruṣaṃ ca dadyāt //
GP12mtp176pu:7978: sampūjya raktāmbaramālyadhūpair dvijaṃ ca raktairatha hemaśṛṅgaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7983: ityanena vidhinā samācared abdabhekamiha yastu mānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:7986: dvīpasaptakapatiḥ punaḥ punar varmamūrtir amitaujasā yutaḥ // MatsP_97.18
GP12mtp176pu:7988: sāpi lokamamareśavanditā yāti nārada raverna saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_97.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:7989: yaḥ paṭhedapi śṛṇoti mānavaḥ paṭhyamānamatha vānumodate /
GP12mtp176pu:7990: so 'pi śakrabhuvanasthito 'maraiḥ pūjyate vasati cākṣayaṃ divi //
GP12mtp176pu:7996: saṃkrāntivāsare prātas tilaiḥ snānaṃ vidhīyate // MatsP_98.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8000: nama uṣṇārciṣe yāmye namo ṛṅmaṇḍalāya ca // MatsP_98.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8001: namaḥ savitre nairṛtye vāruṇe tapanaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8002: vāyavye tu bhagaṃ nyasya punaḥ punarathārcayet // MatsP_98.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8006: kamalaṃ ca yathāśaktyā kārayitvā nivedayet // MatsP_98.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8009: namo 'nanta namo dhātre ṛksāmayajuṣāṃ pate // MatsP_98.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8010: anena vidhinā sarvaṃ māsi māsi samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:8011: vatsarānte 'thavā kuryāt sarvaṃ dvādaśadhā naraḥ // MatsP_98.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8014: payasvinīḥ śīlavatīśca dadyād dharmaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ raupyakhuraiśca yuktāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8015: gāvo 'ṣṭa vā sapta sakāṃsyadohā mālyāmbarā vā caturo 'pyaśaktaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8017: haimīṃ ca dadyātpṛthivīṃ saśeṣām ākārya rūpyāmatha vā ca tāmrīm /
GP12mtp176pu:8018: paiṣṭīmaśaktaḥ pratimāṃ vidhāya sauvarṇasūryeṇa samaṃ pradadyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:8019: na vittaśāṭhyaṃ puruṣo 'tra kuryāt kurvannadho yāti na saṃśayo 'tra //
GP12mtp176pu:8021: tāvatsa gandharvagaṇair aśeṣaiḥ sampūjyate nārada nākapṛṣṭhe //
GP12mtp176pu:8024: iti paṭhati śṛṇoti vātha bhaktyā vidhimakhilaṃ ravisaṃkramasya puṇyam /
GP12mtp176pu:8025: matimapi ca dadāti so 'pi devair amarapaterbhavane prapūjyate ca //
GP12mtp176pu:8030: āṣāḍhe vā daśamyāṃ tu śuklāyāṃ laghubhuṅnaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8031: kṛtvā sāyantanīṃ saṃdhyāṃ gṛhṇīyānniyamaṃ budhaḥ // MatsP_99.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8033: dvādaśyāṃ dvijasaṃyuktaḥ kariṣye bhojanaṃ vibho // MatsP_99.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8034: tadavighnena me yātu saphalaṃ syācca keśava /
GP12mtp176pu:8035: namo nārāyaṇāyeti vācyaṃ ca svapatā niśi // MatsP_99.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8038: vibhūtaye namaḥ pādāv aśokāya ca jānunī /
GP12mtp176pu:8039: namaḥ śivāyetyūrū ca viśvamūrte namaḥ kaṭim // MatsP_99.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8040: kandarpāya namo meḍhram ādityāya namaḥ karau /
GP12mtp176pu:8043: śrīdharāya mukhaṃ keśān keśavāyeti nārada // MatsP_99.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8046: śiraḥ sarvātmane brahman nama ityabhipūjayet // MatsP_99.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8053: yathā na mucyase deva sadā sarvavibhūtibhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8061: grāmaṃ ca śaktimāndadyāt kṣetraṃ vā bhavanānvitam /
GP12mtp176pu:8065: alpavitto yathāśaktyā stokaṃ stokaṃ samācaret // MatsP_99.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:8071: na ca vyādhirbhavettasya na dāridryaṃ na bandhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:8072: vaiṣṇavo vātha śaivo vā bhavejjanmani janmani // MatsP_99.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8077: nāmnā lokeṣu vikhyātas tejasā sūryasaṃnibhaḥ // MatsP_100.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8079: kamalaṃ kāñcanaṃ dattaṃ yathākāmagamaṃ mune // MatsP_100.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8081: dvīpāni suralokaṃ ca yatheṣṭaṃ vyacarattadā // MatsP_100.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8083: loke ca pūjitaṃ yasmāt puṣkaradvīpamucyate // MatsP_100.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8088: nāmnā ca lāvaṇyavatī babhūva sā pārvatīveṣṭatamā bhavasya // MatsP_100.6
GP12mtp176pu:8091: so 'bhyāgataṃ vīkṣya munipravīraṃ prācetasaṃ vākyamidaṃ babhāṣe //
GP12mtp176pu:8093: bhāryā mamālpatapasā paritoṣitena dattaṃ mamāmbujagṛhaṃ ca munīndra dhātrā // MatsP_100.8
GP12mtp176pu:8095: no lakṣyate kva gatamambaramadhya indus tārāgaṇairiva gataḥ paritaḥ sphuradbhiḥ // MatsP_100.9
GP12mtp176pu:8097: bhagavanmayātha tanayair athavānayāpi bhadraṃ yadetadakhilaṃ kathaya pracetaḥ // MatsP_100.10
GP12mtp176pu:8099: janmābhavattava tu lubdhakule 'tighore jātastvamapyanudinaṃ kila pāpakārī
GP12mtp176pu:8101: na ca te suhṛn na sutabandhujano na tātas tv ādṛksvasā na jananī ca tadābhiśastā // MatsP_100.12
GP12mtp176pu:8102: abhisaṃgatā paramabhīṣṭatamā vimukhī mahīśa tava yoṣidiyam /
GP12mtp176pu:8104: kṣutpīḍitenātha tadā na kiṃcid āsāditaṃ dhānyaphalāmiṣādyam //
GP12mtp176pu:8106: padmānyathādāya tato bahūni gataḥ puraṃ vaidiśanāmadheyam // MatsP_100.14
GP12mtp176pu:8107: tanmaulyalābhāya puraṃ samastaṃ bhrāntaṃ tvayāśeṣam ahas tadāsīt /
GP12mtp176pu:8108: kretā na kaścitkamaleṣu jātaḥ śrānto bhṛśaṃ kṣutparipīḍitaśca //
GP12mtp176pu:8110: atha maṅgalaśabdaśca tvayā rātrau mahāñśrutaḥ // MatsP_100.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8117: tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tatastābhyām idaṃ ca paricintitam /
GP12mtp176pu:8118: kimebhiḥ kamalaiḥ kāryaṃ varaṃ viṣṇuralaṃkṛtaḥ // MatsP_100.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8121: śayyā ca puṣpaprakaraiḥ pūjitā bhūśca sarvataḥ // MatsP_100.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:8126: ānīya vyāhṛtaṃ cātra bhujyatāmiti bhūpate // MatsP_100.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:8127: tābhyāṃ tu tadapi tyaktaṃ bhokṣyāvo vai varānane /
GP12mtp176pu:8132: prabhāte ca tadā dattā śayyā salavaṇācalā // MatsP_100.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:8133: grāmāśca gurave bhaktyā vipreṣu dvādaśaiva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:8137: sa bhavāṃl lubdhako jātaḥ sapatnīko nṛpeśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8140: tasya sattvasya māhātmyād alpena tapasā nṛpa // MatsP_100.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8144: patnī sapatnī saṃjātā ratyāḥ prītiriti śrutā /
GP12mtp176pu:8148: kuru rājendra nirvāṇam avaśyaṃ samavāpsyasi // MatsP_100.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:8150: rājā yathoktaṃ ca punar akarotpuṣpavāhanaḥ // MatsP_100.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:8152: yathākathaṃcit kamalair dvādaśa dvādaśīr mune // MatsP_100.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:8154: na vittaśāṭhyaṃ kurvīta bhaktyā tuṣyati keśavaḥ // MatsP_100.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:8155: iti kaluṣatridāraṇaṃ janānāmapi paṭhatīha śṛṇoti cātha bhaktyā /*
GP12mtp176pu:8156: matimapi ca dadāti devaloke vasati sa koṭiśatāni vatsarāṇām //
GP12mtp176pu:8160: naktamabdaṃ caritvā tu gavā sārdhaṃ kuṭumbine /
GP12mtp176pu:8161: haimaṃ cakraṃ triśūlaṃ ca dadyādviprāya vāsasī // MatsP_101.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8165: dhenuṃ tilamayīṃ dadyāt sa padaṃ yāti śāṃkaram /
GP12mtp176pu:8169: sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yāti līlāvratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8171: bhojanopaskaraṃ dadyāt sa yāti bhavanaṃ hareḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8177: puṣyādau yastrayodaśyāṃ kṛtvā naktaṃ madhau punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8178: aśokaṃ kāñcanaṃ dadyād ikṣuyuktaṃ daśāṅgulam // MatsP_101.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8181: etat kāmavrataṃ nāma sadā śokavināśanam // MatsP_101.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8187: puṣpatrayaṃ ca phālgunyāṃ kṛtvā śaktyā ca kāñcanam // MatsP_101.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8189: dattvā paraṃ padaṃ yāti saumyavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8191: samāpte śayanaṃ dadyād gṛhaṃ copaskarānvitam // MatsP_101.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8201: etat sampadvrataṃ nāma sadā pāpavināśanam // MatsP_101.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8204: janmāyutaṃ sa rājā syāt tataḥ śivapuraṃ vrajet /
GP12mtp176pu:8207: ekabhaktaṃ naraḥ kuryād abdamekaṃ vimatsaraḥ // MatsP_101.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:8211: ghṛtena snapanaṃ kuryāc chambhor vā keśavasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8218: haimaṃ siṃhaṃ ca viprāya dattvā śivapadaṃ vrajet /
GP12mtp176pu:8220: etadvīravrataṃ nāma nārīṇāṃ ca sukhapradam // MatsP_101.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:8222: samānte śrāddhakṛddadyāt pañca gāstu payasvinīḥ // MatsP_101.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:8224: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ lokaṃ pitṝṇāṃ tārayecchatam /
GP12mtp176pu:8225: kalpānte rājarājaḥ syāt pitṛvratam idaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8231: vatsarānte punardadyād dhenuṃ pañcāmṛtena hi // MatsP_101.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:8232: viprāya dadyācchaṅkhaṃ ca sa padaṃ yāti śāṃkaram /
GP12mtp176pu:8233: rājā bhavati kalpānte dhṛtivratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:8241: vipreṣu bhojanaṃ dadyāt kārttikyāṃ goprado bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:8242: sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yāti viṣṇuvratamidaṃ śubham // MatsP_101.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:8244: tadante puṣpadāmāni ghṛtadhenvā sahaiva tu // MatsP_101.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:8248: samānte dīpikāṃ dadyāc cakraśūle ca kāñcane // MatsP_101.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:8249: vastrayugmaṃ ca viprāya tejasvī sa bhavediha /
GP12mtp176pu:8252: naktaṃ caredabdamekam abdānte goprado bhavet // MatsP_101.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:8259: bhūtvā viṣṇupade kalpaṃ sthitvā rājā bhavediha /
GP12mtp176pu:8262: tryahaṃ tilaprado bhūtvā vahniṃ saṃtarpya sadvijam // MatsP_101.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:8268: dinaṃ payovratastiṣṭhet sa yāti paramaṃ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:8272: dattvā brahmapadaṃ yāti kalpavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:8273: māsopavāsī yo dadyād dhenuṃ viprāya śobhanām /
GP12mtp176pu:8274: sa vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ yati bhīmavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:8275: dadyād viṃśatpalādūrdhvaṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā tu kāñcanīm /
GP12mtp176pu:8283: kalpānte rājarājaḥ syāt prabhāvratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:8286: naktāśī cāṣṭamīṣu syād vatsarānte ca dhenudaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8289: ghṛtadhenuprado 'nte ca sa paraṃ brahma gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:8292: samānte vaiṣṇavaṃ haimaṃ sa viṣṇoḥ padamāpnuyāt /
GP12mtp176pu:8293: etat kṛṣṇavrataṃ nāma kalpānte rājyabhāgbhavet // MatsP_101.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:8295: lakṣmīlokamavāpnoti hy etad devīvrataṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:8308: paramaṃ padaṃ prāpnoti viṣṇuvratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:8309: kārttikyāṃ ca vṛṣotsargaṃ kṛtvā naktaṃ samācaret /
GP12mtp176pu:8311: kṛcchrānte gopradaḥ kuryād bhojanaṃ śaktitaḥ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:8312: viprāṇāṃ śāṃkaraṃ yāti prājāpatyamidaṃ vratam // MatsP_101.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:8319: anagnipakkam aśnāti tṛtīyāyāṃ tu yo naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8324: kalpānte rājarājaḥ syād aśvavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:8330: niśi kṛtvā jale vāsaṃ prabhāte goprado bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:8332: cāndrāyaṇaṃ ca yaḥ kuryād dhaimaṃ candraṃ nivedayet /
GP12mtp176pu:8338: māghe niśyārdravāsāḥ syāt saptamyāṃ goprado bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:8339: divi kalpamuṣitveha rājā syātpavanaṃ vratam // MatsP_101.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:8346: kalpānte rājarājaḥ syāt somavratamidaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_101.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:8355: śrotuṃ tavecchā tadudīrayāmi priyeṣu kiṃ vākathanīyam asti // MatsP_101.85
GP12mtp176pu:8357: *nandikeśvara uvāca nairmalyaṃ bhāvaśuddhiśca vinā snānaṃ na vidyate /
GP12mtp176pu:8366: pāhi nas tvenasas tasmād ājanmamaraṇāntikāt // MatsP_102.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8368: divi bhuvyantarikṣe ca tāni te santi jāhnavi // MatsP_102.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8369: nandinītyeva te nāma deveṣu nalinīti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8370: dakṣā pṛthvī ca vihagā viśvakāyāmṛtā śivā // MatsP_102.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8372: kṣemā ca jāhnavī caiva śāntā śāntipradāyinī // MatsP_102.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8377: snānaṃ kuryānmṛdā tadvad āmantrya tu vidhānataḥ // MatsP_102.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8379: mṛttike hara me pāpaṃ yanmayā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam // MatsP_102.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8382: āruhya mama gātrāṇi sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pracodaya // MatsP_102.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:8383: mṛttike dehi naḥ puṣṭiṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12mtp176pu:8385: evaṃ snātvā tataḥ paścād ācamya ca vidhānataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8386: utthāya vāsasī śukle śuddhe tu paridhāya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:8387: tatastu tarpaṇaṃ kuryāt trailokyāpyāyanāya vai // MatsP_102.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8389: krūrāḥ sarpāḥ suparṇāśca taravo jambukāḥ khagāḥ // MatsP_102.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8391: nirādhārāśca ye jīvā ye tu dharmaratāstathā // MatsP_102.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8393: kṛtopavītī devebhyo nivītī ca bhavettataḥ // MatsP_102.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8397: sarve te tṛptimāyāntu maddattenāmbunā sadā // MatsP_102.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8399: pracetasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca bhṛguṃ nāradameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8401: apasavyaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā savyaṃ jānvācya bhūtale /
GP12mtp176pu:8411: saṃtarpya vidhinā bhaktyā imaṃ mantramudīrayet // MatsP_102.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:8413: te tṛptimakhilāṃ yāntu yaś cāsmatto 'bhivāñchati // MatsP_102.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:8423: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ caiva sarvaṃ paśyasi sarvaga /
GP12mtp176pu:8424: satyadeva namaste 'stu prasīda mama bhāskara // MatsP_102.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8426: evaṃ sūryaṃ namaskṛtya triḥ kṛtvātha pradakṣiṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:8427: dvijaṃ gāṃ kāñcanaṃ spṛṣṭvā tato viṣṇugṛhaṃ vrajet // MatsP_102.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:8431: bhārate tu yadā vṛtte prāptarājye pṛthāsute /
GP12mtp176pu:8435: asmānsaṃtāpya bahuśaḥ sarve te nidhanaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8436: vāsudevaṃ samāśritya pañca śeṣāstu pāṇḍavāḥ // MatsP_103.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8437: hatvā bhīṣmaṃ ca droṇaṃ ca karṇaṃ caiva mahābalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8439: rājāno nihatāḥ sarve ye cānye śūramāninaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8440: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogairjīvitena vā // MatsP_103.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8443: labdhasaṃjño yadā rājā cintayansa punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8444: kataro viniyogo vā niyamaṃ tīrthameva ca // MatsP_103.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8446: yatra sthitvā naro yāti viṣṇulokamanuttamam // MatsP_103.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8447: kathaṃ pṛcchāmi vai kṛṣṇaṃ yenedaṃ kārito 'smyaham /
GP12mtp176pu:8448: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ kathaṃ pṛcche yasya putraśataṃ hatam // MatsP_103.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8449: vyāsaṃ kathamahaṃ pṛcche yasya gotrakṣayaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8452: ye ca tatra mahātmānaḥ sametāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8453: kuntī ca draupadī caiva ye ca tatra samāgatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8454: bhūmau nipatitāḥ sarve rudantastu samantataḥ // MatsP_103.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8460: tvāṃ draṣṭukāmo mārkaṇḍeyo dvāri tiṣṭhatyasau muniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8462: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca svāgataṃ te mahābhāga svāgataṃ te mahāmune /
GP12mtp176pu:8463: adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me tāritaṃ kulam // MatsP_103.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8464: adya me pitarastuṣṭās tvayi dṛṣṭe mahāmune /
GP12mtp176pu:8465: adyāhaṃ pūtadeho 'smi yattvayā saha darśanam // MatsP_103.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:8467: yudhiṣṭhiro mahātmā vai pūjayāmāsa taṃ munim // MatsP_103.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8468: tataḥ sa tuṣṭo mārkaṇḍaḥ pūjitaścāha taṃ nṛpam /
GP12mtp176pu:8469: ākhyāhi tvaritaṃ rājan kimarthaṃ ruditaṃ tvayā /
GP12mtp176pu:8470: kena vā viklavībhūtaḥ kā bādhā te kimapriyam // MatsP_103.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8471: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca asmākaṃ caiva yadvṛttaṃ rājyasyārthe mahāmune /
GP12mtp176pu:8474: naiva dṛṣṭaṃ raṇe pāpaṃ yudhyamānasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_103.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:8476: tadevaṃ hṛdayaṃ kṛtvā tasmātpāpaṃ na cintayet // MatsP_103.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:8477: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā praṇamya śirasā munim /
GP12mtp176pu:8479: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca pṛcchāmi tvāṃ mahāprājña nityaṃ trailokyadarśinam /
GP12mtp176pu:8480: kathaya tvaṃ samāsena yena mucyeta kilbiṣāt // MatsP_103.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:8487: mṛtānāṃ kā gatistatra snātānāṃ tatra kiṃ phalam // MatsP_104.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8488: ye vasanti prayāge tu brūhi teṣāṃ ca kiṃ phalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8489: etanme sarvamākhyāhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // MatsP_104.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8490: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca kathayiṣyāmi te vatsa yacchreṣṭhaṃ tatra yatphalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8491: purā hi sarvaviprāṇāṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śrutam // MatsP_104.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8494: etatprajāpateḥ kṣetraṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam // MatsP_104.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8495: tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8496: tato brahmādayo devā rakṣāṃ kurvanti saṃgatāḥ // MatsP_104.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8499: saṃkṣepeṇa pravakṣyāmi prayāgasya tu kīrtanam // MatsP_104.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8501: yamunāṃ rakṣati sadā savitā saptavāhanaḥ // MatsP_104.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8502: prayāgaṃ tu viśeṣeṇa sadā rakṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8503: maṇḍalaṃ rakṣati harir daivataiḥ saha saṃgataḥ // MatsP_104.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8505: sthānaṃ rakṣanti vai devāḥ sarvapāpaharaṃ śubham // MatsP_104.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8511: pañca kuṇḍāni rājendra teṣāṃ madhye tu jāhnavī /
GP12mtp176pu:8512: prayāgasya praveśe tu pāpaṃ naśyati tatkṣaṇāt // MatsP_104.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8514: api duṣkṛtakarmā tu labhate paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_104.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8516: avagāhya ca pītvā tu punātyāsaptamaṃ kulam // MatsP_104.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8524: tapanasya sutā devī triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā /
GP12mtp176pu:8526: tatra saṃnihito nityaṃ sākṣāddevo maheśvaraḥ // MatsP_104.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8527: duṣprāpyaṃ mānuṣaiḥ puṇyaṃ prayāgaṃ tu yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8531: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śṛṇu rājanprayāgasya māhātmyaṃ punareva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:8532: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_105.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8534: sthānamuktaṃ prayāgaṃ tu nākhyeyaṃ tu kadācana // MatsP_105.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8535: vyādhito yadi vā dīno vṛddho vāpi bhavennaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8538: gandharvāpsarasāṃ madhye svarge krīḍati mānavaḥ // MatsP_105.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8543: yāvanna smarate janma tāvatsvarge mahīyate // MatsP_105.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8546: tadeva smarate tīrthaṃ smaraṇāttatra gacchati // MatsP_105.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8551: ṛṣayo munayaḥ siddhās tatra loke sa gacchati // MatsP_105.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8553: modate ṛṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sukṛteneha karmaṇā // MatsP_105.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8556: tataḥ śubhāni karmāṇi cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8563: evaṃ tīrthe na gṛhṇīyāt puṇyeṣvāyataneṣu ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8564: nimitteṣu ca sarveṣu hy apramatto bhaveddvijaḥ // MatsP_105.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8570: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca // MatsP_105.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8571: yāvadromāṇi tasyā goḥ santi gātreṣu sattama /
GP12mtp176pu:8574: na ca paśyati taṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ tena karmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:8577: putrāndārāṃstathā bhṛtyān gaurekā prati tārayet // MatsP_105.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:8580: gaureva rakṣāṃ kurute tasmāddeyā dvijottame // MatsP_105.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:8582: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca yathā yathā prayāgasya māhātmyaṃ kathyate tvayā /
GP12mtp176pu:8583: tathā tathā pramucye 'haṃ sarvapāpairna saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_106.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8585: prayāge yo vidhiḥ proktas tanme brūhi mahāmune // MatsP_106.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8590: narake vasate ghore gavāṃ kroṣṭā hi dāruṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:8591: salilaṃ na ca gṛhṇanti pitarastasya dehinaḥ // MatsP_106.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8593: yathātmanā tathā sarvaṃ dānaṃ vipreṣu dāpayet // MatsP_106.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8595: niṣphalaṃ tasya tatsarvaṃ tasmādyānaṃ vivarjayet // MatsP_106.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8598: na sa paśyati taṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ tena karmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:8602: tena tīrthaphalaṃ caiva vardhate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8607: nirdahanti jagatsarvaṃ vaṭamūlaṃ na dahyate // MatsP_106.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8609: sthīyate tatra vai viṣṇur yajamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // MatsP_106.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8612: tato gaccheta rājendra prayāgaṃ saṃstuvaṃśca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:8613: yatra brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ // MatsP_106.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8617: tathā nāgāḥ suparṇāśca siddhāśca khecarāśca ye // MatsP_106.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:8618: sāgarāḥ saritaḥ śailā nāgā vidyādharāśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:8622: tataḥ puṇyatamaṃ nāsti triṣu lokeṣu bhārata // MatsP_106.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8628: matir utkramaṇīyā te prayāgagamanaṃ prati // MatsP_106.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:8633: na te jīvanti loke 'smiṃs tatra tatra yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8634: ye prayāgaṃ na samprāptās triṣu lokeṣu vañcitāḥ // MatsP_106.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:8635: evaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tattīrthaṃ prayāgaṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:8636: mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ śaśāṅka iva rāhuṇā // MatsP_106.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:8638: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // MatsP_106.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:8639: tatra gatvā ca saṃsthānaṃ mahādevasya viśrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:8643: pūrvapārśve tu gaṅgāyās triṣu lokeṣu bhārata /
GP12mtp176pu:8644: kūpaṃ caiva tu sāmudraṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ ca viśrutam // MatsP_106.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8652: parityajati yaḥ prāṇāñ śṛṇu tasyāpi yatphalam // MatsP_106.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:8654: sevyate pitṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ svargaloke narādhipa // MatsP_106.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:8655: urvaśīṃ tu sadā paśyet svargaloke narottama /
GP12mtp176pu:8658: urvaśīsadṛśīnāṃ tu kanyānāṃ labhate śatam // MatsP_106.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:8662: bhuktvā tu vipulān bhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ bhajate punaḥ // MatsP_106.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:8664: ekaṃ kālaṃ tu bhuñjāno māsaṃ bhūmipatirbhavet // MatsP_106.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:8668: bhuktvā tu vipulānbhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ labhate punaḥ // MatsP_106.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:8676: daśāśvamedhakaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ tatrāparaṃ bhavet // MatsP_106.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:8678: dhanāḍhyo rūpavāndakṣo dātā bhavati dhārmikaḥ // MatsP_106.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:8680: ahiṃsāyāṃ tu yo dharmo gamanādeva tatphalam // MatsP_106.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:8684: siddhakṣetraṃ hi tajjñeyaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // MatsP_106.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:8686: divi tārayate devāṃs tena tripathagā smṛtā // MatsP_106.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:8690: tīrthānāṃ tu paraṃ tīrthaṃ nadīnāṃ tu mahānadī /
GP12mtp176pu:8692: sarvatra sulabhā gaṅgā triṣu sthāneṣu durlabhā /
GP12mtp176pu:8694: tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ // MatsP_106.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:8696: gatim anviṣyamāṇānāṃ nāsti gaṅgāsamā gatiḥ // MatsP_106.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:8697: pavitrāṇāṃ pavitraṃ ca maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8699: kṛte tu naimiṣaṃ kṣetraṃ tretāyāṃ puṣkaraṃ param /
GP12mtp176pu:8700: dvāpare tu kurukṣetraṃ kalau gaṅgā viśiṣyate // MatsP_106.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:8702: nānyatkaliyuge ghore bheṣajaṃ nṛpa vidyate // MatsP_106.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:8704: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śṛṇu rājanprayāgasya māhātmyaṃ punareva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:8705: yacchrutvā sarvapāpebhyo mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_107.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8706: mānasaṃ nāma tattīrthaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare taṭe /
GP12mtp176pu:8709: sa tatphalamavāpnoti tattīrthaṃ smarate punaḥ // MatsP_107.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8710: akāmo vā sakāmo vā gaṅgāyāṃ yo 'bhipadyate /
GP12mtp176pu:8711: mṛtastu labhate svargaṃ narakaṃ ca na paśyati // MatsP_107.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8720: prayāge māghamāse tu tryahasnānāttu tatphalam // MatsP_107.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8726: sa bhuktvā vipulānbhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ smarate punaḥ // MatsP_107.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:8728: rāhugraste tathā some vimuktaḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ // MatsP_107.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8732: paribhraṣṭastu rājendra samṛddhe jāyate kule // MatsP_107.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8736: bhuktvā tu vipulānbhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ bhajate punaḥ // MatsP_107.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8737: yaḥ svadehaṃ tu kartitvā śakunibhyaḥ prayacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:8740: tasmādapi paribhraṣṭo rājā bhavati dhārmikaḥ // MatsP_107.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8742: bhuktvā tu vipulānbhogāṃs tattīrthaṃ bhajate punaḥ // MatsP_107.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8743: yāmune cottare kūle prayāgasya tu dakṣiṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:8744: ṛṇapramocanaṃ nāma tattīrthaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_107.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8749: viśuddhaṃ me 'dya hṛdayaṃ prayāgasya tu kīrtanāt // MatsP_108.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8751: yaṃ ca lokamavāpnoti viśuddhaḥ sarvakilbiṣaiḥ // MatsP_108.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8752: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śṛṇu rājanprayāge tu anāśakaphalaṃ vibho /
GP12mtp176pu:8753: prāpnoti puruṣo dhīmāñ śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ // MatsP_108.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8755: aśvamedhaphalaṃ tasya gacchatastu pade pade // MatsP_108.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8757: mucyate sarvapāpebhyo gacchettu paramaṃ padam // MatsP_108.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8758: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca mahābhāgyaṃ hi dharmasya yattvaṃ vadasi me prabho /
GP12mtp176pu:8761: imaṃ me saṃśayaṃ chinddhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // MatsP_108.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8763: ṛṣīṇāṃ saṃnidhau pūrvaṃ kathyamānaṃ mayā śrutam // MatsP_108.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8765: praviṣṭamātre tadbhūmāv aśvamedhaḥ pade pade // MatsP_108.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8768: evaṃ jñātvā tu rājendra sadā sevāparo bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:8770: na prāpnuvanti tatsthānaṃ prayāgaṃ devarakṣitam // MatsP_108.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:8771: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca snehādvā dravyalobhādvā ye tu kāmavaśaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8772: kathaṃ tīrthaphalaṃ teṣāṃ kathaṃ puṇyaphalaṃ bhavet // MatsP_108.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8774: prayāge kā gatistasya tanme brūhi pitāmaha // MatsP_108.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8776: māsamekaṃ tu yaḥ snāyāt prayāge niyatendriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8777: mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ sa gacchetparamaṃ padam // MatsP_108.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8780: tribhirmāsaiḥ sa mucyeta prayāge tu na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_108.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8783: sthānaṃ ca labhate nityaṃ dhanadhānyasamākulam // MatsP_108.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8784: evaṃ jñānena sampūrṇaḥ sadā bhavati bhogavān /
GP12mtp176pu:8788: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me tāritaṃ kulam /
GP12mtp176pu:8792: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca diṣṭyā te saphalaṃ janma diṣṭyā te tāritaṃ kulam /
GP12mtp176pu:8794: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca yamunāyāṃ tu kiṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ phalaṃ tu mahāmune /
GP12mtp176pu:8796: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca tapanasya sutā devī triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā /
GP12mtp176pu:8797: samākhyātā mahābhāgā yamunā tatra nimnagā // MatsP_108.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:8798: yenaiva niḥsṛtā gaṅgā tenaiva yamunā gatā /
GP12mtp176pu:8800: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca yamunāyāṃ yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8801: kīrtanāllabhate puṇyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadrāṇi paśyati // MatsP_108.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:8802: avagāhya ca pītvā ca punātyāsaptamaṃ kulam /
GP12mtp176pu:8803: prāṇāṃstyajati yastatra sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_108.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:8805: paścime dharmarājasya tīrthaṃ tu narakaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_108.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:8806: tatra snātvā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8809: tīrthaṃ nirañjanaṃ nāma yatra devāḥ savāsavāḥ // MatsP_108.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:8810: upāsate sma saṃdhyāṃ ye trikālaṃ hi yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8811: devāḥ sevanti tattīrthaṃ ye cānye vibudhā janāḥ // MatsP_108.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:8814: teṣu snātvā divaṃ yānti ye mṛtāste 'punarbhavāḥ // MatsP_108.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:8815: gaṅgā ca yamunā caiva ubhe tulyaphale smṛte /
GP12mtp176pu:8816: kevalaṃ jyeṣṭhabhāvena gaṅgā sarvatra pūjyate // MatsP_108.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:8819: yastvimaṃ kalya utthāya paṭhate ca śṛṇoti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8820: mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati // MatsP_108.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:8822: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śrutaṃ me brahmaṇā proktaṃ purāṇe brahmasambhave /
GP12mtp176pu:8823: tīrthānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi śatāni niyutāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8824: sarve puṇyāḥ pavitrāśca gatiśca paramā smṛtā // MatsP_109.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8828: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca pṛthivyāṃ naimiṣaṃ puṇyam antarikṣe ca puṣkaram /
GP12mtp176pu:8832: gatiṃ ca paramāṃ divyāṃ bhogāṃścaiva yathepsitān /
GP12mtp176pu:8834: etanme saṃśayaṃ brūhi yathādṛṣṭaṃ yathāśrutam // MatsP_109.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8835: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca aśraddheyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣamapi yadbhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:8838: ete pātakinaḥ sarve tenedaṃ bhāṣitaṃ tvayā // MatsP_109.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8840: pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣaṃ ca yathānyastaṃ bhaviṣyati // MatsP_109.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8842: śāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ kṛtvā ca yujyate yogamātmanaḥ // MatsP_109.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:8846: yastu sarvāṇi ratnāni brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati // MatsP_109.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:8847: tena dānena dattena yogaṃ nābhyeti mānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8848: prayāge tu mṛtasyedaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati nānyathā // MatsP_109.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8850: yathā sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahma sarvatra dṛśyate // MatsP_109.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8851: brāhmaṇe vāsti yatkiṃcid abrāhmam iti vocyate /
GP12mtp176pu:8852: evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahma sarvatra pūjyate // MatsP_109.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8859: yathā puṇyatamaṃ cāsti tathaiva kathitaṃ mayā // MatsP_109.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:8860: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca śrutaṃ cedaṃ tvayā proktaṃ vismito 'haṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8861: kathaṃ yogena tatprāptiḥ svargavāsastu karmaṇā // MatsP_109.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8862: dātā vai labhate bhogān gāṃ ca yatkarmaṇaḥ phalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8863: tāni karmāṇi pṛcchāmi punastaiḥ prāpyate mahī // MatsP_109.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8865: gāmagniṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śāstraṃ kāñcanaṃ salilaṃ striyaḥ // MatsP_109.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8866: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva ye nindanti narādhamāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8869: gacchanti narakaṃ ghoraṃ ye narāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ // MatsP_109.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:8871: parokṣaṃ harate yastu paścāddānaṃ prayacchati // MatsP_109.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:8872: na te gacchanti vai svargaṃ dātāro yatra bhoginaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8873: anenakarmaṇā yuktāḥ pacyante narake punaḥ // MatsP_109.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:8874: evaṃ yogaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca dātāraṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8875: yathā satyamasatyaṃ vā asti nāstīti yatphalam /
GP12mtp176pu:8876: niruktaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathāha svayamaṃśumān // MatsP_109.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:8878: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śṛṇu rājanprayāgasya māhātmyaṃ punareva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:8879: naimiṣaṃ puṣkaraṃ caiva gotīrthaṃ sindhusāgaram // MatsP_110.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8880: gayā ca caitrakaṃ caiva gaṅgāsāgarameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:8881: ete cānye ca bahavo ye ca puṇyāḥ śiloccayāḥ // MatsP_110.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8884: trīṇi cāpyagnikuṇḍāni yeṣāṃ madhye tu jāhnavī /
GP12mtp176pu:8886: tapanasya sutā devī triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā /
GP12mtp176pu:8887: yamunā gaṅgayā sārdhaṃ saṃgatā lokabhāvinī // MatsP_110.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8889: prayāgaṃ rājaśārdūla kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // MatsP_110.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8891: divi bhuvyantarikṣe ca tatsarvaṃ jāhnavī smṛtā // MatsP_110.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8893: bhogavatyatha yā caiṣā vedireṣā prajāpateḥ // MatsP_110.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8896: yajante kratubhir devās tathā cakradharā nṛpāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8897: tataḥ puṇyatamaṃ nāsti triṣu lokeṣu bhārata // MatsP_110.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:8899: daśa tīrthasahasrāṇi tisraḥ koṭyastathā parāḥ // MatsP_110.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:8904: idaṃ dhanyamidaṃ svargyam idaṃ satyamidaṃ sukham /
GP12mtp176pu:8905: idaṃ puṇyamidaṃ dharmyaṃ pāvanaṃ dharmamuttamam // MatsP_110.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8907: adhītya ca dvijo 'pyetan nirmalaḥ svargamāpnuyāt // MatsP_110.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:8908: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānnityaṃ tīrthaṃ puṇyaṃ sadā śuciḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8909: jātismaratvaṃ labhate nākapṛṣṭhe ca modate // MatsP_110.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:8911: snāhi tīrtheṣu kauravya na ca vakramatirbhava // MatsP_110.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:8912: tvayā ca samyakpṛṣṭena kathitaṃ vai mayā vibho /
GP12mtp176pu:8913: pitarastāritāḥ sarve tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ // MatsP_110.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:8914: vrataṃ dānaṃ tapastīrthaṃ yāgāḥ sarve sadakṣiṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8915: yogāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ sadācāro ye cānye jñānahetavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8916: prayāgasya tu sarve te kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // MatsP_110.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:8917: evaṃ jñānaṃ ca yogaśca tīrthaṃ caiva yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8918: bahukleśena yujyante tena yānti parāṃ gatim /
GP12mtp176pu:8919: trikālaṃ jāyate jñānaṃ svargalokaṃ gamiṣyati // MatsP_110.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8921: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca kathaṃ sarvamidaṃ proktaṃ prayāgasya mahāmune /
GP12mtp176pu:8922: etannaḥ sarvamākhyāhi yathā hi mama tārayet // MatsP_111.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:8923: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca śṛṇu rājanprayāge tu proktaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:8925: brahmā sṛjati bhūtāni sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:8926: tānyetāni paraṃ loke viṣṇuḥ saṃvardhate prajāḥ // MatsP_111.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8927: kalpānte tatsamagraṃ hi rudraḥ saṃharate jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:8928: tadā prayāgatīrthaṃ ca na kadācidvinaśyati // MatsP_111.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8929: īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati /
GP12mtp176pu:8930: yatnenānena tiṣṭhanti te yānti paramāṃ gatim // MatsP_111.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8931: *yudhiṣṭhira uvāca ākhyāhi me yathātathyaṃ yathaiṣā tiṣṭhati śrutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8932: kena vā kāraṇenaiva tiṣṭhante lokasattamāḥ // MatsP_111.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8934: kāraṇaṃ tatpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira // MatsP_111.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8942: yasmiñjuhvansvakaṃ pāpaṃ narakaṃ ca na paśyati /
GP12mtp176pu:8943: evaṃ brahmā ca viṣṇuśca prayāge sa maheśvaraḥ // MatsP_111.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:8946: ye cānye bahavaḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti ca yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8947: yat pṛthivī tatsamāśritya nirmitā daivatais tribhiḥ // MatsP_111.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8949: etatpuṇyaṃ pavitraṃ vai prayāgaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira /
GP12mtp176pu:8950: svarājyaṃ kuru rājendra bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito 'nagha // MatsP_111.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8952: *nandikeśvara uvāca bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvair draupadyā saha bhāryayā /
GP12mtp176pu:8955: pāṇḍavaiḥ sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ pūjyamānastu mādhavaḥ // MatsP_112.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:8957: abhiṣiktaḥ svarājye ca dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // MatsP_112.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:8959: tataḥ svastīti coktvā tu kṣaṇādāśramamāgamat // MatsP_112.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:8961: mahādānaṃ tato dattvā dharmaputro mahāmanāḥ // MatsP_112.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:8962: yastvidaṃ kalya utthāya māhātmyaṃ paṭhate naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8963: prayāgaṃ smarate nityaṃ sa yāti paramaṃ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:8964: mucyate sarvapāpebhyo rudralokaṃ sa gacchati // MatsP_112.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:8965: *vāsudeva uvāca mama vākyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ mahārāja bravīmyaham /
GP12mtp176pu:8966: nityaṃ japasva juhvasva prayāge vigatajvaraḥ // MatsP_112.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:8968: svayaṃ prāpsyasi rājendra svargalokaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_112.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:8976: na hi śakyā daridreṇa yajñāḥ prāptuṃ mahīpate // MatsP_112.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:8978: prāpyante pārthivairetaiḥ samṛddhairvai naraiḥ kvacit // MatsP_112.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:8979: yo daridrairapi vidhiḥ śakyaḥ prāptuṃ nareśvara /
GP12mtp176pu:8980: tulyo yajñaphalaiḥ puṇyais tannibodha yudhiṣṭhira // MatsP_112.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:8987: *nandikeśvara uvāca ityuktvā sa mahābhāgo mārkaṇḍeyo mahātapāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:8992: abhiṣekaṃ tu kṛtvādya kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_112.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:8995: tatra snātvā ca japtvā ca vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:8996: dānaṃ dattvā dvijāgryebhyo gataḥ svabhavanaṃ tadā // MatsP_112.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:8998: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kati dvīpāḥ samudrā vā parvatā vā kati prabho /
GP12mtp176pu:8999: kiyanti caiva varṣāṇi teṣu nadyaśca kāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_113.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9005: na śakyante krameṇeha vaktuṃ vai sakalaṃ jagat // MatsP_113.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9008: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvās tāṃstu tarkeṇa sādhayet /
GP12mtp176pu:9009: prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yacca tadacintyasya lakṣaṇam // MatsP_113.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9026: pūrvataḥ śvetavarṇastu brāhmaṇyaṃ tasya tena vai // MatsP_113.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9029: tenāsya śūdratā siddhā meror nāmārthakarmataḥ // MatsP_113.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9031: tenāsya kṣatrabhāvaḥ syād iti varṇāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_113.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9038: madhye tasya mahāmerur vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9039: vedyardhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ meror uttarārdhaṃ tathottaram // MatsP_113.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9040: varṣāṇi yāni saptātra teṣāṃ vai varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9041: dve dve sahasre vistīrṇā yojanairdakṣiṇottaram // MatsP_113.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9043: nīlaśca niṣadhaścaiva teṣāṃ hīnāśca ye pare // MatsP_113.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9052: teṣāṃ madhye janapadās tāni varṣāṇi sapta vai // MatsP_113.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:9054: sapta tāni nadībhedair agamyāni parasparam // MatsP_113.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:9056: imaṃ haimavataṃ varṣaṃ bhārataṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_113.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:9057: hemakūṭaṃ paraṃ tasmān nāmnā kimpuruṣaṃ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:9060: ilāvṛtātparaṃ nīlaṃ ramyakaṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_113.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:9064: dīrghāṇi tasya catvāri madhyamaṃ tadilāvṛtam // MatsP_113.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:9066: paraṃ tvilāvṛtaṃ paścād vedyardhaṃ tu taduttaram // MatsP_113.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:9068: dakṣiṇena tu nīlasya niṣadhasyottareṇa tu // MatsP_113.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:9075: nānāvarṇaḥ sa pārśveṣu pūrvānte śveta ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:9076: pītaṃ tu dakṣiṇaṃ tasya bhṛṅgipattranibhaṃ param /
GP12mtp176pu:9077: uttaraṃ tasya raktaṃ vai iti varṇasamanvitaḥ // MatsP_113.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:9078: merustu śuśubhe divyo rājavatsa tu veṣṭitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9088: yasyeme caturo deśā nānāpārśveṣu saṃsthitāḥ // MatsP_113.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:9089: bhadrāśvaṃ bhārataṃ caiva ketumālaṃ ca paścime /
GP12mtp176pu:9094: teṣāmupari catvāri sarāṃsi ca vanāni ca // MatsP_113.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:9098: dvātriṃśacca sahasrāṇi yojanaiḥ sarvataḥ samaḥ // MatsP_113.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:9100: tatra kālānalāḥ sarve mahāsattvā mahābalāḥ // MatsP_113.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:9102: tatra divyo mahāvṛkṣaḥ panasaḥ pattrabhāsuraḥ // MatsP_113.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:9104: tasya mālyavataḥ pārśve pūrve pūrvā tu gaṇḍikā /
GP12mtp176pu:9108: tatra te puruṣāḥ śvetā mahāsattvā mahābalāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9113: kālāmrasya rasaṃ pītvā te sarve sthirayauvanāḥ // MatsP_113.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:9115: pūrvaṃ mamānugrahakṛd bhūyaḥ kiṃ varṇayāmi vaḥ // MatsP_113.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:9118: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ pūrvāparau samākhyātau yau deśau tau tvayā mune /
GP12mtp176pu:9119: uttarāṇāṃ ca varṣāṇāṃ parvatānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_113.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:9120: ākhyāhi no yathātathyaṃ ye ca parvatavāsinaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9122: *sūta uvāca śṛṇudhvaṃ yāni varṣāṇi pūrvoktāni ca vai mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:9123: dakṣiṇena tu nīlasya niṣadhasyottareṇa tu // MatsP_113.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:9124: varṣaṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāma jāyante yatra vai prajāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9127: tatrāpi ca mahāvṛkṣo nyagrodho rohiṇo mahān /
GP12mtp176pu:9128: tasyāpi te phalarasaṃ pibanto vartayanti hi // MatsP_113.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:9130: jīvanti te mahābhāgāḥ sadā hṛṣṭā narottamāḥ // MatsP_113.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:9131: uttareṇa tu śvetasya pārśve śṛṅgasya dakṣiṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:9132: varṣaṃ hiraṇvataṃ nāma yatra hairaṇvatī nadī // MatsP_113.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:9136: āyuṣpramāṇaṃ jīvanti śatāni daśa pañca ca // MatsP_113.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:9138: tasya pītvā phalarasaṃ tatra jīvanti mānavāḥ // MatsP_113.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:9139: śṛṅgasāhvasya śṛṅgāṇi trīṇi tāni mahānti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:9140: ekaṃ maṇiyutaṃ tatra ekaṃ tu kanakānvitam /
GP12mtp176pu:9142: uttare cāsya śṛṅgasya samudrānte ca dakṣiṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:9145: vastrāṇi te prasūyante phalaiścābharaṇāni ca // MatsP_113.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:9148: ye rakṣanti sadā kṣīraṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ cāmṛtopamam // MatsP_113.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:9150: sarvatra sukhasaṃsparśā niḥśabdāḥ pavanāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_113.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:9154: teṣāṃ te kṣīriṇāṃ kṣīraṃ pibanti hyamṛtopamam // MatsP_113.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:9156: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca samaṃ caiva mriyanti vai // MatsP_113.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:9160: jīvanti ca mahāsattvā na cānyā strī pravartate // MatsP_113.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:9161: *sūta uvāca evameva nisargo vai varṣāṇāṃ bhārate yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:9162: dṛṣṭaḥ paramadharmajñāḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmi vaḥ // MatsP_113.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:9166: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ yadidaṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ yasmin svāyambhuvādayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9169: uttaraśravaṇaṃ bhūyaḥ prabrūhi vadatāṃ vara // MatsP_114.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9172: buddhyā vicārya bahudhā vimṛśya ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9177: yataḥ svargaśca mokṣaśca madhyamaścāpi hi smṛtaḥ // MatsP_114.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9178: na khalvanyatra martyānāṃ bhūmau karmavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9183: yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ tu dvīpo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇottaraḥ // MatsP_114.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9185: tiryagūrdhvaṃ tu vistīrṇaḥ sahasrāṇi daśaiva tu // MatsP_114.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:9188: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā madhye śūdrāśca bhāgaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9190: teṣāṃ sa vyavahāro 'yaṃ vartanaṃ tu parasparam /
GP12mtp176pu:9195: ya enaṃ jayate kṛtsnaṃ sa samrāḍiti kīrtitaḥ // MatsP_114.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9196: ayaṃ lokastu vai samrāḍ antarikṣajitāṃ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9197: svarāḍasau smṛto lokaḥ punarvakṣyāmi vistarāt // MatsP_114.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9203: anye tebhyaḥ parijñātā hrasvā hrasvopajīvinaḥ // MatsP_114.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:9205: pibanti bahulā nadyo gaṅgā sindhuḥ sarasvatī // MatsP_114.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9207: airāvatī vitastā ca viśālā devikā kuhūḥ // MatsP_114.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9208: gomatī dhautapāpā ca bāhudā ca dṛṣadvatī /
GP12mtp176pu:9209: kauśikī tu tṛtīyā ca niścalā gaṇḍakī tathā // MatsP_114.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9212: parṇāśā narmadā caiva kāverī mahatī tathā // MatsP_114.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:9214: śiprā hyavantī kuntī ca pāriyātrāśritāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_114.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:9216: mandākinī daśārṇā ca citrakūṭā tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9217: tamasā pippalī śyenī tathā citrotpalāpi ca // MatsP_114.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:9218: vimalā cañcalā caiva tathā ca dhūtavāhinī /
GP12mtp176pu:9219: śuktimantī śunī lajjā mukuṭā hrādikāpi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9221: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā kṣiprā ca ṛṣabhā nadī /
GP12mtp176pu:9222: veṇā vaitaraṇī caiva viśvamālā kumudvatī // MatsP_114.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:9223: toyā caiva mahāgaurī durgamā tu śilā tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:9224: vindhyapādaprasūtās tāḥ sarvāḥ śītajalāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_114.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:9226: tuṅgabhadrā suprayogā vāhyā kāverī caiva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:9229: malayaprasūtā nadyas tāḥ sarvāḥ śītajalāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_114.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:9231: tāmraparṇī tathā mūlī śaravā vimalā tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:9234: kṛpā ca pāśinī caiva śuktimantātmajās tu tāḥ // MatsP_114.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:9236: viśvasya mātaraḥ sarvāḥ sarvapāpaharāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_114.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:9240: matsyāḥ kirātāḥ kulyāśca kuntalāḥ kāśikośalāḥ // MatsP_114.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:9244: pṛthivyāmapi kṛtsnāyāṃ sa pradeśo manoramaḥ // MatsP_114.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:9248: tataḥ puṣpavaro deśas tena jajñe manoramaḥ // MatsP_114.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:9264: pāṇḍyāśca keralāścaiva colāḥ kulyāstathaiva ca // MatsP_114.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:9268: pulindā vindhyapuṣikā vaidarbhā daṇḍakaiḥ saha // MatsP_114.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:9274: ityete aparāntāstu śṛṇu ye vindhyavāsinaḥ // MatsP_114.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:9276: auṇḍrā māṣā daśārṇāśca bhojāḥ kiṣkindhakaiḥ saha // MatsP_114.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:9278: tumurās tumbarāścaiva padgamā naiṣadhaiḥ saha // MatsP_114.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:9286: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti caturyugam /
GP12mtp176pu:9287: teṣāṃ nisargaṃ vakṣyāmi upariṣṭācca kṛtsnaśaḥ // MatsP_114.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:9288: *matsya uvāca etacchrutvā tu ṛṣaya uttaraṃ punareva te /
GP12mtp176pu:9290: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ yacca kimpuruṣaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:9291: ācakṣva no yathātattvaṃ kīrtitaṃ bhārataṃ tvayā // MatsP_114.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:9293: dvīpānāṃ vāsināṃ teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ prabravīhi naḥ // MatsP_114.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:9300: varṣe kimpuruṣe puṇye plakṣo madhuvahaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9301: tasya kimpuruṣāḥ sarve pibanto rasamuttamam // MatsP_114.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:9307: harivarṣe narāḥ sarve pibantīkṣurasaṃ śubham // MatsP_114.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:9308: na jarā bādhate tatra tena jīvanti te ciram /
GP12mtp176pu:9311: na tatra sūryastapati na ca jānanti mānavāḥ // MatsP_114.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:9314: padmagandhāśca jāyante tatra sarve ca mānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9317: trayodaśa sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ te narottamāḥ // MatsP_114.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:9318: āyuṣpramāṇaṃ jīvanti ye tu varṣa ilāvṛte /
GP12mtp176pu:9319: merostu dakṣiṇe pārśve niṣadhasyottareṇa vā // MatsP_114.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:9323: yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ ca śatadhā ca mahānpunaḥ // MatsP_114.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:9325: tasya jambūphalaraso nadī bhūtvā prasarpati // MatsP_114.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:9327: taṃ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā jambūrasamilāvṛte // MatsP_114.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:9328: jambūphalarasaṃ pītvā na jarā bādhate 'pi tān /
GP12mtp176pu:9329: na kṣudhā na klamo vāpi na duḥkhaṃ ca tathāvidham // MatsP_114.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:9331: indragopakasaṃkāśaṃ jāyate bhāsuraṃ ca yat // MatsP_114.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:9333: skannaṃ tu kāñcanaṃ śubhraṃ jāyate devabhūṣaṇam // MatsP_114.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:9334: teṣāṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ vā dikṣvaṣṭāsu ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9335: īśvarānugrahādbhūmir mṛtāṃśca grasate tu tān // MatsP_114.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:9337: hemakūṭe tu vijñeyā gandharvāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // MatsP_114.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:9339: mahāmerau trayastriṃśat krīḍante yajñiyāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_114.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:9341: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca śvetaḥ parvata ucyate // MatsP_114.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:9346: aśakyā parisaṃkhyātuṃ śraddheyā ca bubhūṣatā // MatsP_114.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:9348: *manur uvāca caritaṃ budhaputrasya janārdana mayā śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:9350: dhenvāḥ prasūyamānāyāḥ phalaṃ dānasya me śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:9354: kena karmavipākena sa tu rājā purūravāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9355: avāpa tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ saubhāgyamapi cottamam // MatsP_115.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9357: urvaśī saṃmatā tyaktvā sarvabhāvena taṃ nṛpam // MatsP_115.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9358: *matsya uvāca śṛṇu karmavipākena yena rājā purūravāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9359: avāpa tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ saubhāgyamapi cottamam // MatsP_115.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9360: atīte janmani purā yo 'yaṃ rājā purūravāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9361: purūravā iti khyāto madradeśādhipo hi saḥ // MatsP_115.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9363: sa vai nṛpaguṇairyuktaḥ kevalaṃ rūpavarjitaḥ // MatsP_115.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9364: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ purūravā madrapatiḥ karmaṇā kena pārthivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9365: babhūva karmaṇā kena rūpavāṃścaiva sūtaja // MatsP_115.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9367: nadyāḥ kūle mahārājaḥ pūrvajanmani pārthivaḥ // MatsP_115.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:9368: sa tu madrapatī rājā yastu nāmnā purūravāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9369: tasmiñjanmanyasau vipro dvādaśyāṃ tu sadānagha // MatsP_115.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9375: varjanīyaṃ prayatnena rūpaghnaṃ tatparaṃ nṛpa // MatsP_115.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:9379: janānurāgo naivāsīd rūpahīnasya tasya vai // MatsP_115.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9381: rājyaṃ mantrigataṃ kṛtvā jagāma himaparvatam // MatsP_115.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:9383: draṣṭuṃ sa tīrthasadanaṃ viṣayānte svake nadīm // MatsP_115.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9388: *sūta uvāca sa dadarśa nadīṃ puṇyāṃ divyāṃ haimavatīṃ śubhām /
GP12mtp176pu:9389: gandharvaiśca samākīrṇāṃ nityaṃ śakreṇa sevitām // MatsP_116.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9395: sābhiṣiktāmiva satāṃ paśyanprītiṃ parāṃ yayau // MatsP_116.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9420: saṃyutaṃ salilaṃ tasyāḥ ṣaṭpadair upasevyate // MatsP_116.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9423: yasyāstīre ratiṃ yānti sadā kāmavaśā mṛgāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9424: tapovanāśca ṛṣayas tathā devāḥ sahāpsarāḥ // MatsP_116.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9430: sa tāṃ paśyanyayau rājā satāmīpsitakāmadām // MatsP_116.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9433: yā sadā vividhairviprair devaiścāpi niṣevyate // MatsP_116.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9434: yā ca sadā sakalaughavināśaṃ bhaktajanasya karotyacireṇa /
GP12mtp176pu:9435: yānugatā saritāṃ hi kadambair yānugatā satataṃ hi munīndraiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:9436: yā hi sutāniva pāti manuṣyān yā ca yutā satataṃ himasaṃghaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9437: yā ca yutā satataṃ suravṛndair yā ca janaiḥ svahitāya śritā vai //
GP12mtp176pu:9438: prayuktā ca kesarigaṇaiḥ karivṛndajuṣṭā saṃtānayuktasalilāpi suvarṇayuktā
GP12mtp176pu:9442: sa gacchanneva dadṛśe himavantaṃ mahāgirim // MatsP_117.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9444: pakṣiṇāmapi saṃcārair vinā siddhagatiṃ śubhām // MatsP_117.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9448: meghottarīyakaṃ śailaṃ dadṛśe sa narādhipaḥ // MatsP_117.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9455: darīmukhaiḥ kvacidbhīmaiḥ pibantaṃ salilaṃ mahat // MatsP_117.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9457: upagītaṃ tathā mukhyaiḥ kiṃnarāṇāṃ gaṇaiḥ kvacit // MatsP_117.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:9463: kvacic ca kusumairyuktam atyantaruciraṃ śubham // MatsP_117.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9467: dṛśyate na ca saṃśrāntaṃ gajānāmākulaṃ kulam // MatsP_117.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9471: ahīnaḥ paśyati girim ahīnaṃ ratnasampadā // MatsP_117.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9472: alpena tapasā yatra siddhiṃ prāpsyanti tāpasāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9482: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ cārunitambabhūmiṃ mahānubhāvaḥ sa tu madranāthaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9483: babhrāma tatraiva mudā sametaḥ sthānaṃ tadā kiṃcidathāsasāda //
GP12mtp176pu:9486: agamyaṃ mānuṣair anyair daivayogād upāgataḥ // MatsP_118.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:9488: meghaśyāmaṃ ca taṃ deśaṃ drumakhaṇḍairanekaśaḥ // MatsP_118.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9492: bhūrjaiḥ samuñjakair bāṇair vṛkṣaiḥ saptacchadadrumaiḥ // MatsP_118.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9520: bandhūkaiśca subandhūkaiḥ kuñjakānāṃ tu jātibhiḥ // MatsP_118.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:9535: pratānaiḥ pippalīnāṃ ca nāgavalyaśca bhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_118.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:9539: kūṣmāṇḍānāṃ pratānaiśca alābūnāṃ tathā kvacit // MatsP_118.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:9543: kahlāraiśca vidāryā ca rurūṭaiḥ svādukaṇṭakaiḥ // MatsP_118.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:9565: jalajaiśca tathā vaṇair nānāvarṇaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ // MatsP_118.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:9576: na taddhānyaṃ na tatsasyaṃ na tacchākaṃ na tatphalam /
GP12mtp176pu:9577: na tanmūlaṃ na tatkandaṃ na tatpuṣpaṃ narādhipa // MatsP_118.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:9579: anūpotthaṃ vanotthaṃ ca tatra yannāsti pārthivaḥ // MatsP_118.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:9581: madreśvaraḥ sa dadṛśe tapasā hyatiyogataḥ // MatsP_118.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:9582: dadṛśe ca tathā tatra nānārūpān patatriṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9593: bhṛṅgarājān sīrapādān bhūliṅgān ḍiṇḍimān navān // MatsP_118.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:9601: tathā mattāṃśca mātaṃgān mahiṣān gavayān vṛṣān /
GP12mtp176pu:9610: taccāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ babhūvātreḥ purā nṛpam // MatsP_118.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:9612: hiṃsanti hi na cānyonyaṃ hiṃsakāstu parasparam // MatsP_118.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:9616: payaḥ kṣaranti te divyam amṛtasvādukaṇṭakam // MatsP_118.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:9618: śilāḥ kṣīreṇa sampūrṇā dadhnā cānyatra vā bahiḥ // MatsP_118.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:9620: sarāṃsi tatra divyāni nadyaśca vimalodakāḥ // MatsP_118.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:9622: kandarāṇi ca śailasya susevyāni pade pade // MatsP_118.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:9624: upatyakā suśailasya śikharasya na vidyate // MatsP_118.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:9626: himapātaṃ ghanā yatra kurvanti sahitāḥ sadā // MatsP_118.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:9627: tatrāsti cāparaṃ śṛṅgaṃ yatra toyaghanā ghanāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9636: śailavāṭaiḥ parivṛtam agamyaṃ manujaiḥ sadā // MatsP_118.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:9640: kṛtaṃ svayaṃ ruciramathātriṇā śubhaṃ śubhāvahaṃ ca hi dadṛśe sa madrarāṭ
GP12mtp176pu:9642: *sūta uvāca tatra yau tau mahāśṛṅgau mahāvarṇau mahāhimau /
GP12mtp176pu:9645: tasyādhastādvṛkṣagaṇe diśāṃ bhāge ca paścime // MatsP_119.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9647: dṛṣṭvaiva kautukāviṣṭas taṃ viveśa mahīpatiḥ // MatsP_119.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:9651: na tatra sūryastapati na virājati candramāḥ // MatsP_119.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9659: pattrair marakatair nīlair vaiḍūryasya mahīpate // MatsP_119.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9661: tasminsarasi yā bhūmir na sā vajrasamākulā // MatsP_119.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:9663: kapardikānāṃ śuktīnāṃ śaṅkhānāṃ ca mahīpate // MatsP_119.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9664: makarāṇāṃ ca matsyānāṃ caṇḍānāṃ kacchapaiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:9665: tatra marakatakhaṇḍāni vajrāṇāṃ ca sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_119.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:9667: puṣparāgāṇi sarvāṇi tathā karkoṭakāni ca // MatsP_119.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9668: tutthakasya tu khaṇḍāni tathā śeṣasya bhāgaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9671: jyotīrasasya ramyasya syamantasya ca bhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_119.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9675: vajrasyaiva ca mukhyasya tathā brahmamaṇerapi // MatsP_119.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:9678: vaiḍūryasya śilā madhye sarasastasya śobhanā // MatsP_119.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:9679: pramāṇena tathā sā ca dve ca rājandhanuḥśate /
GP12mtp176pu:9680: caturasrā tathā ramyā tapasā nirmitātriṇā // MatsP_119.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:9682: pradeśaḥ sa tu rājendra dvīpe tasminmanohare // MatsP_119.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:9686: tasyāstadudakaṃ svādu laghu śītaṃ sugandhikam // MatsP_119.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:9687: na kṣiṇoti yathā kaṇṭhaṃ kukṣiṃ nāpūrayatyapi /
GP12mtp176pu:9688: tṛptiṃ vidhatte paramāṃ śarīre ca mahatsukham // MatsP_119.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:9689: madhye tu tasyāḥ prāsādaṃ nirmitaṃ tapasātriṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:9702: ekaṃ vai devadevasya dvitīyaṃ tu prasāritam // MatsP_119.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:9705: tṛtīyaṃ tu bhujaṃ tasya caturthaṃ tu tathā śṛṇu /
GP12mtp176pu:9716: tataḥ sammukham udvīkṣya vavande sa narādhipaḥ // MatsP_119.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:9717: jānubhyāṃ śirasā caiva gatvā bhūmiṃ yathāvidhi /
GP12mtp176pu:9718: nāmnāṃ sahasreṇa tadā tuṣṭāva madhusūdanam // MatsP_119.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:9719: pradakṣiṇamatho cakre sa tūtthāya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9729: na tasya glānimāyāti śarīraṃ ca tadadbhutam // MatsP_119.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:9730: evaṃ sa rājā tapasi prasaktaḥ sampūjayandevavaraṃ sadaiva /
GP12mtp176pu:9731: tatrāśrame kālamuvāsa kaṃcit svargopame duḥkham avindamānaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:9735: kṛtvā puṣpoccayaṃ bhūri granthayitvā tathā srajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9736: agraṃ nivedya devāya gandharvebhyastadā dadau // MatsP_120.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9738: ceṣṭā nānāvidhākārāḥ paśyannapi na paśyati // MatsP_120.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:9745: kācid uccīya puṣpāṇi dadau kāntasya bhāminī /
GP12mtp176pu:9750: kācidevaṃ raho nītā ramaṇena riraṃsunā // MatsP_120.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9762: channā kācic cirātprāptā kāntenānviṣya yatnataḥ // MatsP_120.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9766: dhārayantī janaṃ cakre kācit tatra samanmatham // MatsP_120.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:9770: saṃbhrāntā kāntaśaraṇaṃ magnā kācidgatā ciram // MatsP_120.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:9776: pūjyamānaṃ ca dadṛśe devadevaṃ janārdanam // MatsP_120.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9777: kvacic ca dadṛśe rājā latāgṛhagatāḥ striyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9780: śṛṇvatī kāntavacanam adhikā tu tathā babhau // MatsP_120.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:9788: pītvā papraccha ramaṇaṃ kva gate te mamotpale // MatsP_120.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:9789: tvayaiva pītau tau nūnam ityuktā ramaṇena sā /
GP12mtp176pu:9790: tathā viditvā mugdhatvād babhūva vrīḍitā bhṛśam // MatsP_120.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:9801: evam apsarasāṃ paśyan krīḍitāni sa parvate /
GP12mtp176pu:9805: vayaṃ hi te pradāsyāmo manasaḥ kāṅkṣitānvarān /
GP12mtp176pu:9806: tānādāya gṛhaṃ gaccha tiṣṭheha yadi vā punaḥ // MatsP_120.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:9811: tatrovāsa sukhī māsaṃ pūjayāno janārdanam // MatsP_120.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:9813: tutoṣa sa jano rājñas tasyālaulyena karmaṇā // MatsP_120.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:9814: māsasya madhye sa nṛpaḥ praviṣṭastadāśramaṃ ratnasahasracitram /*
GP12mtp176pu:9815: toyāśanastatra hyuvāsa māsaṃ yāvatsitānto nṛpa phālgunasya // MatsP_120.41
GP12mtp176pu:9821: pratyūṣakāle vidhivat snātaḥ sa prayatendriyaḥ // MatsP_120.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:9823: dadarśātriṃ muniṃ rājā pratyakṣaṃ tapasāṃ nidhim // MatsP_120.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:9825: tataḥ śuśrāva vacanaṃ devatānāṃ samīritam // MatsP_120.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:9833: madhye himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe kailāso nāma parvataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9834: tasminnivasati śrīmān kuberaḥ saha guhyakaiḥ // MatsP_121.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:9838: tasmāt pravahate divyā nadī mandākinī śubhā // MatsP_121.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:9839: divyaṃ ca nandanaṃ tatra tasyāstīre mahadvanam /
GP12mtp176pu:9840: prāguttareṇa kailāsād divyaṃ saugandhikaṃ girim // MatsP_121.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:9842: candraprabho nāma giriḥ yaḥ śubhro ratnasaṃnibhaḥ // MatsP_121.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:9843: tatsamīpe saro divyam acchodaṃ nāma viśrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:9844: tasmātprabhavate divyā nadī hyacchodakā śubhā // MatsP_121.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:9848: puṇyā mandākinī nāma nadī hyacchodakā śubhā // MatsP_121.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:9850: kailāsadakṣiṇe prācyāṃ śivaṃ sarvauṣadhiṃ girim // MatsP_121.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:9852: lohito hemaśṛṅgastu giriḥ sūryaprabho mahān // MatsP_121.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:9854: tasmātprabhavate puṇyo lauhityaśca nado mahān // MatsP_121.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:9855: divyāraṇyaṃ viśokaṃ ca tasya tīre mahadvanam /
GP12mtp176pu:9856: tasmingirau nivasati yakṣo maṇidharo vaśī // MatsP_121.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:9860: tadañjanaṃ traikakudaṃ śailaṃ trikakudaṃ prati // MatsP_121.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:9862: tasya pāde mahaddivyaṃ mānasaṃ siddhasevitam // MatsP_121.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:9864: yasyāstīre vanaṃ divyaṃ vaibhrājaṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_121.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:9874: tasya pādātprabhavati śailodaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ // MatsP_121.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:9876: sā cakṣusī tayormadhye praviṣṭā paścimodadhim // MatsP_121.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:9878: gauraṃ tu parvataśreṣṭhaṃ haritālamayaṃ prati // MatsP_121.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:9880: tasya pāde mahaddivyaṃ saraḥ kāñcanavālukam // MatsP_121.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:9881: ramyaṃ bindusaro nāma yatra rājā bhagīrathaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9882: gaṅgārthe sa tu rājarṣir uvāsa bahulāḥ samāḥ // MatsP_121.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:9884: tatra tripathagā devī prathamaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitā // MatsP_121.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:9887: tatreṣṭvā kratubhiḥ siddhaḥ śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:9888: divyaśchāyāpathas tatra nakṣatrāṇāṃ tu maṇḍalam // MatsP_121.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:9889: dṛśyate bhāsurā rātrau devī tripathagā tu sā /
GP12mtp176pu:9890: antarikṣaṃ divaṃ caiva bhāvayitvā bhuvaṃ gatā // MatsP_121.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:9892: tasyā ye bindavaḥ kecit kruddhāyāḥ patitā bhuvi // MatsP_121.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:9893: kṛtaṃ tu tairbahusaras tato bindusaraḥ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:9894: tatastasyā niruddhāyā bhavena sahasā ruṣā // MatsP_121.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:9896: bhittvā viśāmi pātālaṃ srotasā gṛhya śaṃkaram // MatsP_121.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:9897: athāvalepaṃ taṃ jñātvā tasyāḥ kruddhastu śaṃkaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9898: tirobhāvayituṃ buddhir āsīdaṅgeṣu tāṃ nadīm // MatsP_121.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:9902: buddhvā'sya varadānaṃ tu tataḥ kopaṃ nyayacchata // MatsP_121.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:9904: tato visarjayāmāsa saṃruddhāṃ svena tejasā // MatsP_121.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:9906: tato visarjayāmāsa sapta srotāṃsi gaṅgayā // MatsP_121.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:9909: nalinī hlādinī caiva pāvanī caiva prācyagā /
GP12mtp176pu:9910: sītā cakṣuśca sindhuśca tisrastā vai pratīcyagāḥ // MatsP_121.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:9912: tasmādbhāgīrathī sā vai praviṣṭā dakṣiṇodadhim // MatsP_121.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:9913: sapta caitāḥ plāvayanti varṣaṃ tu himasāhvayam /
GP12mtp176pu:9914: prasūtāḥ sapta nadyastu śubhā bindusarodbhavāḥ // MatsP_121.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:9918: kṛtvā dvidhā himavantaṃ praviṣṭā dakṣiṇodadhim // MatsP_121.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:9932: tataḥ pratihatā vindhye praviṣṭā dakṣiṇodadhim // MatsP_121.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:9938: sā maṇḍale samudrasya tīre bhūtvā tu sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_121.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:9939: tatastu nalinī cāpi prācīmeva diśaṃ yayau /
GP12mtp176pu:9944: tatastu pāvanī prāyāt prācīmāśāṃ javena tu // MatsP_121.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:9946: pūrvāndeśāṃśca sevantī bhittvā sā bahudhā girim /
GP12mtp176pu:9949: śaimimaṇḍalakoṣṭhaṃ tu sā praviṣṭā mahatsaraḥ // MatsP_121.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:9951: upagacchanti tā nadyo yato varṣati vāsavaḥ // MatsP_121.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:9957: evameva tu vijñeyā siddhiḥ parvatavāsinām // MatsP_121.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:9959: hemakūṭasya pṛṣṭhe tu sarpāṇāṃ tatsaraḥ smṛtam // MatsP_121.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:9963: yasmādagre prabhavati gandharvānukule ca te // MatsP_121.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:9965: jambūścaiva nadī puṇyā yasyāṃ jāmbūnadaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_121.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:9966: payodastu hrado nīlaḥ sa śubhraḥ puṇḍarīkavān /
GP12mtp176pu:9969: mṛgyā ca mṛgakāntā ca tasmād dve samprasūyatām // MatsP_121.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:9971: nāmnā te vai jayā nāma dvādaśodadhisaṃnibhāḥ // MatsP_121.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:9972: tebhyaḥ śāntī ca madhvī ca dve nadyau samprasūyatām /
GP12mtp176pu:9973: kimpuruṣādyāni yānyaṣṭau teṣu devo na varṣati // MatsP_121.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:9975: balāhakaśca ṛṣabho cakro maināka eva ca // MatsP_121.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:9984: tatra saṃvartako nāma so 'gniḥ pibati tajjalam /
GP12mtp176pu:9987: chidyamāneṣu pakṣeṣu purā indrasya vai bhayāt // MatsP_121.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:9988: teṣāṃ tu dṛśyate candre śukle kṛṣṇe samāplutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:9989: te bhāratasya varṣasya bhedā yena prakīrtitāḥ // MatsP_121.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:9993: samanvitāni bhūtāni teṣu varṣeṣu bhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_121.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:9994: vasanti nānājātīni teṣu sarveṣu tāni vai /
GP12mtp176pu:9998: kathyamānaṃ nibodha tvaṃ śākaṃ dvīpaṃ dvijottamāḥ // MatsP_122.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:10002: tatra puṇyā janapadāś cirācca mriyate janaḥ // MatsP_122.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:10004: tatrāpi parvatāḥ śubhrāḥ saptaiva maṇibhūṣitāḥ // MatsP_122.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:10005: śākadvīpādiṣu tveṣu sapta sapta nagās triṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:10010: śākadvīpe tu vakṣyāmi sapta divyānmahācalān // MatsP_122.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:10012: prāgāyataḥ sa sauvarṇa udayo nāma parvataḥ // MatsP_122.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10020: yatra śyāmatvamāpannāḥ prajāḥ pūrvamimāḥ kila // MatsP_122.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:10022: śabdamṛtyuḥ purā tasmin dundubhistāḍitaḥ suraiḥ // MatsP_122.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:10024: tasyāpareṇa rajato mahānasto giriḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_122.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:10025: sa vai somaka ityukto devairyatrāmṛtaṃ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:10026: saṃbhṛtaṃ ca hṛtaṃ caiva māturarthe garutmatā // MatsP_122.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10032: saiveha keśavetyukto yato vāyuḥ pravāti ca // MatsP_122.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:10037: nāmnā gatabhayaṃ nāma varṣaṃ tatprathamaṃ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:10040: nāradasya ca kaumāraṃ tadeva ca sukhodayam // MatsP_122.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10042: ānandakamiti proktaṃ tadeva munibhiḥ śubham // MatsP_122.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:10049: jambūdvīpena saṃkhyātaṃ tasya madhye vanaspatiḥ // MatsP_122.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:10051: eteṣu devagandharvāḥ siddhāśca saha cāraṇaiḥ // MatsP_122.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:10052: viharanti ramante ca dṛśyamānāśca taiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:10055: dvināmnā caiva tāḥ sarvā gaṅgāḥ saptavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_122.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10057: munitaptā ca nāmnaiṣā nadī samparikīrtitā // MatsP_122.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10059: nandā ca pāvanī caiva tṛtīyā parikīrtitā // MatsP_122.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:10060: śibikā ca caturthī syād dvividhā ca punaḥ smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:10061: ikṣuśca pañcamī jñeyā tathaiva ca punaḥ kuhūḥ // MatsP_122.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:10063: sukṛtā ca gabhastī ca saptamī parikīrtitā // MatsP_122.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:10066: abhigacchanti tāścānyā nadā nadyaḥ sarāṃsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10068: tāsāṃ tu nāmadheyāni parimāṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10069: na śakyaṃ parisaṃkhyātuṃ puṇyāstāḥ sariduttamāḥ // MatsP_122.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:10070: tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadīrjanapadāstu te /
GP12mtp176pu:10071: ete śāntabhayāḥ proktāḥ pramodā ye ca vai śivāḥ // MatsP_122.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10075: avasarpiṇī na teṣvasti tathaivotsarpiṇī punaḥ // MatsP_122.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:10077: tretāyugasamaḥ kālas tathā tatra pravartate // MatsP_122.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:10079: deśasya tu vicāreṇa kālaḥ svābhāvikaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_122.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:10080: na teṣu saṃkaraḥ kaścid varṇāśramakṛtaḥ kvacit /
GP12mtp176pu:10082: na teṣu māyā lobho vā īrṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ kutaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10083: viparyayo na teṣvasti tadvai svābhāvikaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_122.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10084: kālo naiva ca teṣvasti na daṇḍo na ca dāṇḍikaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10085: svadharmeṇa ca dharmajñās te rakṣanti parasparam // MatsP_122.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:10094: atha tṛtīyaṃ vakṣyāmi kuśadvīpaṃ ca kṛtsnaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10097: tatrāpi parvatāḥ sapta vijñeyā ratnayonayaḥ // MatsP_122.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:10098: ratnākarāstathā nadyas teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu /
GP12mtp176pu:10099: dvināmānaśca te sarve śākadvīpe yathā tathā // MatsP_122.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:10101: vidrumoccaya ityuktaḥ sa eva ca mahīdharaḥ // MatsP_122.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:10103: dvitīyaḥ parvatastatra unnato nāma viśrutaḥ // MatsP_122.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:10104: hemaparvata ityuktaḥ sa eva ca mahīdharaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10107: dyutimānnāmataḥ proktaḥ sa eva ca mahīdharaḥ // MatsP_122.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:10111: kaṅkastu pañcamasteṣāṃ parvato nāma sāravān // MatsP_122.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10112: kuśeśaya iti proktaḥ punaḥ sa pṛthivīdharaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10115: sa eva tu punaḥ prokto harirityabhiviśrutaḥ // MatsP_122.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:10117: saptamaḥ parvatastatra kakudmānsa hi bhāṣate // MatsP_122.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10119: manda ityeṣa yo dhātur apāmarthe prakāśakaḥ // MatsP_122.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:10121: tatra ratnānyanekāni svayaṃ rakṣati vāsavaḥ // MatsP_122.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:10125: teṣāṃ varṣāṇi vakṣyāmi saptaiva tu vibhāgaśaḥ // MatsP_122.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:10126: kumudasya smṛtaḥ śveta unnataśceva sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10127: unnatasya tu vijñeyaṃ varṣaṃ lohitasaṃjñakam // MatsP_122.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:10130: droṇasya harikaṃ nāma lavaṇaṃ ca punaḥ smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:10131: kaṅkasyāpi kakun nāma dhṛtimaccaiva tatsmṛtam // MatsP_122.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:10133: kakudminastu tadvarṣaṃ kapilaṃ nāma viśrutam // MatsP_122.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:10136: tatrāpi nadyaḥ saptaiva prativarṣaṃ hi tāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10137: dvināmavatyastāḥ sarvāḥ sarvāḥ puṇyajalāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_122.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:10138: dhūtapāpā nadī nāma yoniścaiva punaḥ smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:10139: sītā dvitīyā vijñeyā sā caiva hi niśā smṛtā // MatsP_122.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:10140: pavitrā tṛtīyā vijñeyā vitṛṣṇāpi ca yā punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10141: caturthī hlādinītyuktā candrabhā iti ca smṛtā // MatsP_122.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:10142: vidyucca pañcamī proktā śuklā caiva vibhāvyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10143: puṇḍrā ṣaṣṭhī tu vijñeyā punaścaiva vibhāvarī // MatsP_122.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:10144: mahatī saptamī proktā punaścaiṣā dhṛtiḥ smṛtā /
GP12mtp176pu:10146: abhigacchanti tā nadyo yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10147: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vaḥ kuśadvīpasya varṇitaḥ // MatsP_122.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:10152: tataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi krauñcadvīpaṃ yathā tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:10165: krauñcasya kuśalo deśo vāmanasya manonugaḥ // MatsP_122.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:10171: śrutāstatraiva nadyastu prativarṣaṃ gatāḥ śubhāḥ // MatsP_122.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:10173: khyātī ca puṇḍarīkā ca gaṅgā saptavidhā smṛtā // MatsP_122.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:10175: abhigacchanti tā nadyo bahulāśca bahūdakāḥ // MatsP_122.89 //
GP12mtp176pu:10177: na śakyo vistarādvaktum api varṣaśatairapi // MatsP_122.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:10178: sargo yaśca prajānāṃ tu saṃhāro yaśca teṣu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:10179: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi śālmalasya nibodhata // MatsP_122.91 //
GP12mtp176pu:10181: parivārya samudraṃ tu dadhimaṇḍodakaṃ sthitaḥ // MatsP_122.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:10182: tatra puṇyā janapadāś cirācca mriyate janaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10183: kuta eva tu durbhikṣaṃ kṣamātejoyutā hi te // MatsP_122.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:10185: pītastu madhyamaścāsīt tataḥ kumbhamayo giriḥ // MatsP_122.94 //
GP12mtp176pu:10188: sumahānrohito nāma divyo girivaro hi saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10189: sumanāḥ kuśalo deśaḥ sukhodarkaḥ sukhodayaḥ // MatsP_122.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:10191: tatra ratnānyanekāni svayaṃ rakṣati vāsavaḥ // MatsP_122.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:10193: na tatra meghā varṣanti śītoṣṇaṃ ca na tadvidham // MatsP_122.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:10194: varṇāśramāṇāṃ vārttā vā triṣu dvīpeṣu vidyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10195: na graho na ca candro 'sti īrṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ tathā // MatsP_122.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:10197: bhojanaṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ tatra teṣāṃ svayamupasthitam // MatsP_122.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:10198: adhamottamaṃ na teṣvasti na lobho na parigrahaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10201: sukhamāyuśca rūpaṃ ca dharmaiśvaryaṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_122.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:10203: vyākhyātaḥ śālmalāntānāṃ dvīpānāṃ tu vidhiḥ śubhaḥ // MatsP_122.103 //
GP12mtp176pu:10207: *sūta uvāca gomedakaṃ pravakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhaṃ dvīpaṃ tapodhanāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10210: tasmindvīpe tu vijñeyau parvatau dvau samāhitau // MatsP_123.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:10218: dhātakinaḥ smṛtaṃ tadvai prathamaṃ prathamasya tu // MatsP_123.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:10219: gomedaṃ yatsmṛtaṃ varṣaṃ nāmnā sarvasukhaṃ tu tat /
GP12mtp176pu:10220: kumudasya dvitīyasya dvitīyaṃ kumudaṃ tataḥ // MatsP_123.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:10221: etau dvau parvatau vṛttau śeṣau sarvasamucchritau /
GP12mtp176pu:10222: pūrveṇa tasya dvīpasya sumanāḥ parvataḥ sthitaḥ // MatsP_123.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10224: paścārdhe kumudastasya evameva sthitastu vai // MatsP_123.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10225: etaiḥ parvatapādaistu sa deśo vai dvidhākṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10228: etau janapadau dvau tu gomedasya tu vistṛtau // MatsP_123.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:10230: samudrekṣurasaṃ caiva gomedāddviguṇaṃ hi saḥ // MatsP_123.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:10234: dvīpasyaiva tu pūrvārdhe citrasānuḥ sthito mahān // MatsP_123.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:10236: ūrdhvaṃ sa vai caturviṃśad-yojanānāṃ mahābalaḥ // MatsP_123.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10238: sthito velāsamīpe tu pūrvacandra ivoditaḥ // MatsP_123.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:10240: tasya putro mahāvītaḥ paścimārdhasya rakṣitā // MatsP_123.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10241: pūrvārdhe parvatasyāpi dvidhā deśastu sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10247: sukhamāyuśca rūpaṃ ca triṣu dvīpeṣu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10248: adhamottamau na teṣvāstāṃ tulyāste vīryarūpataḥ // MatsP_123.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:10249: na tatra vadhyavadhakau nerṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:10250: na lobho na ca dambho vā na ca dveṣaḥ parigrahaḥ // MatsP_123.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10251: satyānṛte na teṣvāstāṃ dharmādharmau tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10252: varṇāśramāṇāṃ vārttā ca pāśupālyaṃ vaṇikkṛṣiḥ // MatsP_123.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:10253: trayīvidyā daṇḍanītiḥ śuśrūṣā daṇḍa eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10254: na tatra varṣaṃ nadyo vā śītoṣṇaṃ ca na vidyate // MatsP_123.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10256: tulyottarakurūṇāṃ tu kālastatra tu sarvadā // MatsP_123.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:10258: sargastu dhātakīkhaṇḍe mahāvīte tathaiva ca // MatsP_123.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:10262: apāṃ caiva samudrekāt samudra iti saṃjñitaḥ // MatsP_123.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:10264: ṛṣiratyeva ramaṇe varṣantvetena teṣu vai // MatsP_123.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10265: udayatīndau pūrve tu samudraḥ pūryate sadā /
GP12mtp176pu:10266: prakṣīyamāne bahule kṣīyate 'stamite ca vai // MatsP_123.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10268: tato vai kṣīyamāṇe tu svātmanyeva hy apāṃ kṣayaḥ // MatsP_123.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:10269: udayātpayasāṃ yogāt puṣpanty āpo yathā svayam /
GP12mtp176pu:10270: tathā sa tu samudro 'pi vardhate śaśinodaye // MatsP_123.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:10274: daśottarāṇi pañcāhur aṅgulānāṃ śatāni ca // MatsP_123.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:10275: apāṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ samudrāṇāṃ tu parvasu /
GP12mtp176pu:10276: dvirāpatvāt smṛto dvīpo dadhanāccodadhiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_123.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:10278: śākadvīpe tu vai śākaḥ parvatastena cocyate // MatsP_123.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:10280: krauñcadvīpe giriḥ krauñcas tasya nāmnā nigadyate // MatsP_123.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10282: gomedake tu gomedaḥ parvatastena cocyate // MatsP_123.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:10285: tasminsa vasati brahmā sādhyaiḥ sārdhaṃ prajāpatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10289: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu prajānāṃ kramaśastu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:10290: ārjavādbrahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca // MatsP_123.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:10292: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu yathoktaṃ varṣakeṣu ca // MatsP_123.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10295: ṣaḍrasaṃ tanmahāvīryaṃ tatra te bhuñjate janāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10304: adbhyo daśaguṇaścāgniḥ sarvato dhārayaty apaḥ // MatsP_123.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:10306: tiryakca maṇḍalo vāyur bhūtānyāveṣṭya dhārayan // MatsP_123.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:10310: mahattattvaṃ hyanantena avyaktena tu dhāryate // MatsP_123.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:10314: evaṃ parasparotpannā dhāryante ca parasparam // MatsP_123.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:10318: bhūtebhyaḥ paratas tebhyo hy alokaḥ sarvataḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_123.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:10320: pātre mahati pātrāṇi yathā hyantargatāni ca // MatsP_123.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10326: pratyākhyāyeha bhūtāni kāryotpattir na vidyate // MatsP_123.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10343: acirāttu prakāśena avanāttu raviḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_124.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:10351: ataḥ pṛthivyā vakṣyāmi pramāṇaṃ yojanaiḥ punaḥ // MatsP_124.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10355: abhimānino hyatītā ye tulyāste sāmprataistviha // MatsP_124.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:10361: merormadhye pratidiśaṃ koṭirekā tu sā smṛtā // MatsP_124.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:10365: tisraḥ koṭyastu vistārāt saṃkhyātāstu caturdiśam // MatsP_124.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10367: saptadvīpasamudrāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ sa tu vistaraḥ // MatsP_124.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:10369: gaṇitaṃ yojanānāṃ tu koṭyastvekādaśa smṛtāḥ // MatsP_124.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10375: meroḥ prācyāṃ diśāyāṃ tu mānasottaramūrdhani // MatsP_124.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:10377: dakṣiṇena punarmeror mānasasya tu pṛṣṭhataḥ // MatsP_124.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:10379: pratīcyāṃ tu punarmeror mānasasya tu mūrdhani // MatsP_124.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10380: suṣā nāma purī ramyā varuṇasyāpi dhīmataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10393: suṣāyāmatha vāruṇyām uttiṣṭhansa tu dṛśyate // MatsP_124.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10395: suṣāyāmatha vāruṇyāṃ madhyāhne tu raviryadā // MatsP_124.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10401: evaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu dakṣiṇānteṣu sarpati // MatsP_124.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:10403: pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇe ca dvau dvau devālayau tu saḥ // MatsP_124.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:10404: patatyekaṃ tu madhyāhne bhābhireva ca raśmibhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10405: udito vardhamānābhir madhyāhne tapate raviḥ // MatsP_124.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:10406: ataḥ paraṃ hrasantībhir gobhirastaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:10407: udayāstamayābhyāṃ ca smṛte pūrvāpare tu vai // MatsP_124.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:10409: yatrodayastu dṛśyeta teṣāṃ sa udayaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_124.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10410: praṇāśaṃ gacchate yatra teṣāmastaḥ sa ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10413: śrayante raśmayo yasmāt tena rātrau na dṛśyate // MatsP_124.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:10415: evaṃ puṣkaramadhye tu yadā bhavati bhāskaraḥ // MatsP_124.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:10416: triṃśadbhāgaṃ ca medinyā muhūrtena sa gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:10417: yojanānāṃ sahasrasya imāṃ saṃkhyāṃ nibodhata // MatsP_124.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:10421: etena kramayogeṇa yadā kāṣṭhāṃ tu dakṣiṇām // MatsP_124.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10425: sarvato dakṣiṇasyāṃ tu kāṣṭhāyāṃ tannibodhata // MatsP_124.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:10427: tathā śatasahasrāṇi catvāriṃśacca pañca ca // MatsP_124.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:10435: gomedasya paradvīpe uttarāṃ ca diśaṃ caran // MatsP_124.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:10436: uttarāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ tu kāṣṭhāyā maṇḍalasya tu /
