GP12mtp176pu:10440: nāgavīthyuttarā vīthī hy ajavīthis tu dakṣiṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:10441: ubhe āṣāḍhamūlaṃ tu ajavīthyādayas trayaḥ // MatsP_124.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:10443: aśvinī kṛttikā yāmyā nāgavīthyas trayaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_124.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:10445: puṣyāśleṣā punarvasvor vīthī cairāvatī smṛtā // MatsP_124.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:10446: tisrastu vīthayo hyetā uttaro mārga ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10447: pūrvottarā ca phalgunyau maghā caivārṣabhī bhavet // MatsP_124.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:10449: śravaṇaṃ ca dhaniṣṭhā ca vāruṇaṃ ca jaradgavam // MatsP_124.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10450: etāstu vīthayas tisro madhyamo mārga ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10451: hastaścitrā tathā svātī hy ajavīthiriti smṛtā // MatsP_124.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:10452: jyeṣṭhā viśākhā maitraṃ ca mṛgavīthī tathocyate /
GP12mtp176pu:10453: mūlaṃ pūrvottarāṣāḍhe vīthī vaiśvānarī bhavet // MatsP_124.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:10454: smṛtāstisrastu vīthyastā mārge vai dakṣiṇe punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10455: kāṣṭhayorantaraṃ caitad vakṣyate yojanaiḥ punaḥ // MatsP_124.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10457: śatāni trīṇi cānyāni trayastriṃśattathaiva ca // MatsP_124.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:10467: abhyantaraṃ sa paryeti kramate maṇḍalāni tu // MatsP_124.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:10469: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśa cāṣṭau tathā smṛtam // MatsP_124.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:10471: viṣkambho maṇḍalasyaiva tiryaksa tu vidhīyate // MatsP_124.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:10472: ahastu carate nābheḥ sūryo vai maṇḍalaṃ kramāt /
GP12mtp176pu:10475: tasmātprakṛṣṭāṃ bhūmiṃ tu kālenālpena gacchati // MatsP_124.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:10481: tasmāddīrgheṇa kālena bhūmiṃ so 'lpāṃ prasarpati // MatsP_124.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:10483: trayodaśānāṃ madhye tu ṛkṣāṇāṃ carate raviḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10485: tato mandataraṃ tābhyāṃ cakraṃ tu bhramate punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10486: mṛtpiṇḍa iva madhyastho bhramate 'sau dhruvastathā // MatsP_124.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:10488: ubhayoḥ kāṣṭhayormadhye bhramate maṇḍalāni tu // MatsP_124.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:10490: tasyaiva tu punarnaktaṃ śīghrā sūryasya vai gatiḥ // MatsP_124.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:10492: gatiḥ sūryasya vai naktaṃ mandā cāpi vidhīyate // MatsP_124.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:10498: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśordhvaṃ cocchrito giriḥ // MatsP_124.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:10504: lokālokau tu saṃdhatte yasmātsūryaḥ paribhraman // MatsP_124.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:10506: uṣā rātriḥ smṛtā viprair vyuṣṭiścāpi ahaḥ smṛtam // MatsP_124.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:10507: triṃśatkalo muhūrtastu ahaste daśa pañca ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10508: hrāso vṛddhiraharbhāgair divasānāṃ yathā tu vai // MatsP_124.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:10511: prātaḥ smṛtastataḥ kālo bhāgāṃścāhuśca pañca ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10515: traya eva muhūrtāstu kāla eṣa smṛto budhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10516: aparāhṇavyatītācca kālaḥ sāyaṃ sa ucyate // MatsP_124.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:10517: daśa pañca muhūrtāhno muhūrtās traya eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10518: daśapañcamuhūrtaṃ vai ahastu viṣuve smṛtam // MatsP_124.91 //
GP12mtp176pu:10520: ahastu grasate rātriṃ rātristu grasate ahaḥ // MatsP_124.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:10522: ālokāntaḥ smṛto loko lokāccāloka ucyate // MatsP_124.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:10532: lokasya saṃtānakarāḥ pitṛyāne pathi sthitāḥ // MatsP_124.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:10534: prārabhante lokakāmās teṣāṃ panthāḥ sa dakṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_124.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:10535: calitaṃ te punardharmaṃ sthāpayanti yuge yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:10536: saṃtaptatapasā caiva maryādābhiḥ śrutena ca // MatsP_124.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:10537: jāyamānāstu pūrve vai paścimānāṃ gṛheṣu te /
GP12mtp176pu:10542: kriyāvatāṃ prasaṃkhyaiṣā ye śmaśānāni bhejire // MatsP_124.103 //
GP12mtp176pu:10546: ityetaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ siddhāḥ śmaśānānīha bhejire // MatsP_124.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:10548: saṃtatiṃ te jugupsante tasmānmṛtyurjitastu taiḥ // MatsP_124.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:10554: ityetaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ śuddhais te 'mṛtatvaṃ hi bhejire // MatsP_124.109 //
GP12mtp176pu:10560: etadviṣṇupadaṃ divyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ vyomni bhāsvaram // MatsP_124.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:10561: yatra gatvā na śocanti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GP12mtp176pu:10562: dharme dhruvasya tiṣṭhanti ye tu lokasya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_124.113 //
GP12mtp176pu:10565: sūryācandramasoś cāraṃ grahāṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_125.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:10567: avyūhenaiva sarvāṇi tathā cāsaṃkareṇa vā // MatsP_125.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:10568: kaśca bhrāmayate tāni bhramanti yadi vā svayam /
GP12mtp176pu:10569: etadveditum icchāmas tato nigada sattama // MatsP_125.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:10570: *sūta uvāca bhūtasaṃmohanaṃ hyetad bruvato me nibodhata /
GP12mtp176pu:10571: pratyakṣamapi dṛśyaṃ tat saṃmohayati vai prajāḥ // MatsP_125.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:10576: dhruvasya manasā yo vai bhramate jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10577: vātānīkamayair bandhair dhruve baddhaḥ prasarpati // MatsP_125.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:10578: teṣāṃ bhedaśca yogaśca tathā kālasya niścayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10581: jīmūtā nāma te meghā yadebhyo jīvasambhavaḥ // MatsP_125.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10585: puṣkarāvartakā nāma ye meghāḥ pakṣasambhavāḥ // MatsP_125.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:10594: yasmin brahmā samutpannaś caturvaktraḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10597: teṣāṃ śreṣṭhaśca parjanyaś catvāraścaiva diggajāḥ // MatsP_125.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10598: gajānāṃ parvatānāṃ ca meghānāṃ bhogibhiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:10599: kulamekaṃ dvidhā bhūtaṃ yonirekā jalaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_125.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:10605: tasyā vispanditaṃ toyaṃ diggajāḥ pṛthubhiḥ karaiḥ // MatsP_125.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:10606: śīkarān sampramuñcanti nīhāra iti sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10607: dakṣiṇena giriryo 'sau hemakūṭa iti smṛtaḥ // MatsP_125.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10611: tato himavato vāyur himaṃ tatra samudbhavam // MatsP_125.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10614: ibhāsye ca tataḥ paścād idaṃ bhūtavivṛddhaye /
GP12mtp176pu:10617: sūrya eva tu vṛṣṭīnāṃ sraṣṭā samupadiśyate // MatsP_125.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:10618: varṣaṃ gharmaṃ himaṃ rātriṃ saṃdhye caiva dinaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:10621: sarvabhūtaśarīreṣu tv āpo hyanuśritāśca yāḥ // MatsP_125.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10623: dhūmabhūtāstu tā hyāpo niṣkrāmantīha sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_125.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10631: vāyubhiḥ stanitaṃ caiva vidyutastvagnijāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_125.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:10632: mehanācca miher dhātor meghatvaṃ vyañjayanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10633: na bhraśyante tato hyāpas tasmādabhrasya vai sthitiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10641: cakreṇa bhāsvatā sūryaḥ syandanena prasarpiṇā // MatsP_125.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:10643: dviguṇā ca rathopasthād īṣādaṇḍaḥ pramāṇataḥ // MatsP_125.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:10644: sa tasya brahmaṇā sṛṣṭo ratho hyarthavaśena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:10645: asaṅgaḥ kāñcano divyo yuktaḥ pavanagairhayaiḥ // MatsP_125.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:10647: vāruṇasya rathasyeha lakṣaṇaiḥ sadṛśaśca saḥ // MatsP_125.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:10649: athāṅgāni tu sūryasya pratyaṅgāni rathasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10652: arāḥ saṃvatsarāstasya nemyaḥ ṣaḍṛtavaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_125.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10655: tasya kāṣṭhā smṛtā ghoṇā dantapaṅktiḥ kṣaṇāstu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:10656: nimeṣaścānukarṣo 'sya īṣā cāsya kalā smṛtā // MatsP_125.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:10660: paṅktiśca bṛhatī caiva uṣṇigeva tu saptamam // MatsP_125.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:10661: cakramakṣe nibaddhaṃ tu dhruve cākṣaḥ samarpitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10662: sahacakro bhramatyakṣaḥ sahākṣo bhramati dhruvaḥ // MatsP_125.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:10665: tathā saṃyogabhāgena siddho vai bhāskaro rathaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10666: tenāsau taraṇirdevo nabhasaḥ sarpate divam // MatsP_125.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:10667: yugākṣakoṭī te tasya dakṣiṇe syandanasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:10668: bhramato bhramato raśmī tau cakrayugayostu vai // MatsP_125.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:10671: yugākṣakoṭī te tasya vātormī syandanasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:10674: vardhete dakṣiṇeṣvatra bhramato maṇḍalāni tu // MatsP_125.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:10676: dhruveṇa pragṛhītau tau rathau yau vanato ravim // MatsP_125.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:10677: ākṛṣyete yadā te tu dhruveṇa samadhiṣṭhite /
GP12mtp176pu:10678: tadā so 'bhyantare sūryo bhramate maṇḍalāni tu // MatsP_125.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:10680: dhruveṇa mucyamānena punā raśmiyugena ca // MatsP_125.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10681: tathaiva bāhyataḥ sūryo bhramate maṇḍalāni tu /
GP12mtp176pu:10682: udveṣṭayanvai vegena maṇḍalāni tu gacchati // MatsP_125.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:10684: *sūta uvāca sa ratho 'dhiṣṭhito devair māsi māsi yathākramam /
GP12mtp176pu:10685: tato vahatyathādityaṃ bahubhir ṛṣibhiḥ saha // MatsP_126.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:10687: ete vasanti vai sūrye māsau dvau dvau krameṇa ca // MatsP_126.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:10691: kṛtasthalāpsarāścaiva yā ca sā puñjikasthalā // MatsP_126.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:10693: rakṣo hetiḥ prahetiśca yātudhānāvubhau ṛtau // MatsP_126.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:10695: vasangrīṣme tu dvau māsau mitraśca varuṇaśca vai // MatsP_126.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:10697: menakā sahajanyā ca hāhā hūhūśca gāyakau // MatsP_126.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:10699: puruṣādo vadhaścaiva yātudhānau tu tau smṛtau // MatsP_126.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10700: ete vasanti vai sūrye māsayoḥ śuciśukrayoḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10701: tataḥ sūrye punaścānyā nivasanti sma devatāḥ // MatsP_126.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10705: pramlocetyapsarāścaiva nimrocantī ca te ubhe // MatsP_126.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:10708: māsau dvau devatāḥ sūrye vasanti ca śaradṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:10709: parjanyaścaiva pūṣā ca bharadvājaḥ sagautamaḥ // MatsP_126.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:10710: citrasenaśca gandharvas tathā vā suruciśca yaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10711: viśvācī ca ghṛtācī ca ubhe te puṇyalakṣaṇe // MatsP_126.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:10713: senajicca suṣeṇaśca senānīr grāmaṇīs tathā // MatsP_126.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10715: vasantyete ca vai sūrye māsayośca tviṣorjayoḥ // MatsP_126.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:10716: haimantikau ca dvau māsau nivasanti divākare /
GP12mtp176pu:10717: aṃśo bhagaśca dvāvetau kaśyapaśca kratuśca tau // MatsP_126.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10720: apsarāḥ pūrvacittiśca gandharvā hyurvaśī ca yā /
GP12mtp176pu:10721: tārkṣyaścāriṣṭanemiśca senānīr grāmaṇīś ca tau // MatsP_126.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:10722: vidyutsūryaśca tāvugrau yātudhānau tu tau smṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:10723: sahe caiva sahasye ca vasantyete divākare // MatsP_126.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:10731: ityete nivasanti sma dvau dvau māsau divākare // MatsP_126.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10737: sarpāḥ sarpanti vai sūrye yātudhānānuyānti ca // MatsP_126.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:10741: tathā tapatyasau sūryas teṣāmiddhastu tejasā // MatsP_126.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10743: mānavānāṃ śubhairhyetair hriyate duritaṃ tu vai // MatsP_126.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10745: ete sahaiva sūryeṇa bhramanti sānugā divi // MatsP_126.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:10747: gopāyanti sma bhūtāni īhante hyanukampayā // MatsP_126.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:10749: atītānāgatānāṃ ca vartante sāmprataṃ ca ye // MatsP_126.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:10750: evaṃ vasanti vai sūrye saptakāste caturdaśa /
GP12mtp176pu:10751: caturdaśeṣu vartante gaṇā manvantareṣu vai // MatsP_126.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:10752: grīṣme hime ca varṣāsu muñcamānā yathākramam /
GP12mtp176pu:10753: dharmaṃ himaṃ ca varṣaṃ ca yathākramamaharniśam // MatsP_126.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:10754: gacchatyasāvanudinaṃ parivṛtya raśmīn devānpitṝṃśca manujāṃśca sutarpayanvai /
GP12mtp176pu:10755: śukle ca kṛṣṇe tadahaḥkrameṇa kālakṣaye caiva surāḥ pibanti //
GP12mtp176pu:10756: māsena taccāmṛtamasya mṛṣṭaṃ suvṛṣṭaye raśmiṣu rakṣitaṃ tu /
GP12mtp176pu:10757: sarve 'mṛtaṃ tatpitaraḥ pibanti devāśca saumyāśca tathaiva kāvyāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:10758: sūryeṇa gobhirhi vivardhitābhir adbhiḥ punaścaiva samucchritābhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10759: vṛṣṭyābhivṛṣṭābhir athauṣadhībhir martyā athānnena kṣudhaṃ jayanti //
GP12mtp176pu:10760: tṛptiśca tenārdhamāsaṃ surāṇāṃ māsaṃ sudhābhiḥ svadhayā pitṝṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:10761: annena jīvantyaniśaṃ manuṣyāḥ sūryaḥ śritaṃ taddhi bibharti gobhiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:10764: harir haridbhir hriyate turaṃgamaiḥ pibatyathāpo haribhiḥ sahasradhā /
GP12mtp176pu:10765: punaḥ pramuñcatyatha tāśca yo hariḥ sa muhyamāno haribhisturaṃgamaiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:10773: āvṛto vālakhilyaiśca bhramate rātryahāni tu // MatsP_126.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:10777: vīthyāśrayāṇi carati nakṣatrāṇi tathā śaśī // MatsP_126.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:10786: ajaśca tripathaścaiva vṛṣo vājī naro hayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10789: evaṃ candramasaṃ devaṃ vahanti smāyugakṣayam // MatsP_126.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:10790: devaiḥ parivṛtaḥ somaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha gacchati /
GP12mtp176pu:10791: somasya śuklapakṣādau bhāskare parataḥ sthite // MatsP_126.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:10792: āpūryate paro bhāgaḥ somasya tu ahaḥkramāt /
GP12mtp176pu:10793: tataḥ pītakṣayaṃ somaṃ yupagadvyāpayan raviḥ // MatsP_126.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:10797: tasmāddhrasanti vai kṛṣṇe śukle hyāpyāyayanti ca // MatsP_126.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:10803: pibantyambumayaṃ devā madhu saumyaṃ tathāmṛtam // MatsP_126.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:10809: trayaśca triṃśatā sārdhaṃ trayastriṃśacchatāni tu // MatsP_126.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:10811: ityevaṃ pīyamānasya kṛṣṇe vardhanti tāḥ kalāḥ // MatsP_126.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:10812: kṣīyante ca tāḥ śuklāḥ kṛṣṇā hyāpyāyayanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10818: pibanti dvikalaṃ kālaṃ śiṣṭāstāstu kalāstu yāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10821: saumyā barhiṣadaścaiva agniṣvāttāśca ye smṛtāḥ // MatsP_126.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:10822: kāvyāścaiva tu ye proktāḥ pitaraḥ sarva eva te /
GP12mtp176pu:10823: saṃvatsarāśca ye kāvyāḥ pañcābdā vai dvijāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_126.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:10826: pitṛbhiḥ pīyamānāyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ tu vai kalām /
GP12mtp176pu:10827: yāvacca kṣīyate tasmād bhāgaḥ pañcadaśastu saḥ // MatsP_126.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:10828: amāvāsyāṃ tathā tasya antarā pūryate paraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10829: vṛddhikṣayau vai pakṣādau ṣoḍaśyāṃ śaśinaḥ mṛtau /
GP12mtp176pu:10830: evaṃ sūryanimitte te kṣayavṛddhī niśākare // MatsP_126.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:10832: *sūta uvāca tārāgrahāṇāṃ vakṣyāmi svarbhānostu rathaṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10833: atha tejomayaḥ śubhraḥ somaputrasya vai rathaḥ // MatsP_127.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:10835: śvetaḥ piśaṅgaḥ sāraṅgo nīlaḥ śyāmo vilohitaḥ // MatsP_127.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:10842: gaurāśvena tu raukmeṇa syandanena visarpati // MatsP_127.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:10844: abdaṃ vasati yo rāśau svadiśaṃ tena gacchati // MatsP_127.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:10848: kārṣṇāyasaṃ samāruhya syandanaṃ yātyasau śaniḥ // MatsP_127.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10850: rathaṃ tamomayaṃ tasya vahanti sma sudaṃśitāḥ // MatsP_127.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10855: ete vāhā grahāṇāṃ vai mayā proktā rathaiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:10856: sarve dhruve nibaddhāste nibaddhā vātaraśmibhiḥ // MatsP_127.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:10857: ete vai bhrāmyamāṇāste yathāyogaṃ vahanti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:10860: yāvattamanuparyeti dhruvaṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ // MatsP_127.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:10863: tasmādyāni pragṛhyante vyomni devagṛhā iti // MatsP_127.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:10865: sarvā dhruvanibaddhāstā bhramantyo bhrāmayanti ca // MatsP_127.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:10866: tailapīḍaṃ yathā cakraṃ bhramate bhrāmayanti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:10867: tathā bhramanti jyotīṃṣi vātabaddhāni sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_127.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10869: yasmātpravahate tāni pravahastena sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_127.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:10870: evaṃ dhruve niyukto 'sau bhramate jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10871: eṣa tārāmayaḥ proktaḥ śiśumāre dhruvo divi // MatsP_127.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:10872: yadahnā kurute pāpaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā niśi muñcati /
GP12mtp176pu:10879: varuṇaścāryamā caiva paścime tasya sakthinī // MatsP_127.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:10881: pucche 'gniśca mahendraśca marīciḥ kaśyapo dhruvaḥ // MatsP_127.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10882: eṣa tārāmayaḥ stambho nāstameti na vodayam /
GP12mtp176pu:10887: āgnīdhrakāśyapānāṃ tu teṣāṃ sa paramo dhruvaḥ // MatsP_127.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:10893: kathaṃ devagṛhāṇi syuḥ punarjyotīṃṣi varṇaya // MatsP_128.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:10897: avyākṛtamidaṃ tvāsīn naiśena tamasā vṛtam // MatsP_128.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:10901: jñātvāgniṃ kalpakālādāv apaḥ pṛthvīṃ ca saṃśritā // MatsP_128.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:10903: pācako yastu loke 'smin pārthivaḥ so 'gnirucyate // MatsP_128.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:10904: yaścāsau tapate sūrye śuciragniśca sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10907: kāṣṭhendhanastu nirmathyaḥ so 'dbhiḥ śāmyati pāvakaḥ // MatsP_128.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:10909: yaścāsau maṇḍale śukle nirūṣmā na prakāśate // MatsP_128.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:10910: prabhā saurī tu pādena astaṃ yāti divākare /
GP12mtp176pu:10912: udite tu punaḥ sūrye ūṣmāgnestu samāviśat /
GP12mtp176pu:10913: pādena tejasaścāgnes tasmāt saṃtapate divā // MatsP_128.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:10914: prākāśyaṃ ca tathauṣṇyaṃ ca sauryāgneye tu tejasī /
GP12mtp176pu:10916: uttare caiva bhūmyardhe tathā hyasmiṃstu dakṣiṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:10917: uttiṣṭhati punaḥ sūrye rātrirāviśate hy apaḥ // MatsP_128.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:10919: astaṃ gate punaḥ sūrye aharvai praviśaty apaḥ // MatsP_128.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:10920: tasmānnaktaṃ punaḥ śuklā hy āpo dṛśyanti bhāsurāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10923: yaścāsau tapate sūryaḥ so 'paḥ pibati raśmibhiḥ // MatsP_128.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:10925: ādatte sa tu nāḍīnāṃ sahasreṇa samantataḥ // MatsP_128.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:10934: śuklāśca kakubhaścaiva gāvo viśvasṛtaśca yāḥ // MatsP_128.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:10936: saṃbibhrati hi tāḥ sarvā manuṣyāndevatāḥ pitṝn // MatsP_128.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:10939: vasante caiva grīṣme ca śanaiḥ saṃtapate tribhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10940: varṣāsu ca śaradyevaṃ caturbhiḥ saṃpravarṣati // MatsP_128.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:10941: hemante śiśire caiva himotsargas tribhiḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10942: oṣadhīṣu balaṃ dhatte sudhāṃ ca svadhayā punaḥ // MatsP_128.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:10944: evaṃ raśmisahasraṃ tu sauraṃ lokārthasādhakam // MatsP_128.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:10946: ityevaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śuklaṃ bhāsvaraṃ lokasaṃjñitam // MatsP_128.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:10948: candra ṛkṣagrahāḥ sarve vijñeyāḥ sūryasambhavāḥ // MatsP_128.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:10950: harikeśaḥ purastāttu yo vai nakṣatrayonikṛt // MatsP_128.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:10952: viśvāvasuśca yaḥ paścāc chukrayoniśca sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:10953: saṃvardhanastu yo raśmiḥ sa yonirlohitasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:10954: ṣaṣṭhastu hyaśvabhū raśmir yoniḥ sa hi bṛhaspateḥ // MatsP_128.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:10956: na kṣīyate yatastāni tasmānnakṣatratā smṛtā // MatsP_128.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:10958: kṣetrāṇi teṣāmādatte sūryo nakṣatratā tataḥ // MatsP_128.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:10961: divyānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca vaṃśānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10962: tapanastejaso yogād āditya iti gadyate // MatsP_128.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:10966: śuklatve hyamṛtatve ca śītatve hlādane 'pi ca // MatsP_128.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:10971: tāni devagṛhāṇi syuḥ sthānākhyāni bhavanti hi /
GP12mtp176pu:10972: sauraṃ sūryo 'viśatsthānaṃ saumyaṃ somastathaiva ca // MatsP_128.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:10974: bṛhaspatirbṛhattvaṃ ca lohitaṃ cāpi lohitaḥ // MatsP_128.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:10976: budho 'pi vai budhasthānaṃ bhānuṃ svarbhānureva ca // MatsP_128.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:10978: jyotīṃṣi sukṛtām ete jñeyā devagṛhāstu vai // MatsP_128.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:10980: manvantareṣu sarveṣu devasthānāni tāni vai // MatsP_128.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:10981: abhimānena tiṣṭhanti tāni devāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10982: atītāstu sahātītair bhāvyā bhāvyaiḥ suraiḥ saha // MatsP_128.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:10983: vartante vartamānaiśca suraiḥ sārdhaṃ tu sthāninaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:10984: sūryo devo vivasvāṃśca aṣṭamastvaditeḥ sutaḥ // MatsP_128.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:10988: budho manoharaścaiva śaśiputrastu sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:10990: agnirvikeśyāṃ jajñe tu yuvāsau lohitādhipaḥ // MatsP_128.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:10996: sahasrāṃśutviṣaḥ sthānam ammayaṃ taijasaṃ tathā // MatsP_128.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:10998: śukraḥ ṣoḍaśaraśmistu yastu devo hyapomayaḥ // MatsP_128.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:10999: lohito navaraśmistu sthānamāpyaṃ tu tasya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:11006: maṇḍalaṃ triguṇaṃ cāsya vistāro bhāskarasya tu // MatsP_128.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:11008: triguṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cāsya vaipulyācchaśinaḥ smṛtam // MatsP_128.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:11012: uddhūtya pārthivīṃ chāyāṃ nirmitāṃ maṇḍalākṛtim // MatsP_128.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:11013: brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ sthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu tamomayam /
GP12mtp176pu:11014: ādityātsa tu niṣkramya somaṃ gacchati parvasu // MatsP_128.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:11016: svabhāsā tudate yasmāt svarbhānuriti sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:11018: viṣkambhānmaṇḍalāccaiva yojanānāṃ tu sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_128.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:11025: śatāni pañca catvāri trīṇi dve caikameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11026: sarvopari nisṛṣṭāni maṇḍalāni tu tārakāḥ // MatsP_128.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:11028: upariṣṭāttu ye teṣāṃ grahā ye krūrasāttvikāḥ // MatsP_128.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:11032: yāvanti caiva ṛkṣāṇi koṭyastāvanti tārakāḥ // MatsP_128.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:11034: vistīrṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tasyordhvaṃ carate śaśī // MatsP_128.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:11036: nakṣatrebhyo budhaścordhvaṃ budhāccordhvaṃ tu bhārgavaḥ // MatsP_128.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:11040: saptarṣibhyo dhruvaścordhvaṃ samastaṃ tridivaṃ dhruve // MatsP_128.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:11044: grahāśca candrasūryau ca divi divyena tejasā // MatsP_128.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:11047: samāgame ca bhede ca paśyanti yugapatprajāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11048: parasparaṃ sthitā hyevaṃ yujyante ca parasparam // MatsP_128.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:11049: asaṃkareṇa vijñeyas teṣāṃ yogastu vai budhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11050: ityevaṃ saṃniveśo vai pṛthivyā jyotiṣāṃ ca yaḥ // MatsP_128.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:11052: varṣāṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca ye ca teṣu vasanti vai // MatsP_128.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:11054: āvartaḥ sāntaro madhye saṃkṣiptaśca dhruvāttu sa // MatsP_128.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:11058: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vai sarvasya jyotirātmakaḥ // MatsP_128.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:11060: teṣāṃ śakyaṃ na saṃkhyātuṃ yāthātathyena kenacit /
GP12mtp176pu:11063: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kathaṃ jagāma bhagavān purāritvaṃ maheśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11064: dadāha ca kathaṃ devas tanno vistarato vada // MatsP_129.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11067: devenaikeṣuṇā dagdhaṃ tathā no vada mānada // MatsP_129.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11068: *sūta uvāca śṛṇudhvaṃ tripuraṃ devo yathā dāritavān bhavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11069: mayo nāma mahāmāyo māyānāṃ janako 'suraḥ // MatsP_129.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11070: nirjitaḥ sa tu saṃgrāme tatāpa paramaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11071: tapasyantaṃ tu taṃ viprā daityāvanyāvanugrahāt // MatsP_129.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11073: vidyunmālī ca balavāṃs tārakākhyaśca vīryavān // MatsP_129.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11075: lokā iva yathā mūrtās trayas traya ivāgnayaḥ // MatsP_129.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11077: hemante jalaśayyāsu grīṣme pañcatape tathā // MatsP_129.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:11079: sevānāḥ phalamūlāni puṣpāṇi ca jalāni ca // MatsP_129.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11088: svakaṃ pitāmahaṃ daityās taṃ vai tuṣṭuvureva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11091: varado 'haṃ hi vo vatsās tapastoṣita āgataḥ // MatsP_129.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11095: deva daityāḥ purā devaiḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye // MatsP_129.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:11098: śaraṇaṃ naiva jānīmaḥ śarma vā śaraṇārthinaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11099: so 'haṃ tapaḥprabhāvena tava bhaktyā tathaiva ca // MatsP_129.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11101: tasmiṃśca tripure durge matkṛte kṛtināṃ vara // MatsP_129.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:11103: devapraharaṇānāṃ ca devānāṃ ca prajāpateḥ // MatsP_129.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:11104: alaṅghanīyaṃ bhavatu tripuraṃ yadi te priyam /
GP12mtp176pu:11105: viśvakarmā itīvoktaḥ sa tadā viśvakarmaṇā // MatsP_129.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11109: pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā tadaivaṃ dānavo mayaḥ // MatsP_129.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11112: samaṃ sa saṃyuge hanyād avadhyaṃ śeṣato bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:11113: evamastviti cāpyuktvā mayaṃ devaḥ pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_129.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:11114: svapne labdho yathārtho vai tatraivādarśanaṃ yayau /
GP12mtp176pu:11115: gate pitāmahe daityā gatā mayaraviprabhāḥ // MatsP_129.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:11117: sa mayastu mahābuddhir dānavo vṛṣasattamaḥ // MatsP_129.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11119: kathaṃ nāma bhaveddurgaṃ tanmayā tripuraṃ kṛtam // MatsP_129.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:11120: vatsyate tatpuraṃ divyaṃ matto nānyairna saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11121: yathācaikeṣuṇā tena tatpuraṃ na hi hanyate // MatsP_129.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:11123: vistāro yojanaśatam ekaikasya purasya tu // MatsP_129.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11125: puṣyayogeṇa nirmāṇaṃ purāṇaṃ ca bhaviṣyati // MatsP_129.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:11129: āyasaṃ tu kṣititale rājataṃ tu nabhastale // MatsP_129.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:11135: satārakākhyena mayena guptaṃ svasthaṃ ca guptaṃ taḍinmālināpi /
GP12mtp176pu:11136: ko nāma hantuṃ tripuraṃ samartho muktvā trinetraṃ bhagavantamekam //
GP12mtp176pu:11143: rathyoparathyāḥ sattrikā iha catvara eva ca // MatsP_130.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11145: savaṭāni taḍāgāni hy atra vāpyaḥ sarāṃsi ca // MatsP_130.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11149: mayena tatpuraṃ sṛṣṭaṃ tripuraṃ tviti naḥ śrutam // MatsP_130.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11159: puṣyasaṃyogamātreṇa kālena sa mayaḥ purā // MatsP_130.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11161: yena yena mayo yāti prakurvāṇaḥ puraṃ purāt // MatsP_130.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:11194: babhūva pūrṇaṃ tripuraṃ tathā purā yathāmbaraṃ bhūrijalair jalapradaiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11197: taddurgaṃ durgatāṃ prāpa baddhavairaiḥ surāsuraiḥ // MatsP_131.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11199: mayādiṣṭāni viviśur gṛhāṇi hṛṣitāśca te // MatsP_131.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11205: upatasthuḥ payodābhā ye ca giryupajīvinaḥ // MatsP_131.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11207: tasya tasya mayastatra māyayā vidadhāti saḥ // MatsP_131.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11213: nārībhiḥ satataṃ remur muditāścaiva dānavāḥ // MatsP_131.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:11215: arthe dharme ca kāme ca nidadhuste matīḥ svayam // MatsP_131.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:11217: vrajati sma sukhaṃ kālaḥ svargasthānāṃ yathā tathā // MatsP_131.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11221: arcayanto diteḥ putrās tripurāyatane haram // MatsP_131.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:11225: tripure dānavendrāṇāṃ ramatāṃ śrūyate sadā // MatsP_131.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11229: kaliśca kalahaścaiva tripuraṃ viviśuḥ saha // MatsP_131.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11231: samadhyāsuḥ samaṃ ghorāḥ śarīrāṇi yathāmayāḥ // MatsP_131.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11233: svapne bhayāvahā dṛṣṭā āviśantastu dānavān // MatsP_131.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:11237: āsīnāḥ kāñcanagireḥ śṛṅge toyamuco yathā // MatsP_131.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11241: upaviṣṭā dṛḍhaṃ viddhā dānavā devaśatravaḥ // MatsP_131.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11243: mayo māyāvijanaka ityuvāca sa dānavān // MatsP_131.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11245: niśāmayadhvaṃ svapno 'yaṃ mayā dṛṣṭo bhayāvahaḥ // MatsP_131.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:11249: praviṣṭāḥ sma śarīrāṇi bhūtvā bahuśarīriṇaḥ // MatsP_131.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11251: sagṛhaṃ saha yuṣmābhiḥ sāgarāmbhasi majjitam // MatsP_131.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:11252: ulūkaṃ rucirā nārī nagnārūḍhā kharaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:11253: saha strībhirhasantī ca cumbane pramadā yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:11255: yena sā pramadā nunnā ahaṃ caiva vibodhitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11256: īdṛśī pramadā dṛṣṭā mayā cātibhayāvahā // MatsP_131.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11257: eṣa īdṛśakaḥ svapno dṛṣṭo vai ditinandanāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11258: dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ hi kaṣṭāya asurāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati // MatsP_131.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:11259: yadi vo 'haṃ kṣamo rājā yadidaṃ vettha ceddhitam /
GP12mtp176pu:11260: nibodhadhvaṃ sumanaso na cāsūyitum arhatha // MatsP_131.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:11261: kāmaṃ cerṣyāṃ ca kopaṃ ca asūyāṃ saṃvihāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11262: satye dame ca dharme ca munivāde ca tiṣṭhata // MatsP_131.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:11264: yadi nāmāsya svapnasya hy evaṃ coparamo bhavet // MatsP_131.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:11266: bhaviṣyāṇi ca dṛśyante yato nastripure 'surāḥ // MatsP_131.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:11270: krodherṣyāvasthayā yuktā dṛśyante ca vināśagāḥ // MatsP_131.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:11274: hitvā satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca akāryāṇyupacakramuḥ // MatsP_131.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:11275: dviṣanti brāhmaṇānpuṇyān na cārcanti hi devatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11276: guruṃ caiva na manyante hy anyonyaṃ cāpi cukrudhuḥ // MatsP_131.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:11277: kalaheṣu ca sajjante svadharmeṣu hasanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11278: parasparaṃ ca nindanti ahamityeva vādinaḥ // MatsP_131.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:11282: bhakṣayanti ca śeranta ucchiṣṭāḥ saṃvṛtāstathā // MatsP_131.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:11286: bhāryāṃ gatvā na śudhyanti rahovṛttiṣu nistrapāḥ // MatsP_131.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:11291: vaibhrājaṃ nandanaṃ caiva tathā caitrarathaṃ vanam /
GP12mtp176pu:11292: aśokaṃ ca varāśokaṃ sarvartukamathāpi ca // MatsP_131.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:11302: ādityā vasavaḥ sādhyāḥ pitaro marutāṃ gaṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11309: dānavānāṃ bhayāttadvad bhramāmo hi pitāmaha // MatsP_132.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11313: dānavairlomamohāndhaiḥ kriyante ca bhramanti ca // MatsP_132.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11314: yadi na trāyase lokaṃ dānavairvidrutaṃ drutam /
GP12mtp176pu:11317: pratyāha tridaśān sendrān indutulyānanaḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_132.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:11318: bhayasya yo varo datto mayā matimatāṃ varāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11319: tasyānta eṣa samprāpto yaḥ purokto mayā surāḥ // MatsP_132.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11322: bhavatāṃ ca na paśyāmi kamapyatra surarṣabhāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11323: yastu caikaprahāreṇa puraṃ hanyāt sadānavam // MatsP_132.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:11324: tripuraṃ nālpavīryeṇa śakyaṃ hantuṃ śareṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11325: ekaṃ muktvā mahādevaṃ maheśānaṃ prajāpatim // MatsP_132.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11326: te yūyaṃ yadi anye ca kratuvidhvaṃsakaṃ haram /
GP12mtp176pu:11327: yācāmaḥ sahitā devaṃ tripuraṃ sa haniṣyati // MatsP_132.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11328: kṛtaḥ purāṇāṃ viṣkambho yojamānāṃ śataṃ śatam /
GP12mtp176pu:11329: yathā caikaprahāreṇa hanyate vai bhavena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:11330: puṣyayogeṇa yuktāni tāni caikakṣaṇena tu // MatsP_132.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:11331: tato devaiśca samprokto yāsyāma iti duḥkhitaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11334: paśyanti comayā sārdhaṃ nandinā ca mahātmanā // MatsP_132.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11338: āgamya tamajaṃ devam atha taṃ nīlalohitam /
GP12mtp176pu:11340: *devā ūcuḥ namo bhavāya śarvāya rudrāya varadāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11341: paśūnāṃ pataye nityam ugrāya ca kapardine // MatsP_132.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11358: prajāpatimuvācedaṃ devānāṃ kva bhayaṃ mahat // MatsP_133.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11359: bho devāḥ svāgataṃ vo 'stu brūta yadvo manogatam /
GP12mtp176pu:11360: tāvadeva prayacchāmi nāstyadeyaṃ mayā hi vaḥ // MatsP_133.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11361: yuṣmākaṃ nitarāṃ śaṃ vai kartāhaṃ vibudharṣabhāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11362: carāmi mahadatyugraṃ yaccāpi paramaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_133.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11363: vidviṣṭā vo mama dviṣṭāḥ kaṣṭāḥ kaṣṭaparākramāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11364: teṣāmabhāvaḥ saṃpādyo yuṣmākaṃ bhava eva ca // MatsP_133.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11366: rudramāhurmahābhāgaṃ bhāgārhāḥ sarva eva te // MatsP_133.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11368: asurairvadhyamānāḥ sma vayaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // MatsP_133.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11369: mayo nāma diteḥ putras trinetra kalahapriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11370: tripuraṃ yena taddurgaṃ kṛtaṃ pāṇḍuragopuram // MatsP_133.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:11373: udyānāni ca bhagnāni nandanādīni yāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11379: ye rathā ye gajāścaiva yāḥ striyo vasu yacca naḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11380: tanno vyapahṛtaṃ daityaiḥ saṃśayo jīvite punaḥ // MatsP_133.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:11384: tadahaṃ tripuraṃ dhakṣye kriyatāṃ yadbravīmi tat // MatsP_133.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11390: adhiṣṭhānaṃ śiro meror akṣo mandara eva ca // MatsP_133.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11391: cakruścandraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca cakre kāñcanarājate /
GP12mtp176pu:11398: varūthaṃ gaganaṃ cakruś cārurūpaṃ rathasya te // MatsP_133.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11402: vitastā ca vipāśā ca yamunā gaṇḍakī tathā // MatsP_133.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11403: sarasvatī devikā ca tathā ca sarayūrapi /
GP12mtp176pu:11404: etāḥ saridvarāḥ sarvā veṇusaṃjñā kṛtā rathe // MatsP_133.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11405: dhṛtarāṣṭrāśca ye nāgās te ca veśyātmakāḥ kṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11406: vāsukeḥ kulajā ye ca ye ca raivatavaṃśajāḥ // MatsP_133.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:11409: surasā saramā kadrūr vinatā śucireva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11410: tṛṣā bubhukṣā sarvogrā mṛtyuḥ sarvaśamastathā // MatsP_133.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11412: gadā bhūtvā śaktayaśca tadā devarathe 'bhyayuḥ // MatsP_133.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:11416: dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa nāgena baddhaṃ balavatā mahat // MatsP_133.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11427: pratoda oṃkāra evāsīt tadagraṃ ca vaṣaṭkṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:11428: sinīvālī kuhū rākā tathā cānumatiḥ śubhā /
GP12mtp176pu:11433: ajarā jyābhavaccāpi sāmbikā dhanuṣo dṛḍhā // MatsP_133.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:11434: kālo hi bhagavānrudras taṃ ca saṃvatsaraṃ viduḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11442: kṛtvā devā rathaṃ cāpi divyaṃ divyaprabhāvataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11447: praśasya devānsādhviti rathaṃ paśyati śaṃkaraḥ // MatsP_133.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:11451: īdṛśo rathasampattyā yantā śīghraṃ vidhīyatām // MatsP_133.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:11453: avāpurmahatīṃ cintāṃ kathaṃ kāryamiti bruvan // MatsP_133.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:11454: mahādevasya devo 'nyaḥ ko nāma sadṛśo bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:11455: muktvā cakrāyudhaṃ devaṃ so 'pyasyeṣuṃ samāśritaḥ // MatsP_133.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:11456: dhuri yuktā ivokṣāṇo ghaṭanta iva parvataiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11457: niśvasantaḥ surāḥ sarve kathametaditi bruvan // MatsP_133.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:11461: pratodahastaṃ samprekṣya brahmāṇaṃ sūtatāṃ gatam // MatsP_133.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:11463: sadṛśaḥ sūta ityuktvā cāruroha rathaṃ haraḥ // MatsP_133.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:11464: ārohati rathaṃ deve hy aśvā harabharāturāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11465: jānubhiḥ patitā bhūmau rajogrāsaśca grāsitaḥ // MatsP_133.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:11467: ujjahāra pitṝnārtān suputra iva duḥkhitān // MatsP_133.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:11471: svayambhūḥ prayayau vāhān anumantrya yathājavam // MatsP_133.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:11473: mukhebhyaḥ sasṛjuḥ śvāsān ucchvasanta ivoragāḥ // MatsP_133.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:11475: vrajanti te 'śvā javanāḥ kṣayakāla ivānilāḥ // MatsP_133.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:11477: ākramya nandī vṛṣabhas tasthau tasmiñchivecchayā // MatsP_133.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:11479: rathacakre tu rakṣete rudrasya priyakāṅkṣiṇau // MatsP_133.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:11481: śarahasto rathaṃ pāti śayanaṃ brahmaṇastadā // MatsP_133.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:11484: mayūraṃ śatacandraṃ ca kūjantaṃ kiṃnaraṃ yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:11485: guha āsthāya varado yugopamarathaṃ pituḥ // MatsP_133.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:11489: anujagmū rathaṃ śārvaṃ nakrā iva mahārṇavam // MatsP_133.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:11493: rathastripure sakāñcanācalo vrajati sapakṣa ivādrirambare // MatsP_133.68
GP12mtp176pu:11495: pramathagaṇāḥ parivārya devaguptaṃ rathamabhitaḥ prayayuḥ svadarpayuktāḥ
GP12mtp176pu:11499: *sūta uvāca pūjyamāne rathe tasmiṃl lokairdeve rathe sthite /
GP12mtp176pu:11500: pramatheṣu nadatsūgraṃ pravadatsu ca sādhviti // MatsP_134.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11502: jayatsu vipreṣu tathā garjatsu turageṣu ca // MatsP_134.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11505: autpātikaṃ tu daityānāṃ tripure vartate dhruvam /
GP12mtp176pu:11511: teṣāṃ sa pūjāṃ pūjārhaḥ pratigṛhya tapodhanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11514: yathārhaṃ dānavaiḥ sārdham āsīno dānavādhipaḥ // MatsP_134.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11518: vartate vartamānajña vada tvaṃ hi ca nārada // MatsP_134.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:11519: dṛśyante bhayadāḥ svapnā bhajyante ca dhvajāḥ param /
GP12mtp176pu:11520: vinā ca vāyunā ketuḥ patate ca tathā bhuvi // MatsP_134.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11522: hiṃsa hiṃseti śrūyante giraśca bhayadāḥ pure // MatsP_134.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:11524: muktvaikaṃ varadaṃ sthāṇuṃ bhaktābhayakaraṃ haram // MatsP_134.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:11528: kathayasva muniśreṣṭha prapannasya tu nārada // MatsP_134.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11530: *nārada uvāca śṛṇu dānava tattvena bhavantyautpātikā yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:11531: dharmeti dhāraṇe dhātur māhātmye caiva paṭhyate /
GP12mtp176pu:11532: dhāraṇācca mahattvena dharma eṣa nirucyate // MatsP_134.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11536: vināśastasya nirdeśya iti vedavido viduḥ // MatsP_134.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:11538: apakāriṣu devānāṃ kuruṣe tvaṃ sahāyatām // MatsP_134.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:11540: vaināśikāni dṛśyante dānavānāṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_134.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11542: āyāti tripuraṃ hantuṃ maya tvāmasurānapi // MatsP_134.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:11543: sa tvaṃ mahaujasaṃ nityaṃ prapadyasva maheśvaram /
GP12mtp176pu:11544: yāsyase saha putreṇa dānavaiḥ saha mānada // MatsP_134.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11547: nārade tu munau yāte mayo dānavanāyakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11549: śūrāḥ stha jātaputrāḥ stha kṛtakṛtyāḥ stha dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11550: yudhyadhvaṃ daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ kartavyaṃ cāpi no bhayam // MatsP_134.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:11556: tiṣṭhadhvaṃ laṅghanīyāni bhaviṣyanti purāṇi ca // MatsP_134.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:11557: namogatāstathā śūrā devatā viditā hi vaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11558: tāḥ prayatnena vāryāśca vidāryāścaiva sāyakaiḥ // MatsP_134.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:11560: yuvatijanaviṣaṇṇamānasaṃ tat tripurapuraṃ sahasā viveśa rājā //
GP12mtp176pu:11563: mayamabhayapadaiṣiṇaṃ prapannaṃ na kila bubodha tṛtīyadīptanetraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11564: tadabhimatamadāttataḥ śaśāṅkī sa ca kila nirbhaya eva dānavo 'bhūt //
GP12mtp176pu:11567: āgatya caiva tripurāt sabhāyāmāsthitaḥ svayam // MatsP_135.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11569: yatra yajño balervṛtto baliryatra ca saṃyataḥ // MatsP_135.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11572: devānāṃ yatra vṛttāni kanyādānāni yāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:11573: reme nityaṃ bhavo yatra sahāyaiḥ pārṣadairgaṇaiḥ // MatsP_135.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11582: ime ca toyadābhāsā danujā vikṛtānanāḥ // MatsP_135.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11583: nirgacchanti puro daityāḥ sāyudhā vijayaiṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_135.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:11584: sa tvaṃ suraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sasahāyo varāyudhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11587: puraḥ purasya randhrārthī sthāsyāmi vijayāya vaḥ // MatsP_135.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11588: yadā tu puṣyayogeṇa ekatvaṃ sthāsyate puram /
GP12mtp176pu:11591: yayau tattripuraṃ jetuṃ tena sainyena saṃvṛtaḥ // MatsP_135.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:11595: utpatya dudruvuśceluḥ sāyudhāḥ khe gaṇeśvarān // MatsP_135.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11605: kecin nadanti danujās toyamattā ivāmbudāḥ // MatsP_135.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:11611: tiṣṭhate tripuraṃ pīḍya dehaṃ vyādhirivocchritaḥ // MatsP_135.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:11612: ya eṣo 'sti sa eṣo 'stu kā cintā sambhrame sati /
GP12mtp176pu:11613: ehi āyudham ādāya kva me pṛcchā bhaviṣyati // MatsP_135.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:11628: mṛtāḥ stha kva nu yāsyadhvaṃ haniṣyāmo nivartatām /
GP12mtp176pu:11644: jayatīndraśca rudraśca ityeva ca gaṇeśvarāḥ // MatsP_135.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:11650: dṛḍhāhatāḥ patan pūrvaṃ dānavāḥ pramathāstathā // MatsP_135.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:11654: nadanto meghaśabdena śarabhā iva roṣitāḥ // MatsP_135.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:11658: saśastrā nipatanti sma sapakṣā iva bhūdharāḥ // MatsP_135.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:11660: vidyunmālī mayaścaiva magnau ca drumavadraṇe // MatsP_135.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:11662: ādāya parighaṃ ghoraṃ tāḍayāmāsa nandinam // MatsP_135.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:11664: bhramate madhunā vyaktaḥ purā nārāyaṇo yathā // MatsP_135.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:11670: bhittvā bhittvā rurāvoccair nabhasyambudharo yathā // MatsP_135.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:11672: saṃjñāṃ prāpya tataḥ so 'pi vidyunmālinamādravat // MatsP_135.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:11674: vajraṃ vajranibhāṅgasya dānavasya sasarja ha // MatsP_135.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:11676: papāta vakṣasi tadā vajraṃ daityasya bhīṣaṇam // MatsP_135.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:11684: kartavyaṃ na viduḥ kiṃcid vandyamādhārmikā iva // MatsP_135.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:11686: satarūṇāṃ girīṇāṃ vai tulyarūpadharo babhau // MatsP_135.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:11688: virejurbhujagā mantrair vāryamāṇā yathā tathā // MatsP_135.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:11690: bhramanti bahuśabdālāḥ pañjare śakunā iva // MatsP_135.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:11692: dadāha ca balaṃ sarvaṃ śuṣkendhanamivānalaḥ // MatsP_135.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:11695: gaṇeśā vidhurā jātā jīrṇamūlā yathā drumāḥ // MatsP_135.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:11700: te tārakākhyena mayena māyayā saṃmuhyamānā vivaśā gaṇeśvarāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11705: tataḥ surāṇāṃ pravarābhirakṣituṃ riporbalaṃ saṃviviśuḥ sahāyudhāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11706: yamo gadāstro varuṇaśca bhāskaras tathā kumāro 'marakoṭisaṃyutaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11707: svayaṃ ca śakraḥ sitanāgavāhanaḥ kulīśapāṇiḥ suralokapuṃgavaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11708: sa coḍunāthaḥ sasuto divākaraḥ sa sāntakastryakṣapatir mahādyutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11709: ete ripūṇāṃ prabalābhirakṣitaṃ tadā balaṃ saṃviviśurmadoddhatāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11710: yathā vanaṃ darpitakuñjarādhipā yathā nabhaḥ sāmbudharaṃ divākaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11711: yathā ca siṃhairvijaneṣu gokulaṃ tathā balaṃ tattridaśair abhidrutam //
GP12mtp176pu:11713: svarjyotiṣāṃ jyotir ivoṣmavān harir yathā tamo ghorataraṃ narāṇām //
GP12mtp176pu:11714: viśāntayāmāsa yathā sadaiva niśākaraḥ saṃcitaśārvaraṃ tamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11715: tato 'pakṛṣṭe ca tamaḥprabhāve astraprabhāve ca vivardhamāne //
GP12mtp176pu:11717: saṃkhye vibhagnā vikarā vipādāś chinnottamāṅgāḥ śarapūritāṅgāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11718: devetarā devavarairvibhinnāḥ sīdanti paṅkeṣu yathā gajendrāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11719: vajreṇa bhīmena ca vajrapāṇiḥ śaktyā ca śaktyā ca mayūraketuḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11720: daṇḍena cogreṇa ca dharmarājaḥ pāśena cogreṇa ca vārigoptā /
GP12mtp176pu:11721: śūlena kālena ca yakṣarājo vīryeṇa tejasvitayā sukeśaḥ // MatsP_135.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:11725: śareṇa bhittvā sa hi tārakāsutaṃ sa tārakākhyāsuram ābabhāṣe //
GP12mtp176pu:11726: kṛtvā prahāraṃ praviśāmi vīraṃ puraṃ hi daityendrabalena yuktaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11731: viveśa tūrṇaṃ tripuraṃ diteḥ sutaiḥ sutairadityā yudhi vṛddhaharṣaiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11735: *sūta uvāca mayaḥ prahāraṃ kṛtvā tu māyāvī dānavarṣabhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11736: viveśa tūrṇaṃ tripuram abhraṃ nīlamivāmbaram // MatsP_136.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11738: dadhyau lokakṣaye prāpte kālaṃ kāla ivāparaḥ // MatsP_136.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11740: sa cāpi nidhanaṃ prāpto vidyunmālī mahāyaśāḥ // MatsP_136.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11741: durgaṃ vai tripurasyāsya na samaṃ vidyate puram /
GP12mtp176pu:11742: tasyāpyeṣo 'nayaḥ prāpto na durgaṃ kāraṇaṃ kvacit // MatsP_136.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11743: kālasyaiva vaśe sarvaṃ durgaṃ durgataraṃ ca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:11744: kāle kruddhe kathaṃ kālāt trāṇaṃ no 'dya bhaviṣyati // MatsP_136.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11745: ekeṣu triṣu yatkiṃcid balaṃ vai sarvajantuṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:11746: kālasya tadvaśaṃ sarvam iti paitāmaho vidhiḥ // MatsP_136.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:11748: laṅghane kaḥ samarthaḥ syād ṛte devaṃ maheśvaram // MatsP_136.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:11749: bibhemi nendrāddhi yamād varuṇānna ca vittapāt /
GP12mtp176pu:11750: svāmī caiṣāṃ tu devānāṃ durjayaḥ sa maheśvaraḥ // MatsP_136.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11751: aiśvaryasya phalaṃ yattat prabhutvasya ca yatphalam /
GP12mtp176pu:11755: iti saṃcintya balavān mayo māyāvināṃ varaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11756: māyayā sasṛje vāpīṃ rambhāmiva pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_136.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11765: tāṃ vāpīṃ sṛjya sa mayo gaṅgāmiva maheśvaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11771: kva nandī saha rudreṇa vṛtaḥ pramathajambukaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11772: yudhyāmo 'rīn viniṣpīḍya dayā deheṣu kā hi naḥ // MatsP_136.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:11774: tairvā vinihatā yuddhe bhaviṣyāmo yamāśanāḥ // MatsP_136.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:11776: taṃ pariṣvajya sārdrākṣa idamāha mahāsuraḥ // MatsP_136.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:11777: vidyunmālinna me rājyam abhipretaṃ na jīvitam /
GP12mtp176pu:11778: tvayā vinā mahābāho kimanyena mahāsura // MatsP_136.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:11781: diṣṭyā tvāṃ daitya paśyāmi yamalokād ihāgatam /
GP12mtp176pu:11783: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ vāpīṃ māyayā mayanirmitām /
GP12mtp176pu:11787: tataḥ kṣubdhāmbudhinibhā bherī sā tu bhayaṃkarī /
GP12mtp176pu:11788: vādyamānā nanādoccai rauravī sā punaḥ punaḥ // MatsP_136.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:11795: nṛtyamānā iva naṭā garjanta iva toyadāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11796: karocchrayā iva gajāḥ siṃhā iva ca nirbhayāḥ // MatsP_136.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:11797: hradā iva ca gambhīrāḥ sūryā iva pratāpitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11798: drumā iva ca daityendrās trāsayanto balaṃ mahat // MatsP_136.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:11802: cakruḥ saṃhatya saṃgrāmaṃ codyamānā balena ca // MatsP_136.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:11810: śirāṃsyurvyāṃ patanti sma girikūṭā ivātyaye // MatsP_136.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:11828: hatānapi hi vo vāpī punarujjīvayiṣyati // MatsP_136.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:11832: uttiṣṭhanti punarbhīmāḥ sasyā iva jalokṣitāḥ // MatsP_136.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:11834: nihatā nihatā yatra kṣiptā jīvanti dānavāḥ // MatsP_136.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:11840: dānavā niḥsṛtā dṛṣṭvā devadevarathe suram // MatsP_136.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:11846: śaithilyaṃ yāti sa rathaḥ sneho viprakṛto yathā // MatsP_136.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:11850: vṛṣarūpaṃ mahatkṛtvā rathaṃ jagrāha durdharam // MatsP_136.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:11852: pragṛhyodvahate sajjaṃ kulaṃ kulavaho yathā // MatsP_136.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:11854: abhyadravattadā devaṃ brahmāṇaṃ hatavāṃśca saḥ // MatsP_136.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:11856: vijajvāla muhurbrahmā śvāsaṃ vaktrāt samudgiran // MatsP_136.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:11860: dititanayabalaṃ vimardya sarvaṃ tripurapuraṃ praviveśa keśavaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11864: nardamāno mahābāhuḥ praviveśa śaraṃ tataḥ // MatsP_136.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:11866: parāṅmukhā bhīmamukhaiḥ kṛtā raṇe yathā nayābhyudyatatatparairnaraiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11867: sa tārakākhyas taḍinmālireva ca mayena sārdhaṃ pramathairabhidrutāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11868: puraṃ parāvṛtya nu te śarārditā yathā śarīraṃ pavanodaye gatāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11872: *sūta uvāca pramathaiḥ samare bhinnās traipurāste surārayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11874: śīrṇadaṃṣṭrā yathā nāgā bhagnaśṛṅgā yathā vṛṣāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11875: yathā vipakṣāḥ śakunā nadyaḥ kṣīṇodakā yathā // MatsP_137.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:11877: babhūvuste vimanasaḥ kathaṃ kāryamiti bruvan // MatsP_137.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:11880: kṛtvā yuddhāni ghorāṇi pramathaiḥ saha sāmaraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11881: toṣayitvā tathā yuddhe pramathānamaraiḥ saha // MatsP_137.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:11885: yatra nāma mahābhāgāḥ praviśanti girervanam // MatsP_137.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:11886: aho hi kālasya balam aho kālo hi durjayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11889: babhūvurniṣprabhā daityā grahā indūdaye yathā // MatsP_137.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:11892: yā sāmṛtarasā gūḍhā vāpī vai nirmitā tvayā /
GP12mtp176pu:11895: vāpī sā sāmprataṃ dṛṣṭā mṛtasaṃjñā ivāṅganā // MatsP_137.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:11898: mayā māyābalakṛtā vāpī pītā tviyaṃ yadi /
GP12mtp176pu:11899: vinaṣṭāḥ sma na saṃdehas tripuraṃ dānavā gatam // MatsP_137.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:11901: pītā vā yadi vā vāpī pītā vai pītavāsasā // MatsP_137.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:11905: yatra madvarakauśalyaṃ vijñātaṃ na vṛtaṃ budhaiḥ // MatsP_137.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:11912: yudhyatāṃ nighnatāṃ śatrūn bhītānāṃ ca draviṣyatām /
GP12mtp176pu:11915: tripureṇa yayau tūrṇaṃ sāgaraṃ sindhubāndhavam // MatsP_137.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:11920: pitāmaha dṛḍhaṃ bhītā bhagavandānavā hi naḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11921: vipulaṃ sāgaraṃ te tu dānavāḥ samupāśritāḥ // MatsP_137.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:11922: yata eva hi te yātās tripureṇa tu dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11923: tata eva rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ prāpayasva pitāmaha // MatsP_137.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:11924: siṃhanādaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā devā devarathaṃ ca tam /
GP12mtp176pu:11933: tridaśagaṇapatirhyuvāca śakraṃ tripuragataṃ sahasā nirīkṣya śatrum //
GP12mtp176pu:11936: vihitaparabalābhighātabhūtaṃ vraja jaladhestu yataḥ purāṇi tasthuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11937: sa rathavaragato bhavaḥ samartho hy udadhimagāttripuraṃ punarnihantum //
GP12mtp176pu:11938: iti parigaṇayanto diteḥ sutā hy avatasthurlavaṇārṇavopariṣṭāt /
GP12mtp176pu:11946: lokapālā yayuḥ sarve gaṇapālāśca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_138.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:11953: ājagmuḥ paramaṃ kṣobham atyayeṣviva sāgarāḥ // MatsP_138.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:11961: śaṃsanta iva nāgendrā bhramanta eva pakṣiṇaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11962: girīndrā iva kampanto garjanta iva toyadāḥ // MatsP_138.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:11963: jṛmbhanta iva śārdūlāḥ garjanta iva toyadāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11966: yuyudhurniścalā bhūtvā vajrā iva mahācalaiḥ // MatsP_138.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:11968: kālānugānāṃ meghānāṃ yathā viyati vāyunā // MatsP_138.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:11969: āhuśca yuddhe mā bhaiṣīḥ kva yāsyasi mṛto hyasi /
GP12mtp176pu:11970: praharāśu sthito 'smyatra ehi darśaya pauruṣam // MatsP_138.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:11971: gṛhāṇa chinddhi bhinddhīti khāda māraya dāraya /
GP12mtp176pu:11983: bhramante bhakṣayantaśca dānavānāṃ ca lohitam // MatsP_138.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:11987: ambare 'mbhasi ca tathā yuddhaṃ cakrurjalecarāḥ // MatsP_138.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:11988: yathā bhramanti pramathāḥ sadaityās tathā bhramante timayaḥ sanakrāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11989: yathaiva chindanti parasparaṃ tu tathaiva krandanti vibhinnadehāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:11991: kṛto muhūrtena samudradeśaḥ saraktatoyaḥ samudīrṇatoyaḥ // MatsP_138.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:11992: pūrvaṃ mahāmbhodharaparvatābhaṃ dvāraṃ mahāntaṃ tripurasya śakraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:11993: nipīḍya tasthau mahatā balena yukto 'marāṇāṃ mahatā balena // MatsP_138.23
GP12mtp176pu:11997: devāriṇastasya purasya dvāraṃ tābhyāṃ tu tatpaścimato niruddham //
GP12mtp176pu:12001: prahlādarūpāḥ pramathāvaruddhā jyotīṃṣi meghā iva cāśmavarṣāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12003: prakṣipya prakṣipya samudramadhye kālāmbudābhāḥ pramathā vineduḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12005: gṛhāṇi he nātha pitaḥ suteti bhrāteti kānteti priyeti cāpi /
GP12mtp176pu:12008: mahāsurāḥ sāgaratulyavegā gaṇeśvarāḥ kopavṛtāḥ pratīyuḥ // MatsP_138.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12011: anyonyamuddiśya vimardatāṃ ca pradhāvatāṃ caiva vinighnatāṃ ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12013: vraṇairajasraṃ kṣatajaṃ vamantaḥ kopoparaktā bahudhā nadantaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12016: kṛtā muhūrtena sukhena gantuṃ chinnottamāṅgāṅghrikarāḥ karālāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12017: kopāvṛtākṣaḥ sa tu tārakākhyaḥ saṃkhye savṛkṣaḥ sagirirnilīnaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12019: sa tatra prākārāgatāṃśca bhūtāñ chātan mahānadbhutavīryasattvaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12021: tataḥ sa daityottamaparvatābho yathāñjasā nāga ivābhimattaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12022: nivārito rudrarathaṃ jighṛkṣur yathārṇavaḥ sarpati cātivelaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12023: śeṣaḥ sudhanvā giriśaśca devaś caturmukho yaḥ sa trilocanaśca /
GP12mtp176pu:12024: te tārakākhyābhigatā gatājau kṣobhaṃ yathā vāyuvaśātsamudrāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12025: śeṣo girīśaḥ sapitāmaheśaś cotkṣubhyamāṇaḥ sa rathe 'mbarasthaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12026: bibheda saṃdhīṣu balābhipannaḥ kūjanninādāṃśca karoti ghorān //
GP12mtp176pu:12027: ekaṃ tu ṛgvedaturaṃgamasya pṛṣṭhe padaṃ nyasya vṛṣasya caikam /
GP12mtp176pu:12030: petuḥ stanāśca dantāśca pīḍitābhyāṃ triśūlinā // MatsP_138.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:12031: tataḥprabhṛti cāśvānāṃ stanā dantā gavāṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:12036: takṣayāmāsa vai takṣā candanaṃ gandhado yathā // MatsP_138.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:12038: dudrāva khaḍgaṃ niṣkṛṣya tārakākhyo gaṇeśvaram // MatsP_138.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:12039: yajñopavītam ādāya cicheda ca nanāda ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12044: bahuvadanavatāṃ kimeṣa śabdo nadatāṃ śrūyate bhinnasāgarābhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12045: vada vacanaṃ taḍinmālin kiṃ kim etadgaṇapālā yuyudhuryayurgajendrāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12049: sakalasamaraśīrṣaparvatendro yuddhvā yastapati hi tārako gaṇendraiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12052: iti suhṛdo vacanaṃ niśamya tat tvaṃ taḍimāleḥ sa mayaḥ suvarṇamālī /
GP12mtp176pu:12058: yena yena tato vidyun mālī yāti mayaśca saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12059: tena tena puraṃ śūnyaṃ pramathaiḥ prahṛtaiḥ kṛtam // MatsP_138.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:12061: sakaratalapuṭaiśca siṃhanādair bhavamabhipūjya tadā surā avatasthuḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12065: *sūta uvāca tārakākhye hate yuddhe utsārya pramathānmayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12066: uvāca dānavānbhūyo bhūyaḥ sa tu bhayāvṛtān // MatsP_139.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12068: yatkartavyaṃ mayā caiva yuṣmābhiśca mahābalaiḥ // MatsP_139.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12070: yadaikaṃ tripuraṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇamekaṃ bhaviṣyati // MatsP_139.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:12072: sa kālaḥ puṣyayogasya purasya ca mayā kṛtaḥ // MatsP_139.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12074: sa enaṃ kārayeccūrṇaṃ balinaikaiṣuṇā suraḥ // MatsP_139.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:12075: yo vaḥ prāṇo balaṃ yacca yā ca vo vairitāsurāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12076: tatkṛtvā hṛdaye caiva pālayadhvamidaṃ puram // MatsP_139.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:12084: tathā kurmo yathā rudro na mokṣyati pure śaram // MatsP_139.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:12086: kathayanti diteḥ putrā hṛṣṭā bhinnatanūruhāḥ // MatsP_139.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:12087: kalpaṃ sthāsyati vā khasthaṃ tripuraṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam /
GP12mtp176pu:12089: vayaṃ na dharmaṃ hāsyāmo yasminyokṣyasi no bhavān /
GP12mtp176pu:12090: adaivatam adaityaṃ vā lokaṃ drakṣyanti mānavāḥ // MatsP_139.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:12094: tamāṃsyutsārya bhagavāṃś candro jṛmbhati so 'mbaram // MatsP_139.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:12096: siṃho yathā copaviṣṭo vaiḍūryaśikhare mahān // MatsP_139.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:12099: bhrājate bhrājayaṃl lokān sṛjañjyotsnārasaṃ balāt // MatsP_139.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:12101: pradoṣe lalitaṃ cakrur gṛhamātmānameva ca // MatsP_139.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:12104: tadā maṭheṣu te dīpāḥ snehapūrṇāḥ pradīpitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12108: upadravaiḥ kulamiva pīyate tripure tamaḥ // MatsP_139.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12110: ratyarthino vai danujā gṛheṣu sahāṅganābhiḥ suciraṃ viremuḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12111: vinoditā ye tu vṛṣadhvajasya pañceṣavaste makaradhvajena /
GP12mtp176pu:12113: kalapralāpeṣu ca dānavīnāṃ vīṇāpralāpeṣu ca mūrchiteṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:12114: mattapralāpeṣu ca kokilānāṃ sacāpabāṇo madano mamantha // MatsP_139.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:12115: tamāṃsi naiśāni drutaṃ nihatya jyotsnāvitānena jagadvitatya /
GP12mtp176pu:12116: khe rohiṇīṃ tāṃ ca priyāṃ sametya candraḥ prabhābhiḥ kurute 'dhirājyam //
GP12mtp176pu:12117: sthitvaiva kāntasya tu pādamūle kācidvarastrī svakapolamūle /
GP12mtp176pu:12118: viśeṣakaṃ cārutaraṃ karoti tenānanaṃ svaṃ samalaṃkaroti // MatsP_139.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:12119: dṛṣṭvānanaṃ maṇḍaladarpaṇasthaṃ mahāprabhā me mukhajeti japtvā /
GP12mtp176pu:12120: smṛtvā varāṅgī ramaṇeritāni tenaiva bhāvena ratīmavāpa // MatsP_139.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:12122: svayaṃ drutaṃ yānti madābhibhūtāḥ kṣapā yathā cārkadināvasāne //
GP12mtp176pu:12123: pepīyate cātirasānuviddhā vimārgitānyā ca priyaṃ prasannā /
GP12mtp176pu:12126: manojñarūpā rucirā babhūvuḥ pūrṇāmṛtasyeva suvarṇakumbhāḥ // MatsP_139.30
GP12mtp176pu:12127: kṣatādharoṣṭhā drutadoṣaraktā lalanti daityā dayitāsu raktāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12129: kvacitpravṛttaṃ madhurābhigānaṃ kāmasya bāṇaiḥ sukṛtaṃ nidhānam /
GP12mtp176pu:12130: āpānabhūmīṣu sukhaprameyaṃ geyaṃ pravṛttaṃ tvatha sādhayanti //
GP12mtp176pu:12131: geyaṃ pravṛttaṃ tvatha śodhayanti kecitpriyāṃ tatra ca sādhayanti /
GP12mtp176pu:12132: kecitpriyāṃ samprati bodhayanti saṃbudhya saṃbudhya ca rāmayanti //
GP12mtp176pu:12133: dhūtaprasūnaprabhavaḥ subandhaḥ sūrye gate vai tripure babhūva /
GP12mtp176pu:12134: samarmaro nūpuramekhalānāṃ śabdaśca saṃbādhati kokilānām // MatsP_139.34
GP12mtp176pu:12139: pānena khinnā dayitātivelaṃ kapolamājighrasi kiṃ mamedam /
GP12mtp176pu:12140: āroha me śroṇimimāṃ viśālāṃ pīnonnatāṃ kāñcanamekhalāḍhyām // MatsP_139.37
GP12mtp176pu:12142: daityāṅganā yūthagatā vibhānti tārā yathā candramaso divānte //
GP12mtp176pu:12143: aṭṭāṭṭahāseṣu ca cāmareṣu preṅkhāsu cānyā madalolabhāvāt /
GP12mtp176pu:12144: saṃdolayante kalasamprahāsāḥ provāca kāñcī guṇasūkṣmanādā // MatsP_139.39
GP12mtp176pu:12146: śrūyanti vācaḥ kaladhautakalpā vāpīṣu cānye kalahaṃsaśabdāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12153: sacandrike sopavane pradoṣe ruteṣu vṛndeṣu ca kokilānām /
GP12mtp176pu:12154: śaravyayaṃ prāpya pure 'surāṇāṃ prakṣīṇabāṇo madanaścacāra // MatsP_139.44
GP12mtp176pu:12155: iti tatra pure 'maradviṣāṇāṃ sapadi hi paścimakaumudī tadāsīt /*
GP12mtp176pu:12156: raṇaśirasi parābhaviṣyatāṃ vai bhavaturagaiḥ kṛtasaṃkṣayā arīṇām //
GP12mtp176pu:12158: vichāyatāṃ hi samupetya na bhāti tadvad bhāgyakṣaye dhanapatiśca naro vivarṇaḥ // MatsP_139.46
GP12mtp176pu:12160: sthitvodayāgramukuṭe bahureva sūryo bhātyambare timiratoyavahāṃ tariṣyan
GP12mtp176pu:12162: *sūta uvāca udite tu sahasrāṃśau merau bhāsākare ravau /
GP12mtp176pu:12163: nadaddevabalaṃ kṛtsnaṃ yugānta iva sāgaraḥ // MatsP_140.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12165: savittadaḥ savaruṇas tripuraṃ prayayau haraḥ // MatsP_140.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12169: babhūva tadbalaṃ divyaṃ vanaṃ pracalitaṃ yathā // MatsP_140.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12173: śarāsanāni vajrāṇi gurūṇi musalāni ca // MatsP_140.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:12175: nijaghnuḥ parvataghnāya ghanā iva tapātyaye // MatsP_140.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12187: timinakragaṇe caiva patanti pramathāḥ surāḥ // MatsP_140.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:12202: yadi tvidānīṃ me jīvan mucyase nandikeśvara /
GP12mtp176pu:12207: śakto hantuṃ kimātmānaṃ jātidoṣād vibṛṃhasi // MatsP_140.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12209: idānīṃ vā kathaṃ nāma na hiṃsye kratudūṣaṇam // MatsP_140.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:12211: so 'pi māṃ śaknuyānnaiva cakṣurbhyāṃ samavekṣitum // MatsP_140.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:12218: vāyununnaḥ sa ca taruḥ śīrṇapuṣpo mahāravaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12223: dudrāva hantuṃ sa krūraṃ mahiṣaṃ gajarāḍiva // MatsP_140.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12227: arergṛhya rathaṃ tasya mahataḥ prayayau javāt // MatsP_140.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:12231: ājaghāna tadā śaktyā śailādiṃ samavasthitam // MatsP_140.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12237: sādhu sādhviti coktvā te pūjayanta umāpatim // MatsP_140.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12238: nandinā sādite daitye vidyunmālau hate mayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12242: atha vajradharo yamo 'rthadaḥ sa ca nandī sa ca ṣaṇmukho guhaḥ /*
GP12mtp176pu:12244: nāgaṃ tu nāgādhipateḥ śatākṣaṃ mayo vidāryeṣuvareṇa tūrṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:12245: yamaṃ ca vittādhipatiṃ ca viddhvā rarāsa mattāmbudavattadānīm //
GP12mtp176pu:12249: kapardisainye prababhuḥ samantato nipātyamānā yudhi vajrasaṃnibhāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12251: babhūva cāpi saṃyuktaṃ tadyogena puratrayam // MatsP_140.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:12252: tato bāṇaṃ tridhā devas tridaivatamayaṃ haraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12255: ākāśaṃ svarṇasaṃkāśaṃ kṛtaṃ sūryeṇa rañjitam // MatsP_140.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:12257: dhigdhiṅ māmiti cakranda kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭamiti bruvan // MatsP_140.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12259: kimidaṃ tviti papraccha śūlapāṇiṃ maheśvaram // MatsP_140.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:12261: uvāca nandinaṃ bhaktaḥ sa mayo 'dya vinaṅkṣyati // MatsP_140.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:12263: śare tripuramāyāti tripuraṃ praviveśa saḥ // MatsP_140.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:12264: sa mayaṃ prekṣya gaṇapaḥ prāha kāñcanasaṃnibhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12266: anenaiva gṛheṇa tvam apakrāma bravīmyaham // MatsP_140.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:12270: tridhā iva hutāśaśca somo nārāyaṇastathā // MatsP_140.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:12283: dahyante dānavendrāṇām agninā hyapi tāḥ striyaḥ // MatsP_140.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:12285: puraḥ priyasya pañcatvaṃ gatāgnivadane kṣayam // MatsP_140.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:12288: dharmasākṣī trilokasya na māṃ spraṣṭumihārhasi // MatsP_140.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:12289: śāyitaṃ ca mayā deva śivayā ca śivaprabha /
GP12mtp176pu:12290: pareṇa praihi muktvedaṃ gṛhaṃ ca dayitaṃ hi me // MatsP_140.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:12297: tāta putreti māteti mātuleti ca vihvalam /
GP12mtp176pu:12304: babhūva kāñcīguṇanūpurāṇām ākranditānāṃ ca ravo 'timiśraḥ // MatsP_140.69
GP12mtp176pu:12306: dagdhāni dagdhāni gṛhāṇi tatra patanti rakṣārthamivārṇavaughe //
GP12mtp176pu:12308: kuputradoṣaiḥ prahatānuviddhaṃ yathā kulaṃ yāti dhanānvitasya //
GP12mtp176pu:12312: taireva sārdhaṃ bhavanaiḥ papāta śabdaṃ mahāntaṃ janayansamudre //
GP12mtp176pu:12313: sahasraśṛṅgair bhavanair yadāsīt sahasraśṛṅgaḥ sa ivācaleśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12315: pradahyamānena pureṇa tena jagat sapātāladivaṃ prataptam /
GP12mtp176pu:12321: yasya yasya tu deśasya bhaviṣyati parābhavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12322: drakṣyanti tripuraṃ khaṇḍaṃ tatredaṃ nāśagā janāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12324: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ bhagavansa mayo yena gṛheṇa prapalāyitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12325: tasya no gatimākhyāhi mayasya camasodbhava // MatsP_140.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:12326: *sūta uvāca dṛśyate dṛśyate yatra dhruvastatra mayāspadam /
GP12mtp176pu:12327: devadviṭ tu mayaścātaḥ sa tadā khinnamānasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12328: tataścyuto 'nyaloke 'smiṃs trāṇārthaṃ vai cakāra saḥ // MatsP_140.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:12330: tatrāśaktaṃ tato gantuṃ taṃ caikaṃ puramuttamam // MatsP_140.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:12331: śivaḥ sṛṣṭvā gṛhaṃ prādān mayāyaiva gṛhārthine /
GP12mtp176pu:12333: pūjyamānaṃ ca bhūteśaṃ sarve tuṣṭuvurīśvaram // MatsP_140.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:12334: sampūjyamānaṃ tridaśaiḥ samīkṣya gaṇairgaṇeśādhipatiṃ tu mukhyam /
GP12mtp176pu:12335: harṣād vavalgur jahasuśca devā jagmurnanardustu viṣaktahastāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:12336: pitāmahaṃ vandya tato maheśaṃ pragṛhya cāpaṃ pravimṛjya bhūtān /
GP12mtp176pu:12337: rathācca saṃpatya hareṣudagdhaṃ kṣiptaṃ puraṃ tanmakarālaye ca //
GP12mtp176pu:12339: vijayaṃ tasya kṛtyeṣu dadāti vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ // MatsP_140.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:12340: pitṝṇāṃ vāpi śrāddheṣu ya imaṃ śrāvayiṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:12341: anantaṃ tasya puṇyaṃ syāt sarvayajñaphalapradam // MatsP_140.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:12342: idaṃ svastyayanaṃ puṇyam idaṃ puṃsavanaṃ mahat /
GP12mtp176pu:12343: idaṃ śrutvā paṭhitvā ca yānti rudrasalokatām // MatsP_140.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:12345: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kathaṃ gacchatyamāvāsyāṃ māsi māsi divaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12346: ailaḥ purūravāḥ sūta tarpayeta kathaṃ pitṝn /
GP12mtp176pu:12347: etadicchāmahe śrotuṃ prabhāvaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // MatsP_141.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12348: *sūta uvāca etadeva tu papraccha manuḥ sa madhusūdanam /
GP12mtp176pu:12349: sūryaputrāya covāca yathā tanme nibodhata // MatsP_141.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12350: *matsya uvāca tasya cāhaṃ pravakṣyāmi prabhāvaṃ vistareṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:12351: ailasya divi saṃyogaṃ somena saha dhīmatā // MatsP_141.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:12353: saumyā barhiṣadaḥ kāvyā agniṣvāttāstathaiva ca // MatsP_141.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12358: abhivādya tu tau tatra kālāpekṣaḥ sa tiṣṭhati /
GP12mtp176pu:12359: pracaskanda tataḥ somam arcayitvā pariśramāt // MatsP_141.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12361: tataḥ sa divi somaṃ vai hy upatasthe pitṝnapi // MatsP_141.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:12362: dvilavaṃ kuhūmātraṃ ca tāvubhau tu nidhāya saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12365: tamupāsya tataḥ somaṃ kalāpekṣī pratīkṣate // MatsP_141.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:12366: svadhāmṛtaṃ tu somādvai vasaṃsteṣāṃ ca tṛptaye /
GP12mtp176pu:12369: sadyo 'bhikṣaratā tena saumyena madhunā ca saḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12370: nivāpeṣvatha datteṣu pitryeṇa vidhinā tu vai // MatsP_141.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:12372: saumyā barhiṣadaḥ kāvyā agniṣvāttāstathaiva ca // MatsP_141.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:12373: ṛturagniḥ smṛto viprair ṛtuṃ saṃvatsaraṃ viduḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12374: jajñire ṛtavastasmād ṛtubhyo hyārtavā abhavan // MatsP_141.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:12377: prapitāmahāḥ smṛtā devāḥ pañcābdā brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ // MatsP_141.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:12378: saumyā barhiṣadaḥ kāvyā agniṣvāttā iti tridhā /
GP12mtp176pu:12379: gṛhasthā ye tu yajvāno haviryajñārtavāśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:12380: smṛtā barhiṣadaste vai purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ // MatsP_141.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:12391: etattadamṛtaṃ somam avāpa madhu caiva hi // MatsP_141.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12393: āpyāyate suṣumnena somaṃ tu somapāyinam // MatsP_141.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12394: niḥśeṣā vai kalāḥ pūrvā yugapad vyāpayan purā /
GP12mtp176pu:12396: kalāḥ kṣīyanti kṛṣṇāstāḥ śuklā hyāpyāyayanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12397: evaṃ sā sūryavīryeṇa candrasyāpyāyitā tanuḥ // MatsP_141.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:12400: devaiḥ pītasudhaṃ somaṃ purā paścātpibedraviḥ // MatsP_141.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:12404: tasmāddhrasanti vai kṛṣṇāḥ śuklā hyāpyāyayanti ca // MatsP_141.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:12405: evamāpyāyate somaḥ kṣayite ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12409: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi parvaṇāṃ saṃdhayaśca yāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12411: tathābdamāsāḥ pakṣāśca śuklāḥ kṛṣṇāstu vai smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12412: paurṇamāsyāstu yo bhedo granthayaḥ saṃdhayastathā // MatsP_141.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12416: sāyāhne anumatyāśca dvau lavau kāla ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:12417: lavau dvāveva rākāyāḥ kālo jñeyo 'parāhṇikaḥ // MatsP_141.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12419: sāyāhne pratipadyeṣa sa kālaḥ paurṇamāsikaḥ // MatsP_141.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12421: yugāntarodite caiva candre lekhopari sthite // MatsP_141.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:12423: tau tu vai pratipadyāvat tasminkāle vyavasthitau // MatsP_141.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:12425: sa caiva satkriyākālaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ kālo 'bhidhīyate // MatsP_141.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12433: rañjanāccaiva candrasya rāketi kavayo viduḥ // MatsP_141.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:12435: ekā pañcadaśī rātrir amāvāsyā tataḥ smṛtā // MatsP_141.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:12437: anyonyaṃ candrasūryau tu darśanāddarśa ucyate // MatsP_141.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:12438: dvau dvau lavāvamāvāsyāṃ sa kālaḥ parvasaṃdhiṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:12439: dvyakṣaraḥ kuhūmātraśca parvakālastu sa smṛtaḥ // MatsP_141.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:12441: divā tadūrdhvaṃ rātryāṃ tu sūrye prāpte tu candramāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12442: sūryeṇa sahasodgacchet tataḥ prātastanāttu vai // MatsP_141.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:12446: sa tadānvāhuteḥ kālo darśasya ca vaṣaṭkriyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12447: etadṛtumukhaṃ jñeyam amāvāsyāṃ tu pārvaṇam // MatsP_141.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12448: divā parva tvamāvāsyāṃ kṣīṇendau dhavale tu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12449: tasmāddivā tvamāvāsyāṃ gṛhyate yo divākaraḥ // MatsP_141.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:12451: tatkālasaṃjñitā hyeṣā amāvāsyā kuhūḥ smṛtā // MatsP_141.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:12453: amāvāsyā viśatyarkaṃ sinīvālī tadā smṛtā // MatsP_141.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:12455: etāsāṃ dvilavaḥ kālaḥ kuhūmātrā kuhūḥ smṛtā // MatsP_141.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:12456: ityeṣa parvasaṃdhīnāṃ kālo vai dvilavaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12461: arkanirmaṇḍale some parvakālaḥ kalāḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_141.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:12462: yasmād āpūryate somaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ tu pūrṇimā /
GP12mtp176pu:12464: tasmātpañcadaśe some kalā vai nāsti ṣoḍaśī /
GP12mtp176pu:12465: tasmātsomasya viproktaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ mayā kṣayaḥ // MatsP_141.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:12469: teṣāṃ gatiṃ ca sattatvaṃ prāptiṃ śrāddhasya caiva hi // MatsP_141.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:12470: na mṛtānāṃ gatiḥ śakyā jñātuṃ vā punarāgatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12471: tapasā hi prasiddhena kiṃ punarmāṃsacakṣuṣā // MatsP_141.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:12473: teṣāṃ te dharmasāmarthyāt smṛtāḥ sāyujyagā dvijaiḥ // MatsP_141.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:12475: anye cātra prasīdanti śraddhāyukteṣu karmasu // MatsP_141.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:12477: śrāddhena vidyayā caiva cānnadānena saptadhā // MatsP_141.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:12478: karmasveteṣu ye saktā vartanty ā dehapātanāt /
GP12mtp176pu:12480: svargatā divi modante pitṛmanta upāsate // MatsP_141.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:12481: prajāvatāṃ prasiddhaiṣā uktā śrāddhakṛtāṃ ca vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12482: teṣāṃ nivāpe dattaṃ hi tatkulīnaistu bāndhavaiḥ // MatsP_141.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:12484: ete manuṣyāḥ pitaro māsaśrāddhabhujastu vai // MatsP_141.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:12485: tebhyo 'pare tu ye tvanye saṃkīrṇāḥ karmayoniṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:12493: sthāneṣu pātyamānā ye yātanāstheṣu teṣu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12496: tatrasthānāṃ tu teṣāṃ vai duḥkhitānām aśāyinām // MatsP_141.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:12500: aprāptā yātanāsthānaṃ prabhraṣṭā ye ca pañcadhā /
GP12mtp176pu:12501: paścādye sthāvarānte vai bhūtānīke svakarmabhiḥ // MatsP_141.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:12503: yadāhārā bhavantyete tāsu tāsviha yoniṣu // MatsP_141.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:12504: tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tadāhāre śrāddhaṃ dattaṃ tu prīṇayet /
GP12mtp176pu:12507: yathā goṣu pranaṣṭāsu vatso vindati mātaram /
GP12mtp176pu:12508: tathā śrāddheṣu dṛṣṭānto mantraḥ prāpayate tu tam // MatsP_141.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:12511: gatāgatajñaḥ pretānāṃ prāptiṃ śrāddhasya caiva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:12513: ityete pitaro devā devāśca pitaraśca vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12514: anyonyapitaro hyete devāśca pitaro divi // MatsP_141.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:12515: ete tu pitaro devā manuṣyāḥ pitaraśca ye /
GP12mtp176pu:12518: etatpitṛmahattvaṃ hi purāṇe niścayaṃ gatam // MatsP_141.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:12520: avāptiṃ śraddhayā caiva pitṝṇāṃ caiva tarpaṇam // MatsP_141.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:12521: parvaṇāṃ caiva yaḥ kālo yātanāsthānameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12526: vistareṇānupūrvyācca bhūyaḥ kiṃ kathayāmi vaḥ // MatsP_141.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:12528: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ caturyugāṇi yāni syuḥ pūrve svāyambhuve 'ntare /
GP12mtp176pu:12529: eṣāṃ nisargasaṃkhyāṃ ca śrotumicchāma vistarāt // MatsP_142.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12536: kāṣṭhā nimeṣā daśa pañca caiva triṃśacca kāṣṭhāṃ gaṇayetkalāṃ tu /
GP12mtp176pu:12539: rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇāmahaḥ // MatsP_142.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:12540: pitrye rātryahanī māsaḥ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12541: kṛṣṇapakṣas tvahasteṣāṃ śuklaḥ svapnāya śarvarī // MatsP_142.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:12542: triṃśadye mānuṣā māsāḥ pitryo māsaḥ sa ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:12543: śatāni trīṇi māsānāṃ ṣaṣṭyā cābhyadhikāni tu /
GP12mtp176pu:12544: pitryaḥ saṃvatsaro hyeṣa mānuṣeṇa vibhāvyate // MatsP_142.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12546: pitṝṇāṃ tāni varṣāṇi saṃkhyātāni tu trīṇi vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12547: daśa ca dvyadhikā māsāḥ pitṛsaṃkhyeha kīrtitā // MatsP_142.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:12548: laukikena pramāṇena abdo yo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12552: ete rātryahanī divye prasaṃkhyāte tayoḥ punaḥ // MatsP_142.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:12553: triṃśadyāni tu varṣāṇi divyo māsastu sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12554: mānuṣāṇāṃ śataṃ yacca divyā māsāstrayastu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12555: tathaiva saha saṃkhyāto divya eṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_142.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:12557: divyaḥ saṃvatsaro hyeṣa mānuṣeṇa prakīrtitaḥ // MatsP_142.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:12560: nava yāni sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ mānuṣāṇi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:12564: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ tu prāhuḥ saṃkhyāvido janāḥ // MatsP_142.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:12568: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaivaṃ caturyugam // MatsP_142.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:12570: dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaiva yugāni parikalpayet // MatsP_142.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:12572: tasya tāv acchatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaśca tathāvidhaḥ // MatsP_142.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:12574: ekapāde nivartante sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // MatsP_142.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:12576: tasyāpi triśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaḥ saṃdhyayā samaḥ // MatsP_142.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12577: dve sahasre dvāparaṃ tu saṃdhyāṃśau tu catuḥśatam /
GP12mtp176pu:12579: dve śate ca tathānye ca saṃdhyāsaṃdhyāṃśayoḥ smṛte // MatsP_142.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12581: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti catuṣṭayam // MatsP_142.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:12583: niyutāni daśa dve ca pañca caivātra saṃkhyayā /
GP12mtp176pu:12585: prayutaṃ tu tathā pūrṇaṃ dve cānye niyute punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12587: tretāyugasya saṃkhyaiṣā mānuṣeṇa tu saṃjñitā // MatsP_142.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:12590: catvāri niyutāni syur varṣāṇi tu kaliryugam /
GP12mtp176pu:12594: caturyugasya saṃkhyātā saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśakaiḥ saha // MatsP_142.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:12598: ekatriṃśattathā koṭyaḥ saṃkhyātāḥ saṃkhyayā dvijaiḥ // MatsP_142.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12600: sahasrāṇi tu dvātriṃśac chatānyaṣṭādhikāni ca // MatsP_142.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12604: sahasrāṇāṃ śatānyāhuḥ sa ca vai parisaṃkhyayā // MatsP_142.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12606: manvantarasya kālastu yugaiḥ saha prakīrtitaḥ // MatsP_142.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12610: tatastu pralayaḥ kṛtsnaḥ sa tu saṃpralayo mahān // MatsP_142.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:12612: caturyugākhyā vyākhyātā kṛtaṃ tretāyugaṃ ca vai // MatsP_142.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12614: yugapatsamavetau dvau dvidhā vaktuṃ na śakyate // MatsP_142.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:12619: śrautasmārtaṃ bruvandharmaṃ brahmaṇā tu pracoditāḥ // MatsP_142.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:12629: ādikalpe tu devānāṃ prādurbhūtāstu te svayam // MatsP_142.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:12632: te mantrā vai punasteṣāṃ pratimāyāmupasthitāḥ // MatsP_142.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:12634: saptarṣibhiśca ye proktāḥ smārtaṃ tu manurabravīt // MatsP_142.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12644: kriyāvantaḥ prajāvantaḥ samṛddhāḥ sukhinaśca vai // MatsP_142.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:12651: sarvasādhāraṇaṃ hyetad āsīttretāyuge tu vai // MatsP_142.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:12653: saṃhitāśca tathā mantrā ārogyaṃ dharmaśīlatā // MatsP_142.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:12654: saṃhitāśca tathā mantrā ṛṣibhir brahmaṇaḥ sutaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12655: yajñaḥ pravartitaścaiva tadā hyeva tu daivataiḥ // MatsP_142.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:12658: svāyambhuve 'ntare devais te yajñāḥ prākpravartitāḥ // MatsP_142.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:12659: satyaṃ japastapo dānaṃ pūrvadharmo ya ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:12660: yadā dharmasya hrasate śākhādharmasya vardhate // MatsP_142.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:12661: jāyante ca tadā śūrā āyuṣmanto mahābalāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12667: nyagrodhau tu smṛtau bāhū vyāmo nyagrodha ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:12668: vyāmena sūcchrayo yasya ata ūrdhvaṃ tu dehinaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12671: proktāni sapta ratnāni pūrvaṃ svāyambhuve 'ntare // MatsP_142.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:12673: manvantareṣu sarveṣu hy atītānāgateṣu vai // MatsP_142.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:12677: atyadbhutāni catvāri balaṃ dharmaṃ sukhaṃ dhanam // MatsP_142.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:12679: artho dharmaśca kāmaśca yaśo vijaya eva ca // MatsP_142.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:12681: śrutena tapasā caiva ṛṣīṃste 'bhibhavanti hi // MatsP_142.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:12684: keśāḥ sthitā lalāṭena jihvā ca parimārjanī /
GP12mtp176pu:12691: antarikṣe samudreṣu pātāle parvateṣu ca // MatsP_142.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:12692: ijyā dānaṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ tretādharmāstu vai smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12696: eko vedaścatuṣpādas tretāyāṃ tu vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12697: trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi jīvante tatra tāḥ prajāḥ // MatsP_142.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:12699: eṣa tretāyuge bhāvas tretāsaṃkhyāṃ nibodhata // MatsP_142.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:12701: saṃdhyāpādaḥ svabhāvācca yo 'ṃśaḥ pādena tiṣṭhati // MatsP_142.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:12704: pūrve svāyambhuve sarge yathāvatprabravīhi naḥ // MatsP_143.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12706: kālākhyāyāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ prāpte tretāyuge tadā // MatsP_143.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12708: pratiṣṭhitāyāṃ vārttāyāṃ grāmeṣu ca pureṣu ca // MatsP_143.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:12712: *sūta uvāca mantrānvai yojayitvā tu ihāmutra ca karmasu /
GP12mtp176pu:12717: hūyamāne devahotre agnau bahuvidhaṃ haviḥ // MatsP_143.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12720: ālabdheṣu ca madhye tu tathā paśugaṇeṣu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:12721: āhūteṣu ca deveṣu yajñabhukṣu tatastadā // MatsP_143.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:12723: tānyajanti tadā devāḥ kalyādiṣu bhavanti ye // MatsP_143.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:12726: viśvabhujaṃ te tvapṛcchan kathaṃ yajñavidhistava // MatsP_143.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:12728: navaḥ paśuvidhistviṣṭas tava yajñe surottama // MatsP_143.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:12730: nāyaṃ dharmo hyadharmo 'yaṃ na hiṃsā dharma ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:12738: jaṅgamaiḥ sthāvaraiḥ kena yaṣṭavyamiti cocyate // MatsP_143.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:12739: te tu khinnā vivādena śaktyā yuktā maharṣayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12740: saṃdhāya samamindreṇa papracchuḥ khacaraṃ vasum // MatsP_143.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:12741: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ mahāprājña tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ yajñavidhirnṛpa /
GP12mtp176pu:12742: auttānapāde prabrūhi saṃśayaṃ nastuda prabho // MatsP_143.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:12743: *sūta uvāca śrutvā vākyaṃ vasusteṣām avicārya balābalam /
GP12mtp176pu:12747: hiṃsā svabhāvo yajñasya iti me darśanāgamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12748: tathaite bhāvitā mantrā hiṃsāliṅgā maharṣibhiḥ // MatsP_143.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:12750: tatpramāṇaṃ mayā coktaṃ tasmācchamitum arhatha // MatsP_143.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:12751: yadi pramāṇaṃ svānyeva mantravākyāṇi vo dvijāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12752: tathā pravartatāṃ yajño hy anyathā mānṛtaṃ vacaḥ // MatsP_143.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:12753: evaṃ kṛtottarāste tu yujyātmānaṃ tato dhiyā /
GP12mtp176pu:12760: bahudhārasya dharmasya sūkṣmā duranugā gatiḥ // MatsP_143.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:12761: tasmānna niścayādvaktuṃ dharmaḥ śakyo hi kenacit /
GP12mtp176pu:12763: tasmānna hiṃsā yajñe syād yaduktamṛṣibhiḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:12766: uñchaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ śākam udapātraṃ tapodhanāḥ // MatsP_143.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12769: brahmacaryaṃ tapaḥ śaucam anukrośaṃ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12772: yajñaiśca devānāpnoti vairājaṃ tapasā punaḥ // MatsP_143.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12774: jñānātprāpnoti kaivalyaṃ pañcaitā gatayaḥ smṛtāḥ // MatsP_143.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:12776: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca pūrve svāyambhuve 'ntare // MatsP_143.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:12777: tataste ṛṣayo dṛṣṭvā hṛtaṃ dharmaṃ balena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:12780: śrūyante hi tapaḥsiddhā brahmakṣatrādayo nṛpāḥ // MatsP_143.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12784: ete cānye ca bahavas te tapobhirdivaṃ gatāḥ // MatsP_143.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:12786: tasmādviśiṣyate yajñāt tapaḥ sarvaistu kāraṇaiḥ // MatsP_143.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:12790: tadāprabhṛti yajño 'yaṃ yugaiḥ sārdhaṃ pravartitaḥ // MatsP_143.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:12792: *sūta uvāca ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi dvāparasya vidhiṃ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12793: tatra tretāyuge kṣīṇe dvāparaṃ pratipadyate // MatsP_144.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:12794: dvāparādau prajānāṃ tu siddhistretāyuge tu yā /
GP12mtp176pu:12795: parivṛtte yuge tasmiṃs tataḥ sā vai praṇaśyati // MatsP_144.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:12796: tataḥ pravartite tāsāṃ prajānāṃ dvāpare punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12799: yātrā vadhaḥ paro daṇḍo māno darpo 'kṣamā balam // MatsP_144.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:12800: tathā rajastamo bhūyaḥ pravṛtte dvāpare punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12801: ādye kṛte nādharmo 'sti sa tretāyāṃ pravartitaḥ // MatsP_144.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:12802: dvāpare vyākulo bhūtvā praṇaśyati kalau punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12803: varṇānāṃ dvāpare dharmāḥ saṃkīryante tathāśramāḥ // MatsP_144.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:12805: dvidhā śrutiḥ smṛtiścaiva niścayo nādhigamyate // MatsP_144.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:12810: eko vedaścatuṣpādaḥ saṃhṛtya tu punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12818: anye tu prasthitāstānvai kecit tān pratyavasthitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12823: tathaivātharvaṇāṃ sāmnāṃ vikalpaiḥ svasya saṃkṣayaiḥ // MatsP_144.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:12825: dvāpare saṃnivṛtte te vedā naśyanti vai kalau // MatsP_144.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:12839: manasā karmaṇā vācā kṛcchrādvārttā prasidhyati // MatsP_144.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:12845: niḥśeṣe dvāpare tasmiṃs tasya saṃdhyā tu pādataḥ // MatsP_144.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:12847: tathaiva saṃdhyā pādena aṃśastasyāṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // MatsP_144.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:12848: dvāparasya tu paryāye puṣyasya ca nibodhata /
GP12mtp176pu:12851: ete svabhāvāḥ puṣyasya sādhayanti ca tāḥ prajāḥ // MatsP_144.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:12852: eṣa dharmaḥ smṛtaḥ kṛtsno dharmaśca parihīyate /
GP12mtp176pu:12853: manasā karmaṇā vācā vārttāḥ sidhyanti vā na vā // MatsP_144.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:12854: kaliḥ pramārako rogaḥ satataṃ cāpi kṣudbhayam /
GP12mtp176pu:12855: anāvṛṣṭibhayaṃ caiva deśānāṃ ca viparyayaḥ // MatsP_144.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:12856: na pramāṇe sthitirhyasti puṣye ghore yuge kalau /
GP12mtp176pu:12857: garbhastho mriyate kaścid yauvanasthastathā paraḥ // MatsP_144.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:12858: sthāvirye madhyakaumāre mriyante ca kalau prajāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12864: puṣye bhavanti jantūnāṃ lobho mohaśca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12865: saṃkṣobho jāyate 'tyarthaṃ kalimāsādya vai yugam // MatsP_144.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:12866: nādhīyate tathā vedān na yajante dvijātayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12867: utsīdanti tathā caiva vaiśyaiḥ sārdhaṃ tu kṣatriyāḥ // MatsP_144.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:12871: kāṣāyiṇaśca niṣkacchās tathā kāpālinaśca ha // MatsP_144.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:12872: ye cānye devavratinas tathā ye dharmadūṣakāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12873: divyavṛttāśca ye kecid vṛttyarthaṃ śrutiliṅginaḥ // MatsP_144.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:12874: evaṃvidhāśca ye kecid bhavantīha kalau yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:12875: adhīyate tadā vedāñ chūdrā dharmārthakovidāḥ // MatsP_144.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:12877: strībālagovadhaṃ kṛtvā hatvā caiva parasparam // MatsP_144.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:12881: bhrūṇahatyā prajānāṃ na tathā hyevaṃ pravartate // MatsP_144.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:12883: duḥkhenābhiplutānāṃ ca paramāyuḥ śataṃ nṛṇām // MatsP_144.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:12884: bhūtvā ca na bhavantīha vedāḥ kaliyuge 'khilāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12885: utsīdante tathā yajñāḥ kevalaṃ dharmahetavaḥ // MatsP_144.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:12887: yuge yuge tu hīyante trīṃstrīnpādāṃśca siddhayaḥ // MatsP_144.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:12890: evaṃ saṃdhyāṃśake kāle samprāpte tu yugāntike /
GP12mtp176pu:12891: teṣāmadharmiṇāṃ śāstā bhṛgūṇāṃ ca kule sthitaḥ // MatsP_144.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:12895: aśvakarmā sa vai senāṃ hastyaśvarathasaṃkulām // MatsP_144.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:12897: sa tadā taiḥ parivṛto mlecchānsarvān nijaghnivān // MatsP_144.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:12909: mānavasya tu vaṃśe tu nṛdevasyeha jajñivān // MatsP_144.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:12911: sutaḥ sa vai candramasaḥ pūrve kaliyuge prabhuḥ // MatsP_144.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:12914: kṛtvā bījāvaśiṣṭāṃ tāṃ pṛthvīṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:12916: saṃsthitā sahasā yā tu senā pramatinā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:12919: utsādya pārthivānsarvāṃs teṣvatīteṣu vai tadā // MatsP_144.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:12920: tataḥ saṃdhyāṃśake kāle samprāpte ca yugāntike /
GP12mtp176pu:12922: svāpradānās tadā te vai lobhāviṣṭāstu vṛndaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12925: prajāstā vai tadā sarvāḥ parasparabhayārditāḥ // MatsP_144.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:12926: vyākulāstāḥ parāvṛttās tyaktvā devaṃ gṛhāṇi tu /
GP12mtp176pu:12933: āśrayanti sma pratyantān hitvā janapadānsvakān // MatsP_144.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:12937: evaṃ kaṣṭamanuprāptā hy alpaśeṣāḥ prajāstataḥ // MatsP_144.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:12940: tataḥ prajāstu tāḥ sarvā māṃsāhārā bhavanti hi /
GP12mtp176pu:12943: samudraṃ saṃśritā yāstu nadīścaiva prajāstu tāḥ // MatsP_144.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:12948: evaṃ varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ divyaṃ teṣāṃ nyavartata /
GP12mtp176pu:12949: ṣaṭtriṃśacca sahasrāṇi mānuṣāṇi tu tāni vai // MatsP_144.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:12951: matsyāścaiva hatāḥ sarvaiḥ kṣudhāviṣṭaiśca sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_144.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:12953: saṃdhyāṃśe pratipanne tu niḥśeṣāstu tadā kṛtāḥ // MatsP_144.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:12958: evaṃ kṣayaṃ gamiṣyanti hy alpaśiṣṭāḥ prajāstadā /
GP12mtp176pu:12961: tato varṣaśatasyānte alpaśiṣṭāḥ striyaḥ sutāḥ // MatsP_144.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:12962: mithunāni tu tāḥ sarvā hy anyonyaṃ samprajajñire /
GP12mtp176pu:12963: tatastāstu mriyante vai pūrvotpannāḥ prajāstu yāḥ // MatsP_144.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:12965: yathā svarge śarīrāṇi narake caiva dehinām // MatsP_144.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:12967: evaṃ kṛtasya saṃtānaḥ kaleścaiva kṣayastathā // MatsP_144.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:12971: bhāvino 'rthasya ca balāt tataḥ kṛtamavartata // MatsP_144.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:12975: pravṛtte tu tatastasmin punaḥ kṛtayuge tu vai // MatsP_144.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:12977: tiṣṭhanti ceha ye siddhā adṛṣṭā viharanti ca // MatsP_144.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:12978: saha saptarṣibhirye tu tatra ye ca vyavasthitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12979: brahmakṣatraviśaḥ śūdrā bījārthe ya iha smṛtāḥ /
