GP12mtp176pu:12981: teṣāṃ saptarṣayo dharmaṃ kathayantīha teṣu ca // MatsP_144.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:12983: evaṃ teṣu kriyāvatsu pravartantīha vai kṛte // MatsP_144.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:12985: te tu dharmavyavasthārthaṃ tiṣṭhantīha kṛte yuge // MatsP_144.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:12988: vanānāṃ prathamaṃ vṛṣṭyā teṣāṃ mūleṣu sambhavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:12989: evaṃ yugādyugānāṃ vai saṃtānastu parasparam // MatsP_144.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:12991: sukhamāyurbalaṃ rūpaṃ dharmārthau kāma eva ca // MatsP_144.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:12992: yugeṣvetāni hīyante trayaḥ pādāḥ krameṇa tu /
GP12mtp176pu:12993: ityeṣa pratisaṃdhirvaḥ kīrtitastu mayā dvijāḥ // MatsP_144.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:12995: eṣāṃ caturyugāṇāṃ tu gaṇitā hyekasaptatiḥ // MatsP_144.102 //
GP12mtp176pu:12997: yugākhyāsu tu sarvāsu bhavatīha yadā ca yat // MatsP_144.103 //
GP12mtp176pu:12999: sarge sarge yathā bhedā hy utpadyante tathaiva ca // MatsP_144.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:13001: āsurī yātudhānī ca paiśācī yakṣarākṣasī // MatsP_144.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:13002: yuge yuge tadā kāle prajā jāyanti tāḥ śṛṇu /
GP12mtp176pu:13004: ityetallakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ yugānāṃ vai yathākramam // MatsP_144.106 //
GP12mtp176pu:13006: kṣaṇaṃ na saṃtiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:13008: manvantarāṇi yānyasmin kalpe vakṣyāmi tāni ca // MatsP_144.108 //
GP12mtp176pu:13010: *sūta uvāca manvantarāṇi yāni syuḥ kalpe kalpe caturdaśa /
GP12mtp176pu:13013: tasminyuge ca sambhūtir yāsāṃ yāvacca jīvitam // MatsP_145.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13014: yugamātraṃ tu jīvanti nyūnaṃ tatsyāddvayena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13016: manuṣyāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ ca pakṣiṇāṃ sthāvaraiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:13019: asthitiṃ ca kalau dṛṣṭvā bhūtānāmāyuṣaśca vai // MatsP_145.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:13020: paramāyuḥ śataṃ tvetan mānuṣāṇāṃ kalau smṛtam /
GP12mtp176pu:13022: pariṇāhocchraye tulyā jāyante ha kṛte yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:13029: ā pādatalamastako navatālo bhavettu yaḥ // MatsP_145.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13031: gavāṃ ca hastināṃ caiva mahiṣasthāvarātmanām // MatsP_145.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13036: śatārdhamaṅgulānāṃ tu hy utsedhaḥ śākhināṃ paraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13041: ityeva hi parikrāntā bhāvā ye divyamānuṣāḥ // MatsP_145.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:13042: paśūnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ caiva sthāvarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13043: gāvo 'jāśvāśca vijñeyā hastinaḥ pakṣiṇo mṛgāḥ // MatsP_145.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13050: saṃyujya brahmaṇā hyantas tena santaḥ pracakṣate // MatsP_145.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13051: sāmānyeṣu ca dharmeṣu tathā vaiśiṣikeṣu ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13054: śrautasmārto hi yo dharmo jñānadharmaḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_145.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:13058: yatamāno yatiḥ sādhuḥ smṛto yogasya sādhanāt // MatsP_145.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:13059: dharmo dharmagatiḥ proktaḥ śabdo hyeṣa kriyātmakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13062: ayaṃ dharmo hyayaṃ neti bruvate maunamūrtinā // MatsP_145.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:13063: dharmeti dhāraṇe dhātur mahattve caiva ucyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13064: ādhāraṇe mahattve vā dharmaḥ sa tu nirucyate // MatsP_145.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:13073: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni brahmaṇo 'ṅgāni vai śrutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13076: evaṃ vai dvividho dharmaḥ śiṣṭācāraḥ sa ucyate // MatsP_145.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:13078: manvantareṣu ye śiṣṭā iha tiṣṭhanti dhārmikāḥ // MatsP_145.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:13081: taiḥ śiṣṭaiścalito dharmaḥ sthāpyate vai yuge yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:13085: dānaṃ satyaṃ tapo loko vidyejyā pūjanaṃ damaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13086: aṣṭau tāni caritrāṇi śiṣṭācārasya lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:13091: pratyaṅgāni pravakṣyāmi dharmasyeha tu lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:13092: dṛṣṭānubhūtamarthaṃ ca yaḥ pṛṣṭo na vigūhate /
GP12mtp176pu:13095: ityetattapaso rūpaṃ sughoraṃ tu durāsadam // MatsP_145.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:13097: ṛtvijāṃ dakṣiṇāyāśca saṃyogo yajña ucyate // MatsP_145.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:13099: vartate satataṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kriyā śreṣṭhā dayā smṛtā // MatsP_145.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:13101: aduṣṭo vāṅmanaḥkāyais titikṣuḥ sā kṣamā smṛtā // MatsP_145.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:13103: parasvānām anādānam alobha iti saṃjñitam // MatsP_145.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:13106: ātmārthe vā parārthe vā indriyāṇīha yasya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:13107: viṣaye na pravartante damasyaitattu lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:13109: na krudhyeta pratihataḥ sa jitātmā bhaviṣyati // MatsP_145.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:13117: kuśalākuśalābhyāṃ tu prahāṇaṃ nyāsa ucyate // MatsP_145.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:13119: cetanācetanaṃ jñātvā jñāne jñānī sa ucyate // MatsP_145.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:13122: atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi vidhiṃ manvantarasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13123: tathaiva cāturhotrasya cāturvarṇyasya caiva hi // MatsP_145.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:13127: dravyastotraṃ guṇastotraṃ karmastotraṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_145.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:13129: manvantareṣu sarveṣu yathā bhedā bhavanti hi // MatsP_145.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:13130: pravartayanti teṣāṃ vai brahmastotraṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13133: ṛṣīṇāṃ tapyatāṃ teṣāṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram // MatsP_145.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:13137: ṛṣīṇāṃ yādṛśatvaṃ hi tadvakṣyāmīha lakṣaṇam // MatsP_145.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:13139: tathā ṛṣīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi ārṣasyeha samudbhavam // MatsP_145.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:13144: pravartate tathā te tu yathā matsyodakāvubhau /
GP12mtp176pu:13152: saṃsiddhikāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sadya eva vivartate // MatsP_145.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:13154: tathā pravṛttāḥ kṣetrajñāḥ kālenaikena kāraṇāt // MatsP_145.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:13156: tathā nivṛtto hyavyaktaḥ khadyota iva saṃjvalan // MatsP_145.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:13159: tatraiva saṃsthito vidvāṃs tapaso 'nta iti śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:13164: puri śete yataḥ pūrvaṃ kṣetrajñānaṃ tathāpi ca // MatsP_145.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:13166: yasmāddharmātprasūte hi tasmādvai dhārmikastu saḥ // MatsP_145.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:13168: evaṃ vivṛttaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetraṃ hyanabhisaṃdhitaḥ // MatsP_145.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:13170: kṣetrajñena parijñātaṃ bhogyo 'yaṃ viṣayo mama // MatsP_145.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:13171: ṛṣirhiṃsāgatau dhātur vidyā satyaṃ tapaḥ śrutam /
GP12mtp176pu:13172: eṣa sannilayo yasmād brāhmaṇastutatas tv ṛṣiḥ // MatsP_145.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:13174: ṛṣate paramaṃ yasmāt paramarṣistataḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_145.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:13176: yasmādeṣa svayaṃbhūtas tasmācca ṛṣitā matā // MatsP_145.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:13184: ṛṣikāṇāṃ sutā ye tu vijñeyā ṛṣiputrakāḥ // MatsP_145.86 //
GP12mtp176pu:13186: avyaktātmā mahātmā vā-haṃkārātmā tathaiva ca // MatsP_145.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:13190: manurdakṣo vasiṣṭhaśca pulastyaścāpi te daśa // MatsP_145.89 //
GP12mtp176pu:13197: ityete ṛṣayaḥ proktās tapasā ṛṣitāṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13202: śṛṅgī ca śaṅkhapāc caiva rājā vaiśravaṇastathā // MatsP_145.95 //
GP12mtp176pu:13203: ityete ṛṣikāḥ sarve satyena ṛṣitāṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13204: īśvarā ṛṣayaścaiva ṛṣīkā ye ca viśrutāḥ // MatsP_145.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:13206: bhṛguḥ kāśyapaḥ pracetā dadhīco hyātmavānapi // MatsP_145.97 //
GP12mtp176pu:13220: kakṣīvāṃśca trayastriṃśat smṛtā hyaṅgirasāṃ varāḥ // MatsP_145.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:13222: kāśyapaḥ sahavatsāro naidhruvo nitya eva ca // MatsP_145.105 //
GP12mtp176pu:13225: karṇakaśca ṛṣiḥ siddhas tathā pūrvātithiśca yaḥ // MatsP_145.107 //
GP12mtp176pu:13235: śiśiraśca mahātejāḥ śālaṅkāyana eva ca // MatsP_145.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:13241: bhalandakaśca vāsāśvaḥ saṃkīlaścaiva te trayaḥ // MatsP_145.115 //
GP12mtp176pu:13242: ete mantrakṛto jñeyā vaiśyānāṃ pravarāḥ sadā /
GP12mtp176pu:13243: iti dvinavatiḥ proktā mantrāyaiśca bahiṣkṛtāḥ // MatsP_145.116 //
GP12mtp176pu:13245: ṛṣīkāṇāṃ sutā hyete ṛṣiputrāḥ śrutarṣayaḥ // MatsP_145.117 //
GP12mtp176pu:13247: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kathaṃ matsyena kathitas tārakasya vadho mahān /
GP12mtp176pu:13250: karṇābhyāṃ pibatāṃ tṛptir asmākaṃ na prajāyate /
GP12mtp176pu:13251: idaṃ mune samākhyāhi mahābuddhe manogatam // MatsP_146.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13252: *sūta uvāca pṛṣṭastu manunā devo matsyarūpī janārdanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13253: kathaṃ śaravaṇe jāto devaḥ ṣaḍvadano vibho // MatsP_146.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:13256: *matsya uvāca vajrāṅgo nāma daityo 'bhūt tasya putrastu tārakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13259: bhītāṃśca tridaśāndṛṣṭvā brahmā teṣāmuvāca ha // MatsP_146.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:13262: tataḥ kāle tu kasmiṃścid dṛṣṭvā vai śailajāṃ śivaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13265: vidārya jaṭharāṇyeṣām ajīrṇaṃ nirgataṃ mune // MatsP_146.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:13267: tasmāttu sa samudbhūto guho dinakaraprabhaḥ // MatsP_146.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13269: evaṃ śrutvā tato vākyaṃ tam ūcur ṛṣisattamāḥ // MatsP_146.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13271: vistareṇa hi no brūhi yāthātathyena śṛṇvatām // MatsP_146.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:13272: vajrāṅgo nāma daityendraḥ kasya vaṃśodbhavaḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:13274: nirmitaḥ ko vadhe cābhūt tasya daityeśvarasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13275: guhajanma tu kārtsnyena asmākaṃ brūhi mānada // MatsP_146.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:13276: *sūta uvāca mānaso brahmaṇaḥ putro dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13277: ṣaṣṭiṃ so 'janayatkanyā vairiṇyāmeva naḥ śrutam // MatsP_146.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:13278: dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa /
GP12mtp176pu:13280: dve vai bāhukaputrāya dve vai cāṅgirase tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:13281: dve kṛśāśvāya viduṣe prajāpatisutaḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_146.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13283: surabhirvinatā caiva tāmrā krodhavaśā irā // MatsP_146.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:13287: devendropendrapūṣādyāḥ sarve te ditijā matāḥ // MatsP_146.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13289: dānavāśca danoḥ putrā gāvaśca surabhīsutāḥ // MatsP_146.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:13291: nāgāḥ kadrūsutā jñeyāḥ śeṣāścānye 'pi jantavaḥ // MatsP_146.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:13295: nihatā viṣṇunā saṃkhye śeṣāścendreṇa dānavāḥ // MatsP_146.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:13297: bhartāraṃ kaśyapaṃ devaṃ putramanyaṃ mahābalam // MatsP_146.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:13298: samare śakrahantāraṃ sa tasyā adadātprabhuḥ // MatsP_146.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:13299: niyame varta he devi sahasraṃ śucimānasā /
GP12mtp176pu:13300: varṣāṇāṃ lapsyase putram ityuktā sā tathākarot // MatsP_146.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:13304: uvāca śakraṃ suprītā varadā tapasi sthitā // MatsP_146.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:13307: bhaviṣyati ca te bhrātā tena sārdhamimāṃ śriyam // MatsP_146.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:13311: tattu randhraṃ samāsādya jaṭharaṃ pākaśāsanaḥ // MatsP_146.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:13312: cakāra saptadhā garbhaṃ kuliśena tu devarāṭ /
GP12mtp176pu:13313: ekaikaṃ tu punaḥ khaṇḍaṃ cakāra maghavā tataḥ // MatsP_146.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:13314: saptadhā saptadhā kopāt prābudhyata tato ditiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13315: vibudhyovāca mā śakra ghātayethāḥ prajāṃ mama // MatsP_146.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:13317: uvāca vākyaṃ saṃtrasto māturvai vadaneritam // MatsP_146.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:13319: saptasaptabhirevātas tava garbhaḥ kṛto mayā // MatsP_146.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:13321: dāsyāmi teṣāṃ sthānāni divi daivatapūjite // MatsP_146.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:13327: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tapaḥ kṛtvā tu lapsyase // MatsP_146.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:13329: vajrāṅgo nāma putraste bhavitā putravatsale // MatsP_146.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:13330: sā tu labdhavarā devī jagāma tapase vanam /
GP12mtp176pu:13331: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi sā tapo ghoramācarat // MatsP_146.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:13335: uvāca mātaraṃ bhaktyā mātaḥ kiṃ karavāṇyaham // MatsP_146.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:13336: tamuvāca tato hṛṣṭā ditirdaityādhipaṃ ca sā /
GP12mtp176pu:13337: bahavo me hatāḥ putrāḥ sahasrākṣeṇa putraka // MatsP_146.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:13338: teṣāṃ tvaṃ pratikartuṃ vai gaccha śakravadhāya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13339: bāḍhamityeva tāmuktvā jagāma tridivaṃ balī // MatsP_146.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:13344: dṛṣṭvā tu tāvuvācedaṃ brahmā kaśyapa eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13345: muñcainaṃ putra devendraṃ kimanena prayojanam // MatsP_146.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:13346: apamāno vadhaḥ proktaḥ putra saṃbhāvitasya ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13347: asmadvākyena yo mukto viddhi taṃ mṛtameva ca // MatsP_146.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:13349: jīvanneva mṛto vatsa divase divase sa tu // MatsP_146.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:13351: etacchrutvā tu vajrāṅgaḥ praṇato vākyamabravīt // MatsP_146.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:13352: na me kṛtyamanenāsti māturājñā kṛtā mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:13353: tvaṃ surāsuranātho 'si mama ca prapitāmahaḥ // MatsP_146.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:13354: kariṣye tvadvaco deva eṣa muktaḥ śatakratuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13355: tapase me ratirdeva nirvighnaṃ caiva me bhavet // MatsP_146.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:13357: tasmiṃstūṣṇīṃ sthite daitye provācedaṃ pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_146.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:13360: anayā cittaśuddhyā te paryāptaṃ janmanaḥ phalam // MatsP_146.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:13362: tāmasmai pradadau devaḥ patnyarthaṃ padmasambhavaḥ // MatsP_146.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:13363: varāṅgīti ca nāmāsyāḥ kṛtvā yātaḥ pitāmahaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13364: vajrāṅgo 'pi tayā sārdhaṃ jagāma tapase vanam // MatsP_146.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:13370: jalāntaraṃ praviṣṭasya tasya patnī mahāvratā // MatsP_146.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:13372: nirāhārā tapo ghoraṃ praviveśa mahādyutiḥ // MatsP_146.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:13374: bhūtvā tu markaṭastatra tadāśramapadaṃ mahān // MatsP_146.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:13379: tapobalāḍhyā sā tasya na vadhyatvaṃ jagāma ha /
GP12mtp176pu:13384: śailasya duṣṭatāṃ matvā śāpaṃ dātuṃ vyavasthitā // MatsP_146.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:13386: uvāca tāṃ varārohāṃ varāṅgīṃ bhīrucetanaḥ // MatsP_146.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:13388: vibhramaṃ tu karotyeṣa ruṣitaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ // MatsP_146.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:13391: tuṣṭaḥ provāca vajrāṅgaṃ tamāgamya jalāśrayam // MatsP_146.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:13396: *vajrāṅga uvāca āsuro māstu me bhāvaḥ santu lokā mamākṣayāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13397: tapasyeva ratir me'stu śarīrasyāstu vartanam // MatsP_146.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:13399: vajrāṅgo 'pi samāpte tu tapasi sthirasaṃyamaḥ // MatsP_146.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:13401: kṣudhāviṣṭaḥ sa śailasya gahanaṃ praviveśa ha // MatsP_146.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:13404: tāṃ vilokya sa daityendraḥ provāca parisāntvayan // MatsP_146.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:13405: *vajrāṅga uvāca kena te 'pakṛtaṃ bhīru yamalokaṃ yiyāsunā /
GP12mtp176pu:13406: kaṃ vā kāmaṃ prayacchāmi śīghraṃ me brūhi bhāmini // MatsP_146.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:13412: putraṃ me tārakaṃ dehi duḥkhaśokamahārṇavāt // MatsP_147.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13416: jñātvā tu tasya saṃkalpaṃ brahmā krūrataraṃ punaḥ // MatsP_147.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:13418: uvāca tasmai bhagavān prabhurmadhurayā girā // MatsP_147.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:13421: āhārābhimukho daitya tanno brūhi mahāvrata // MatsP_147.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:13424: tyāgo hyaprāptakāmānāṃ kāmebhyo na tathā guruḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13425: yathā prāptaṃ parityajya kāmaṃ kamalalocana // MatsP_147.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:13429: mahiṣī bhīṣitā dīnā rudatī śākhinastale // MatsP_147.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13430: sā mayoktā tu tanvaṅgī dūyamānena cetasā /
GP12mtp176pu:13431: kimevaṃ vartase bhīru vada tvaṃ kiṃ cikīrṣasi // MatsP_147.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13432: ityuktā sā mayā deva provāca skhalitākṣaram /
GP12mtp176pu:13433: vākyaṃ covāca tanvaṅgī bhītā sā hetusaṃhitam // MatsP_147.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:13438: putraṃ me tārakaṃ dehi hy asmādduḥkhamahārṇavāt // MatsP_147.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:13440: tapo ghoraṃ kariṣyāmi jayāya tridivaukasām // MatsP_147.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:13444: alaṃ te tapasā vatsa mā kleśe dustare viśa /
GP12mtp176pu:13445: putraste tārako nāma bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ // MatsP_147.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:13449: tau dampatī kṛtārthau tu jagmatuḥ svāśramaṃ mudā // MatsP_147.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:13451: pūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ ca dadhārodara eva hi // MatsP_147.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13457: candrasūryau jahuḥ kāntiṃ sanīhārā diśo 'bhavan // MatsP_147.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:13458: jāte mahāsure tasmin sarve cāpi mahāsurāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13461: tato mahotsavo jāto dānavānāṃ dvijottamāḥ // MatsP_147.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:13463: varāṅgī svasutaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣeṇāpūritā tadā // MatsP_147.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:13464: bahu mene na devendra-vijayaṃ tu tadeva sā /
GP12mtp176pu:13468: sa tu prāpya mahārājyaṃ tārako munisattamāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13471: *tāraka uvāca śṛṇudhvamasurāḥ sarve vākyaṃ mama mahābalāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13472: śreyase kriyatāṃ buddhiḥ sarvaiḥ kṛtyasya saṃvidhau // MatsP_148.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:13474: asmākaṃ jātidharmo vai virūḍhaṃ vairamakṣayam // MatsP_148.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13476: svabāhubalamāśritya sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_148.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:13478: ahamādau kariṣyāmi tato ghoraṃ diteḥ sutāḥ // MatsP_148.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:13480: sthiropāyo hi puruṣaḥ sthiraśrīrapi jāyate // MatsP_148.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:13482: tacchrutvā dānavāḥ sarve vākyaṃ tasyāsurasya tu // MatsP_148.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:13490: prāpya tatkandaraṃ daityaś cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_148.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13492: śataṃ śataṃ samānāṃ tu tapāṃsyetāni so 'karot // MatsP_148.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13493: tataḥ svadehādutkṛtya karṣaṃ karṣaṃ dine dine /
GP12mtp176pu:13494: māṃsasyāgnau juhāvāsau tato nirmāṃsatāṃ gataḥ // MatsP_148.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:13496: jajvaluḥ sarvabhūtāni tejasā tasya sarvataḥ // MatsP_148.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:13497: udvignāśca surāḥ sarve tapasā tasya bhīṣitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13500: prāpya taṃ śailarājānaṃ sa gireḥ kandarasthitam /
GP12mtp176pu:13501: uvāca tārakaṃ devo girā madhurayā yutaḥ // MatsP_148.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:13504: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva ruciraṃ yatte manasi vartate // MatsP_148.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:13510: taiśca niḥśeṣitā daityāḥ krūraiḥ saṃtyajya dharmitām /
GP12mtp176pu:13511: teṣāmahaṃ samuddhartā bhaveyamiti me matiḥ // MatsP_148.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:13513: syāmahaṃ paramo hyeṣa varo mama hṛdi sthitaḥ // MatsP_148.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13514: etanme dehi deveśa nānyo me rocate varaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13515: tamuvāca tato daityaṃ viriñciḥ suranāyakaḥ // MatsP_148.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:13516: na yujyante vinā mṛtyuṃ dehino daityasattama /
GP12mtp176pu:13517: yatastato 'pi varaya mṛtyuṃ yasmānna śaṅkase // MatsP_148.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:13519: vavre mahāsuro mṛtyum avalepena mohitaḥ // MatsP_148.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:13521: jagāma tridivaṃ devo daityo 'pi svakamālayam // MatsP_148.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:13523: parivavruḥ sahasrākṣaṃ divi devagaṇā yathā // MatsP_148.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:13531: vījayantyapsaraḥśreṣṭhā bhṛśaṃ muñcanti naiva tāḥ // MatsP_148.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:13534: evaṃ prayāti kāle tu vitate tārakāsuraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13536: *tāraka uvāca rājyena kāraṇaṃ kiṃ me tv anākramya triviṣṭapam /
GP12mtp176pu:13537: aniryāpya surairvairaṃ kā śāntirhṛdaye mama // MatsP_148.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:13538: bhuñjate 'dyāpi yajñāṃśān amarā nāka eva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:13539: viṣṇuḥ śriyaṃ na jahati tiṣṭhate ca gatabhramaḥ // MatsP_148.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:13541: sotpalā madirāmodā divi krīḍāyaneṣu ca // MatsP_148.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:13542: labdhvā janma na yaḥ kaścid ghaṭayetpauruṣaṃ naraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13543: janma tasya vṛthā bhūtam ajanmā tu viśiṣyate // MatsP_148.35 //
GP12mtp176pu:13544: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ na karoti kāmān bandhūnaśokānna karoti yo vā /
GP12mtp176pu:13545: kīrtiṃ hi vā nārjayate himābhāṃ pumānsa jāto 'pi mṛto mataṃ me //
GP12mtp176pu:13547: saṃyojyatāṃ me rathamaṣṭacakraṃ balaṃ ca me durjayadaityacakram /
GP12mtp176pu:13548: dhvajaṃ ca me kāñcanapaṭṭanaddhaṃ chattraṃ ca me mauktikajālabaddham //
GP12mtp176pu:13549: tārakasya vacaḥ śrutvā grasano nāma dānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13550: senānīr daityarājasya tathā cakre balānvitaḥ // MatsP_148.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:13559: mathano jambhakaḥ śumbho daityendrā daśa nāyakāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13568: dhvāṅkṣo dhvaje tu śumbhasya kṛṣṇāyomayamucchritam // MatsP_148.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:13572: śatenāpi ca siṃhānāṃ ratho jambhasya durjayaḥ // MatsP_148.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:13574: rathastu mahiṣasyoṣṭrair gajasya tu turaṃgamaiḥ // MatsP_148.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:13594: dṛṣṭvā sa dānavabalaṃ jagāmendrasya śaṃsitum // MatsP_148.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:13595: sa gatvā tu sabhāṃ divyāṃ mahendrasya mahātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13596: śaśaṃsa madhye devānāṃ tatkāryaṃ samupasthitam // MatsP_148.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:13599: *indra uvāca samprāpto 'ti vimardo 'yaṃ devānāṃ dānavaiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:13608: saṃtāpitaḥ khalo yāti sādhyatāṃ bhraṣṭasaṃśayaḥ // MatsP_148.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:13610: jātidharmeṇa vā bhedyā dānaṃ prāptaśriye ca kim // MatsP_148.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:13612: durjaneṣu kṛtaṃ sāma mahadyāti ca vandhyatām // MatsP_148.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:13615: manyante durjanā nityaṃ sāma cāpi bhayodayāt /
GP12mtp176pu:13618: durjanaḥ sujanatvāya kalpate na kadācana // MatsP_148.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:13620: evaṃ me budhyate buddhir yūyamatra vyavasyata // MatsP_148.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:13623: *indra uvāca sāvadhānena me vācaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ nākavāsinaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13625: sve mahimni sthitā nityaṃ jagataḥ paripālakāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13627: teṣāṃ sāmādi naivāsti daṇḍa eva vidhīyatām /
GP12mtp176pu:13628: kriyatāṃ samarodyogaḥ sainyaṃ saṃyojyatāṃ mama // MatsP_148.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:13630: vāhanāni ca yānāni yojayantu mamāmarāḥ // MatsP_148.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:13632: ityuktāḥ samanahyanta devānāṃ ye pradhānataḥ // MatsP_148.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:13684: tūryāṇāṃ caiva nirghoṣair mātaṃgānāṃ ca bṛṃhitaiḥ // MatsP_149.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:13706: ākāśasaraso bhraṣṭaiḥ paṅkajairiva bhūḥ stṛtā // MatsP_149.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:13708: gajāḥ śalanibhāḥ petur dharaṇyāṃ rudhirasravāḥ // MatsP_149.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:13710: petuḥ śakalatāṃ yātās turaṃgāśca sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_149.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:13720: sa vicintya yamo bāṇān grasanasyātipauruṣam // MatsP_150.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:13724: viphalāṃ tāṃ samālokya yamastāṃ śarasaṃtatim // MatsP_150.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:13725: sa vicintya śaravrātaṃ grasanasya rathaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:13726: cikṣepa mudgaraṃ ghoraṃ tarasā tasya cāntakaḥ // MatsP_150.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:13727: sa taṃ mudgaram āyāntam utplutya gaganasthitam /
GP12mtp176pu:13729: tameva mudgaraṃ gṛhya yamasya mahiṣaṃ ruṣā /
GP12mtp176pu:13730: pātayāmāsa vegena sa papāta mahītale // MatsP_150.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:13732: prāsena tāḍayāmāsa grasanaṃ vadane dṛḍham // MatsP_150.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:13734: grasanaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā jambho bhīmaparākramaḥ // MatsP_150.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:13736: yamastena prahāreṇa susrāva rudhiraṃ mukhāt // MatsP_150.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:13738: vṛto yakṣāyutaśatair jambhaṃ pratyudyayau ruṣā // MatsP_150.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:13740: uvāca prājño vākyaṃ tu yathā snigdhena bhāṣitam // MatsP_150.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:13746: sa gadāṃ viyati prāpya rarāsāmbudharo yathā // MatsP_150.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:13752: nihatyātha gadāṃ daṇḍas tato grasanamūrdhani // MatsP_150.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:13754: sa tu tena prahāreṇa dṛṣṭvā satimirā diśaḥ // MatsP_150.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:13760: madvidhe vastuni puṃsi prabhoḥ paribhavodayāt // MatsP_150.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:13764: evaṃ saṃcintya vegena samuttasthau mahābalaḥ // MatsP_150.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:13768: samāsādya yamaṃ yuddhe grasano bhrāmya mudgaram // MatsP_150.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:13770: vilokya mudgaraṃ dīptaṃ yamaḥ saṃbhrāntalocanaḥ // MatsP_150.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:13773: yāmyānāṃ kiṃkarāṇāṃ tu sahasraṃ niṣpipeṣa ha /
GP12mtp176pu:13774: tatastāṃ nihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā ghorāṃ kiṃkaravāhinīm // MatsP_150.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:13776: grasanastu samālokya tāṃ kiṃkaramayīṃ camūm // MatsP_150.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:13786: apare muṣṭibhiḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ kiṃkarāḥ praharanti ca // MatsP_150.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:13788: utsṛjya gātraṃ bhūpṛṣṭhe niṣpipeṣa sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:13790: sa tu kiṃkarayuddhena grasanaḥ śramamāptavān // MatsP_150.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:13791: tamālokya yamaḥ śrāntaṃ nihatāṃ ca svavāhinīm /
GP12mtp176pu:13796: sa ratho daṇḍamathitair vyāghrairardhair vikṛṣyate // MatsP_150.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:13798: samutsṛjya rathaṃ daityaḥ padātirdharaṇīṃ gataḥ // MatsP_150.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:13810: yāvadyamasya vadanāt susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu // MatsP_150.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:13811: nirjīvitaṃ yamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ saṃtyajya dānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13812: jayaṃ prāpyoddhataṃ daityo nādaṃ muktvā mahāsvanaḥ // MatsP_150.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:13818: sārathiṃ ca śatenājau dhvajaṃ daśabhireva ca // MatsP_150.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:13821: siṃhamekena taṃ tīkṣṇair vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13826: vivyādha dhanadaṃ tīkṣṇaiḥ śarairvakṣasi dānavaḥ // MatsP_150.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:13831: mohaṃ paramato gacchan dṛḍhaviddho hi vittapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13834: diśaḥ khaṃ vidiśo bhūmīr anīkānyasurasya ca // MatsP_150.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:13838: tato dhaneśaḥ saṃkruddho dānavendrasya karmaṇā // MatsP_150.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:13840: taddṛṣṭvā duṣkṛtaṃ karma dhanādhyakṣasya dānavaḥ // MatsP_150.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:13844: rathaṃ dhanapateḥ sarve parivārya vyavasthitāḥ // MatsP_150.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:13848: jagrāha paraśuṃ daityo mardanaṃ daityavidviṣām // MatsP_150.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:13850: cicheda śataśo daityo hy ākhuḥ snigdhamivāmbaram // MatsP_150.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:13856: cikṣepa mūrdhni saṃkruddho jambhasya tu dhanādhipaḥ // MatsP_150.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:13858: daityo gadābhighātārthaṃ śastravṛṣṭiṃ mumoca ha // MatsP_150.72 //
GP12mtp176pu:13865: jambhaṃ tu nihataṃ matvā kujambho bhairavasvanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13867: cakre bāṇamayaṃ jālaṃ dikṣu yakṣādhipasya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:13868: cicheda bāṇajālaṃ tad ardhacandraiḥ śitaistataḥ // MatsP_150.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:13869: mumoca śaravṛṣṭiṃ tu tasmai yakṣādhipo balī /
GP12mtp176pu:13870: sa taṃ daityaḥ śaravrātaṃ cicheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // MatsP_150.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:13871: vyarthīkṛtāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā śaravṛṣṭiṃ dhanādhipaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13874: sa tāṃ nirūpya vegena kujambhāya mumoca ha // MatsP_150.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:13880: sa tena paṭṭiśenājau dhanadasya stanāntaram // MatsP_150.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:13884: nipapāta rathopasthe jarjaro dhūrvaho yathā // MatsP_150.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:13885: tathāgataṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā dhaneśaṃ naravāhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:13888: atha dṛṣṭvā tu durdharṣaṃ kujambho rākṣaseśvaram // MatsP_150.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:13890: sa dṛṣṭvā coditāṃ senāṃ bhallanānāstrabhīṣaṇām // MatsP_150.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:13900: jīvagrāhānsa jagrāha baddhvā pāśaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.93 //
GP12mtp176pu:13901: mūrtimanti tu ratnāni vividhāni ca dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13902: vāhanāni ca divyāni vimānāni sahasraśaḥ // MatsP_150.94 //
GP12mtp176pu:13905: dhyātvāstraṃ gāruḍaṃ divyaṃ bāṇaṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke /
GP12mtp176pu:13906: mumoca dānavānīke taṃ bāṇaṃ śatrudāraṇam // MatsP_150.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:13910: tataḥ krameṇa durvāraṃ nānārūpaṃ tadābhavat // MatsP_150.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:13912: tato 'ntarikṣe śaṃsanti tejaste tu pariṣkṛtam // MatsP_150.99 //
GP12mtp176pu:13922: yuyutsavaḥ sthitā yakṣā mukuṭaṃ parivārya tam // MatsP_150.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:13929: dhanāni ratnāni ca mūrtimanti tathā nidhānāni śarīriṇaśca /
GP12mtp176pu:13930: ādāya sarvāṇi jagāma daityo jambhaḥ svasainyaṃ danujendrasiṃhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13931: dhanādhipo vai vinikīrṇamūrdhajo jagāma dīnaḥ surabharturantikam //
GP12mtp176pu:13935: tato viphalanetrāṇi dānavānāṃ balāni tu // MatsP_150.110 //
GP12mtp176pu:13936: na śekuścalitaṃ tatra padādapi padaṃ tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:13947: cakruḥ krūreṇa manasā devānīkaiḥ sahādbhutam // MatsP_150.116 //
GP12mtp176pu:13953: tadādānaṃ ca saṃdhānaṃ na mokṣaścāpi lakṣyate // MatsP_150.119 //
GP12mtp176pu:13957: kujambhaḥ karma taddṛṣṭvā rākṣasendrasya saṃyuge // MatsP_150.121 //
GP12mtp176pu:13963: sa tu tena prahāreṇa kṣīṇaḥ saṃbhrāntamānasaḥ // MatsP_150.124 //
GP12mtp176pu:13967: keśeṣu nirṛtiṃ daityo jānunākramya dhiṣṭhitam // MatsP_150.126 //
GP12mtp176pu:13973: sa tu tena prahāreṇa srotobhiḥ kṣatajaṃ vaman // MatsP_150.129 //
GP12mtp176pu:13980: bhṛśaṃ drutau javād digbhyām ubhābhyāṃ bhayavihvalau /
GP12mtp176pu:13981: jagāma nirṛtiḥ kṣipraṃ śaraṇaṃ pākaśāsanam // MatsP_150.133 //
GP12mtp176pu:13986: vāyunā tena candreṇa saṃśuṣkeṇa himena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:13987: vyathitā dānavāḥ sarve śītocchinnā vipauruṣāḥ // MatsP_150.136 //
GP12mtp176pu:13993: sarve te niṣpratīkārā daityāścandramasā jitāḥ // MatsP_150.139 //
GP12mtp176pu:13996: bho bhoḥ śṛṅgāriṇaḥ śarāḥ sarve śastrāstrapāragāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:13999: ekaikasyāpi paryāptā na sarve 'pi divaukasaḥ // MatsP_150.142 //
GP12mtp176pu:14009: āśritya dānavīṃ māyāṃ vitatya svaṃ mahāvapuḥ // MatsP_150.147 //
GP12mtp176pu:14010: pūrayāmāsa gaganaṃ diśo vidiśa eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:14015: tataḥ krameṇa vibhraṣṭaṃ śītadurdinam ābabhau // MatsP_150.150 //
GP12mtp176pu:14019: *divākara uvāca nayāruṇa rathaṃ śīghraṃ kālanemiratho yataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14024: jagaddīpo 'tha bhagavāñ jagrāha vitataṃ dhanuḥ // MatsP_150.154 //
GP12mtp176pu:14026: saṃcārāstreṇa saṃdhāya bāṇamekaṃ sasarja saḥ // MatsP_150.155 //
GP12mtp176pu:14029: devānāṃ dānavaṃ rūpaṃ dānavānāṃ ca daivikam /
GP12mtp176pu:14035: kāṃścit pipeṣātha rathasya vegāt kāṃścitkrudhā coddhatamuṣṭipātaiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14037: rūpaṃ svaṃ tu prapadyanta hy asurāḥ suradharṣitāḥ // MatsP_150.160 //
GP12mtp176pu:14038: kālanemī ruṣāviṣṭas teṣāṃ rūpaṃ na buddhavān /
GP12mtp176pu:14040: ahaṃ nemiḥ suro naiva kālaneme vidasva mām /
GP12mtp176pu:14045: yojayāmāsa bāṇaṃ hi brahmāstravihitena tu // MatsP_150.164 //
GP12mtp176pu:14046: mumoca cāpi daityendraḥ sa svayaṃ surakaṇṭakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14049: saṃcarāstraṃ ca saṃśāntaṃ svayamāyodhane babhau // MatsP_150.166 //
GP12mtp176pu:14055: cakṣūṃṣi dānavendrāṇāṃ cakārāndhāni ca prabhuḥ // MatsP_150.169 //
GP12mtp176pu:14057: turagā niḥśvasantaśca gharmārtā rathino 'pi ca // MatsP_150.170 //
GP12mtp176pu:14062: toyārthinaḥ puro dṛṣṭvā toyaṃ kallolamālinam // MatsP_150.172 //
GP12mtp176pu:14064: aprāpya salilaṃ bhūmau vyāttāsyā gatacetasaḥ // MatsP_150.173 //
GP12mtp176pu:14065: tatra tatra vyadṛśyanta mṛtā daityeśvarā bhuvi /
GP12mtp176pu:14066: rathā gajāśca patitās turagāśca samāpitāḥ // MatsP_150.174 //
GP12mtp176pu:14068: dānavānāṃ sahasrāṇi vyadṛśyanta mṛtāni tu // MatsP_150.175 //
GP12mtp176pu:14074: śītaṃ vavarṣa salilaṃ dānavendrabalaṃ prati // MatsP_150.178 //
GP12mtp176pu:14076: bījāṅkurā ivāmlānāḥ prāpya vṛṣṭiṃ dharātale // MatsP_150.179 //
GP12mtp176pu:14080: gatiṃ kāṃ ca na paśyanto gāvaḥ śītārditā iva // MatsP_150.181 //
GP12mtp176pu:14082: sveṣu bādhe vyalīyanta gajeṣu turageṣu ca // MatsP_150.182 //
GP12mtp176pu:14086: evaṃvidhe tu saṃgrāme tumule devasaṃkṣaye // MatsP_150.184 //
GP12mtp176pu:14094: yakṣāṇāṃ pañca lakṣāṇi rakṣasāmayutāni ṣaṭ // MatsP_150.188 //
GP12mtp176pu:14095: trīṇi lakṣāṇi jaghne sa kiṃnarāṇāṃ tarasvinām /
GP12mtp176pu:14096: jaghne piśācamukhyānāṃ sapta lakṣāṇi nirbhayaḥ // MatsP_150.189 //
GP12mtp176pu:14098: jaghne sa koṭīḥ saṃkruddhaś citrāstrairastrakovidaḥ // MatsP_150.190 //
GP12mtp176pu:14102: tamāsādya raṇe ghoram ekaikaḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ śaraiḥ // MatsP_150.192 //
GP12mtp176pu:14106: tena cakreṇa so 'śvibhyāṃ cicheda rathakūbaram // MatsP_150.194 //
GP12mtp176pu:14110: tacca karma tayordṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ kopamāviśat // MatsP_150.196 //
GP12mtp176pu:14113: sa tato bhrāmya vegena cikṣepāśvirathaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:14114: taṃ tu mudgaram āyāntam ālokyāmbaragocaram // MatsP_150.198 //
GP12mtp176pu:14115: tyaktvā rathau tu tau vegād āplutau tarasāśvinau /
GP12mtp176pu:14116: tau rathau sa tu niṣpiṣya mudgaro 'calasaṃnibhaḥ // MatsP_150.199 //
GP12mtp176pu:14118: tasya karmāśvinau dṛṣṭvā bhiṣajau citrayodhinau // MatsP_150.200 //
GP12mtp176pu:14120: tato vajramayaṃ varṣaṃ prāvartad atidāruṇam // MatsP_150.201 //
GP12mtp176pu:14122: ratho dhvajo dhanuścakraṃ kavacaṃ cāpi kāñcanam // MatsP_150.202 //
GP12mtp176pu:14124: taddṛṣṭvā duṣkaraṃ karma so 'śvibhyāṃ bhīmavikramaḥ // MatsP_150.203 //
GP12mtp176pu:14128: jīvagrāhaṃ grāhayitum aśvinau tu pracakrame // MatsP_150.205 //
GP12mtp176pu:14130: prayātau vepamānau tu padā śastravivarjitau // MatsP_150.206 //
GP12mtp176pu:14134: dṛṣṭvā daityasya tatkrauryaṃ sarvabhūtāni menire // MatsP_150.208 //
GP12mtp176pu:14136: celuḥ śikhariṇo mukhyāḥ peturulkā nabhastalāt // MatsP_150.209 //
GP12mtp176pu:14148: yathā hi puruṣaṃ ghorair abhāgyairvaṃśaśālibhiḥ // MatsP_150.215 //
GP12mtp176pu:14156: ayaṃ vai devasarvasvaṃ jite 'sminnirjitāḥ surāḥ // MatsP_150.219 //
GP12mtp176pu:14160: nijaghnurvividhairastrais te tam āyāntam āhave // MatsP_150.221 //
GP12mtp176pu:14164: jambhakaścaiva saptatyā śumbho daśabhireva ca // MatsP_150.223 //
GP12mtp176pu:14166: daśabhiścaiva yattāste jaghnuḥ sagaruḍaṃ raṇe // MatsP_150.224 //
GP12mtp176pu:14168: ekaikaṃ dānavaṃ jaghne ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍbhirajihmagaiḥ // MatsP_150.225 //
GP12mtp176pu:14174: satataṃ bhrāmya vegena dānavāya vyasarjayat // MatsP_150.228 //
GP12mtp176pu:14177: tato viṣṇuḥ prakupitaḥ prāsaṃ jagrāha bhairavam /
GP12mtp176pu:14178: tena daityasya hṛdayaṃ tāḍayāmāsa gāḍhataḥ // MatsP_150.230 //
GP12mtp176pu:14182: bhinnaḥ śaktyā bhujastasya srutaśoṇita ābabhau // MatsP_150.232 //
GP12mtp176pu:14184: tato viṣṇuḥ prakupito jagrāha vipulaṃ dhanuḥ // MatsP_150.233 //
GP12mtp176pu:14186: daityasya hṛdayaṃ ṣaḍbhir vivyādha ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // MatsP_150.234 //
GP12mtp176pu:14187: caturbhiḥ sārathiṃ cāsya dhvajaṃ caikena pattriṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:14188: dvābhyāṃ jyādhanuṣī cāpi bhujaṃ savyaṃ ca pattriṇā // MatsP_150.235 //
GP12mtp176pu:14189: sa viddho hṛdaye gāḍhaṃ daityo hariśilīmukhaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14193: tāṃ ca vegena cikṣepa kālanemirathaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:14194: sā papāta śirasyugrā vipulā kālaneminaḥ // MatsP_150.238 //
GP12mtp176pu:14200: gacchāsura vimukto 'si sāmprataṃ jīva nirbhayaḥ // MatsP_150.241 //
GP12mtp176pu:14205: *sūta uvāca taṃ dṛṣṭvā dānavāḥ kruddhāśceruḥ svaiḥ svairbalairvṛtāḥ /*
GP12mtp176pu:14210: āruhyājau nimirdaityo hariṃ pratyudyayau balī // MatsP_151.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:14218: śumbhaḥ śūlena tīkṣṇena prāsena grasanastathā // MatsP_151.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:14219: cakreṇa mahiṣaḥ kruddho jambhaḥ śaktyā mahāraṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:14223: asambhrānto raṇe viṣṇur atha jagrāha kārmukam /
GP12mtp176pu:14226: abhyadravadraṇe kruddho daityānīke tu pauruṣāt // MatsP_151.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:14228: mathanaṃ daśabhirbāṇaiḥ śumbhaṃ pañcabhireva ca // MatsP_151.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:14234: saṃdhyamānaṃ śaraṃ haste cicheda mahiṣāsuraḥ // MatsP_151.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:14237: chinne dhanuṣi govindo gadāṃ jagrāha bhīṣaṇām /
GP12mtp176pu:14238: tāṃ prāhiṇotsa vegena mathanāya mahāhave // MatsP_151.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:14240: tāṃ nāśamāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvā hīnāgre prārthanāmiva // MatsP_151.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:14242: taṃ mumocātha vegena nimimuddiśya dānavam // MatsP_151.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:14243: tam āyāntaṃ viyatyeva trayo daityā nyavārayan /
GP12mtp176pu:14244: gadayā jambhadaityastu grasanaḥ paṭṭiśena tu // MatsP_151.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:14246: nirākṛtaṃ tamālokya durjane praṇayaṃ yathā // MatsP_151.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:14250: gṛhītāṃ tāṃ samālokya śikṣāmiva vivekibhiḥ // MatsP_151.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:14254: tato bāṇamayaṃ sarvam ākāśaṃ samadṛśyata // MatsP_151.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:14258: tena tatpraśamaṃ yātaṃ raudrāstraṃ lokaghasmaram // MatsP_151.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:14262: cakampe ca mahī devī daityā bhinnadhiyo 'bhavan // MatsP_151.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:14265: nārāyaṇāstraṃ grasano gṛhītvā cakraṃ nimiḥ svāstravaraṃ mumoca /
GP12mtp176pu:14266: aiṣīkamastraṃ ca cakāra jambhas tatkāladaṇḍāstranivāraṇāya // MatsP_151.31
GP12mtp176pu:14267: yāvanna saṃdhyā na daśāṃ prayānti daityeśvarāścāstranivāraṇāya /
GP12mtp176pu:14270: śāntaṃ tadālokya hariḥ svaśastraṃ svavikrame manyuparītamūrtiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14273: cakraṃ tadākāśagataṃ vilokya sarvātmanā daityavarāḥ svavīryaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14274: nāśaknuvanvārayituṃ pracaṇḍaṃ daivaṃ yathā karma mudhā prapannam //
GP12mtp176pu:14275: tamapratarkyaṃ janayannajayyaṃ cakraṃ papāta grasanasya kaṇṭhe /
GP12mtp176pu:14276: dvidhā tu kṛtvā grasanasya kaṇṭhaṃ tadraktadhārāruṇaghoranābhi /
GP12mtp176pu:14282: tīkṣṇānanaiśca nārācaiś cakraiḥ śaktibhireva ca // MatsP_152.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:14290: uvāca ca garutmantaṃ tasminsutumule raṇe // MatsP_152.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:14292: yadyaśrānto 'si tadyāhi mathanasya rathaṃ prati // MatsP_152.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:14300: punardaśabhir ākṛṣṭais taṃ tatāḍa stanāntare // MatsP_152.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:14302: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvāsya jagrāha parighaṃ tadā // MatsP_152.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:14306: mathanaṃ sarathaṃ roṣān niṣpipeṣātha roṣataḥ // MatsP_152.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:14314: śaktyā ca garuḍaṃ vīro mahiṣo 'bhyahanaddhṛdi // MatsP_152.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:14322: parivartitakāyo 'dhaḥ papāta na mamāra ca // MatsP_152.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:14323: mahiṣaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūmau provāca keśavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14330: sajyaṃ cakāra sa dhanuḥ śarāṃścāśīviṣopamān // MatsP_152.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:14331: sa citrayodhī dṛḍhamuṣṭipātas tatastu viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ ca daityaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14334: tayā bhuśuṇḍyā ca pipeṣa meṣaṃ śumbhasya pattraṃ dharaṇīdharābham //
GP12mtp176pu:14335: tasmādavaplutya hatācca meṣād bhūbhau padātiḥ sa tu daityanāthaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14336: tato mahīsthasya hariḥ śaraughān mumoca kālānalatulyabhāsaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14337: śaraistribhistasya bhujaṃ bibheda ṣaḍbhiśca śīrṣaṃ daśabhiśca ketum /
GP12mtp176pu:14339: sa tena viddho vyathito babhūva daityeśvaro visrutaśoṇitaughaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14340: tato 'sya kiṃcic calitasya dhairyād uvāca śaṅkhāmbujaśārṅgapāṇiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14342: vadhaṃ na matto 'rhasi ceha mūḍha vṛthaiva kiṃ yuddhasamutsuko 'si //
GP12mtp176pu:14343: jambho vaco viṣṇumukhānniśamya nimiśca niṣpeṣṭumiyeṣa viṣṇum /
GP12mtp176pu:14344: gadāmathodyamya nimiḥ pracaṇḍāṃ jaghāna gāḍhāṃ garuḍaṃ śirastaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14346: tau dānavābhyāṃ viṣamaiḥ prahārair nipetururvyāṃ ghanapāvakābhau //
GP12mtp176pu:14347: tatkarma dṛṣṭvā ditijāstu sarve jagarjuruccaiḥ kṛtasiṃhanādāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14349: vāsāṃsi caivādudhuvuḥ pare tu dadhmuśca śaṅkhānakagomukhaughān //
GP12mtp176pu:14354: hariṃ devaḥ sahasrākṣo mene bhagnaṃ durāhave // MatsP_153.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:14361: tasmānna nīcaṃ matimān durgahīnaṃ hi saṃtyajet /
GP12mtp176pu:14366: pūrve 'pyatibalā ye ca daityendrāḥ suravidviṣaḥ // MatsP_153.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:14368: yuge yuge ca daityānāṃ tvamevāntakaro hare // MatsP_153.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:14373: daityendrāḥ svairvadhopāyaiḥ śakyā hantuṃ hi nānyataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14374: durjayastārako daityo muktvā saptadinaṃ śiśum // MatsP_153.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:14376: jambhastu vadhyatāṃ prāpto dānavaḥ krūravikramaḥ // MatsP_153.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:14378: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvāṃ vinā sa tu dānavaḥ // MatsP_153.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:14382: yatsāraṃ sarvalokeṣu vīryasya tapaso 'pi ca // MatsP_153.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:14390: ajeśaḥ śāsanaḥ śāstā śaṃbhuścaṇḍo dhruvastathā // MatsP_153.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:14398: tasthau himagireḥ śṛṅge bhānumāniva dīptimān // MatsP_153.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:14413: mamarda ca raṇe devāṃś cikṣepānyānkareṇa tu // MatsP_153.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:14421: vicacāra raṇe devān duṣprekṣye gajadānavaḥ // MatsP_153.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:14424: atha vidravamāṇaṃ tad balaṃ prekṣya samantataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14426: bho bho gṛhṇīta daityendraṃ mardatainaṃ hatāśrayam /
GP12mtp176pu:14427: karṣatainaṃ śitaiḥ śūlair bhañjatainaṃ ca marmasu // MatsP_153.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:14431: dṛḍhena muṣṭibandhena śūlaṃ viṣṭabhya nirmalam // MatsP_153.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:14433: tato daśāpi te rudrā nirmalāyomayai raṇe // MatsP_153.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:14441: dṛṣṭvā saktaṃ tu rudrābhyāṃ nava rudrāstato 'dbhutam // MatsP_153.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:14443: nirbhayā balino yuddhe raṇabhūmau vyavasthitāḥ // MatsP_153.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:14447: mamarda caraṇāghātair dantaiścāpi kareṇa ca // MatsP_153.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:14449: tadā kapālī jagrāha karaṃ tasyāmaradviṣaḥ // MatsP_153.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:14450: bhrāmayāmāsa vegena hy atīva ca gajāsuram /
GP12mtp176pu:14453: tataḥ patata evāsya carma cotkṛtya bhairavam // MatsP_153.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:14455: dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ daityaṃ dānavendrā mahābalāḥ // MatsP_153.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:14458: dikṣu bhūmau tamevograṃ rudraṃ daityā vyalokayan /
GP12mtp176pu:14459: evaṃ vilulite tasmin dānavendre mahābale // MatsP_153.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:14463: yāṃ yāṃ nimigajo yāti diśaṃ tāṃ tāṃ savāhanā /
GP12mtp176pu:14467: tasthau dikpālakaiḥ sārdham aṣṭabhiḥ keśavena ca // MatsP_153.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:14469: tāvacchakragajo yāto muktvā nādaṃ sa bhairavam // MatsP_153.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:14470: dhriyamāṇo 'pi yatnena sa raṇe naiva tiṣṭhati /
GP12mtp176pu:14471: palāyite gaje tasminn ārūḍhaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ // MatsP_153.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:14477: sa hato mudgareṇātha śakrakuñjara āhave // MatsP_153.62 //
GP12mtp176pu:14483: srutarakto babhau śailo ghanadhātuhrado yathā // MatsP_153.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:14488: patite tu gaje tasmin siṃhanādo mahānabhūt /
GP12mtp176pu:14491: gajaṃ taṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā nimiṃ cāpi parāṅmukham // MatsP_153.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:14493: jambho jajvāla kopena pītājya iva pāvakaḥ // MatsP_153.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:14499: śaśiśubhrātapatreṇa sa tena syandanena tu // MatsP_153.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:14504: tenāsya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ raṇe cicheda vṛtrahā /
GP12mtp176pu:14505: kṣipraṃ saṃtyajya taccāpaṃ jambho dānavanandanaḥ // MatsP_153.76 //
GP12mtp176pu:14508: śakraṃ vivyādha daśabhir jatrudeśe tu pattribhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14509: hṛdaye ca tribhiścāpi dvābhyāṃ ca skandhayor dvayoḥ // MatsP_153.78 //
GP12mtp176pu:14515: daityo 'pi bāṇajālaṃ tad vyadhamatsāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ // MatsP_153.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:14517: śakro 'tha krodhasaṃrambhān na viśeṣayate yadā // MatsP_153.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:14533: tataḥ surādhipastvāṣṭram astraṃ ca samudīrayat // MatsP_153.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:14537: vitānakena tenātha praśamaṃ mausale gate // MatsP_153.92 //
GP12mtp176pu:14553: tenāstreṇa tadastraṃ ca babhraṃśe tadanantaram // MatsP_153.100 //
GP12mtp176pu:14555: jajvāla kāyaṃ jambhasya sarathaṃ ca sasārathim // MatsP_153.101 //
GP12mtp176pu:14567: na śekustatra te sthātuṃ raṇe 'tibalino 'pi ye // MatsP_153.107 //
GP12mtp176pu:14571: tataḥ praśamite vāyau daityendre parvatākṛtau // MatsP_153.109 //
GP12mtp176pu:14575: tataḥ sā dānavendrasya śailamāyā nyavartata // MatsP_153.111 //
GP12mtp176pu:14579: babhañja pṛṣṭhataḥ kāṃścit kareṇāveṣṭya dānavaḥ // MatsP_153.113 //
GP12mtp176pu:14581: astraṃ trailokyadurdharṣaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ mumoca ha // MatsP_153.114 //
GP12mtp176pu:14590: kṛtastu khaṇḍaśo daityaḥ sāsya māyā vyanaśyata // MatsP_153.118 //
GP12mtp176pu:14591: pranaṣṭāyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ tato jambho mahāsuraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14597: śakro dainyaṃ samāpannaḥ śrāntabāhuḥ savāhanaḥ // MatsP_153.121 //
GP12mtp176pu:14603: vardhasvāśu mahāmāyāṃ puraṃdara ripuṃ prati // MatsP_153.124 //
GP12mtp176pu:14605: mā śakra mohamāgaccha kṣipramastraṃ smara prabho // MatsP_153.125 //
GP12mtp176pu:14606: tataḥ śakraḥ prakupito dānavaṃ prati devarāṭ /
GP12mtp176pu:14611: mahāstrabhinnahṛdayaḥ susrāva rudhiraṃ ca saḥ // MatsP_153.127 //
GP12mtp176pu:14613: tadastratejasā tasya rūpaṃ daityasya nāśitam // MatsP_153.128 //
GP12mtp176pu:14619: vavarṣa dānavo raudro hy abandhyānakṣayānapi // MatsP_153.131 //
GP12mtp176pu:14627: śṛgālagṛdhravāyasāḥ paraṃ pramodamādadhuḥ kvacidvikṛṣṭalocanaḥ śavasya rauti vāyasaḥ // MatsP_153.135
GP12mtp176pu:14630: mṛtasya māṃsamāharañchvajātayaśca saṃsthitāḥ kvacidvṛko gajāsṛjaṃ papau nilīyatāntrataḥ // kvacit turaṃgamaṇḍalī vikṛṣyate śvajātibhiḥ kvacitpiśācajātakaiḥ prapītaśoṇitāsavaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14633: karo 'yamabjasaṃnibho mamāstu karṇapūrakaḥ saroṣamīkṣate 'parā vapāṃ vinā priyaṃ tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:14634: parā priyā hyavāpa yadbhṛtoṣṇaśoṇitāsavaṃ vikṛṣya śavacarma tatprabaddhasāndrapallavam // cakāra yakṣakāminī taruṃ kuṭhārapāṭitaṃ gajasya dantamātmajaṃ pragṛhya kumbhasaṃpuṭam /
GP12mtp176pu:14635: vipāṭya mauktikaṃ paraṃ priyaprasādamicchate samāṃsaśoṇitāsavaṃ papuśca yakṣarākṣasāḥ // MatsP_153.139
GP12mtp176pu:14636: mṛtāśvakeśavāsitaṃ rasaṃ pragṛhya pāṇinā priyāvimuktajīvitaṃ samānayāsṛgāsavam /
GP12mtp176pu:14637: na pathyatāṃ prayāti me gataṃ śmaśānagocaraṃ narasya tajjahātyasau praśasya kiṃnarānanam // sa nāga eṣa no bhayaṃ dadhāti muktajīvito na dānavasya śakyate mayā tadekayānanam /
GP12mtp176pu:14638: iti priyāya vallabhā vadanti yakṣayoṣitaḥ pare kapālapāṇayaḥ piśācayakṣarākṣasāḥ // MatsP_153.141
GP12mtp176pu:14639: vadanti dehi dehi me mamātibhakṣyacāriṇaḥ pare 'vatīrya śoṇitāpagāsu dhautamūrtayā /
GP12mtp176pu:14640: pitṝn pratarpya devatāḥ samarcayanti cāmiṣair gajoḍupe susaṃsthitāstaranti śoṇitaṃ hradam iti pragāḍhasaṃkaṭe surāsure susaṃgare bhayaṃ samujhya durjayā bhaṭāḥ sphuṭanti māninaḥ // tata śakro dhaneśaśca varuṇaḥ pavano 'nalaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14643: astrāṇi vyarthatāṃ jagmur devānāṃ dānavānprati // MatsP_153.145 //
GP12mtp176pu:14645: gatiṃ na vividuścāpi śrāntā daityasya devatāḥ // MatsP_153.146 //
GP12mtp176pu:14647: parasparaṃ vyalīyanta gāvaḥ śītārditā iva // MatsP_153.147 //
GP12mtp176pu:14649: brahmāstraṃ smara devendra yasyāvadhyo na vidyate /
GP12mtp176pu:14650: viṣṇunā coditaḥ śakraḥ sasmārāstraṃ mahaujasam // MatsP_153.148 //
GP12mtp176pu:14653: sa mantramuccārya yatāntarāśayo vadhāya daityasya dhiyābhisaṃdhya tu /
GP12mtp176pu:14655: athāsuraḥ prekṣya mahāstramāhitaṃ vihāya māyāmavanau vyatiṣṭhata /
GP12mtp176pu:14656: pravepamānena mukhena śuṣyatā balena gātreṇa ca saṃbhramākulaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14664: sa jambhadānavendraṃ tu surai raṇamukhe hatam // MatsP_153.155 //
GP12mtp176pu:14678: taṃ rathaṃ devarājasya parivārya samantataḥ // MatsP_153.162 //
GP12mtp176pu:14680: tataścacāla vasudhā tato rūkṣo marudvavau // MatsP_153.163 //
GP12mtp176pu:14690: astrāṇi tejāṃsi dhanāni dhairyaṃ senābalaṃ vīryaparākramau ca /
GP12mtp176pu:14691: sattvaujasāṃ tannikaraṃ babhūva surāsurāṇāṃ tapaso balena // MatsP_153.168
GP12mtp176pu:14697: tato 'cchinnaṃ śaravrātaṃ saṃgrāme mumucuḥ surāḥ // MatsP_153.171 //
GP12mtp176pu:14701: sunirmalaṃ kramāyātaṃ kuputraḥ svaṃ mahākulam // MatsP_153.173 //
GP12mtp176pu:14703: bāṇairvyoma diśaḥ pṛthvīṃ pūrayāmāsa dānavaḥ // MatsP_153.174 //
GP12mtp176pu:14704: cicheda puṅkhadeśeṣu svake sthāne ca lāghavāt /
GP12mtp176pu:14708: tataḥ śatena bāṇānāṃ śakraṃ vivyādha dānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14709: nārāyaṇaṃ ca saptatyā navatyā ca hutāśanam // MatsP_153.177 //
GP12mtp176pu:14711: dhanadaṃ caiva saptatyā varuṇaṃ ca tathāṣṭabhiḥ // MatsP_153.178 //
GP12mtp176pu:14714: tathā ca mātaliṃ daityo vivyādha tribhirāśugaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14715: garuḍaṃ daśabhiścaiva sa vivyādha patatribhiḥ // MatsP_153.180 //
GP12mtp176pu:14717: cakāra varmajātāni cicheda ca dhanūṃṣi tu /
GP12mtp176pu:14718: tato vikavacā devā vidhanuṣkāḥ śaraiḥ kṛtāḥ // MatsP_153.181 //
GP12mtp176pu:14719: athānyāni cāpāni tasminsaroṣā raṇe lokapālā gṛhītvā samantāt /
GP12mtp176pu:14722: jaghānorasi kṣipramindraṃ subāhuṃ mahendro vyakampadrathopastha eva //
GP12mtp176pu:14725: tatastārakaḥ pretanāthaṃ pṛṣatkair vasuṃ tasya savye smarankṣudrabhāvam /
GP12mtp176pu:14729: kṣaṇāllabdhacittāḥ svayaṃ viṣṇuśakrānalādyāḥ susaṃhatya tīkṣṇaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GP12mtp176pu:14730: pracakruḥ pracaṇḍena daityena sārdhaṃ mahāsaṃgaraṃ saṃgaragrāsakalpam //
GP12mtp176pu:14731: athānamya cāpaṃ haristīkṣṇabāṇair hanatsārathiṃ daityarājasya hṛdyam /
GP12mtp176pu:14732: dhvajaṃ dhūmaketuḥ kirīṭaṃ mahendro dhaneśo dhanuḥ kāñcanānaddhapṛṣṭham /
GP12mtp176pu:14733: yamo bāhudaṇḍaṃ rathāṅgāni vāyur niśācāriṇām īśvarasyāpi varma //
GP12mtp176pu:14740: sa rathaṃ cūrṇayāmāsa na mamāra ca mātaliḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14741: gṛhītvā paṭṭiśaṃ daityo jaghānorasi keśavam // MatsP_153.192 //
GP12mtp176pu:14743: khaḍgena rākṣasendrasya nicakarta ca vāhanam // MatsP_153.193 //
GP12mtp176pu:14744: yamaṃ ca pātayāmāsa bhūmau daityo bhuśuṇḍinā /
GP12mtp176pu:14745: vahniṃ ca bhindipālena tāḍayāmāsa mūrdhani // MatsP_153.194 //
GP12mtp176pu:14747: dhaneśaṃ ca dhanuṣkoṭyā kuṭṭayāmāsa kopanaḥ // MatsP_153.195 //
GP12mtp176pu:14753: papāta cakraṃ daityasya hṛdaye bhāskaradyuti // MatsP_153.198 //
GP12mtp176pu:14755: tato vajraṃ mahendrastu pramumocārcitaṃ ciram // MatsP_153.199 //
GP12mtp176pu:14767: daityendraṃ mūrdhni cikṣepa bhrāmya vegena durjayaḥ // MatsP_153.205 //
GP12mtp176pu:14774: cikṣepa dānavendrāya tasya mūrdhni papāta ca /
GP12mtp176pu:14783: na cāstrāṇyasya sajanti gātre vajrācalopame // MatsP_153.213 //
GP12mtp176pu:14785: jaghāna koṭiśo devān karapārṣṇibhireva ca // MatsP_153.214 //
GP12mtp176pu:14787: diśo bhītāni saṃtyajya raṇopakaraṇāni tu // MatsP_153.215 //
GP12mtp176pu:14799: sa jānubhyāṃ mahīṃ gatvā pihitāsyaḥ svapāṇinā // MatsP_154.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:14803: sa vijñāpayati stheyaṃ kva bandibhiriti prabho // MatsP_154.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:14805: yatheṣṭaṃ sthīyatāmebhir gṛhaṃ me bhuvanatrayam // MatsP_154.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:14807: evaṃ kṛte tato devā dūyamānena cetasā // MatsP_154.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:14813: vyaktiṃ nītvā tvaṃ vapuḥ svaṃ mahimnā tasmādaṇḍāt sābhidhānādacintyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14814: dyāvāpṛthvyor ūrdhvakhaṇḍāvarāmyāṃ hy aṇḍādasmāttvaṃ vibhāgaṃ karoṣi //
GP12mtp176pu:14816: vyaktaṃ devā janmanaḥ śāśvatasya dyauste mūrdhā locane candrasūryau //
GP12mtp176pu:14817: vyālāḥ keśāḥ śrotrarandhrā diśaste pādau bhūmirnābhirandhre samudrāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14818: māyākāraḥ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ prasiddho vedaiḥ śānto jyotiṣā tvaṃ vimuktaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14819: vedārtheṣu tvāṃ vivṛṇvanti buddhvā hṛtpadmāntaḥsaṃniviṣṭaṃ purāṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:14820: tvāmātmānaṃ labdhayogā gṛṇanti sāṃkhyairyāstāḥ sapta sūkṣmāḥ praṇītāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14821: tāsāṃ heturyāṣṭamī cāpi gītā tasyāṃ tasyāṃ gīyase vai tvamantam /
GP12mtp176pu:14822: dṛṣṭvā mūrtiṃ sthūlasūkṣmāṃ cakāra devairbhāvāḥ kāraṇaiḥ kaiściduktāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14823: sambhūtāste tvatta evādisarge bhūyastāṃ tāṃ vāsanāṃ te 'bhyupeyuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14826: ye 'nye sūkṣmāḥ santi tebhyo 'bhigītaḥ sthūlā bhāvāścāvṛtāraśca teṣām //
GP12mtp176pu:14827: tebhyaḥ sthūlaistaiḥ purāṇaiḥ pratīto bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ caivamudbhūtibhājām /
GP12mtp176pu:14828: bhāve bhāve bhāvitaṃ tvā yunakti yuktaṃ yuktaṃ vyaktibhāvānnirasya /
GP12mtp176pu:14829: itthaṃ devo bhaktibhājāṃ śaraṇyas trātā goptā no bhavānantamūrtiḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14832: evaṃ stuto viriñcistu prasādaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14836: na rājate tathā śakra mlānavaktraśiroruhā // MatsP_154.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:14840: daṇḍasyālambaneneva hy akṛcchrastu pade pade // MatsP_154.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:14845: vāyo bhavān vicetaskas tvaṃ snigdhairiva nirjitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14846: kiṃ tvaṃ bibheṣi dhanada saṃnyasyaiva kuberatām // MatsP_154.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:14848: bhavantaḥ kena tatkṣiptaṃ tejastu bhavatāmapi // MatsP_154.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:14856: caturmukhaṃ tadā prāha carācaraguruṃ vibhum // MatsP_154.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:14857: na tu vetsi carācarabhūtagataṃ bhavabhāvamatīva mahānucchritaḥ prabhavaḥ
GP12mtp176pu:14860: amarāsurametadaśeṣamapi tvayi tulyamaho janako 'si yataḥ // MatsP_154.30
GP12mtp176pu:14861: piturasti tathāpi manovikṛtiḥ saguṇo viguṇo balavānabalaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14863: sacarācaranirmathane kimiti kitavastu kṛto vihito bhavatā /
GP12mtp176pu:14864: kila deva tvayā sthitaye jagatāṃ mahadadbhutacitraviciguṇāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:14865: api tuṣṭikṛtaḥ śrutakāmaphalā vihitā dvijanāyaka devagaṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14867: apahṛtya vimānagaṇaṃ sa kṛto ditijena mahāmarubhūmisamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14869: samamiṅgitabhāvavidhiḥ sa girir gaganena sadocchrayatāṃ hi gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14872: surarāja sa tasya bhayena gataṃ vyadadhādaśarīra ito 'pi vṛthā //
GP12mtp176pu:14881: cāṭuyuktamatho karma hy amarā bahu bhāṣata // MatsP_154.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:14883: vadateti ca daityasya preṣyairvihasitā bahu // MatsP_154.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:14887: surāgam upadhā nityaṃ gīyate tasya veśmasu // MatsP_154.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:14890: iti niḥśeṣamathavā niḥśeṣaṃ vai na śakyate /
GP12mtp176pu:14896: yasya vadhyaḥ sa nādyāpi jātastribhuvane pumān // MatsP_154.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:14899: sa ca vavre vadhaṃ daityaḥ śiśutaḥ saptavāsarāt /
GP12mtp176pu:14900: sa saptadivaso bālaḥ śaṃkarādyo bhaviṣyati // MatsP_154.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:14904: uttāno varadaḥ pāṇir eṣa devyāḥ sadaiva tu // MatsP_154.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:14905: himācalasya duhitā sā tu devī bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:14906: tasyāḥ sakāśādyaḥ śarvas tv araṇyāṃ pāvako yathā // MatsP_154.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:14908: mayāpyupāyaḥ sa kṛto yathaivaṃ hi bhaviṣyati // MatsP_154.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:14914: niśāṃ sasmāra bhagavān svatanoḥ pūrvasaṃbhavām // MatsP_154.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:14916: tāṃ vivikte samālokya brahmovāca vibhāvarīm // MatsP_154.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:14919: tatkartavyaṃ tvayā devi śṛṇu kāryasya niścayam // MatsP_154.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:14923: śaṃkarasyābhavatpatnī satī dakṣasutā tu yā // MatsP_154.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:14929: tayoḥ sutaptatapasor bhavitā yo mahābalaḥ // MatsP_154.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:14931: jātamātrā tu sā devī svalpasaṃjñā ca bhāminī // MatsP_154.64 //
GP12mtp176pu:14934: tatastābhyāṃ tu janitaḥ svalpo vākkalaho bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:14935: tato 'pi saṃśayo bhūyas tārakaṃ prati dṛśyate // MatsP_154.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:14937: vighnastvayā vidhātavyo yathā tābhyāṃ tathā śṛṇu // MatsP_154.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:14938: garbhasthāne ca tanmātuḥ svena rūpeṇa rañjaya /
GP12mtp176pu:14939: tato vihāya śarvastāṃ viśrānto narmapūrvakam // MatsP_154.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:14940: bhartsayiṣyati tāṃ devīṃ tataḥ sā kupitā satī /
GP12mtp176pu:14943: sa bhaviṣyati hantā vai surārīṇāmasaṃśayam // MatsP_154.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:14949: tadā svameva tadrūpaṃ śailajā pratipatsyate // MatsP_154.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:14951: rūpāṃśena tu saṃyuktā tvamumāyāṃ bhaviṣyasi // MatsP_154.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:14956: tvaṃ bhūriti viśāṃ mātā śūdraiḥ śaivīti pūjitā /
GP12mtp176pu:14960: tvaṃ muktiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvadehinām /
GP12mtp176pu:14961: tvaṃ ca kīrtimatāṃ kīrtis tvaṃ mūrtiḥ sarvadehinām // MatsP_154.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:14963: tvaṃ kāntiḥ kṛtabhūṣāṇāṃ tvaṃ śāntirduḥkhakarmaṇām // MatsP_154.80 //
GP12mtp176pu:14964: tvaṃ bhrāntiḥ sarvabodhānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ kratuyājinām /
GP12mtp176pu:14965: jaladhīnāṃ mahāvelā tvaṃ ca līlā vilāsinām // MatsP_154.81 //
GP12mtp176pu:14970: ye tvāṃ stoṣyanti varade pūjayiṣyanti vāpi ye /
GP12mtp176pu:14971: te sarvakāmānāpsyanti niyatā nātra saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_154.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:14972: ityuktā tu niśā devī tathetyuktvā kṛtāñjaliḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:14973: jagāma tvaritā tūrṇaṃ gṛhaṃ himagireḥ param // MatsP_154.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:14983: tataḥ krameṇa divase gate dūraṃ vibhāvarī // MatsP_154.90 //
GP12mtp176pu:14992: āviveśāntaraṃ janma manyamānā kṣapā tu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:14995: brāhme muhūrte subhage vyasūyata guhāraṇim // MatsP_154.96 //
GP12mtp176pu:14999: abhavatkrūrasattvānāṃ cetaḥ śāntaṃ ca dehinām // MatsP_154.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:15002: gandhavanti ca mālyāni vimalaṃ ca nabho 'bhavat /
GP12mtp176pu:15027: smṛtiṃ śakrasya vijñāya jātāṃ tu bhagavāṃstadā // MatsP_154.112 //
GP12mtp176pu:15029: taṃ sa dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaḥ samutthāya mahāsanāt // MatsP_154.113 //
GP12mtp176pu:15031: śakrapraṇītāṃ tāṃ pūjāṃ pratigṛhya yathāvidhi // MatsP_154.114 //
GP12mtp176pu:15033: pṛṣṭe ca kuśale śakraḥ provāca vacanaṃ prabhuḥ // MatsP_154.115 //
GP12mtp176pu:15037: nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ yāti nivedyārthaṃ suhṛjjane // MatsP_154.117 //
GP12mtp176pu:15043: vandito himaśailena nirgatena puro muniḥ // MatsP_154.120 //
GP12mtp176pu:15044: saha praviśya bhavanaṃ bhuvo bhūṣaṇatāṃ gatam /
GP12mtp176pu:15045: nivedite svayaṃ haime himaśaile na vistṛte // MatsP_154.121 //
GP12mtp176pu:15047: yathārhaṃ cārghyapādyaṃ ca śailastasmai nyavedayat // MatsP_154.122 //
GP12mtp176pu:15053: pṛthutvaṃ manasā tulyaṃ kandarāṇāṃ tathācala // MatsP_154.125 //
GP12mtp176pu:15055: prasannatā ca toyasya manaso 'pyadhikā ca te // MatsP_154.126 //
GP12mtp176pu:15057: na ca lakṣmīstathā svarge kutrādhikatayā sthitā // MatsP_154.127 //
GP12mtp176pu:15062: aho dhanyo 'si śailendra yasya te kandaraṃ haraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15068: tatra sthito munivaraḥ śailena sahito vaśī /
GP12mtp176pu:15069: dṛṣṭvā tu tejaso rāśiṃ muniṃ śailapriyā tadā // MatsP_154.133 //
GP12mtp176pu:15071: tāṃ vilokya mahābhāgo maharṣir amitadyutiḥ // MatsP_154.134 //
GP12mtp176pu:15075: ehi vatseti cāpyuktā ṛṣiṇā snigdhayā girā // MatsP_154.136 //
GP12mtp176pu:15077: uvāca mātā tāṃ devīm abhivandaya putrike // MatsP_154.137 //
GP12mtp176pu:15079: ityuktā tu tato mātrā vastrāntapihitānanā // MatsP_154.138 //
GP12mtp176pu:15081: tataḥ punaruvācedaṃ vākyaṃ mātā sutāṃ tadā // MatsP_154.139 //
GP12mtp176pu:15082: vatse vandaya devarṣiṃ tato dāsyāmi te śubham /
GP12mtp176pu:15083: ratnakrīḍanakaṃ ramyaṃ sthāpitaṃ yacciraṃ mayā // MatsP_154.140 //
GP12mtp176pu:15084: ityuktā tu tato vegād uddhṛtya caraṇau tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:15086: kṛte tu vandane tasyā mātā sakhīmukhena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15090: jñātvā tadiṅgitaṃ śailo mahiṣyā hṛdayena tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15093: smitānano mahābhāgo vākyaṃ provāca nāradaḥ // MatsP_154.145 //
GP12mtp176pu:15103: yo jāyate hi yadbījo janituḥ sa hyasārthakaḥ // MatsP_154.149 //
GP12mtp176pu:15104: janitā cāpi jātasya na kaściditi yatsphuṭam /
GP12mtp176pu:15113: saṃsārasya kuto vṛddhiḥ sarve syuryadatigrahāḥ // MatsP_154.154 //
GP12mtp176pu:15114: ataḥ kartrā tu śāstreṣu sutalābhaḥ praśaṃsitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15120: daśaputrasamā kanyā yā na syācchīlavarjitā // MatsP_154.157 //
GP12mtp176pu:15122: kanyā hi kṛpaṇā śocyā piturduḥkhavivardhinī // MatsP_154.158 //
GP12mtp176pu:15126: aho muhyāmi śuṣyāmi glāmi sīdāmi nārada // MatsP_154.160 //
GP12mtp176pu:15128: anugraheṇa me chinddhi duḥkhaṃ kanyāśrayaṃ mune // MatsP_154.161 //
GP12mtp176pu:15133: durlabhaḥ satpatiḥ strīṇāṃ viguṇo 'pi patiḥ kila /
GP12mtp176pu:15134: na prāpyate vinā puṇyaiḥ patirnāryā kadācana // MatsP_154.164 //
GP12mtp176pu:15136: dhanaṃ jīvitaparyāptaṃ patyau nāryāḥ pratiṣṭhitam // MatsP_154.165 //
GP12mtp176pu:15138: daivataṃ paramaṃ nāryāḥ patiruktaḥ sadaiva hi // MatsP_154.166 //
GP12mtp176pu:15139: tvayā coktaṃ hi devarṣe na jāto 'syāḥ patiḥ kila /
GP12mtp176pu:15141: carācare bhūtasarge yadadyāpi ca no mune /
GP12mtp176pu:15142: na sa jāta iti brūṣe tena me vyākulaṃ manaḥ // MatsP_154.168 //
GP12mtp176pu:15149: tatrāpi śreyasāṃ hyāśā mune na pratibhāti naḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15153: tvaṃ me sarvaṃ vijānāsi satyavāgasi cāpyataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15154: muhyāmi muniśārdūla hṛdayaṃ dīryatīva me // MatsP_154.174 //
GP12mtp176pu:15158: *nārada uvāca harṣasthāne 'pi mahati tvayā duḥkhaṃ nirūpyate /
GP12mtp176pu:15164: śaraṇyaḥ śāśvataḥ śāstā śaṃkaraḥ parameśvaraḥ // MatsP_154.178 //
GP12mtp176pu:15166: tasyaite parameśasya sarve krīḍanakā gire // MatsP_154.179 //
GP12mtp176pu:15169: manyase māyayā jātaṃ viṣṇuṃ cāpi yuge yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:15170: ātmano na vināśo 'sti sthāvarānte 'pi bhūdhara // MatsP_154.181 //
GP12mtp176pu:15172: naśyate deha evātra nātmano nāśa ucyate // MatsP_154.182 //
GP12mtp176pu:15174: sa janmamṛtyuduḥkhārto hy avaśaḥ parivartate // MatsP_154.183 //
GP12mtp176pu:15176: bhaviṣyati patiḥ so 'syā jagannātho nirāmayaḥ // MatsP_154.184 //
GP12mtp176pu:15177: yaduktaṃ ca mayā devī lakṣaṇairvarjitā tava /
GP12mtp176pu:15178: śṛṇu tasyāpi vākyasya samyaktvena vicāraṇam // MatsP_154.185 //
GP12mtp176pu:15183: ato 'syā lakṣaṇaṃ gātre śaila nāsti mahāmate /
GP12mtp176pu:15185: uttāno varadaḥ pāṇir eṣa devyāḥ sadaiva tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15188: asyāḥ śṛṇu mamātrāpi vāgyuktiṃ śailasattama // MatsP_154.190 //
GP12mtp176pu:15197: atyantaṃ hi mahatkāryaṃ devānāṃ himabhūdhara // MatsP_154.194 //
GP12mtp176pu:15198: *sūta uvāca evaṃ śrutvā tu śailendro nāradātsarvameva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:15199: ātmānaṃ sa punarjātaṃ mene menāpatistadā // MatsP_154.195 //
GP12mtp176pu:15201: uvāca so 'pi saṃhṛṣṭo nāradaṃ tu himācalaḥ // MatsP_154.196 //
GP12mtp176pu:15209: yadi vācāmadhīśaḥ syāṃ tvadguṇānāṃ vicāraṇe // MatsP_154.199 //
GP12mtp176pu:15211: tavāsmānprati cāpalyaṃ vyaktaṃ mama mahāmune // MatsP_154.200 //
GP12mtp176pu:15213: munīnāṃ devatānāṃ ca svayaṃkartāpi kalmaṣam // MatsP_154.201 //
GP12mtp176pu:15215: ityuktavati śailendre sa tadā harṣanirbhare // MatsP_154.202 //
GP12mtp176pu:15216: tathā ca nārado vākyaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvamiti prabho /
GP12mtp176pu:15217: surakārye ya evārthas tavāpi sumahattaraḥ // MatsP_154.203 //
GP12mtp176pu:15218: ityuktvā nāradaḥ śīghraṃ jagāma tridivaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:15219: sa gatvā śakrabhavanam amareśaṃ dadarśa ha // MatsP_154.204 //
GP12mtp176pu:15221: pṛṣṭaḥ śakreṇa provāca himajāsaṃśrayāṃ kathām // MatsP_154.205 //
GP12mtp176pu:15222: *nārada uvāca samūhya yattu kartavyaṃ tanmayā kṛtameva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:15228: prādurbhūtaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā śakraḥ provāca sādaram // MatsP_154.208 //
GP12mtp176pu:15229: *śakra uvāca upadeśena bahunā kiṃ tvāṃ prati vade priyam /
GP12mtp176pu:15230: manobhavo 'si tena tvaṃ vetsi bhūtamanogatam // MatsP_154.209 //
GP12mtp176pu:15233: saṃyuto madhunā caiva ṛturājena durjaya // MatsP_154.210 //
GP12mtp176pu:15235: provāca pañcabāṇo 'tha vākyaṃ bhītaḥ śatakratum // MatsP_154.211 //
GP12mtp176pu:15237: duḥsādhyaḥ śaṃkaro devaḥ kiṃ na vetsi jagatprabho // MatsP_154.212 //
GP12mtp176pu:15238: tasya devasya vettha tvaṃ kāraṇaṃ tu yadavyayam /
GP12mtp176pu:15239: prāyaḥ prasādaḥ kopo 'pi sarvo hi mahatāṃ mahān // MatsP_154.213 //
GP12mtp176pu:15241: adhyāśritaṃ ca yatsaukhyaṃ bhavatā naṣṭaceṣṭitam // MatsP_154.214 //
GP12mtp176pu:15243: prāgeva ceha dṛśyante bhūtānāṃ kāryasaṃbhavāḥ // MatsP_154.215 //
GP12mtp176pu:15246: *śakra uvāca vayaṃ pramāṇāste hyatra ratikānta na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15248: kasyacic ca kvaciddṛṣṭaṃ sāmarthyaṃ na tu sarvataḥ // MatsP_154.217 //
GP12mtp176pu:15250: ratiyukto jagāmāśu prasthaṃ tu himabhūbhṛtaḥ // MatsP_154.218 //
GP12mtp176pu:15252: mahārthā ye hi niṣkampā manasteṣāṃ sudurjayam // MatsP_154.219 //
GP12mtp176pu:15254: saṃsiddhiṃ prāpnuyuścaiva pūrvaṃ saṃśodhya mānasam // MatsP_154.220 //
GP12mtp176pu:15258: tāmasya viniyokṣyāmi manaso vikṛtiṃ parām // MatsP_154.222 //
GP12mtp176pu:15260: avagantuṃ hi māṃ tatra na kaścidatipaṇḍitaḥ // MatsP_154.223 //
GP12mtp176pu:15286: tataḥ sā tasya śanakais tirobhūyātinirmalā // MatsP_154.236 //
GP12mtp176pu:15292: sa tayā māyayāviṣṭo jajvāla madanastataḥ // MatsP_154.239 //
GP12mtp176pu:15296: anuyāto 'tha hṛdyena mitreṇa madhunā saha // MatsP_154.241 //
GP12mtp176pu:15298: stabakaṃ madano ramyaṃ haravakṣasi satvaram // MatsP_154.242 //
GP12mtp176pu:15300: śivasya hṛdaye śuddhe nāśaśālī mahāśaraḥ // MatsP_154.243 //
GP12mtp176pu:15302: tataḥ karaṇasaṃdeho viddhastu hṛdaye bhavaḥ // MatsP_154.244 //
GP12mtp176pu:15312: sa tu taṃ bhasmasātkṛtvā haranetrodbhavo 'nalaḥ // MatsP_154.249 //
GP12mtp176pu:15320: samprāpya snehasaṃpṛktaṃ kāmināṃ hṛdayaṃ kila // MatsP_154.253 //
GP12mtp176pu:15323: vilalāpa ratiḥ krūraṃ bandhunā madhunā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:15324: tato vilapya bahuśo madhunā parisāntvitā // MatsP_154.255 //
GP12mtp176pu:15328: nirbadhya tu jaṭājūṭaṃ kuṭilair alakai ratiḥ // MatsP_154.257 //
GP12mtp176pu:15332: namaḥ śivāyāstu nirāmayāya namaḥ śivāyāstu manomayāya /
GP12mtp176pu:15333: namaḥ śivāyāstu surārcitāya tubhyaṃ sadā bhaktakṛpāparāya // MatsP_154.259
GP12mtp176pu:15334: namo bhavāyāstu bhavodbhavāya namo 'stu te dhvastamanobhavāya /
GP12mtp176pu:15335: namo 'stu te gūḍhamahāvratāya namo 'stu māyāgahanāśrayāya // MatsP_154.260
GP12mtp176pu:15336: namo 'stu śarvāya namaḥ śivāya namo 'stu siddhāya purātanāya /
GP12mtp176pu:15337: namo 'stu kālāya namaḥ kalāya namo 'stu te jñānavarapradāya //
GP12mtp176pu:15341: namo 'stu nānājagatāṃ vidhātre namo 'stu te citraphalaprayoktre //
GP12mtp176pu:15343: namo 'stu bhaktābhimatapradātre namaḥ sadā te bhavasaṅgahartre //
GP12mtp176pu:15344: anantarūpāya sadaiva tubhyam asahyakopāya namo 'stu tubhyam /
GP12mtp176pu:15345: śaśāṅkacihnāya sadaiva tubhyam ameyamānāya namaḥ stutāya // MatsP_154.265
GP12mtp176pu:15349: tvāmindumauliṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannā priyāprameyaṃ mahatāṃ maheśam //
GP12mtp176pu:15350: prayaccha me kāmayaśaḥsamṛddhiṃ punaḥ prabho jīvatu kāmadevaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15351: priyaṃ vinā tvāṃ priyajīviteṣu tvatto 'paraḥ ko bhuvaneṣvihāsti //
GP12mtp176pu:15354: *sūta uvāca itthaṃ stutaḥ śaṃkara īḍya īśo vṛṣākapirmanmathakāntayā tu /
GP12mtp176pu:15355: tutoṣa doṣākarakhaṇḍadhārī uvāca caināṃ madhuraṃ nirīkṣya // MatsP_154.270
GP12mtp176pu:15357: anaṅga iti lokeṣu sa vikhyātiṃ gamiṣyati // MatsP_154.271 //
GP12mtp176pu:15360: ruroda cāpi bahuśo dīnā ramye sthale tu sā /
GP12mtp176pu:15365: śarābhyāṃ saṃyutāṃ śailo gṛhītvā svasutāṃ tataḥ // MatsP_154.275 //
GP12mtp176pu:15370: kautukena parāmṛśya tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rudatīṃ giriḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15373: kāsi kasyāsi kalyāṇi kimarthaṃ cāpi rodiṣi /
GP12mtp176pu:15375: sā tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā uvāca madhunā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:15378: kāmasya dayitāṃ bhāryāṃ ratiṃ māṃ viddhi suvrata /
GP12mtp176pu:15382: ahaṃ tu śaraṇaṃ yātā taṃ devaṃ bhayavihvalā /
GP12mtp176pu:15383: stutavatyatha saṃstutyā tato māṃ giriśo 'bravīt // MatsP_154.283 //
GP12mtp176pu:15386: lapsyate kāṅkṣitaṃ kāmaṃ nivartya maraṇāditaḥ // MatsP_154.284 //
GP12mtp176pu:15390: pāṇāvādāya hi sutāṃ gantumaicchatsvakaṃ puram // MatsP_154.286 //
GP12mtp176pu:15392: lajjamānā sakhimukhair uvāca pitaraṃ girim // MatsP_154.287 //
GP12mtp176pu:15395: kathaṃ ca tādṛśaṃ prāptaṃ sukhaṃ me sa patirbhavet // MatsP_154.288 //
GP12mtp176pu:15397: durbhagatvaṃ vṛthā loko vahate sati sādhane // MatsP_154.289 //
GP12mtp176pu:15399: bhaviṣyāmi na saṃdeho niyamaiḥ śoṣaye tanum // MatsP_154.290 //
GP12mtp176pu:15401: sāhaṃ tapaḥ kariṣyāmi yadahaṃ prāpya durlabhā // MatsP_154.291 //
GP12mtp176pu:15405: umeti capale putri na kṣamaṃ tāvakaṃ vapuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15410: bhavanāyaiva gacchāmaś cintayiṣyāmi tatra vai // MatsP_154.295 //
GP12mtp176pu:15411: ityuktā tu yadā naiva guhāyābhyeti śailajā /
GP12mtp176pu:15412: tataḥ sa cintayāviṣṭo duhitāṃ praśaśaṃsa ca // MatsP_154.296 //
GP12mtp176pu:15414: umeti capale putri tvayoktā tanayā tataḥ // MatsP_154.297 //
GP12mtp176pu:15416: siddhiṃ ca mūrtimatyeṣā sādhayiṣyati cintitām // MatsP_154.298 //
GP12mtp176pu:15418: anujñāya sutāṃ śailo jagāmāśu svamandiram // MatsP_154.299 //
GP12mtp176pu:15419: *sūta uvāca śailajāpi yayau śailam agamyamapi daivataiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15437: nirāhārā śataṃ sābhūt samānāṃ tapasāṃ nidhiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15440: te samāgamya munayaḥ sarve samuditāstataḥ // MatsP_154.310 //
GP12mtp176pu:15442: kimarthaṃ tu suraśreṣṭha saṃsmṛtāstu vayaṃ tvayā // MatsP_154.311 //
GP12mtp176pu:15445: tasyā hyabhimataṃ kāmaṃ bhavantaḥ kartumarhatha // MatsP_154.312 //
GP12mtp176pu:15449: putri kiṃ te vyavasitaḥ kāmaḥ kamalalocane // MatsP_154.314 //
GP12mtp176pu:15451: tapasyato mahābhāgāḥ prāpya maune bhavādṛśān // MatsP_154.315 //
GP12mtp176pu:15458: tyaktvā vratātmakaṃ maunaṃ maunaṃ jagrāha hrīmayam /
GP12mtp176pu:15459: bhāvaṃ tasyāstu maunāntaṃ tasyāḥ saptarṣayo yathā // MatsP_154.319 //
GP12mtp176pu:15463: bhagavanto vijānanti prāṇināṃ mānasaṃ hitam // MatsP_154.321 //
GP12mtp176pu:15465: kecit tu nipuṇāstatra ghaṭante vibudhodyamaiḥ // MatsP_154.322 //
GP12mtp176pu:15470: vandhyā sutaṃ prāptukāmā manaḥ prasarate muhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15471: ahaṃ kila bhavaṃ devaṃ patiṃ prāptuṃ samudyatā // MatsP_154.325 //
GP12mtp176pu:15478: *munaya ūcuḥ dvividhaṃ tu sukhaṃ tāvat putri lokeṣu bhāvyate /
GP12mtp176pu:15480: prakṛtyā sa tu digvāsā bhīmaḥ pitṛvaṇeśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15481: kapālī bhikṣuko nagno virūpākṣaḥ sthirakriyaḥ // MatsP_154.330 //
GP12mtp176pu:15483: yatinā tena kaste 'rtho mūrtānarthena kāṅkṣitaḥ // MatsP_154.331 //
GP12mtp176pu:15485: tatkathaṃ te mahādevād bhayabhājo jugupsitāt // MatsP_154.332 //
GP12mtp176pu:15493: vāyurasti jagaddhātā yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvadehinām // MatsP_154.336 //
GP12mtp176pu:15495: ebhya ekatamaṃ kasmān na tvaṃ samprāptumicchasi // MatsP_154.337 //
GP12mtp176pu:15502: asya te vidhiyogasya dhātā kartātra caiva hi // MatsP_154.340 //
GP12mtp176pu:15503: *sūta uvāca ityuktā sā tu kupitā munivaryeṣu śailajā /
GP12mtp176pu:15506: asadgrahasya kā prītir vyasanasya kva yantraṇā /
GP12mtp176pu:15508: evaṃ māṃ vettha duṣprajñāṃ hy asthānāsadgrahapriyām /
GP12mtp176pu:15511: nūnaṃ na vettha taṃ devaṃ śāśvataṃ jagataḥ prabhum // MatsP_154.344 //
GP12mtp176pu:15514: viduryaṃ na haribrahma-pramukhā hi sureśvarāḥ // MatsP_154.346 //
GP12mtp176pu:15516: prakaṭaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tadapyatra na vettha kim // MatsP_154.347 //
GP12mtp176pu:15518: kasya bhūḥ kasya varuṇaḥ kaścandrārkavilocanaḥ // MatsP_154.348 //
GP12mtp176pu:15520: yaṃ bruvantīśvaraṃ devā vidhīndrādyā maharṣayaḥ // MatsP_154.349 //
GP12mtp176pu:15521: prabhāvaṃ prabhavaṃ caiṣa teṣāmapi na vettha kim /
GP12mtp176pu:15522: aditiḥ kasya māteyaṃ kasmājjāto janārdanaḥ // MatsP_154.350 //
GP12mtp176pu:15524: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putro hy aditirdakṣaputrikā // MatsP_154.351 //
GP12mtp176pu:15525: marīciścāpi dakṣaśca putrau tau brahmaṇaḥ kila /
GP12mtp176pu:15534: kṛtvānyaṃ deham anyā dṛk tādṛk kṛtvā punarhariḥ // MatsP_154.356 //
GP12mtp176pu:15536: evameva hi saṃsāro yo janmamaraṇātmakaḥ // MatsP_154.357 //
GP12mtp176pu:15538: atha nārāyaṇo devaḥ svakāṃ chāyāṃ samāśrayat // MatsP_154.358 //
GP12mtp176pu:15540: sāpi karmaṇa evoktā preraṇā vivaśātmanām // MatsP_154.359 //
GP12mtp176pu:15546: na hyasya jīvitaṃ dīrghaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dehe tu kutracit // MatsP_154.362 //
GP12mtp176pu:15550: kvacitsamāḥ śataṃ jīvet kvacidbālye vipadyate // MatsP_154.364 //
GP12mtp176pu:15552: jīvito na mriyatyagre tasmātso 'mara ucyate // MatsP_154.365 //
GP12mtp176pu:15558: sthitaṃ ca tāratamyena prāṇināṃ paramaṃ tvidam // MatsP_154.368 //
GP12mtp176pu:15564: evaṃ niśamya vacanaṃ devyā munivarāstadā // MatsP_154.371 //
GP12mtp176pu:15566: ūcuśca paramaprītāḥ śailajāṃ madhuraṃ vacaḥ // MatsP_154.372 //
GP12mtp176pu:15572: kvādityasya prabhā yāti ratnebhyaḥ kva dyutiḥ pṛthak // MatsP_154.375 //
GP12mtp176pu:15573: ko 'rtho varṇālikāvyaktaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ giriśaṃ vinā /
GP12mtp176pu:15575: asmākamapi vai so 'rthaḥ sutarāṃ hṛdi vartate /
GP12mtp176pu:15576: atastvameva sā buddhir yato nītistvameva hi // MatsP_154.377 //
GP12mtp176pu:15578: ityuktvā pūjitā yātā munayo girikanyayā // MatsP_154.378 //
GP12mtp176pu:15582: gireḥ samprāpya te prasthaṃ dadṛśuḥ śaṃkarāśramam // MatsP_154.380 //
GP12mtp176pu:15586: sapta te munayaḥ pūjyā vinītāḥ kāryagauravāt // MatsP_154.382 //
GP12mtp176pu:15590: tvameva no gatistattvaṃ yathā kālānatikramaḥ // MatsP_154.384 //
GP12mtp176pu:15592: ityukto munibhiḥ so 'tha gauravāttānuvāca saḥ // MatsP_154.385 //
GP12mtp176pu:15594: kṣaṇena bhavitā viprās tatra drakṣyatha śūlinam // MatsP_154.386 //
GP12mtp176pu:15601: samprāptā munayaḥ sapta tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ dīptatejasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15605: bhūbhaṅgasaṃjñayā teṣāṃ praveśājñāṃ dadau tadā // MatsP_154.391 //
GP12mtp176pu:15613: manmathāriṃ tato hṛṣṭāḥ samaṃ tuṣṭuvurādṛtāḥ // MatsP_154.395 //
GP12mtp176pu:15614: *munaya ūcuḥ aho kṛtārthā vayameva sāṃprataṃ sureśvaro 'pyatra varo bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:15616: jayatyasau dhanyataro himācalas tadāśrayaṃ yasya sutā tapasyati /
GP12mtp176pu:15617: sa daityarājo 'pi mahāphalodayo vimūlitāśeṣasuro hi tārakaḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:15618: tvadīyamaṃśaṃ pravilokya kalmaṣāt svakaṃ śarīraṃ parimokṣyate hi yaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15621: tvameva caiko vividhākṛtakriyaḥ kileti vācā vidhurair vibhāṣyate //
GP12mtp176pu:15622: athādya ekastvamavādi nānyathā jagattathā nirghṛṇatāṃ tava spṛśet /
GP12mtp176pu:15623: na vetsi vā duḥkhamidaṃ prajātmakaṃ vihanyate te khalu sarvataḥ kriyā //
GP12mtp176pu:15624: upekṣase cej jagatāmupadravaṃ dayāmayatvaṃ tava kena kathyate /
GP12mtp176pu:15626: vayaṃ ca te dhanyatarāḥ śarīriṇāṃ yadīdṛśaṃ tvāṃ pravilokayāmahe /
GP12mtp176pu:15627: adarśanaṃ tena manoratho yathā prayāti sāphalyatayā manogatam //
GP12mtp176pu:15629: vinemuritthaṃ munayo visṛjya tāṃ giraṃ girīśaśrutibhūmisaṃnidhau //
GP12mtp176pu:15630: utkṛṣṭakedāra ivāvanītale subījamuṣṭiṃ suphalāya karṣakāḥ // MatsP_154.404
GP12mtp176pu:15631: teṣāṃ śrutvā tu tāṃ ramyāṃ prakramopakramakriyām /
GP12mtp176pu:15636: teṣāṃ tvaranti cetāṃsi kiṃtu kāryaṃ vivakṣitam // MatsP_154.407 //
GP12mtp176pu:15638: sevante te yato dharmaṃ tatprāmāṇyātpare sthitāḥ // MatsP_154.408 //
GP12mtp176pu:15642: *munaya ūcuḥ devo duhitaraṃ sākṣāt pinākī tava mārgate /
GP12mtp176pu:15654: varastasyāpi cāhūya sutā deyā hyayācataḥ // MatsP_154.415 //
GP12mtp176pu:15661: yasyopayogi yadrūpaṃ sā ca tatprāptaye ciram /
GP12mtp176pu:15662: ghoraṃ tapasyate bālā tena rūpeṇa nirvṛtiḥ // MatsP_154.419 //
GP12mtp176pu:15664: tatra sāvahitā tāvat tasmāt saiva bhaviṣyati // MatsP_154.420 //
GP12mtp176pu:15665: ityuktvā giriṇā sārdhaṃ te yayuryatra śailajā /
GP12mtp176pu:15668: ramyaṃ priyaṃ manohāri mā rūpaṃ tapasā daha // MatsP_154.422 //
GP12mtp176pu:15669: prātaste śaṃkaraḥ pāṇim eṣa putri grahīṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:15671: pitrā saha gṛhaṃ gaccha vayaṃ yāmaḥ svamandiram // MatsP_154.424 //
GP12mtp176pu:15672: ityuktā tapasaḥ satyaṃ phalamastīti cintya sā /
GP12mtp176pu:15674: sā tatra rajanīṃ mene varṣāyutasamāṃ satī /
GP12mtp176pu:15676: tato muhūrte brāhme tu tasyāścakruḥ surastriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15679: upāsata giriṃ mūrtā ṛtavaḥ sārvakāmikāḥ // MatsP_154.428 //
GP12mtp176pu:15681: harmyeṣu śrīḥ svayaṃ devī kṛtanānāprasādhanā // MatsP_154.429 //
GP12mtp176pu:15688: nadyaḥ samudrā nikhilāḥ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca yat /
GP12mtp176pu:15696: uvāca cāpi vacanaṃ putraṃ janaya śaṃkara /
GP12mtp176pu:15697: yo daityendrakulaṃ hatvā māṃ raktaistarpayiṣyati // MatsP_154.437 //
GP12mtp176pu:15699: bhujagābharaṇaṃ gṛhya sajjaṃ śaṃbhoḥ puro 'bhavat // MatsP_154.438 //
GP12mtp176pu:15705: svāṃ dyutiṃ lokanāthasya jagataḥ karmasākṣiṇaḥ // MatsP_154.441 //
GP12mtp176pu:15707: manujāsthimayīṃ mālām ābabandha ca pāṇinā // MatsP_154.442 //
GP12mtp176pu:15711: karṇottaṃsaṃ cakāreśo vāsukiṃ takṣakaṃ svayam // MatsP_154.444 //
GP12mtp176pu:15713: tatastu te gaṇādhīśā vinayāttatra vīrakam // MatsP_154.445 //
GP12mtp176pu:15723: ratiḥ purastava prāptā nābhāti madanojjhitā // MatsP_154.450 //
GP12mtp176pu:15726: tato haro himagirikandarākṛtiṃ sitaṃ kaśāmṛduhatibhiḥ pracodayat /
GP12mtp176pu:15729: dharārajaḥśabalitabhūṣaṇo 'bravīt prayāta mā kuruta patho 'sya saṃkaṭam //
GP12mtp176pu:15732: viyaccarā viyati kimasti kāntakaṃ prayāta no dharaṇidharāvidūrataḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:15734: gaṇeśvarāś capalatayā na gamyatāṃ sureśvaraiḥ sthiramatibhir nirīkṣyate //
GP12mtp176pu:15735: na bhṛṅgiṇā svatanumavekṣya nīyate pinākinaḥ pṛthumukhamaṇḍam agrataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15736: vṛthā yamaḥ prakaṭitadantakoṭaraṃ tvamāyudhaṃ vahasi vihāya saṃbhramam //
GP12mtp176pu:15737: padaṃ na yadrathaturagaiḥ puradviṣaḥ pramucyate bahutaramātṛsaṃkulam /
GP12mtp176pu:15738: amī surāḥ pṛthaganuyāyibhirvṛtāḥ padātayo dviguṇapathān harapriyāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:15740: surāḥ svakaṃ kimiti sarāgamūrjitaṃ vicāryate niyatalayatrayānugam //
GP12mtp176pu:15741: na kiṃnarair abhibhavituṃ hi śakyate vibhūṣaṇacayasamudbhavo dhvaniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15742: ajātijāḥ kimiti na ṣaḍjamadhyam apṛthusvaraṃ bahutaramatra vakṣyate //
GP12mtp176pu:15745: visaṃhatāḥ kimiti na ṣāḍgavādayaḥ svagītakair lalitapadaprayogajaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15746: prabhoḥ puro bhavati hi yasya cākṣataṃ samudgatārthakamiti tatpratīyate //
GP12mtp176pu:15749: amī kathaṃ kakubhi kathāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ dhvananti te vividhavadhūvimiśritāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15750: na jātayo dhvanimurajāsamīritā na mūrchitāḥ kimiti ca mūrchanātmakāḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:15752: na hanyate bahuvidhavādyaḍambaraṃ prakīrṇavīṇāmurajādi nāma yat //
GP12mtp176pu:15753: itīrate girimavadhānaśālinaḥ surāsurāḥ sapadi tu vīrakājñayā /
GP12mtp176pu:15754: niyāmitāḥ prayayuratīva harṣitāś carācaraṃ jagadakhilaṃ hyapūrayan //
GP12mtp176pu:15768: kāciduvāca kalaṃ gatamānā kātaratāṃ sakhi mā kuru mūḍhe // MatsP_154.472
GP12mtp176pu:15769: dagdhamanobhava eva pinākī kāmayate svayameva vihartum /
GP12mtp176pu:15770: kācidapi svayameva patantī prāha parāṃ virahaskhalitāṅgīm // MatsP_154.473
GP12mtp176pu:15771: mā capale madanavyatiṣaṅgaṃ śaṃkarajaṃ skhalanena vada tvam /
GP12mtp176pu:15773: eṣa sa yatra sahasramakhādyā nākasadāmadhipāḥ svayamuktaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15775: eṣa na caiṣa sa eṣa yadagre carmaparītatanuḥ śaśimaulī /
GP12mtp176pu:15786: netrāṇi saphalānyadya manobhiriti te dadhuḥ // MatsP_154.481 //
GP12mtp176pu:15792: dātā mahībhṛtāṃ nātho hotā devaścaturmukhaḥ // MatsP_154.484 //
GP12mtp176pu:15800: tasthau sābharaṇo devo harṣadaḥ sarvadehinām // MatsP_154.488 //
GP12mtp176pu:15808: mūrtāśca ṛtavastatra jaguśca nanṛtuśca vai // MatsP_154.492 //
GP12mtp176pu:15813: avasattāṃ kṣapāṃ tatra patnyā saha purāntakaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15818: tato gate bhagavati nīlalohite sahomayā ratimalabhanna bhūdharaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15819: sabāndhavo bhavati ca kasya no mano vihvalaṃ ca jagati hi kanyakāpituḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:15823: purodyāneṣu ramyeṣu vivikteṣu vaneṣu ca // MatsP_154.499 //
GP12mtp176pu:15825: tato bahutithe kāle sutakāmā gireḥ sutā // MatsP_154.500 //
GP12mtp176pu:15829: tadudvartanakaṃ gṛhya naraṃ cakre gajānanam // MatsP_154.502 //
GP12mtp176pu:15833: putretyuvāca te devī putretyūce ca jāhnavī // MatsP_154.504 //
GP12mtp176pu:15836: punaḥ sā krīḍanaṃ cakre putrārthaṃ varavarṇinī /
GP12mtp176pu:15840: tato devaiśca munibhiḥ proktā devī tvidaṃ vacaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15841: bhavāni bhavatī bhavyā sambhūtā lokabhūtaye // MatsP_154.508 //
GP12mtp176pu:15843: aputrāśca prajāḥ prāyo dṛśyante daivahetavaḥ // MatsP_154.509 //
GP12mtp176pu:15846: ityuktā harṣapūrṇāṅgī provācomā śubhāṃ giram // MatsP_154.510 //
GP12mtp176pu:15847: evaṃ nirudake deśe yaḥ kūpaṃ kārayedbudhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15848: bindau bindau ca toyasya vasetsaṃvatsaraṃ divi // MatsP_154.511 //
GP12mtp176pu:15851: eṣaiva mama maryādā niyatā lokabhāvinī // MatsP_154.512 //
GP12mtp176pu:15853: jagmuḥ svamandirāṇyeva bhavānīṃ vandya sādaram // MatsP_154.513 //
GP12mtp176pu:15873: papraccha taṃ śubhatanur haraṃ vismayapūrvakam // MatsP_154.523 //
GP12mtp176pu:15875: ete gaṇeśāḥ krīḍante śaile 'sminmatpriyāḥ sadā // MatsP_154.524 //
GP12mtp176pu:15877: yairahaṃ toṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ ta ete manujottamāḥ // MatsP_154.525 //
GP12mtp176pu:15884: hṛdyā me cārusarvāṅgi ta ete krīḍitā girau /
GP12mtp176pu:15885: ityuktā tu tato devī tyaktvā tadvismayākulā // MatsP_154.529 //
GP12mtp176pu:15887: yāvantaste kṛśā dīrghā hrasvāḥ sthūlā mahodarāḥ // MatsP_154.530 //
GP12mtp176pu:15899: gaṇeśāṃstāṃstathā dṛṣṭvā devī provāca śaṃkaram // MatsP_154.536 //
GP12mtp176pu:15902: ekaikaśo mama brūhi dhiṣṭhitā ye pṛthakpṛthak // MatsP_154.537 //
GP12mtp176pu:15911: na hyeṣāṃ vai anantatvād guṇānvaktuṃ hi śakyate // MatsP_154.541 //
GP12mtp176pu:15918: ya eṣa gaṇagīteṣu dattakarṇo muhurmuhuḥ // MatsP_154.544 //
GP12mtp176pu:15919: sa eṣa vīrako devi sadā maddhṛdayapriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15925: tvayā mātrā kṛtārtho 'stu vīrako 'pi sumadhyame // MatsP_154.547 //
GP12mtp176pu:15931: ehi vīraka cāpalyāt tvayā devaḥ prakopitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15932: kimuttaraṃ vadatyarthe nṛtyaraṅge tu śailajā // MatsP_154.550 //
GP12mtp176pu:15940: ehyehi yāto 'si me putratāṃ devadevena datto 'dhunā vīraka ||
GP12mtp176pu:15941: ityevamaṅke nidhāyātha taṃ paryacumbatkapole kalavādinam || MatsP_154.555
GP12mtp176pu:15942: mūrdhnyupāghrāya saṃmārjya gātrāṇi bhūṣayāmāsa divyaiḥ svayaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ kiṅkiṇīmekhalānūpurair māṇikyakeyūrahārorumūlaguṇaiḥ || MatsP_154.556 ||
GP12mtp176pu:15943: komalaiḥ pallavaiścitritaiścārubhir divyamantrodbhavais tasya śubhaistato bhūribhiścākaronmiśrasiddhārthakair aṅgarakṣāvidhim || MatsP_154.557 ||
GP12mtp176pu:15944: evamādāya covāca kṛtvā srajaṃ mūrdhni gorocanāpatrabhaṅgojjvalam ||
GP12mtp176pu:15945: gaccha gacchādhunā krīḍa sārdhaṃ gaṇairapramatto nage śvabhravarja śanairvyālamālākulāḥ śailasānudrumadantibhir bhinnasārāḥ pare saṅginaḥ ||
GP12mtp176pu:15946: jāhnavīyaṃ jalaṃ kṣubdhatoyākulaṃ kūlaṃ mā viśethā bahuvyāghraduṣṭe vane || MatsP_154.560
GP12mtp176pu:15947: vatsāsaṃkhyeṣu durgā gaṇeśeṣvetasminvīrake putrabhāvopatuṣṭāntaḥkaraṇā tiṣṭhatu || MatsP_154.561
GP12mtp176pu:15949: so 'pi nirvartya sarvān gaṇān sasmayamāha bālatvalīlārasāviṣṭadhīḥ ||
GP12mtp176pu:15950: eṣa mātrā svayaṃ me kṛtabhūṣaṇo 'tra eṣa paṭaḥ pāṭalairbindubhiḥ
GP12mtp176pu:15951: sinduvārasya puṣpairiyaṃ mālatīmiśritā mālikā me śirasyāhitā ||
GP12mtp176pu:15952: ko 'yamātodyadhārī gaṇastasya dāsyāmi hastādidaṃ krīḍanam || MatsP_154.565
GP12mtp176pu:15953: dakṣiṇātpaścimaṃ paścimāduttaramuttarātpūrvamabhyetya sakhyā yutā prekṣatī taṃ gavākṣāntarādvīrakaṃ śailaputrī bahiḥ krīḍanaṃ yajjaganmāturapyeṣa cittabhramaḥ || MatsP_154.566 ||
GP12mtp176pu:15954: putralubdho janastatra ko mohamāyāti na svalpacetā jaḍo māṃsaviṇmūtrasaṃghātadehaḥ || MatsP_154.567
GP12mtp176pu:15956: vāhanātyāvarohā gaṇāstairyuto lokapālāstramūrto hyayaṃ khaḍgo vikhaḍgakaro nirmamaḥ kṛtāntaḥ kasya kenāhato brūta maune bhavanto 'stradaṇḍena kiṃ duḥspṛhāḥ || MatsP_154.569 ||
GP12mtp176pu:15957: bhīmamūrtyānanenāsti kṛtyaṃ girau ya eṣo 'strajñena kiṃ vadhyate ||
GP12mtp176pu:15958: mā vṛthā lokapālānugacittatā evam evaitad ityūcurasmai tadā devatāḥ ||
GP12mtp176pu:15959: devadevānugaṃ vīrakaṃ lakṣaṇā prāha devī vanaṃ parvatā nirjharāṇyagnidevyānyatho bhūtapā nirjharāmbhonipāteṣu nimajjata ||
GP12mtp176pu:15960: puṣpajālāvanaddheṣu dhāmasvapi prottuṅganānādrikuñjeṣvanugarjantu hemārutāsphoṭasaṃkṣepaṇāt kāmataḥ || MatsP_154.573 ||
GP12mtp176pu:15961: kāñcanottuṅgaśṛṅgāvarohakṣitau hemareṇūtkarāsaṅgadyutiṃ khecarāṇāṃ vanādhāyini ramye bahurūpasaṃpatprakare gaṇānvāsitaṃ mandarakandare sundaramandārapuṣpapravālāmbuje siddhanārībhir āpītarūpāmṛtaṃ vistṛtair netrapātrair anunmeṣibhir vīrake śailaputrī nimeṣāntarād asmaratputragṛdhrī vinodārthinī so 'pi tādṛkkṣaṇāvāptapuṇyodayo yo 'pi janmāntarasyātmajatvaṃ gataḥ krīḍatastasya tṛptiḥ kathaṃ jāyate yo 'pi bhāvijagadvedhasā tejasaḥ kalpitaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ divyagītakṣaṇo nṛtyalolo gaṇeśaiḥ praṇataḥ ||
GP12mtp176pu:15963: kṣaṇaṃ phullanānātamālālikāle kṣaṇaṃ vṛkṣamūle vilolo marāle //
GP12mtp176pu:15964: kṣaṇe svalpapaṅke jale paṅkajāḍhye kṣaṇaṃ māturaṅke śubhe niṣkalaṅke /
GP12mtp176pu:15991: *śarva uvāca śarīre mama tanvaṅgi site bhāsyasitadyutiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:15992: bhujaṃgīvāsitā śuddhā saṃśliṣṭā candane tarau // MatsP_155.1 //
