GP12mtp176pu:15994: rajanīvāsite pakṣe dṛṣṭidoṣaṃ dadāsi me // MatsP_155.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16001: tasyā me niyatastveṣa hy avamānaḥ pade pade // MatsP_155.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:16002: naivāsmi kuṭilā śarva viṣamā naiva dhūrjaṭe /
GP12mtp176pu:16004: nāhaṃ pūṣṇo 'pi daśanā netre cāsmi bhagasya hi /
GP12mtp176pu:16007: yastvaṃ māmāha kṛṣṇeti mahākāleti viśrutaḥ // MatsP_155.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16009: jīvantyā nāsti me kṛtyaṃ dhūrtena paribhūtayā // MatsP_155.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16015: yadyevaṃ kupitā bhīru tvaṃ tavāhaṃ na vai punaḥ // MatsP_155.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:16019: tasmānna jātu ruṣṭasya narmaspṛṣṭo janaḥ kila // MatsP_155.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:16021: kopaṃ tīvraṃ na tatyāja satī marmaṇi ghaṭṭitā // MatsP_155.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:16025: satyaṃ sarvairavayavaiḥ sutāsi sadṛśī pituḥ // MatsP_155.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16031: ityuktā sā punaḥ prāha giriśaṃ śailajā tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:16035: tavāpi duṣṭasaṃparkāt saṃkrāntaṃ sarvameva hi // MatsP_155.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:16038: tathā bahu kimuktena alaṃ vācā śrameṇa te /
GP12mtp176pu:16039: śmaśānavāsān nirbhīs tvaṃ nagnatvānna tava trapā /
GP12mtp176pu:16040: nirghṛṇatvaṃ kapālitvād dayā te vigatā ciram // MatsP_155.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16041: *sūta uvāca ityuktvā mandirāttasmān nirjagāma himādrijā // MatsP_155.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:16043: kva mātargacchasi tyaktvā rudanto dhāvitāḥ punaḥ // MatsP_155.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:16045: provāca mātaḥ kiṃtvetat kva yāsi kupitāntarā // MatsP_155.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:16047: no cetpatiṣye śikharāt taponiṣṭhe tvayojjhitaḥ // MatsP_155.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:16048: unnāmya vadanaṃ devī dakṣiṇena tu pāṇinā /
GP12mtp176pu:16049: uvāca vīrakaṃ mātā śokaṃ putraka mā kṛthāḥ // MatsP_155.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:16050: śailāgrātpatituṃ naiva na cāgantuṃ mayā saha /
GP12mtp176pu:16051: yuktaṃ te putra vakṣyāmi yena kāryeṇa tacchṛṇu // MatsP_155.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:16053: sārhaṃ tapaḥ kariṣyāmi yena gaurītvamāpnuyām // MatsP_155.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:16055: dvārarakṣā tvayā kāryā nityaṃ randhrānvavekṣiṇā // MatsP_155.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:16056: yathā na kācit praviśed yoṣidatra harāntikam /
GP12mtp176pu:16057: dṛṣṭvā parāṃstriyaṃ cātra vadethā mama putraka // MatsP_155.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:16059: evamastviti devīṃ sa vīrakaḥ prāha sāṃpratam // MatsP_155.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:16061: jagāma kakṣāṃ saṃdraṣṭuṃ praṇipatya ca mātaram // MatsP_155.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:16063: *sūta uvāca devīṃ sāpaśyad āyāntīṃ sakhīṃ māturvibhūṣitām /
GP12mtp176pu:16064: kusumamodinīṃ nāma tasya śailasya devatām // MatsP_156.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:16066: kva putri gacchasītyuccair āliṅgyovāca devatā // MatsP_156.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16071: sarvataḥ saṃnidhānaṃ te mama cātīva vatsalā // MatsP_156.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:16075: pinākinaḥ praviṣṭāyāṃ vaktavyaṃ me tvayānaghe // MatsP_156.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:16077: ityuktā sā tathetyuktvā jagāma svagiriṃ śubham // MatsP_156.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16081: grīṣme pañcāgnisaṃtaptā varṣāsu ca jaloṣitā // MatsP_156.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16083: evaṃ sādhayatī tatra tapasā saṃvyavasthitā // MatsP_156.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:16084: jñātvā tu tāṃ girisutāṃ daityastatrāntare vaśī /
GP12mtp176pu:16089: sa tatrāgatya dadṛśe vīrakaṃ dvāryavasthitam // MatsP_156.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:16097: na kaścic ca vinā mṛtyuṃ naro dānava vidyate /
GP12mtp176pu:16098: yatastato 'pi daityendra mṛtyuḥ prāpyaḥ śarīriṇā // MatsP_156.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16100: rūpasya parivarto me yadā syātpadmasaṃbhava // MatsP_156.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:16101: tadā mṛtyurmama bhaved anyathā tvamaro hyaham /
GP12mtp176pu:16104: tadā te bhavitā mṛtyur anyathā na bhaviṣyati // MatsP_156.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:16108: bhujaṃgarūpī randhreṇa praviveśa dṛśaḥ patham // MatsP_156.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:16121: apṛcchatsādhu te bhāvo giriputri na kṛtrimaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16122: yā tvaṃ madāśayaṃ jñātvā prāpteha varavarṇinī // MatsP_156.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:16129: ratiśca tatra me nābhūt tataḥ prāptā tvadantikam // MatsP_156.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:16132: kupitā mayi tanvaṅgī prakṛtyā ca dṛḍhavratā /
GP12mtp176pu:16136: lomāvartaṃ tu racitaṃ tato devaḥ pinākadhṛk /
GP12mtp176pu:16150: gaṇeśa kṣārasadṛśī śilā mātā bhaviṣyati // MatsP_157.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16158: tasyāśu vartituṃ devī vyavasyata satī tadā // MatsP_157.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:16161: āgamyovāca deveśo girijāṃ spaṣṭayā girā // MatsP_157.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16163: kiṃ putri prāptukāmāsi kimalabhyaṃ dadāmi te /
GP12mtp176pu:16169: sa māṃ śyāmalavarṇeti bahuśaḥ proktavānbhavaḥ // MatsP_157.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:16173: evaṃ bhava tvaṃ bhūyaśca bhartṛdehārdhadhāriṇī // MatsP_157.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:16180: ya eṣa siṃhaḥ prodbhūto devyāḥ krodhādvarānane // MatsP_157.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:16181: sa te 'stu vāhanaṃ devi ketau cāstu mahābalaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16182: gaccha vindhyācalaṃ tatra surakāryaṃ kariṣyasi // MatsP_157.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16184: dattaste kiṃkaro devi mayā māyāśatairyutaḥ // MatsP_157.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:16185: ityuktā kauśikī devī vindhyaśailaṃ jagāma ha /
GP12mtp176pu:16187: praviśantīṃ tu tāṃ dvārād apakṛṣya samāhitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16190: prayojanaṃ na te 'stīha gaccha yāvanna bhetsyase // MatsP_157.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:16191: devyā rūpadharo daityo devaṃ vañcayituṃ tviha /
GP12mtp176pu:16192: praviṣṭo na ca dṛṣṭo 'sau sa vai devena ghātitaḥ // MatsP_157.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:16194: dvāreṣu nāvadhānaṃ te yasmātpaśyāmi vai tataḥ // MatsP_157.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16196: ataste 'tra na dāsyāmi praveśaṃ gamyatāṃ drutam // MatsP_157.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:16198: *vīraka uvāca evamuktvā girisutā mātā me snehavatsalā /
GP12mtp176pu:16199: praveśaṃ labhate nānyā nārī kamalalocane // MatsP_158.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:16200: ityuktā tu tadā devī cintayāmāsa cetasā /
GP12mtp176pu:16201: na sā nārīti daityo 'sau vāyurme yāmabhāṣata // MatsP_158.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16203: akāryaṃ kriyate mūḍhaiḥ prāyaḥ krodhasamīritaiḥ // MatsP_158.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:16204: krodhena naśyate kīrtiḥ krodho hanti sthirāṃ śriyam /
GP12mtp176pu:16210: ahaṃ vīraka te mātā mā te 'stu manaso bhramaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16212: mama gātracchavibhrāntyā mā śaṅkāṃ putra bhāvaya /
GP12mtp176pu:16213: tuṣṭena gauratā dattā mameyaṃ padmajanmanā // MatsP_158.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16215: jñātvā nārīpraveśaṃ tu śaṃkare rahasi sthite // MatsP_158.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16216: na nivartayituṃ śakyaḥ śāpaḥ kiṃ tu bravīmi te /
GP12mtp176pu:16217: śīghrameṣyasi mānuṣyāt sa tvaṃ kāmasamanvitaḥ // MatsP_158.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16218: *sūta uvāca śirasā tu tato vandya mātaraṃ pūrṇamānasaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16222: nagasute śaraṇāgatavatsale tava nato 'smi natārtivināśini // MatsP_158.11
GP12mtp176pu:16225: jagati kaḥ praṇatābhimataṃ dadau jhaṭiti siddhanute bhavatī yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:16226: jagati kāṃ ca na vāñchati śaṃkaro bhuvanadhṛttanaye bhavatīṃ yathā //
GP12mtp176pu:16233: viyati vāyupathe jvalanojjvale 'vanitale tava devi ca yadvapuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16240: tvayi mamāstu matiḥ satataṃ śive śaraṇago 'smi nato 'smi namo 'stu te //
GP12mtp176pu:16241: *sūta uvāca prasannā tu tato devī vīrakasyeti saṃstutā /
GP12mtp176pu:16242: praviveśa śubhaṃ bhartur bhavanaṃ bhūdharātmajā // MatsP_158.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:16243: atha rudro mahāgaurīṃ gaurīṃ dṛṣṭvā tu sundarīm /
GP12mtp176pu:16248: sakāmaḥ śaṅkito dīno raudro vīro bhayānakaḥ // MatsP_158.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16251: sā cāpi bhairavī jātā devasya pratirūpiṇī /
GP12mtp176pu:16254: pārvatyā cātha niḥśaṅkaḥ śaṃkaro vābhavattataḥ // MatsP_158.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:16255: dṛṣṭvā jaganmayīṃ tāṃ tu rarāma suratapriyaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16256: virahotkaṇṭhitāṃ bhāryāṃ prāpya bhūyo himātmajām // MatsP_158.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:16262: nibhṛtaḥ krīḍatītyuktā yayuste ca yathāgatam // MatsP_158.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:16266: dadṛśe śayane śarvaṃ rataṃ girijayā saha // MatsP_158.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:16267: dadṛśe taṃ ca deveśo hutāśaṃ śukarūpiṇam /
GP12mtp176pu:16269: *śarva uvāca niṣiktamardhaṃ devyāṃ me śukrasya śukavigraha /
GP12mtp176pu:16270: lajjayā viratisthāyāṃ tvamardhaṃ piba pāvaka // MatsP_158.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:16274: vipāṭya jaṭharaṃ teṣāṃ vīryaṃ māheśvaraṃ tataḥ // MatsP_158.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:16278: tacchrutvā tu tato devī hemadrumamahājalam // MatsP_158.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:16282: pātukāmā ca tattoyaṃ svādu nirmalapaṅkajam // MatsP_158.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:16284: padmapatre tu tadvāri gṛhītvopasthitā gṛham // MatsP_158.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:16287: *kṛttikā ūcuḥ dāsyāmo yadi te garbhaḥ sambhūto yo bhaviṣyati /
GP12mtp176pu:16288: so 'smākamapi putraḥ syād asmannāmnā ca vartatām /
GP12mtp176pu:16292: tatastāṃ kṛttikā ūcur vidhāsyāmo 'sya vai vayam /
GP12mtp176pu:16296: tasyai dadustayā cāpi tatpītaṃ kramaśo jalam /
GP12mtp176pu:16297: pīte tu salile tasmiṃs tatastasminsarovare // MatsP_158.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:16305: *sūta uvāca vāmaṃ vidārya niṣkrāntaḥ suto devyāḥ punaḥ śiśuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16308: śākhābhidhāḥ samākhyātāḥ ṣaṭsu vaktreṣu vistṛtāḥ // MatsP_159.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16310: skando viśākhaḥ ṣaḍvaktraḥ kārtikeyaśca viśrutaḥ // MatsP_159.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:16315: tasyāmeva tataḥ ṣaṣṭhyām abhiṣikto guhaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16320: sutāmasmai dadau śakro devaseneti viśrutām // MatsP_159.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16325: evaṃ surāstu te sarve parivāramanuttamam // MatsP_159.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:16328: stotreṇānena varadaṃ ṣaṇmukhaṃ mukhyaśaḥ surāḥ // MatsP_159.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:16329: *devā ūcuḥ namaḥ kumārāya mahāprabhāya skandāya ca skanditadānavāya /
GP12mtp176pu:16330: navārkavidyuddyutaye namo 'stute namo 'stu te ṣaṇmukha kāmarūpa //
GP12mtp176pu:16332: namo 'stu te 'rkapratimaprabhāya namo 'stu guhyāya guhāya tubhyam //
GP12mtp176pu:16333: namo 'stu trailokyabhayāpahāya namo 'stu te bāla kṛpāparāya /
GP12mtp176pu:16334: namo viśālāmalalocanāya namo viśākhāya mahāvratāya // MatsP_159.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:16335: namo namaste 'stu manoharāya namo namaste 'stu raṇotkaṭāya /
GP12mtp176pu:16336: namo mayūrojjvalavāhanāya namo 'stu keyūradharāya tubhyam // MatsP_159.16
GP12mtp176pu:16337: namo dhṛtodagrapatākine namaste namaḥ prabhāvapraṇatāya te 'stu /
GP12mtp176pu:16338: namaste namaste varavīryaśāline kṛpāparo no bhava bhavyamūrte //
GP12mtp176pu:16339: kriyāparā yajñapatiṃ ca stutvā vinemurevaṃ tvamarādhipādyāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16340: evaṃ tadā ṣaḍvadanastu sendrān uvāca tuṣṭaśca guhastatastān /
GP12mtp176pu:16341: nirīkṣya netrairamalaiḥ sureśāñ śatrūnhaniṣyāmi gatajvarāḥ stha //
GP12mtp176pu:16342: *kumāra uvāca kaṃ vaḥ kāmaṃ prayacchāmi devatā brūta nirvṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16343: yadyapyasādhyaṃ hṛdyaṃ vo hṛdaye cintitaṃ param // MatsP_159.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:16345: sarva eva mahātmānaṃ guhaṃ tadgatamānasāḥ // MatsP_159.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:16348: tameva jahi hṛdyo 'rtha eṣo 'smākaṃ bhayāpaha // MatsP_159.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:16354: sa tu gatvābravīddaityaṃ nirbhayo bhīmadarśanaḥ // MatsP_159.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:16361: *tāraka uvāca dṛṣṭaṃ te pauruṣaṃ śakra raṇeṣu śataśo mayā /
GP12mtp176pu:16362: nistrapatvānna te lajjā vidyate śakra durmate // MatsP_159.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:16364: nālabdhasaṃśrayaḥ śakro vaktumevaṃ hi cārhati // MatsP_159.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:16365: jitaḥ sa śakro nākasmāj jāyate saṃśrayāśrayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16380: senāṃ nākasadāṃ daityaḥ prāsādastho vyalokayat // MatsP_159.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:16382: apūrvaḥ ko bhavedyoddhā yo mayā na vinirjitaḥ // MatsP_159.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:16386: suravadana kumudakānana-vikāsanendo kumāra jaya ditijakulamahodadhivaḍavānala || MatsP_159.40
GP12mtp176pu:16389: jaya viśākha vibho jaya sakalalokatāraka jaya devasenānāyaka |
GP12mtp176pu:16390: skanda jaya gaurīnandana ghaṇṭāpriya priya viśākha vibho dhṛtapatākaprakīrṇapaṭala |
GP12mtp176pu:16392: jaya janitasaṃbhrama līlālūnākhilārāte jaya sakalalokatāraka ditijāsuravaratārakāntaka |
GP12mtp176pu:16393: skanda jaya bāla saptavāsara jaya bhuvanāvaliśokavināśana || MatsP_159.43
GP12mtp176pu:16396: sasmāra brahmaṇo vākyaṃ vadhaṃ bālādupasthitam // MatsP_160.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:16401: yodhā dhāvata gṛhīta yojayadhvaṃ varūthinīm // MatsP_160.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:16403: kiṃ bāla yoddhukāmo 'si krīḍa kandukalīlayā // MatsP_160.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:16405: bālatvādatha te buddhir evaṃ svalpārthadarśinī // MatsP_160.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:16407: śṛṇu tāraka śāstrārthas tava caiva nirūpyate // MatsP_160.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:16409: śiśutvaṃ māvamaṃsthā me śiśuḥ kālabhujaṃgamaḥ // MatsP_160.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16410: duṣprekṣyo bhāskaro bālas tathāhaṃ durjayaḥ śiśuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16411: alpākṣaro na mantraḥ kiṃ susphuro daitya dṛśyate // MatsP_160.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16418: mene ca durjayaṃ daityas tadā ṣaḍvadanaṃ raṇe /
GP12mtp176pu:16419: cintayāmāsa buddhyā vai prāptaḥ kālo na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_160.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:16421: sarve daityeśvarā jaghnuḥ kumāraṃ raṇadāruṇam // MatsP_160.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:16423: raṇaśauṇḍāstu daityendrāḥ punaḥ prāsaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // MatsP_160.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:16425: kumārasya vyathā nābhūd daityāstranihatasya tu // MatsP_160.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:16431: vidruteṣvatha daityeṣu hateṣu ca samantataḥ // MatsP_160.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:16433: jagrāha ca gadāṃ divyāṃ hemajālapariṣkṛtām // MatsP_160.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:16437: bibheda tārakaḥ kruddhaḥ sa sainye 'suranāyakaḥ // MatsP_160.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:16439: jagrāha śaktiṃ vimalāṃ raṇe kanakabhūṣaṇām // MatsP_160.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:16443: hato 'syadya mayā śaktyā smara śastraṃ suśikṣitam // MatsP_160.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:16444: ityuktvā ca tataḥ śaktiṃ mumoca ditijaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:16447: gatāsuḥ sa papātorvyāṃ pralaye bhūdharo yathā /
GP12mtp176pu:16450: nābhūt kaścit tadā duḥkhī narakeṣvapi pāpakṛt // MatsP_160.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:16452: jagmuḥ svāneva bhavanān bhūridhāmāna utsukāḥ // MatsP_160.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:16453: daduścāpi varaṃ sarve devāḥ skandamukhaṃ prati /
GP12mtp176pu:16455: *devā ūcuḥ yaḥ paṭhetskandasambaddhāṃ kathāṃ martyo mahāmatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16459: saṃdhyāmupāsya yaḥ pūrvāṃ skandasya caritaṃ paṭhet /
GP12mtp176pu:16460: sa muktaḥ kilbiṣaiḥ sarvair mahādhanapatirbhavet // MatsP_160.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:16463: tanukṣaye ca sāyujyaṃ ṣaṇmukhasya vrajennaraḥ // MatsP_160.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:16467: *sūta uvāca purā kṛtayuge viprā hiraṇyakaśipuḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16471: tataḥ śamadamābhyāṃ ca brahmacaryeṇa caiva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:16472: brahmā prīto 'bhavattasya tapasā niyamena ca // MatsP_161.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:16477: digbhiś caiva vidigbhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgaraistathā /
GP12mtp176pu:16482: brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityaṃ vacanamabravīt // MatsP_161.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16484: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmamāpnuhi // MatsP_161.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:16487: na mānuṣāḥ piśācā vā hanyurmāṃ devasattama // MatsP_161.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:16488: ṛṣayo vā na māṃ śāpaiḥ śapeyuḥ prapitāmaha /
GP12mtp176pu:16489: yadi me bhagavānprīto vara eṣa vṛto mayā // MatsP_161.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:16490: na cāstreṇa na śastreṇa giriṇā pādapena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:16491: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa na divā na niśātha vā // MatsP_161.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:16493: salilaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa // MatsP_161.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:16494: ahaṃ krodhaśca kāmaśca varuṇo vāsavo yamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16498: sarvānkāmānsadā vatsa prāpsyasi tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // MatsP_161.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:16499: evamuktvā sa bhagavāñ jagāmākāśa eva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:16501: tato devāśca nāgāśca gandharvā ṛṣibhiḥ saha /
GP12mtp176pu:16506: sraṣṭā tvaṃ havyakavyānām avyaktaprakṛtir budhaḥ // MatsP_161.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:16510: tapaso 'nte 'sya bhagavān vadhaṃ viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati // MatsP_161.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:16513: labdhamātre vare cātha sarvāḥ so 'bādhata prajāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16518: trailokyaṃ vaśamānīya svarge vasati dānavaḥ // MatsP_161.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:16525: *devā ūcuḥ nārāyaṇa mahābhāga devāstvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16526: trāyasva jahi daityendraṃ hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabho // MatsP_161.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:16527: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo dhātā tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo guruḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16528: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo devo brahmādīnāṃ surottama // MatsP_161.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:16531: tathaiva tridivaṃ devāḥ pratipadyata mā ciram // MatsP_161.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:16536: sāhāyyaṃ ca mahābāhur oṃkāraṃ gṛhya satvaram /
GP12mtp176pu:16539: tejasā bhāskarākāraḥ śaśī kāntyeva cāparaḥ // MatsP_161.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:16541: nārasiṃhena vapuṣā pāṇiṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā // MatsP_161.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:16554: susukhā na ca duḥkhā sā na śītā na ca gharmadā /
GP12mtp176pu:16555: na kṣutpipāse glāniṃ vā prāpya tāṃ prāpnuvanti te // MatsP_161.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:16557: stambhairna vibhṛtā sā vai śāśvatī cākṣapā sadā // MatsP_161.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:16558: ati candraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca śikhinaṃ ca svayaṃprabhā /
GP12mtp176pu:16560: sarve ca kāmāḥ pracurā ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16563: uṣṇe śītāni toyāni śīte coṣṇāni santi ca // MatsP_161.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:16565: latāvitānasaṃchannā nadīṣu ca saraḥsu ca // MatsP_161.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:16567: gandhavanti ca puṣpāṇi rasavanti phalāni ca // MatsP_161.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:16568: nātiśītāni noṣṇāni tatra tatra sarāṃsi ca /
GP12mtp176pu:16569: apaśyatsarvatīrthāni sabhāyāṃ tasya sa prabhuḥ // MatsP_161.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:16571: raktaiḥ kuvalayairnīlaiḥ kumudaiḥ saṃvṛtāni ca // MatsP_161.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:16579: cūtā nīpāḥ prasthapuṣpāḥ kadambā bakulā dhavāḥ // MatsP_161.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:16597: madhūkāḥ saptaparṇāśca bahavaḥ kṣīrakā drumāḥ // MatsP_161.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:16599: ete cānye ca bahavas tatra kānanajā drumāḥ // MatsP_161.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:16615: divyātha saurabheyī ca samīcī puñjikasthalī // MatsP_161.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:16616: miśrakeśī ca rambhā ca citralekhā śucismitā /
GP12mtp176pu:16617: cārukeśī ghṛtācī ca menakā corvaśī tathā // MatsP_161.75 //
GP12mtp176pu:16621: upāsate diteḥ putrāḥ sarve labdhavarāstathā // MatsP_161.77 //
GP12mtp176pu:16625: surahantā sunāmā ca pramatiḥ sumatirvaraḥ // MatsP_161.79 //
GP12mtp176pu:16631: sragviṇo vāgminaḥ sarve sadaiva caritavratāḥ // MatsP_161.82 //
GP12mtp176pu:16633: ete cānye ca bahavo hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabhum // MatsP_161.83 //
GP12mtp176pu:16637: bhūṣitāṅgā diteḥ putrās tamupāsanta sarvaśaḥ // MatsP_161.85 //
GP12mtp176pu:16640: na śrutaṃ naiva dṛṣṭaṃ hi hiraṇyakaśiporyathā /
GP12mtp176pu:16641: aiśvaryaṃ daityasiṃhasya yathā tasya mahātmanaḥ // MatsP_161.87 //
GP12mtp176pu:16652: vismitā dānavāḥ sarve hiraṇyakaśipuśca saḥ // MatsP_162.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:16654: na śrutaṃ na ca no dṛṣṭaṃ nārasiṃhamidaṃ vapuḥ // MatsP_162.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:16656: daityāntakaraṇaṃ ghoraṃ saṃśatīva mano mama // MatsP_162.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:16657: asya devāḥ śarīrasthāḥ sāgarāḥ saritaśca yāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16660: dhanado varuṇaścaiva yamaḥ śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ // MatsP_162.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16662: nāgā yakṣāḥ piśācāśca rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ // MatsP_162.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16663: brahmā devaḥ paśupatir lalāṭasthā bhramanti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:16664: sthāvarāṇi ca sarvāṇi jaṅgamāni tathaiva ca // MatsP_162.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16669: prajāpatiścātra manur mahātmā grahāśca yogāśca mahīruhāśca /
GP12mtp176pu:16670: utpātakālaśca dhṛtirmatiśca ratiśca satyaṃ ca tapo damaśca // MatsP_162.12
GP12mtp176pu:16671: sanatkumāraśca mahānubhāvo viśve ca devā ṛṣayaśca sarve /
GP12mtp176pu:16672: krodhaśca kāmaśca tathaiva harṣo dharmaśca mohaḥ pitaraśca sarve //
GP12mtp176pu:16674: uvāca dānavānsarvān gaṇāṃśca sa gaṇādhipaḥ // MatsP_162.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:16676: yadi vā saṃśayaḥ kaścid vadhyatāṃ vanagocaraḥ // MatsP_162.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:16680: babhañja tāṃ sabhāṃ divyāṃ vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // MatsP_162.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:16684: kālacakraṃ tathāghoraṃ viṣṇucakraṃ tathā param // MatsP_162.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:16687: raudraṃ tathograṃ śūlaṃ ca kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:16690: tathāpratihatāṃ śaktiṃ krauñcamastraṃ tathaiva ca // MatsP_162.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:16692: kampanaṃ śātanaṃ caiva tvāṣṭraṃ caiva subhairavam // MatsP_162.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16694: saṃvartanaṃ mohanaṃ ca tathā māyādharaṃ param // MatsP_162.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:16697: astraṃ pāśupataṃ caiva yasyāpratihatā gatiḥ // MatsP_162.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:16718: kṣipadbhir ugrair jvalitair mahābalair mahāstrapūgaiḥ susamāvṛto babhau /*
GP12mtp176pu:16734: avadhyasya mṛgendrasya na vyathāṃ cakrurāhave // MatsP_163.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:16738: vilayaṃ jagmurākāśe khadyotā iva parvate // MatsP_163.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16745: tāni cakrāṇi vadane viśamānāni bhānti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:16751: rarāja bhagnā sā śaktir mṛgendreṇa mahītale /
GP12mtp176pu:16755: sa garjitvā yathānyāyaṃ vikramya ca yathāsukham /
GP12mtp176pu:16760: diśo daśa vikīrṇā vai khadyotaprakarā iva // MatsP_163.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:16763: na ca taṃ cālayāmāsur daityaughā devasattamam /
GP12mtp176pu:16769: dhārā divi ca sarvatra vasudhāyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16770: na spṛśanti ca tā devaṃ nipatantyo 'niśaṃ bhuvi // MatsP_163.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16777: tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ yudhi dānavaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16784: hiraṇyakaśipuṃ daityaṃ vivarṇāḥ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // MatsP_163.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:16790: ityevaṃ kṣubhitāḥ sapta maruto gaganecarāḥ // MatsP_163.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:16791: ye grahāḥ sarvalokasya kṣaye prādurbhavanti vai /
GP12mtp176pu:16792: te sarve gagane dṛṣṭā vyacaranta yathāsukham // MatsP_163.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:16795: vivarṇatāṃ ca bhagavān gato divi divākaraḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16796: kṛṣṇaṃ kabandhaṃ ca tathā lakṣyate sumahaddivi // MatsP_163.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:16799: sapta dhūmranibhā ghorāḥ sūryā divi samutthitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16801: vāme tu dakṣiṇe caiva sthitau śukrabṛhaspatī /
GP12mtp176pu:16811: akāle ca drumāḥ sarve puṣpanti ca phalanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:16812: latāśca saphalāḥ sarvā ye cāhurdaityanāśanam // MatsP_163.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:16813: phalaiḥ phalānyajāyanta puṣpaiḥ puṣpaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:16814: unmīlanti nimīlanti hasanti ca rudanti ca // MatsP_163.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:16815: vikrośanti ca gambhīrā dhūmayanti jvalanti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:16820: na prakāśanti ca diśo raktareṇusamākulāḥ // MatsP_163.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:16822: vāyuvegena hanyante bhajyante praṇamanti ca // MatsP_163.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:16823: yadā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ chāyā na parivartate /
GP12mtp176pu:16829: ete cānye ca bahavo ghorotpātāḥ samutthitāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16840: tadā kruddhena mahatā kampitāni samantataḥ // MatsP_163.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:16844: nadī bhāgīrathī caiva sarayūḥ kauśikī tathā // MatsP_163.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:16845: yamunā tvatha kāverī kṛṣṇaveṇā ca nimnagā /
GP12mtp176pu:16846: suveṇā ca mahābhāgā nadī godāvarī tathā // MatsP_163.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:16849: narmadā śubhatoyā ca tathā vetravatī nadī /
GP12mtp176pu:16856: māgadhāśca mahāgrāmā muṇḍāḥ śuṅgāstathaiva ca // MatsP_163.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:16860: raktatoyo mahābhīmo lauhityo nāma sāgaraḥ // MatsP_163.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:16893: hemagarbho mahāśailas tathā hemasakho giriḥ // MatsP_163.84 //
GP12mtp176pu:16901: devābhraparvataścaiva tathā vai reṇuko giriḥ // MatsP_163.88 //
GP12mtp176pu:16903: ete cānye ca girayo deśā janapadāstathā // MatsP_163.89 //
GP12mtp176pu:16915: mahī ca kālaśca śaśī nabhaśca grahāśca sūryaśca diśaśca sarvāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16916: nadyaśca śailāśca mahārṇavāśca gatāḥ prasādaṃ ditiputranāśāt //
GP12mtp176pu:16921: *devā ūcuḥ bhavānbrahmā ca rudraśca mahendro devasattamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16922: bhavānkartā vikartā ca lokānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ // MatsP_163.98 //
GP12mtp176pu:16923: parāṃ ca siddhiṃ ca paraṃ ca devaṃ paraṃ ca mantraṃ paramaṃ haviśca /
GP12mtp176pu:16924: paraṃ ca dharmaṃ paramaṃ ca viśvaṃ tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam //
GP12mtp176pu:16925: paraṃ śarīraṃ paramaṃ ca brahma paraṃ ca yogaṃ paramāṃ ca vāṇīm /
GP12mtp176pu:16926: paraṃ rahasyaṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam //
GP12mtp176pu:16927: evaṃ parasyāpi paraṃ padaṃ yat paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ ca devam /
GP12mtp176pu:16928: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ ca bhūtaṃ tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam //
GP12mtp176pu:16929: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ rahasyaṃ paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ mahattvam /
GP12mtp176pu:16930: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ mahadyat tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam //
GP12mtp176pu:16931: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ nidhānaṃ paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ pavitram /
GP12mtp176pu:16932: paraṃ parasyāpi paraṃ ca dāntaṃ tvāmāhuragryaṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇam //
GP12mtp176pu:16934: stutvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ brahmalokaṃ gataḥ prabhuḥ // MatsP_163.104 //
GP12mtp176pu:16942: *ṛṣaya ūcuḥ kathitaṃ narasiṃhasya māhātmyaṃ vistareṇa ca /
GP12mtp176pu:16945: kathaṃ ca vaiṣṇavī sṛṣṭiḥ padmamadhye 'bhavatpurā // MatsP_164.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:16946: *sūta uvāca śrutvā ca narasiṃhasya māhātmyaṃ ravinandanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16949: kathaṃ pādme mahākalpe tava padmamayaṃ jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:16952: puṣkare ca kathaṃ bhūtā devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā // MatsP_164.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:16954: śṛṇvatastasya me kīrtiṃ na tṛptirupajāyate // MatsP_164.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:16955: kiyatā caiva kālena śete vai puruṣottamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16956: kiyantaṃ vā svapiti ca ko 'sya kālasya saṃbhavaḥ // MatsP_164.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:16957: kiyatā vātha kālena hy uttiṣṭhati mahāyaśāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16958: kathaṃ cotthāya bhagavān sṛjate nikhilaṃ jagat // MatsP_164.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:16960: kathaṃ nirmitavāṃścaiva citraṃ lokaṃ sanātanam // MatsP_164.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:16970: *matsya uvāca nārāyaṇasya yaśasaḥ śravaṇe yā tava spṛhā /
GP12mtp176pu:16973: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vadatāṃ śrutvā vai sumahātmanām // MatsP_164.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:16977: yadvijñātuṃ mayā śakyam ṛṣimātreṇa sattamāḥ // MatsP_164.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:16979: viśvāyanaśca yadbrahmā na vedayati tattvataḥ // MatsP_164.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:16982: tadadhyātmavidāṃ cintyaṃ narakaṃ ca vikarmiṇām // MatsP_164.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:16985: sa yajño vedanirdiṣṭas tattapaḥ kavayo viduḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16986: yaḥ kartā kārako buddhir manaḥ kṣetrajña eva ca // MatsP_164.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:16988: prāṇaḥ pañcavidhaścaiva dhruva akṣara eva ca // MatsP_164.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:16989: kālaḥ pākaśca paktā ca draṣṭā svādhyāya eva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:16990: ucyate vividhairdevaiḥ sa evāyaṃ na tatparam // MatsP_164.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:16991: sa eva bhagavānsarvaṃ karoti vikaroti ca /
GP12mtp176pu:16994: yo vaktā yacca vaktavyaṃ yaccāhaṃ tadbravīmi vaḥ // MatsP_164.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:16996: yāḥ kathāścaiva vartante śrutayo vātha tatparāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:16997: viśvaṃ viśvapatiryaśca sa tu nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_164.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:16998: yatsatyaṃ yadamṛtamakṣaraṃ paraṃ yad yadbhūtaṃ paramamidaṃ ca yadbhaviṣyat /
GP12mtp176pu:16999: yatkiṃcic caramacaraṃ yadasti cānyat tatsarvaṃ puruṣavaraḥ prabhuḥ purāṇaḥ // MatsP_164.28
GP12mtp176pu:17001: *matsya uvāca catvāryāhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tu kṛtaṃ yugam /
GP12mtp176pu:17002: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā ravinandana // MatsP_165.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:17004: svadharmaniratāḥ santo jāyante yatra mānavāḥ // MatsP_165.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17005: viprāḥ sthitā dharmaparā rājavṛttau sthitā nṛpāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17006: kṛṣyāmabhiratā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ śuśrūṣavaḥ sthitāḥ // MatsP_165.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:17007: tadā satyaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca dharmaścaiva vivardhate /
GP12mtp176pu:17008: sadbhirācaritaṃ karma kriyate khyāyate ca vai // MatsP_165.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:17010: prāṇināṃ dharmasaṅgānām api vai nīcajanmanām // MatsP_165.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17012: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā parikīrtyate // MatsP_165.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17014: yatra satyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca tretādharmo vidhīyate // MatsP_165.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:17015: tretāyāṃ vikṛtiṃ yānti varṇāstvete na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17018: dvāparasya tu yā ceṣṭā tāmapi śrotumarhasi // MatsP_165.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17019: dvāparaṃ dve sahasre tu varṣāṇāṃ ravinandana /
GP12mtp176pu:17020: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā yugamucyate // MatsP_165.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17021: tatra cārthaparāḥ sarve prāṇino rajasā hatāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17022: sarve naiṣkṛtikāḥ kṣudrā jāyante ravinandana // MatsP_165.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17027: tathā varṣasahasraṃ tu varṣāṇāṃ dve śate api /
GP12mtp176pu:17028: saṃdhyayā saha saṃkhyātaṃ krūraṃ kaliyugaṃ smṛtam // MatsP_165.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17030: kāminastapasā hīnā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // MatsP_165.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:17031: naivātisāttvikaḥ kaścin na sādhurna ca satyavāk /
GP12mtp176pu:17032: nāstikā brahmabhaktā vā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // MatsP_165.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17034: viprāḥ śūdrasamācārāḥ santi sarve kalau yuge // MatsP_165.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17036: varṇānāṃ caiva saṃdeho yugānte ravinandana // MatsP_165.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17044: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca paśūnāṃ caiva sattama /
GP12mtp176pu:17045: tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kṛmiṇāṃ tathā // MatsP_165.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17048: bhūtvā sūryaścakṣuṣī cādadāno bhūtvā vāyuḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇajālam /
GP12mtp176pu:17049: bhūtvā vahnirnirdahansarvalokān bhūtvā megho bhūya ugro 'pyavarṣat //
GP12mtp176pu:17053: tataḥ pītvārṇavān sarvān nadīḥ kūpāṃśca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17054: parvatānāṃ ca salilaṃ sarvamādāya raśmibhiḥ // MatsP_166.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17061: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve bhūtānyeva ca yāni tu /
GP12mtp176pu:17062: gandho ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivīṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ // MatsP_166.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17063: jihvā rasaśca snehaśca saṃśritāḥ salile guṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17065: sparśaḥ prāṇaśca ceṣṭā ca pavane saṃśritā guṇāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17066: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ ca khānyeva gagane saṃśritā guṇāḥ // MatsP_166.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17068: mano buddhiśca sarveṣāṃ kṣetrajñaśceti yaḥ śrutaḥ // MatsP_166.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17072: teṣāṃ saṃgharṣaṇodbhūtaḥ pāvakaḥ śatadhā jvalan // MatsP_166.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17075: vimānāni ca divyāni purāṇi vividhāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17076: yāni cāśrayaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi so 'dahat // MatsP_166.12* //
GP12mtp176pu:17078: bhūyo nirvāpayāmāsa yugāntena ca karmaṇā // MatsP_166.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:17083: tena rodhena saṃchannā payasāṃ varṣato dharā /
GP12mtp176pu:17088: dagdhvā saṃplāvya ca tathā svapityekaḥ sanātanaḥ // MatsP_166.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17092: na cainaṃ kaścidavyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ veditumarhati // MatsP_166.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17093: kaścaiva puruṣo nāma kiṃyogaḥ kaśca yogavān /
GP12mtp176pu:17094: asau kiyantaṃ kālaṃ ca ekārṇavavidhiṃ prabhuḥ // MatsP_166.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:17095: kariṣyatīti bhagavān iti kaścin na budhyate // MatsP_166.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17096: na draṣṭā naiva gamitā na jñātā naiva pārśvagaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17097: tasya na jñāyate kiṃcit tamṛte devasattamam // MatsP_166.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:17098: nabhaḥ kṣitiṃ pavanam apaḥ prakāśakaṃ prajāpatiṃ bhuvanadharaṃ sureśvaram /
GP12mtp176pu:17099: pitāmahaṃ śrutinilayaṃ mahāmuniṃ praśāmya bhūyaḥ śayanaṃ hyarocayat //
GP12mtp176pu:17104: virajaskaṃ mahābāhum akṣayaṃ brahma yadviduḥ // MatsP_167.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17107: yāthātathyaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ bhūtaṃ tadbrahmaṇā purā /
GP12mtp176pu:17110: yaścānyaḥ puruṣākhyaḥ syāt sa eṣa puruṣottamaḥ // MatsP_167.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17111: ye ca yajñakarā viprā ye cartvija iti smṛtāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17112: asmādeva purā bhūtā yajñebhyaḥ śrūyatāṃ tathā // MatsP_167.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17113: brahmāṇaṃ prathamaṃ vaktrād udgātāraṃ ca sāmagam /
GP12mtp176pu:17116: tau mitrāvaruṇau pṛṣṭhāt pratiprastārameva ca // MatsP_167.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17120: grāvastutaṃ tu pādābhyām unnetāraṃ ca yājuṣam // MatsP_167.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17130: āśramāṇi ca puṇyāni devatāyatanāni ca // MatsP_167.15 //
GP12mtp176pu:17132: japahomaparaḥ śāntas tapo ghoraṃ samāsthitaḥ // MatsP_167.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17134: sa niṣkrāmanna cātmānaṃ jānīte devamāyayā // MatsP_167.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17140: kiṃ nu syānmama cinteyaṃ mohaḥ svapno 'nubhūyate // MatsP_167.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17142: na hīdṛśaṃ jagatkleśam ayuktaṃ satyamarhati // MatsP_167.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:17144: katamaḥ syādayaṃ loka iti cintāmavasthitaḥ // MatsP_167.22 //
GP12mtp176pu:17148: śarvaryāṃ jāgratamiva bhāsantaṃ svena tejasā // MatsP_167.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17150: tathaiva sa muniḥ kukṣiṃ punareva praveśitaḥ // MatsP_167.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:17153: sa tathaiva yathāpūrvaṃ yo dharāmaṭate purā /
GP12mtp176pu:17158: catvāraścāśramāḥ samyag yathoddiṣṭā mayā tava // MatsP_167.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:17160: carataḥ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ na kukṣyantaḥ samīkṣitaḥ // MatsP_167.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:17173: mā bhairvatsa na bhetavyam ihaivāyāhi me 'ntikam /
GP12mtp176pu:17174: mārkaṇḍeyo munistvāha bālaṃ taṃ śramapīḍitaḥ // MatsP_167.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:17175: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca ko māṃ nāmnā kīrtayati tapaḥ paribhavanmama /
GP12mtp176pu:17176: divyaṃ varṣasahasrākhyaṃ dharṣayanniva me vayaḥ // MatsP_167.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:17177: na hyeṣa vaḥ samācāro deveṣvapi mamocitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17178: māṃ brahmāpi hi deveśo dīrghāyuriti bhāṣate // MatsP_167.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:17181: *sūta uvāca evamābhāṣya taṃ krodhān mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17183: *śrībhagavān uvāca ahaṃ te janako vatsa hṛṣīkeśaḥ pitā guruḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17184: āyuṣpradātā paurāṇaḥ kiṃ māṃ tvaṃ nopasarpasi // MatsP_167.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:17185: māṃ putrakāmaḥ prathamaṃ pitā te 'ṅgiraso muniḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17189: kaḥ samutsahate cānyo yo na bhūtātmakātmajaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17195: *mārkaṇḍeya uvāca iccheyaṃ tattvato māyām imāṃ jñātuṃ tavānagha /
GP12mtp176pu:17198: tarkaye tvāṃ mahātmānaṃ ko hyanyaḥ sthātumarhati // MatsP_167.49 //
GP12mtp176pu:17205: ahaṃ yogī yugākhyasya yugāntāvarta eva ca // MatsP_167.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:17207: bhujaṃgānāmahaṃ śeṣas tārkṣyo vai sarvapakṣiṇām // MatsP_167.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:17211: yattatsatyaṃ ca paramam ahamekaḥ prajāpatiḥ // MatsP_167.55 //
GP12mtp176pu:17213: ahamijyā kriyā cāham ahaṃ vidyādhipaḥ smṛtaḥ // MatsP_167.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:17214: ahaṃ jyotirahaṃ vāyur ahaṃ bhūmirahaṃ nabhaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17215: ahamāpaḥ samudrāśca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa // MatsP_167.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:17219: ahaṃ purāṇaḥ paramaṃ tathaivāhaṃ parāyaṇam // MatsP_167.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:17221: yatkiṃcitpaśyase vipra yacchṛṇoṣi ca kiṃcana // MatsP_167.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:17223: viśvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ sṛjyaṃ cādyāpi paśya mām // MatsP_167.61 //
GP12mtp176pu:17224: yuge yuge ca srakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyākhilaṃ jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:17226: śuśrūṣurmama dharmāṃśca kukṣau cara sukhaṃ mama /
GP12mtp176pu:17227: mama brahmā śarīrastho devaiśca ṛṣibhiḥ saha // MatsP_167.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:17233: tato bhagavataḥ kukṣiṃ praviṣṭo munisattamaḥ // MatsP_167.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:17238: *matsya uvāca āpavaḥ sa vibhurbhūtvā cārayāmāsa vai tapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17243: nirākāśe toyamaye sūkṣme jagati gahvare // MatsP_168.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:17260: bahujanmā hi viśvātmā brahmaṇo havirucyate // MatsP_168.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17262: jñānaṃ vṛṣṭaṃ tu viśvārthe yogināṃ yāti mukhyatām // MatsP_168.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17264: pade brahmaṇi viśveśaṃ nyayojayata yogavit // MatsP_168.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:17266: jale krīḍaṃśca vidhivan modate sarvalokakṛt // MatsP_168.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17278: yā padmā sā rasā devī pṛthivī paricakṣyate /
GP12mtp176pu:17280: himavantaṃ ca meruṃ ca nīlaṃ niṣadhameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17281: kailāsaṃ muñjavantaṃ ca tathānyaṃ gandhamādanam // MatsP_169.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17282: puṇyaṃ triśikharaṃ caiva kāntaṃ mandarameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17283: udayaṃ piñjaraṃ caiva vindhyavantaṃ ca parvatam // MatsP_169.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17284: ete devagaṇānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām /
GP12mtp176pu:17287: jambūdvīpasya saṃsthānaṃ yajñiyā yatra vai kriyāḥ // MatsP_169.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17291: asaṃkhyeyāḥ pṛthivyāste viśve vai dhātuparvatāḥ // MatsP_169.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17292: yāni padmasya parṇāni bhūrīṇi tu narādhipa /
GP12mtp176pu:17293: te durgamāḥ śailacitā mlecchadeśā vikalpitāḥ // MatsP_169.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17295: daityānāmuragāṇāṃ ca pataṅgānāṃ ca pārthiva // MatsP_169.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17299: proktātha dikṣu sarvāsu catvāraḥ salilākarāḥ // MatsP_169.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17305: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca hradānāṃ caiva nirmitaḥ // MatsP_169.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17307: śanaiḥ svayaṃbhūḥ śayanaṃ sṛjattadā jaganmayaṃ padmavidhiṃ mahārṇave //
GP12mtp176pu:17310: tenaiva ca sahodbhūto hy asuro nāma kaiṭabhaḥ // MatsP_170.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:17311: tau rajastamasau viṣṇoḥ sambhūtau tāmasau gaṇau /
GP12mtp176pu:17321: tau tatra vicarantau sma puṣkare viśvatomukham /
GP12mtp176pu:17328: ādhāya niyamaṃ mohād āste tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ // MatsP_170.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17331: tatra kaścodbhavastubhyaṃ kena vāsi na yojitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17332: kaḥ sraṣṭā kaśca te goptā kena nāmnā vidhīyase // MatsP_170.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17338: āvābhyāṃ chādyate viśvaṃ tamasā rajasātha vai // MatsP_170.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17343: sukhaṃ yatra mudā yuktaṃ yatra śrīḥ kīrtireva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17344: yeṣāṃ yatkāṅkṣitaṃ caiva tattadāvāṃ vicintaya // MatsP_170.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17346: yatnād yogavato dṛṣṭyā yogaḥ pūrvaṃ mayārjitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17347: taṃ samādhāya guṇavat sattvaṃ cāsmi samāśritaḥ // MatsP_170.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17348: yaḥ paro yogamatimān yogākhyaḥ sattvameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17351: sa eva hi yuvāṃ nāṃśe vaśī devo haniṣyati // MatsP_170.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17359: tvamāvāṃ pāhi hetvartham idaṃ nau buddhikāraṇam // MatsP_170.24 //
GP12mtp176pu:17360: amoghadarśanaḥ sa tvaṃ yatastvāṃ vidvaḥ śāśvatam /
GP12mtp176pu:17365: kimarthaṃ hi drutaṃ brūtaṃ varaṃ hyasurasattamau /
GP12mtp176pu:17366: dattāyuṣkau punarbhūyo raho jīvitum icchathaḥ // MatsP_170.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:17369: tamicchāvo vadhaścaiva tvatto no 'stu mahāvrata // MatsP_170.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:17372: bhaviṣyato na saṃdehaḥ satyametadbravīmi vām // MatsP_170.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:17373: varaṃ pradāyātha mahāsurābhyāṃ sanātano viśvavaraḥ surottamaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17374: rajastamovargabhavāyanau yamau mamantha tāvūrutalena vai prabhuḥ //
GP12mtp176pu:17376: *matsya uvāca sthitvā ca tasminkamale brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17382: sāṃkhyācāryo hi matimān kapilo brāhmaṇo varaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17389: trīnimān kṛtavāṃllokān yatheyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutiḥ // MatsP_171.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:17393: kiṃ kurmastava sāhāyyaṃ bravītu bhagavānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_171.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17397: brahmaṇastu tadarthaṃ tu tadā bhūyaḥ samutthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17398: śuśrūṣurasmi yuvayoḥ kiṃ karomi kṛtāñjaliḥ // MatsP_171.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17400: yatsatyamakṣaraṃ brahma hy aṣṭādaśavidhaṃ tu tat /
GP12mtp176pu:17401: yatsatyaṃ yadṛtaṃ tattu paraṃ padamanusmara // MatsP_171.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17403: gatvā ca tatra brahmatvam agamajjñānatejasā // MatsP_171.13 //
GP12mtp176pu:17405: saṃkalpayitvā manasā tameva ca mahāmanāḥ // MatsP_171.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17408: brahmābhyāsaṃ tu kṛtavān bhuvaśca pṛthivīṃ gataḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17409: prāptaśca paramaṃ sthānaṃ sa tayoḥ pārśvamāgataḥ // MatsP_171.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17416: yaṃ kālaṃ tau gatau muktau brahmā taṃ kālameva hi /
GP12mtp176pu:17417: tato ghoratamaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃśritaḥ paramaṃ vratam // MatsP_171.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17420: tapasā tejasā caiva varcasā niyamena ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17423: tato jagāda tripadāṃ gāyatrīṃ vedapūjitām // MatsP_171.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:17427: viśve prajānāṃ patayo yebhyo lokā viniḥsṛtāḥ // MatsP_171.25 //
GP12mtp176pu:17429: sarvamantrahitaṃ puṇyaṃ nāmnā dharmaṃ sa sṛṣṭavān // MatsP_171.26 //
GP12mtp176pu:17430: dakṣaṃ marīcimatriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum /
GP12mtp176pu:17431: vasiṣṭhaṃ gautamaṃ caiva bhṛgumaṅgirasaṃ manum // MatsP_171.27 //
GP12mtp176pu:17435: tāmrā krodhātha suratā vinatā kadrureva ca // MatsP_171.29 //
GP12mtp176pu:17437: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putras tapasā nirmitaḥ kila // MatsP_171.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:17438: tasmai kanyā dvādaśānyā dakṣastāḥ pradadau tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:17439: nakṣatrāṇi ca somāya tadā vai dattavānṛṣiḥ // MatsP_171.31 //
GP12mtp176pu:17441: lakṣmīrmarutvatī sādhyā viśveśā ca matā śubhā // MatsP_171.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:17442: devī sarasvatī caiva brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:17443: etāḥ pañca variṣṭhā vai suraśreṣṭhāya pārthiva // MatsP_171.33 //
GP12mtp176pu:17445: yā tu rūpavatī patnī brahmaṇaḥ kāmarūpiṇī // MatsP_171.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:17446: surabhiḥ sā hitā bhūtvā brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitā /
GP12mtp176pu:17449: jajñire ca sutāstasyāṃ vipulā dhūmasaṃnibhāḥ // MatsP_171.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:17451: te rudanto dravantaśca garhayantaḥ pitāmaham // MatsP_171.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:17455: ahirbudhnyaśca bhagavān kapālī cāpi piṅgalaḥ // MatsP_171.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:17457: tasyāmeva surabhyāṃ ca gāvo yajñeśvarāśca vai // MatsP_171.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:17462: bhavaṃ ca prabhavaṃ caiva hīśaṃ cāsurahaṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:17465: vatsaraṃ caiva bhūtiṃ ca sarvāsuraniṣūdanam // MatsP_171.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:17467: vāsavānugatā devī janayāmāsa vai surān // MatsP_171.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:17468: varaṃ vai prathamaṃ devaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhruvamavyayam /
GP12mtp176pu:17469: viśvāvasuṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ somamīśvaram // MatsP_171.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:17471: saptamaṃ ca tathā vāyum aṣṭamaṃ nirṛtiṃ vasum // MatsP_171.47 //
GP12mtp176pu:17473: viśve devāśca viśvāyāṃ dharmājjātā iti śrutiḥ // MatsP_171.48 //
GP12mtp176pu:17480: agniṃ cakṣuṃ ravirjyotiḥ sāvitraṃ mitrameva ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17481: amaraṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca sukarṣaṃ ca mahābhujam // MatsP_171.52 //
GP12mtp176pu:17482: virājaṃ caiva vācaṃ ca viśvāvasumatiṃ tathā /
GP12mtp176pu:17483: aśvamitraṃ citraraśmiṃ tathā niṣadhanaṃ nṛpa // MatsP_171.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:17485: bṛhantaṃ vai bṛhadrūpaṃ tathā vai pūtanānugam // MatsP_171.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:17486: marutvatī purā jajña etānvai marutāṃ gaṇān /
GP12mtp176pu:17489: pūṣā mitraśca dhanado dhātā parjanya eva ca // MatsP_171.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:17491: ādityasya sarasvatyāṃ jajñāte dvau sutau varau // MatsP_171.57 //
GP12mtp176pu:17494: kālā tu vai kālakeyān asurānsurasā tu vai /
GP12mtp176pu:17497: tāmrā tvapsarasāṃ mātā puṇyānāṃ bhāratodbhava // MatsP_171.60 //
GP12mtp176pu:17503: evaṃ vṛddhiṃ samagaman viśve lokāḥ paraṃtapa // MatsP_171.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:17504: tadā vai pauṣkaro rājan prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17508: yaścedamagryaṃ śṛṇuyāt purāṇaṃ sadā naraḥ parvasu gauraveṇa /
GP12mtp176pu:17509: avāpya lokānsa hi vītarāgaḥ paratra ca svargaphalāni bhuṅkte //
GP12mtp176pu:17510: cakṣuṣā manasā vācā karmaṇā ca caturvidham /
GP12mtp176pu:17511: prasādayati yaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇo 'nuprasīdati // MatsP_171.67 //
GP12mtp176pu:17512: rājā ca labhate rājyam adhanaścottamaṃ dhanam /
GP12mtp176pu:17513: kṣīṇāyurlabhate cāyuḥ putrakāmaḥ sutaṃ tathā // MatsP_171.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:17514: yajñā vedāstathā kāmās tapāṃsi vividhāni ca /
GP12mtp176pu:17515: prāpnoti vividhaṃ puṇyaṃ viṣṇubhakto dhanāni ca // MatsP_171.69 //
GP12mtp176pu:17517: sarvaṃ vihāya ya imaṃ paṭhetpauṣkarakaṃ hareḥ // MatsP_171.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:17518: prādurbhāvaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha na tasya hyaśubhaṃ bhavet /
GP12mtp176pu:17522: *matsya uvāca viṣṇutvaṃ śṛṇu viṣṇośca haritvaṃ ca kṛte yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:17523: vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ ca deveṣu kṛṣṇatvaṃ mānuṣeṣu ca // MatsP_172.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:17524: īśvarasya hi tasyaiṣā karmaṇāṃ gahanā gatiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17527: nārāyaṇo hyanantātmā prabhavo 'vyaya eva ca // MatsP_172.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:17529: brahmā vāyuśca somaśca dharmaḥ śakro bṛhaspatiḥ // MatsP_172.4 //
GP12mtp176pu:17530: aditerapi putratvam eva yāti yuge yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:17531: eṣa viṣṇuriti khyāta indrasyāvarajo vibhuḥ // MatsP_172.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17539: kīrtanīyasya lokeṣu kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me // MatsP_172.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17540: vṛte vṛtravadhe tatra vartamāne kṛte yuge /
GP12mtp176pu:17542: yatra te dānavā ghorāḥ sarve saṅgrāmadurjayāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17545: trātāraṃ manasā jagmur devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // MatsP_172.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17553: divyāni ca vimānāni prapatantyutpatanti ca // MatsP_172.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17556: jātaṃ ca niṣprabhaṃ sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃcana /
GP12mtp176pu:17557: timiraughaparikṣiptā na rejuśca diśo daśa // MatsP_172.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17563: tejasā vapuṣā caiva kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇamivācalam // MatsP_172.21 //
GP12mtp176pu:17602: dadṛśuste sthitaṃ devaṃ divye lokamaye rathe /
GP12mtp176pu:17603: te kṛtāñjalayaḥ sarve devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ // MatsP_172.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:17605: sa teṣāṃ tāṃ giraṃ śrutvā viṣṇurdaivatadaivatam // MatsP_172.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:17607: ākāśe tu sthito viṣṇur uttamaṃ vapurāsthitaḥ // MatsP_172.43 //
GP12mtp176pu:17609: śāntiṃ vrajata bhadraṃ vo mā bhaiṣṭa marutāṃ gaṇāḥ // MatsP_172.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:17610: jitā me dānavāḥ sarve trailokyaṃ parigṛhyatām /
GP12mtp176pu:17611: te tasya satyasaṃdhasya viṣṇorvākyena toṣitāḥ // MatsP_172.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:17613: tatastamaḥ saṃhṛtaṃ tad vineśuśca balāhakāḥ // MatsP_172.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:17614: pravavuśca śivā vātāḥ praśāntāśca diśo daśa /
GP12mtp176pu:17621: yajñeṣu ca haviḥ pākaṃ śivamāpa ca pāvakaḥ // MatsP_172.50 //
GP12mtp176pu:17625: *matsya uvāca tato 'bhayaṃ viṣṇuvacaḥ śrutvā daityāśca dānavāḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17626: udyogaṃ vipulaṃ cakrur yuddhāya vijayāya ca // MatsP_173.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:17646: āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ pūrṇaṃ kṣepaṇīyaiśca mudgaraiḥ // MatsP_173.11 //
GP12mtp176pu:17652: pramukhe tasya sainyasya dīptaśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // MatsP_173.14 //
GP12mtp176pu:17656: varāhaḥ pramukhe tasthau sapraroha ivācalaḥ // MatsP_173.16 //
GP12mtp176pu:17680: bāhubhiḥ parighākārais tarjayanti sma devatāḥ // MatsP_173.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:17684: cakraiśca daityapravarāś cakrur ānanditaṃ balam // MatsP_173.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:17691: surāṇāmapi sainyasya vistāraṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śṛṇu // MatsP_174.1 //
GP12mtp176pu:17692: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca mahābalau /
GP12mtp176pu:17702: yamārūḍhaḥ sa bhagavān paryeti sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12mtp176pu:17703: havirdhāneṣu gāyanti viprā makhamukhe sthitāḥ // MatsP_174.7 //
GP12mtp176pu:17708: sa syandanavaro bhāti gupto mātalinā tadā /
GP12mtp176pu:17709: kṛtsnaḥ parivṛto merur bhāskarasyeva tejasā // MatsP_174.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17723: vimānayodhī dhanado vimāne puṣpake sthitaḥ // MatsP_174.17 //
GP12mtp176pu:17725: ukṣāṇamāsthitaḥ saṃkhye sākṣādiva śivaḥ svayam // MatsP_174.18 //
GP12mtp176pu:17727: varuṇaḥ paścimaṃ pakṣam uttaraṃ naravāhanaḥ // MatsP_174.19 //
GP12mtp176pu:17729: svāsu dikṣu svarakṣanta tasya devabalasya te // MatsP_174.20 //
GP12mtp176pu:17735: cacāra madhye lokānāṃ dvādaśātmā dineśvaraḥ // MatsP_174.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:17742: jagataḥ prathamaṃ bhāgaṃ saumyaṃ satyamayaṃ ratham /
GP12mtp176pu:17744: yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pañcadhā bhidyate nṛṣu /
GP12mtp176pu:17745: saptadhātugato lokāṃs trīndadhāra cacāra ca // MatsP_174.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:17750: sa vāyuḥ sarvabhūtāyur udbhūtaḥ svena tejasā /
GP12mtp176pu:17757: upatasthuḥ suragaṇāḥ prahartuṃ dānavaṃ balam // MatsP_174.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:17765: kareṇa kālīṃ vapuṣā śatrukālapradāṃ gadām // MatsP_174.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:17795: *matsya uvāca tābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ saṃjajñe tumulo vigrahastadā /
GP12mtp176pu:17798: samīyuryudhyamānā vai parvatā iva parvataiḥ // MatsP_175.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17810: viṣaṇṇavadanā devā jagmurārtiṃ parāṃ mṛdhe // MatsP_175.8 //
GP12mtp176pu:17812: bhinnoraskā ditisutair vemū raktaṃ vraṇairbahu // MatsP_175.9 //
GP12mtp176pu:17814: praviṣṭā dānavīṃ māyāṃ na śekuste viceṣṭitum // MatsP_175.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17818: śakro daityabalaṃ ghoraṃ viveśa bahulocanaḥ // MatsP_175.12 //
GP12mtp176pu:17831: sā dadāha tataḥ sarvān māyā mayavikalpitā /
GP12mtp176pu:17837: saṃtate māyayā sainye hanyamāne ca dānavaiḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17840: ūrvaḥ sapūrvatejasvī sadṛśo brahmaṇo guṇaiḥ // MatsP_175.23 //
GP12mtp176pu:17850: ekadehāni tiṣṭhanti viviktāni vinā prajāḥ // MatsP_175.28 //
GP12mtp176pu:17854: tvayā dharmo 'rjitastena dvitīyāṃ kuru vai tanum // MatsP_175.30 //
GP12mtp176pu:17855: sa evamukto munibhir munir marmasu tāḍitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17857: yathāyaṃ vihito dharo munīnāṃ śāśvataḥ purā /
GP12mtp176pu:17858: ārṣaṃ vai sevataḥ karma vanyamūlaphalāśinaḥ // MatsP_175.32 //
GP12mtp176pu:17862: asmākaṃ tu varaṃ vṛttir vanāśramanivāsinām // MatsP_175.34 //
GP12mtp176pu:17866: brahmacaryaṃ puraskṛtya prārthayanti parāṃ gatim // MatsP_175.36 //
GP12mtp176pu:17868: evamāhuḥ pare loke brahmacaryavido janāḥ // MatsP_175.37 //
GP12mtp176pu:17869: brahmacarye sthitaṃ satyaṃ brahmacarye sthitaṃ tapaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17870: ye sthitā brahmacarye tu brāhmaṇā divi saṃsthitāḥ // MatsP_175.38 //
GP12mtp176pu:17871: nāsti yogaṃ vinā siddhir na vā siddhiṃ vinā yaśaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17872: nāsti loke yaśomūlaṃ brahmacaryātparaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_175.39 //
GP12mtp176pu:17874: brahmacaryaṃ samādhatte kimataḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // MatsP_175.40 //
GP12mtp176pu:17876: abrahmacarye caryā ca trayaṃ syād dambhasaṃjñakam // MatsP_175.41 //
GP12mtp176pu:17877: kva dārāḥ kva ca saṃyogaḥ kva ca bhāvaviparyayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17878: nanviyaṃ brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā manasā mānasī prajā // MatsP_175.42 //
GP12mtp176pu:17882: na dārayogo bījaṃ vā vratamuktaṃ tapasvinām // MatsP_175.44 //
GP12mtp176pu:17884: vyāhṛtaṃ sadbhiratyartham asadbhiriva me matam // MatsP_175.45 //
GP12mtp176pu:17886: dārayogaṃ vinā srakṣye putram ātmatanūruham // MatsP_175.46 //
GP12mtp176pu:17896: kṣudhā me bādhate tāta jagadbhakṣye tyajasva mām // MatsP_175.51 //
GP12mtp176pu:17900: uvāca vāryatāṃ putro jagataśca dayāṃ kuru // MatsP_175.53 //
GP12mtp176pu:17902: tathyametadvacaḥ putra śṛṇu tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara // MatsP_175.54 //
GP12mtp176pu:17906: bhagavaṃstarpitaḥ putraḥ kairhavyaiḥ prāpsyate sukham // MatsP_175.56 //
GP12mtp176pu:17907: kutra cāsya nivāsaḥ syād bhojanaṃ vā kimātmakam /
GP12mtp176pu:17911: mama yonirjalaṃ vipra tasya pītavataḥ sukham // MatsP_175.58 //
GP12mtp176pu:17913: taddhavistava putrasya visṛjāmyālayaṃ ca tat // MatsP_175.59 //
GP12mtp176pu:17914: tato yugānte bhūtānām eṣa cāhaṃ ca putraka /
GP12mtp176pu:17916: eṣo 'gnir antakāle tu salilāśī mayā kṛtaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17920: pratiyātastato brahmā ye ca sarve maharṣayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17921: aurvasyāgneḥ prabhāṃ jñātvā svāṃ svāṃ gatimupāśritāḥ // MatsP_175.63 //
GP12mtp176pu:17925: tapasā te muniśreṣṭha parituṣṭaḥ pitāmahaḥ // MatsP_175.65 //
GP12mtp176pu:17926: ahaṃ tu tava putrasya tava caiva mahāvrata /
GP12mtp176pu:17927: bhṛtya ityavagantavyaḥ sādhyo yadiha karmaṇā // MatsP_175.66 //
GP12mtp176pu:17930: *aurva uvāca dhanyo 'smyanugṛhīto 'smi yasya te 'haṃ guruḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17931: nāsti me tapasānena bhayamadyeha suvrata // MatsP_175.68 //
GP12mtp176pu:17932: tāmeva māyāṃ gṛhṇīṣva mama putreṇa nirmitām /
GP12mtp176pu:17935: saṃrakṣatyātmapakṣaṃ ca vipakṣaṃ ca pradhakṣyati // MatsP_175.70 //
GP12mtp176pu:17937: jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtārtho dānaveśvaraḥ // MatsP_175.71 //
GP12mtp176pu:17940: tasmiṃstu vyutthite daitye nirvīryaiṣā na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12mtp176pu:17941: śāpo hyasyāḥ purā dattaḥ sṛṣṭā yenaiva tejasā // MatsP_175.73 //
GP12mtp176pu:17943: dīyatāṃ me sakhā śakra toyayonirniśākaraḥ // MatsP_175.74 //
GP12mtp176pu:17949: gaccha soma sahāyatvaṃ kuru pāśadharasya vai /
GP12mtp176pu:17950: asurāṇāṃ vināśāya jayārthaṃ ca divaukasām // MatsP_176.2 //
GP12mtp176pu:17952: tvanmayaṃ sarvalokeṣu rasaṃ rasavido viduḥ // MatsP_176.3 //
GP12mtp176pu:17956: na viduḥ soma devāpi ye ca nakṣatrayonayaḥ // MatsP_176.5 //
GP12mtp176pu:17958: tamaḥ protsārya mahasā bhāsayasyakhilaṃ jagat // MatsP_176.6 //
GP12mtp176pu:17963: tvaṃ kāntiḥ kāntivapuṣāṃ tvaṃ somaḥ somapāyinām /
GP12mtp176pu:17966: śamaya tvāsurīṃ māyāṃ yayā dahyāma saṃyuge // MatsP_176.10 //
GP12mtp176pu:17967: *soma uvāca yanmāṃ vadasi yuddhārthe devarāja varaprada /
GP12mtp176pu:17974: veṣṭayanti sma tānghorān daityānmeghagaṇā iva // MatsP_176.14 //
